rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams nachags shing zhen la/ zhe sdangang rgyal gyis khengs pa dang 'byung ba ste/ dri dag gi don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams phan tshun las chen po nyams su len par byed
de de dag gi sdig pa rnams tshe rab sa kun tu r 'bar byed do zhes gsungs so// de'i tshe bdag gis smon lam btab pa// ji lta bu'i tshul dang thabs kyis de ra gzhan dag mchi pa de bzhin du/
bdag kyang mchib gyur cig ces bgyis nas/ de'i tshatsho rabs snga ma la bdag gi mar gyur pa de'i don bgyi ba dang/ rtsi nas ngan song gsum du mi mang bar bgyi ba'i slad du skye ba blangs so//
sngon gyi mi mjed kyi 'jigarten gyi khams su dge bsnyenam pusha zhes bgyi bar gyur pa dang/ gzhon nu nor bzang gis rnam par thar pa bdag la dris pa/ slan chad bdag gis mo'i nang du ma'i skye
bslangs te/ bdag gis sems can dag dang 'dod chags spyad nas mi gzhan gyis bdag la khro mo dang glen mar mthong ngo// sems can rnams yongs su grol ba'i slad du bud med
ba/ nang du mi bzad pa'i skye ba mang bo dag blangs te/ rgyal mo dang/ rgyal po'i bu mo dang/ budamed phal dang/ smad 'tshong ma dang/ sdug 'phongs pa dang/ bud med
cha dbul mo dag tu gyur te/ bud med du skyes pa rnams kyi don bgyid pa dang/ bud med rnams yongs su grol bar bgyid do// rang gi las kyi dbang gis ltar 'dod pa'i 'dod chags sdud kyang/
sems can de dag mgu bar ma nus te/ tshe rabs du mar mi mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can gyi don gyi slad du sdug bsngal mang po nyams su myong ste/ bud med du skye bas shin tu
skyo bar gyuran/ 'on kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis sug las chen por bka' stsal to/ tshor bas grangs ma mchis par bdag gis sdug bsngal bzod par bgyatshal te/ bcom ldan 'das
shAkya thub pa mnyes par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas nyid sgrub pa'i slad du bdag gis smon lam chen po btab pa/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i slad du tshong bas gzhan dag tubadag
la sdug bsngal 'acung bar 'gyur ba thams cad bdag gis bzod par bgyi'o// yul de srungs shig ces bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bka' stsal pa gang lags pa de na da dung
ming yang ma mchis/ yul yang m byung mod kyi/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das re dang/ 'khor der 'dus pa lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/

dri bro dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa thams cad las dam pa blang bar bgyi'o// ji srid du bdag tshe rabs de dag tu skye ban/ bdag la 'dod chags dang zhe
sdang gi gzhi'i mthong na'ang bdag la sdig pa las gyur cig/ ci rigs par skye ba'adus 'tshal bar gyur la/ 'di lta bu yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig/ gang gi tshe la lul thog mar byung ba'i dus la bab
ban/ de'i tshayul bgyid pa'i slad du der bdag thog mar rgyal por gyur cig/ li yul du nam rgyal po de dag gi ming chags shing rgyalakhas thog mkhyudaban/ tshorabs bdun du rgyal po byed par gyur
cig/ grong khyer dang ldan zhes bgyi bar nga bgyi'o// bal po se 'u tshal du nusangs rgyas kyi mchod rten chen po bgyi'o// yul rtamajug tu ni chos dang ldan pa'i rgyal po mchod rten bgyi'o// 'dum ti/

rarani dge 'dun gyi kun dag 'a ra ba chen po bgyi'o// rtsam banar yang dge 'dun gyi kun dga' ra ba chen po bgyi'o// pa ya ka ra ni gtsang khang na kho dang mchod rten chen po bgyi ste// ji srid du bdag rgyal
srid la gnas pa de srid du las chen po dag bgyi'o// gong gi tshorgyal po las shi' bos khrir gyur pa na'ang/ byang chub sems dpa' byams pa gang na bzhugs pa'i lhazhing du skye bar 'gyur te/ bdag des
mchis pa'i tshe ting nge 'dzin rnams dran par gyur cig/ de nas slar yang la yul 'dir skye ba len cing/ ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa bzhin du bud med kyi gzugs su gyur te/ skar
rdo'i rgyal po'i bu mo rab nges zhes bya bar gyur nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gzungs sngags ji snyed gsungs pa dang/ bdag gis rtogs pa gang lags
pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad de'abadag gis dran par gyur cig/ mdo sde 'di'ang shan tudran par gyu/ ci nas thams cad rgyas par gyur cig/ gang gi tsho dmag sde gnyis bcar

par 'gyur ba dang/ li yul gyi don gyi phyir las su bya ba yod par gyur pa dang/ gang gi tsho gzhon nu rdo rje sde skar rdo'i rgyal po rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya bar gyur nas/ la yul gyi phyir rgyud 'jal
skaba'i dus la bab pa de'i tsho/ bdag rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad dang/ 'khor de'i nang du ji snyed 'dus par gyur pa lha de dag thams car grogs su
gyur te/ mdo 'di dang gzungs sngags rnams bshad pa'i gzungs sngags de dag thams cad dang/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad bdag gis tshor bas thams cad du dran par gyur cig ces byas so// gang

tsha lu gi tshelha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis tshig de skad ces sas pa de'i tshadas ting nge 'dzin rnams thob ste/ zhes mdo 'di la sus kyang gnod pa byed mi nus par 'gyur ba'i 'dzin theg pa chen po'i
mdo dam pa'i chos pad+madakar po'i grong 'khyil ba zhes bya ba thob ste/ de'i tshes ngas rgyas thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ 'di skad ces bka'astsal to// gang gi tsho khyod las
rtsom pa de'atsho'od zer de dag steng du gnas par gyur te/ de'igang gas ma do 'di dran par 'gyur zhing/ shin tu nyams su len par 'gyur ba'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas yid la byed pa zhes bya ba
rtogs bar 'gyur spro/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis rdo rje'i de kyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i gzungs sngags gsungs pa de bar ng bzhin gang gses gzu ngas sngags rtogs par 'gyur
ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin skyong ba dang/ sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams chos thos pa de dag thams cad kyang dran pa byed do// lhamo dra ma med pa'i 'od des kyang byungachub sems
dang bo dag gisatibange 'dzin dang gzungs sngags ji ltar rtogs pa de de bzhin du rtogs pa byed do// rnam par rgyal pa'i go chas kyang rgyal srid thob par 'gyur te/ gzhan gyis bar chad byed
minus so// de dag gi las lan bdun bzlas brjod phyag la/ rta gnas kyi rig sngags gang gis sdig pa rnams 'byang bar 'gyur bar ya nga brjod par bya ste/ nyin lan gsum mtshan lan
gsum brjod na/ lo bdun gyis rdo 'dakyil 'khor gyi gzungs sngags rtogs par 'gyur ro// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis rdo rje'i dkyikhor gyi gzungs sngags 'di bshad pa de'i
tsho/ bcom ldan 'das kyi steng du lha rnams kyis lha'i me tog gi char phab ste/ lha'i rol mo'i sgra bsgrags nas 'di skad ces smras so// bdag gis kyang sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams las thos pa'i gzungs sngags rnams stsal bar bgyi'o// na ma sarba a khyud gtu/ badzraprasaN+Da 'photam s+ya/ ta thA ga tas+ya/ kadad[à ]/sa byas+ya/ bo d+hisatwas+ya///nams las bsal zur ro
tshathA/ bu sa ngan/ das pa raM/ de na yu ri/ ku myoru pra ti/ pa da ra pa b+ha ba tu/ tu/ ma ngu ga la raya ka dam pa tu/ sa pa dzam sa ra ta swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di nal rnams chad pas
gcod pa'i gzungs sngags zhes bya ste/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ tsArUrab brgyartsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na gang che byed kyang rung ste/ lha rnams kyis gzhig par mi nus so//
dkyil 'khor zam por byas te/ lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod khyas la/ mdud pa brgyartsa brgyad bor nas/ gang du brjod pa de'abyung pos gnod par byed mi nus so// byad stems khyed
par yang mi nus so// de nas de 'tsho 'khor de dag thams cad kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad do// tad+yathA/ sarba pA na/ sarba parnyan naN+Di takhardza te/ skan danatsa pa na/ na ma na pa nags

mchu ra/ da da tsa tshapa pa/ tshud ma ma/ b+haspyi mi/ daN+Da ka ra Na har/ su khar/ da ba ma 'a swA hU/ sa ba pa/ paru ka ra Na sa rA/ 'khor thams cad kyis bshad pa'i gzungs sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa
brgyad bzlas brjod byas te// mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyad byas nas skud pa de bsregs na khyim der byad stems kyis mi tshugs la/ 'byung ba'i nad rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro// tad+ya thA/ ra ti/
kar rta de ba bar budzadzari'i dzatibu sA tA/ gzungs sngags 'di lkogaman b.lan bdun bzlas brjod khyas nas/ g.yag rdzal mdud pa bdun bor ta garags pa la'o// tad+yathA/ sarba bud+d+ha
dam bka' khabaka6tshams ras glu/ gzungs sngags 'dilus la nad byung ba thams cad l lanabadun bzlas brjod byas nas/ skud pa la mdud pa bdun bdun bor te btags so// de nas
de'atsho 'khor de dag thams cad kyis pus mo'i lha ngas la btsugs te 'di skad ces gsol to// gang gi gzhon nu rdo rjeseyulaskar rdanas la yul du mam ba de'atsho/ gzungs sngags gang gis
shul du dpa' bo'i las bgyid par 'gyur ba'agazungs sngags bdag cag gis stsal bar 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ bu bu de da ba bis sa/ ban+d+ha pa pa ti/ pa pa ra ti ka la sa/ tapya/ shar ka
wA/ dzad tsho bar/ shad dra tra/ na ngos hA/ gzungs sngags 'ad 'gron du 'gro ba rnams kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ khrus byas la lag pa khru gsanas lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te
phyogs bzhu'athor ma/ bdag nyid kyis 'thungasan/ de la dgras gnod pa byed par mi nus te// dpa' bo'ilas kyang byed par 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis
'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ de bzhin du rnam thos kyi bu dang/ dbang phyug chen po dang/ kun tu rgyal dang/ 'phrogam bu dang bcas pa rnams kyis kyang 'di skad ces sas so// bdag cag gis
bya@#// kyang gzhon nu rdo rjesde de inas dgra rnams gnod pa byed mi nus par gzungs sngags 'di dag sbyin no// na mo badzra pU dza s+ya/ ta thA ga ta s+ya/ tapya/ badzra'i mi bi bi ma ma sa
ka /gu ma te/ ad d+ha'i/ ad d+hare a ra dzAl/ pA rAn sA hA/ narlom hashar s+ya/ na mo ba khrimaN s+ya/ na ma sany+tsaya s+ya/ namo par tiya ba sa pu tra/ pa ri pa ra ya/ tar wA/ sa sa sa sa/ hA/

hAhA/ pra yA pra ya pra ya dri ma/ pu trapu tra pu tA/ ba' dat+taka ra/ ts+tshin+da mu le bad tresha na ka ra sU tA dbang phyug chen po dang/ rnam thos kyi bu dang/ kun tu rgyal ba dang/ 'phrog ma bu dang bcas
pa rnams kyis gzungs sngags 'di bshad nas 'di skad ces gsol to// ngoltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag cag sugalasachen po bskos pa'i gzungs sngags gzhan gyis ma tshugs pa de dag kyang bdag

cag gis bshad pa'i tshal lo// lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od de dang/ gzhon nu rdo rjesde skar rdo'i rgyal bo rnam par rgyal ba'i go mar 'gyur ba gang lags pa des chad bas gcad par bgyi ba de'ang bdag cag gis
bshad par bgyi'o// gang gatshodakra'am/ su'ang rung ba dag sdig pa'ilas rtsom pan/ gzungs sngags khashad pa 'di gnyis lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te/ skud pa sngon po la mdud pa bdun bor nas/
bsregs te/ sra rtsa pog gi bdug pas bsregs la/ mi de'i ming nas brjod na gnod pa byed mi nus so// bdag cag gis yid dam dang por bcas pa bzhin duste/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo
ba dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par ma bgyis na/ dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bsnyus pagyur cig ces byas so// de nas 'khor der

sud 'dus pa'i lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam ma las ldong dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am cad ng/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa de rag thams cad kyis kyang 'dod skad
ces gsol te// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du/ bdag cag thams cad kyis kyang dam bcas te de ltar ma bgyis na/ bdag cag gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyus
bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sku bslus par gyuracig/ bdag cag thams cad kyis rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha tsanas kyang/ li yul gyi rgyal por 'gyurang thams cad sems mthun pas phyin cig
tu dbang bskur bar bgyi'o// gang gi tshog dong dmar dang rgya'athab par 'gyur ba de'i tshe/ nes yul 'jig par mi 'gyur ba dang/ gang gi tshoyul gzhan nas li yul du rab tu byung ba rnams 'ongs ba
na rta den gnas rim gro byed par 'gyur ba dang/ yul gzhan nas der soms can bres pa de dag der gnas 'thob par 'gyur zhing/ gdong dmar gyis bsregs pa gangayin pa'i mchod rten chen po de dag
dang/ dge 'dun gyi kun dga' kha de dag 'chos pa'i grogs byed par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir li yul gyi rgyud 'jal ba dang/ rgyadang phan tshun du bgam gtong ba dang len par byed do// de nas sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das kyis de'atsholhamo dri ma med pa'i 'od dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sdeganyis la la yul gtad nas/ de'i tshe sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ gzhon nu rdo tshesde
tshal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod la yul gyi rgyal po byed pa dang/ lha mo dri med pa'i 'od kyis grogs byed par 'gyur gyis/ mdo 'di las dzaskud bshad pa bzhin du khyod kyis thams

cad gyis shig/ gang gi mkhyod gsar gyi rigs kyi yul du phyir log pa de'atsho/ rgyu'i dmag yul du 'ongs so zhes de skad du thos pa dang the tshom ma byed par la yul du song la der pho nyab btang na/ der
'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ li yul dang gu zan gyi yul du 'gro bar 'gyur// de la spring yigan nga dang gnyen du phyes la/ yul la byin cig ces ngas shig/ de nas de 'di khyod na'i yul gyi rgyal

por 'gyur ro// dbang po'i go cha na skor rdo'i rgyal po byed par 'gyur te/ de'ang khyod ci nas la yul gyi rgyal por 'gyur ba'i grogs byed par 'gyur ro// skar rdo'i yul du gnod pa 'byung ba de'i tsho/ khyod
kyis nas kyang gnod pa khyed du ma gzhug cig/ dbang po'i go cha dang yang thog mar 'dus par gyis shig/ las 'di dag byed pa'i grogs su 'gyur ro// skar rdo ba ji snyed yod pa thams cad kyang
grogs byed par 'gyur ro// a kun zhes bya ba dpa' bo zhig yod de/ de sngon ye shes grags pa zhes bya bar gyur pa na/ des dar ma tir zhes bya ba'i gtsug lag khang byas so// de nas khyod kyis a ku/
'kha nAtshol cig dang/ yul gzuba' grogs byed par 'gyur ro// ci'i phyir zhen/ dedang khyon sngon son lam lhan cig tubatab pa'i phur te/ a ku zhes bya ba'i ming ni sngon rgyal por gyur te//
mi rgod rnams kyis chung ma brkus taphyim rnyed pa yin no// khyod ni rgyal po de'i blon po na ro yin te/ dag byed kyi par gyur pa yin no// de nas de 'tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon
nudoN+Di la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhon nu dorje sgo khyod ni li yul 'khor du rnam par rgyal ba'i go cha zhes bya ba'i rgyal por gyur te/ lasum cu'i bar du rgyal srid 'dzin par 'gyural/ dag
bsnyon du chu nag li yul gyi phyi lus yongs su gtong zhing 'bras bu glob ba 'gyur// de nas de'atshobcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod la
yul du rab nges zhes bya bar gyur pa'i tshomado 'di zung zhig/ 'ge 'jug pa gyis shig/ rgyas pa gyis shig/ skal rdo'i yul du'ang mang po la skul cig dang/ khyod kyi steng du 'od zer rnams
gas par 'gyur ro// gang gatsho khyod kyis gzungs sngagasa rnams rtogs pagyurapa de'atshi khyod la sangs rgyas khacom ldan 'das nyidi gsung bar 'gyur zhing/ lha rnams kyang can s khyod kyi
las byed nus par 'gyur ba de lta burgyas par smra bar 'gyuro// de nas de'i tshosangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
to nusdug ji ltar bcom ldan 'das rinachen snying po grong khyer du gshegs pa'i tsholo'u cag gnyis sas rgyas nyid du lung bstan pa thob nas/ der deskad du phyogs bsun sams
cha can 'jigs shing sgrug pa ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad bdag gis skyabs byed pa gyur cig de skad ces smon lam btab pa'i dus de dran par gyis la/ da nga'i li yul 'di dang/ lha mo dri ma med
pa'i 'od dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde gtad pa 'di khyod kyis long zhig/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasakyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang/ 'jam dpal dang/ nam mkha'i snying po dang/ mthu

chen thob dang/ stsa na gyi rgyal po dang/ rab spyin dbang po dang/ sa'i snying bo dang/ byams pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs dbang phyugal 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sngon 'di'i phu sku

bo dang/ grogs su gyur pa dang/ rtagatu 'grogs 'grogs pa 'di dag yin te/ sna tshogs kyi lha dang/ dbang phyug gi lha dang/ ljon shing gi dbang phyug rgyal bo dang/ snying rje'i dbang phyug dang/ gzugs kyi

tsha dbang phyug dang/ spong ba'i dbang phyug dang/ 'od kyi dbang phyug dang/ dri'i dbang phyug dang/ tshogs kyi dbang phyug dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug dang/ 'od gsal dang/ rigs kyi dbang phyug rnams so// de
nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu dag khyed kyis 'khrig pa

za@#/chen po'i mdo 'di dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od yongs su zung zhig/ de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lagan rdo rje la bos 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyod rtag tunga'i phyi bzhin du 'brang

ba yin gyis/ mdo 'di dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od khyod la gtad do// gnod sbyin dbang po rnam thos kyi bu dang/ gnod na kun tu rgyal dang/ lha'i bu blo gros brtan pa dang/ klu'i

rgyal po ma dros pa dang/ 'thog ma bu dang bcas pa dang/ lha' yi khrangasum cu rtsa gnyis kyi lha'i rgyal po rnams dang/ 'khor der 'dus pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'od zer gtong ba do
dug dang/ phyogs bcunas 'dus pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad la mdo 'di dang/ la yul dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad de/ yongs su gtad pa'i dam pas
yongs su gtad do// de nas yang de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// ngas je skad khashadapa dang/ khyedakyis ji ltar dam bcas pa bzhin du grogs gyis la/ ngas dgongs pa kun thoms
cado nas thams cad du mthar phyin par gyis la/ can s log par mi 'gyur ba de ltar gyis shig/ ngas bskal pa mang por 'khor ba na dka' ba'i las shin tumang po don dpaldan pa dag byas pa lta bu naM/
byang chub sems dba'agazhan dag gis kyang ma byas so// nga' la yul 'khor der sems can ngs yongs su smin par ma byas pa de gang yin pa dag phyis li yul 'khor du gnas par gyur te/ 'i tshes
kyis yongs su grol bar 'gyur ro// nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la bos te 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// khyed thams/

cad la ma de 'di dang/ li yul dang/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad do// gang gi tshesangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad

dang / lca thams car dang/ 'khor thams cad la mdo 'di dang/ 'di yul dang/ gzhonanu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa'i 'od gtad pa de'i tshe/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du lha'i mi
ra tog gi charakhab bo// lha rnams kyis lha'i rol mo'isgra bsgrags so// lha'i rgyan gyi charayabab bo// de bzhin du 'khor rer thams cad kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das la jiltar 'os pa'i machod pas bcom
@#ldan 'das la mchod par byas so// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir 'od zerashin tu mang po btang ngo// mi mjed 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na gnas pa'i
sems can rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa mthong ngo// de na gnas pa rnams kyis kyang de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa 'khor dang bcas pa
rang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ste/ 'khor thams cad dang/ lha rang/ mi rnams gcig/sa gcig mthong bar rgyur to// de nas de'i tsho dag slong kun dga' bo stan las langs te thal/
tsho spyanas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dusan su 'ba medo 'di klog pa dang/ sems pa dang/ nyan pa dang/ kun chub par bgyid pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'dra'i
'jug ba de'i bsod nams kyi phung po tsom du 'phel bar 'gyur/ bco ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ sangs rgyas kyazhing brgya khri bzhi stong gnang na skye bo dzasnyed gnas pa rnams la sbyin pa khyen/
pa bsan/ su mdo 'di 'chang ba 'am/ kha ton du byed pa 'am/ klog pa de'i bsod nams kyi phung po ches mang bar 'gyur ro// mdor na ji ltar 'bras bu gsum pa rtogs pa de'i bsod nams kyi phud/
po ji snyed 'phel bar 'gyur zhes ng sbya'o// de nas lhadang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ dri za dang/ mi 'am ci dang/lto 'phye chen po dang/ srin po dang/ 'khor
dadag thams cad kyis 'di skad ces gsol to// bdag cag 'kho 'di 'dus pa ji snyedams pa rnams gang dumado 'di brjod pa der mamachis sam/ gzhon nu rdo rje sde dang/ lha mo dri ma med pa 'i 'od
la gzungs sngags ma stsal tam/ dam bcas pa 'di bskyud par gyuran/ bdag cag gis dus gsum du gshegs partsesas rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi skabaslus par gyur cig mtshams
mamachis pa'i las bgyis pa'i sdig pa jitsamams pa bdag cag gis bgyis par gyur cig/ de nas 'od khre de dag lasags su brjod pa 'di skad ces 'byung ste/ gang nam 'di brjod pa der
ku@#/ kha dag cag 'ong ngo zhes sgra grags par gyur to// de nas kun dga' bo dang 'khor de dag thams cad kyis zhus pa/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i ming lags//

cha ji ltar gzung bar bgyi/ bka' bstsal pi/ mdo 'di'i ming ni chos kyi spyi bo zhes kyang bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi snying bo zhes kyang khya/ dri ma me pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes kyang bya'o// de nas
bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// so chos ga bshad pa de dag thams cad mdo 'di nyid kyi nang du 'dus so/ bcom ldan 'das kyis daskad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang
chub sa mas dpa' de dag dang/ tshe dang ldan pa dga' bo dang/ 'khor de dag thams cad dang/ lha dang/ mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon//
par bstod do// theg pa chen po'i mdo dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis zhus pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so////lha mo dri ma med pa 'i 'od kyis zhus pa mdo'adi shin tu dag par yod pas yid ches kyi
gnas so// gzhan 'khrugs chad yod pa mang bar snang ste/ grogs kham mang du bstas so///rgya gar skad du/ A a ba lo ki ta shA rA haa ba pA ra

Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug ngataa grwa ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ra t+na trayA ya/ na ma Ar+ya a ba le ka ta shA/

'a rAya/ bo d+hi satAya// mahAsatAya/ ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ sajus te byu/ sanAg tani/ nam / an+d+ha sa tresgyu / sa na a ba ta ra Ni/ nam / sa satwab+ha yot+tar Nam/ nag sad+ma b+ha ba bra shaman ka rA ya/ nam

sam+b+hasatA bo d+hi tsitas na ka rA ya/ na ma/ sarlabarnyan/ smyudan ka 'a/ nam/ sany+dza du kha dra mo k+Sha tsaka ra ya/ nam/ sam+b+ha an+d+ha ka rA bo d+ha ma na ka la/ na ma/ san+d+ha b+hi rA dza dngasha bru yo/ ma hAyo gA/

yo gArAya/ taspyan mgro ta i dan Ar+ya a ba lokiti shAr mu khod gits+tshar 'bad da dA de ba nAg/ yar sa/ shakra brash+tsa/ li ka pA la/ puN+Da ma hahAranAr ya Na/san+d+ha ku be'aa su ren+d+ra/mAtrig Na

nam kr-in/ badzra khu ra sa hiyaM/ da grwa ba brat+tha/ pa ra ma sdod ya/ mA pa ya mi/ a ba phra me Ad+ha sa pA ka naa ba can/ sam+b+ham tAnaM/ san+d+ha bgyi ba nAyakaM/ a mo g+ho/ saN+Da karmaNaM/ ripanAny+tsa/
banA yakaM/ tad+yathA/ ota ru la Sha ru la/ gita ru la bita lul/ sats+tsub ga taka/ sam+b+ha b+hA ta bi dra ba ka dza la ta/ an la/ bslu la go/ rgyu das/ gsar/ a dob/ pra gita ka laM badzra/khur zhin
ta/ tsa' ba su rgyu dal/ brjod shA/ sa tam ru tokAti/ pra shaman ka ra/ bgrodu bgyin/ saM b+ha Na ka ra/ swa ba po bar sha ka ra/ pa ra ma shAn+tika ra/ bung bu bod yu ti b+ha ga wa

hayagrwa ba/ sadz+dza du khrid yi/ ma brtayumi/ khA da khAd/ ma 'odra/man+tan/ rak+Sha raka/ ed tshosA hitAn/ man tran/sits+tshasi// san+d+ha kaname/ sid+d+haM/de hid hi A bi sha A bi sha/ pra tigawA/
bsha/ sarbagra red/ a pra ti ta/ rgyun myun/ bsnyun brdzun/ ma tha ma tha/ pra ma tha pram tha/ sats+tsA ba ro ba gram/ kr-itu ka kho rdo/ duralaM gte/ mu sha kha/ bseg kar/bsesha/

daM btsuts+tsha ya a ba lor ba sha kar Na/ sid+d+haany+dzan/ tsaklu mo han/ oMbakashe pan kar/ni tra/ a ba prakAN/ pas ya lngas ya/ mang+g+ho d+hi sa twA/ 'od d+ma mnan/ sam+bab+ha me sgyu / sat+tAnaMrak+Sha

rake/ ma ma bud+d+hA/ d+harma saM g+ha/ a nu dzA taM/ maM karma/ shAkloku ru ku ruphaT/ haya glib paT/ badzra gu rA ya phaT/ badzradihAka'adwa ya b+hi'i gA ya baT/ pa ra mnaM/ sham ka rA ya phaT/ pa ra du

big+hAn/ paM b+hakANaka ra ya phaT/ san+d+ra gra ho ta sA dan karAya phaT/ sa gra a pra ti ha tAya phaT/ pa Ta la mu khA ya phaT/ yi ge tseta/ ma ma a hita shin/ ka e kra man+ti/ man yan+ti/ ya man+ti/

idzab yan+ti/ rdzun+ti/ kA khor kucan+te/ sarban mu khe na ba kr-i tAya phaT/ na ma/ sadz+dzaduShA ga hatisA dan ya/ ya grwapA ya/ sad ts+tshanu mnapa da/ sArA/ o a mr-i tod b+ha bA a tshulaT phaT su rA/ oM na mo
yA ya swA hA/ on mo bi shAmArAya sA da// na masaN+DasatAnaM/ sid d+hunu/ man+tapa dA ya AtA/ 'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug ya grwa ba zhes bya ba'i gzungasardzogs so//
dang/ rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba dzoya ba tinAlaM pra togarA/ bod skad du/ phyi'i bzlog pa 'phags pa rnam par rgyal ba zhes bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' 'gro
ba thams cad srung ba la mngon par brtson pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sgrub pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal le// gi sngags 'chang thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal
la chog la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po snying rjechen po dang ldan pa 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal le/

de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas phyir bzlog pa rnam par rgyal ba can zhes bya ba gshed byed dang byad sel ba/ ngolangs dang bkramishis pa rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang/ chom rkun gyi 'jige
pa dang/ me'i 'jigs pa dang/ chu'i 'jigs pa dang/ mkha' 'gro ma'i 'jigs pa dang/ yi dbags dang/ sha grwa dang/ grul bum gyi 'jigs pa dang/ grib gnon gyi 'jigs pa dang/ brjed byed kyi 'khrig
ba dang/ srul po'i 'jigs pa dang/ lus srul po'i 'jigs pa dang/ lam log pa dang lamadu zhugs pa'i 'jigs pa dang/ nyin mo dang mtshan mo'i 'gro ba so so'i 'jigs pa rmugs par byed pa/ red/
par byed pa/ rmongs bar byed ba/ mdog bzang por byed pa// spo ba yang dag pa 'phel bar byed pa// dgra thams cad zlog pa/ bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa/ sdig pa thams
cad yang dag par byang bar byed pa/ kharmugs par byed// kha rengs par byed pa/ bzhin mdzes par byed pa brjed par bya'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sams dpa' chen po snying rje chen po dang ldan ba ]
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag grub pa ru gyucig/ tad+yathA/ oM d+ha ra ng+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/d+ha ra/ d+hi'i

ster/d+har ri/ d+hi ri d+hi ri/ d+hi ri/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru d+hu ru/ d+hu ru/ bdag 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang/ gshed byed dang/ byad thams cad las srung du gsol srung du
gsol/ tad+yathA/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sa ra sa ra/ sor/ sa ri si'i/ sa'i sir/ si si ri saraM/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru/ su ru su ru/ su ru/ ma ra mar ma ra ma ra ma ra ma ra/ ma ra mi ra me
ra rtsomi ra mi ra/ mi'i mi ri/ mi ri/ mu ru mu ru/ mu rumu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ mu 'u/ bdag nad thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/ tad+ya thA/ sdel la/ sdel tel/ sIl nga la/hi'i la/ li/
yulu ru lu/ ngulu hu/ tu'u yulu/ sulu yulu/ ngulu/ ki li ki li/ ki li ki li/ ki loki li/ ki li ki li/ kili/ mi li mi li/mi li mi li/ mi li mi li mi li mi li/ mi/ ci le tsa la/ tsal li

tsa la tsa la/ tsi li tsi li/ tsali/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu tsu lu/ tsu lu/ 'byung po thams cad bzlog par mdzad du gsol/ oM sa ra ba sa ra/ kaM pa kaM pa/ nA sha ya/ nA sha ya/ dgra gang

dag bdag la mi phan par 'dod pa dang/ rnam par snang ba dang/ gnod par sems pa dang/ sdang bar byed pa dang/ sbyin sreg byed pa dang/ byed du'ajug pa dang/ byas pa la rjes su yi rang ba de dag thams cad
nyid la slar song zhig su hA/ mi mdza' ba thams cad kyi mig khacing// rna ba bcing ngo// sna bcing ngo// lce b.rung ngo// lus bsung ngo// yid khaming ngo// yan lag bcing ngo// nying lag thams cad/
bcang ngo// spu Ta spu Ta/ spyaT/ sngo ya/ spo Ta ya/ spo Ta ya/ gshad byed dang byad thams cad rnam par bsal du gsol/ rnam par gzhom du gsol/ rnam par gzhig tu gsol/ sarba sha tun/ tu ru tu
ru tu ru tu ru/ turuhur/ ngur swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa thams cad dang// gshed khyed dang/ byad dang/ ro langs dang/ brjod byed thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol swA hA/

bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bsal du gsol bsal du gsol/ tsar tsa na sUt+tA ma ra ma ra sus+sa/ si ri si'i sna wA/ ku ru ku ru swA hA/ chu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ d+hu ru d+hu ru d+hu ru swA hA/ mi gang dag gnod bar 'dod la
na par mi 'dod cing/ bdag la lta ba thams cad rmugasakhar bgyi'o// rengs par ba 'o// 'khrul par bgyi'o// rmongs par bgyi'o// 'byung po thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/ nad thams cad
'khrul par mdzad ma/ rmongs par mdzadu ma/ rmugs par mdzad ma/ rengs par mdzad ma/ 'gas par mdzad ma/ rnam par 'jigs pa mdzad ma/ rnam par 'thor bar mdzad m/ rnam pa'joms par
mdzad m sU hA/ ni'i na li ni la/ keshe sA g+ha/ bi to pa ti pa takesha swA hA/ la hIta/ la hitaM/ la pa toke she swA hA/ awa da te/ achad te/ maNArA ta sha sany+tsa/ tishAtanA ta bas nAr Na yis////
'byung bo thams cad la dbang sgyur ma/ bdag gi sdig pa thams cad bsal du gsol sAhA/ 'phel bar mdzad ma/ bdag gi dpal dang skal ba bzang po thams cad spel du gsol//
cha 'phel bar mdzad du gsol swA hA/ bdag 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dang/ nad 'go ba dang/ 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ gshad byed dang/ byad thams cad dang/ nad thams cad dang/ gdon thams cad dang/
sdig pa thams cad dang/ bza'anyes dang/ sgomanyes dang// gnod sgrib dang/ gnod ltas thams cad las srung du gso' srung du gsol sA yA/ phyir ldoga rnam par rgyal ba can// rgyal ba 'byung bkasud+ma
ba 'di// gang gi mgul du 'di btags pa// de ni la 'gyur the tshom med// sdig dang mi ngan bkrami shes// rgyal po med dang chom rkun dgra// de dag rnams kyis de ma tshugs// gang gi mgul
du'adi btags pa// don chu yis khyer mi 'gyul/ sdig pa yang dag 'byang bar 'gyur// dge ba rnams ni rtag tu 'phel// nad med pa yang 'thob par 'gyur// phyi'i bzlog pa 'phags pa rnam par
rgyal ba can zhes bya ba rdzogs so//@#// 'phags pa paNashapa ci'i mdo/ dkon mchog gsum 'phyag 'tshal 'go/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 'tshal// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo//
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob la phyag 'tshal lo// bA man Tim ngami tA nam su mi 'a ma ni b+ha ga ba ti pa gtsa/paN+Dasha ba ri/ pishatsa sha pa la shud+d+ha Ni/ ya ni ka nadi

b+ha yApa tshu ste/ ma ke natsad u pa dralA / e ka tsidau pA yA sA/ ye ka tshud a d+ya akAkA lha ya/ mi ke nyid u pa yargya u ba sang+gAsaM b+hAdz+dzAgA/ utapa bya ste/ saman tAni/ sarba sta/ sarba tepA la tA/a

bod par+yane na paN+Di tata/ tad nan sa skya pa tsanas r+yabAken tad+ya thA/ o dza/ dza dza dza/ e b+hiSha/ pa ta a d+hi'i laman pa tar/ ma ma sarba satanAny+tsa/ rak+Sha ku ru pagi naku ru/ pa ri gra ku

ru pa'i pA lanaM ku ru/ shAn+ti ku'u spu stsa ya naMku ru/daN pa 'i hAraMku ru/ shas pa'itAraMku ru/ Abad pa 'ad+ma rANaM ku ru/ a pa 'a hAlaM ku ru/ ud ka pa rihAlaM ku ru/ kakhornats+tshe danaku ru/ sI aM bo d+haM/

ku'u/ d+hAr Ni ban+d+ha ku ru/ tad+ya thA/ a mi te a mi te/ aa todab+ha be/ a mi ta saM b+ha be/ a sA ste/ as so ga/ mA ma ra mA ma ra/ mas la mA sa ra/ sham bra sha ma/ u pa sa ma sa bu d+hI/ nu pa sa
ma ga a kAlamr-i t+yA/ nu pa sa masarmanak+Sha dragra hado/ nga nu pa sa ma/ sarba donaM/ tshogs ma/ b+ha ga ba ti/ paNasha ba ru/ rgyun tsun/ ba tsun btsun/ tuN tu Na tumu les/ o go ri

gats+tsA ri tsaritsan+dAli mA[']taM gi puk+ka sis hA/ na ma/ sarba shu pa rANaM/ mdzad shapa rA NaM/ b+hag ba tipi sha tsipad+d+ha sha kha las hA/ o po gtsapaN+Nasha ba ri hi/ dza/yuMphaT pa tso// oM aM ku ro/
'a@#/// maM ku re/ kur re pa sha ba'i su hA/ gnag nad la srad bu byas te brgyartsa brgyad bzlasangashing mdud pa brgya rtsa brgyud dumadud de/ sngags kyi snying po bris pa'i snod dang/
bcas pas bzlas pa tshul bzhin du byas la/ de'irjes la nad pa 'am/ rta dang ba lang la sogs pa la spos chus bkrus nas khyu mchog kyang bkrus to/ de'i mgo la bcingasan zhi bar 'gyur ro// de bzhi

du ma le dang lug rnams la gnod pa byung ba la'ang lhas su bri bar bya'o// bum pa chu gtsang mas bkang ste brgya rtsa brgyud du bsngags nas bkrusan zhi bar 'gyu maro// snga dro phyugasakyi lhas su song la dri dang
ma tog gi gtor ma byas te/ bum pa gsar pa ma spyad pa chus bkang la brgya rtsa brgyad dubasngags te/ phyugs lhas kyi sgor rtababs gzugs shing/ rta babs de 'chu shing gi ma la ga pa ga'u wang gis
bris rtababs kyi khar gdags so// danas phyugs thams cad zas la song ba rta babs kyi sgo de nas gzud do// gzhan yang bum pa bzhi chus bkang ste brgyartsa brgyad du bsngags nas ma bzhis chus ga
na phyugs nad med par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du zhagabadun du byas na nad thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ro// ma nad dang phyugs nad la gro ga la bris te mchod pa byas nas rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo la gdags so/
stag gi 'jigs pa la dril bu la bzlas nas dkrol bar bya'o// chu srin gyi 'jigs pa la mda' dang pa gul bsngags na sprul dang/ bya ba dang/ sdig pa la sogs pa rnams kyang kha bcings pa 'gyur ro//

g.yul ngor thal ba la bsngags takhe dang mgul du byugasan mtshon cha zlog par byed do// skud pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad du bzlas pas nadapali khri la bcing ngo// bum pa la brgya rtsa brgyad du bsngags pas/
khrus bya'o/ lag pa'i skyed pa la bzlas nas bcing ngo// de nas bde bar 'gyu'o// yul bskor te lebu dang/ dza dang/ dung la khazlas pa byas na bgags thams cad 'byer taganod pa'i ng zhi bar 'gyugo
skyes bu dpa' bo'i dpral bar rig pa'i mdongs bzhag la mtshon cha bskur na dgra 'am g.yul zhi khar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa pad+d+hasha kha'i'i mdo rdzogs so//
rgya gar skadadu/ Ar+ya paN+Nasha ba'i nAm d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma la phyag 'tshal lo// dkon mchog gsum
la phyag 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od dpag tu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub samasadapa' sems dpa' chen po
'phags pa spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das ma

mi'u thung sha za mo ri khrod le ma gyon ma dgra sta dang zhags pa 'dzin ma khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 'jigs pa gang dag ni byung ba de dag thams cad dang/ yams kyi nad gang dag mikhyungayang rung ba dang/
'chi byed gang dag ca'i rung ba dang/ 'byed chen po gang dag ci'ang rung ba dang/ gnod pa gang dug su'ang rung ba dang/ 'khrug pa gang dag ci'ang rung ba dang/ ngo duganod
cha pa gang dag ci'ang rung ba dang/ gang dag nibyung ba de dag thams cad ni byis pa kho na la 'byug/ mkhas pa la ni yagano// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig dang/ bden pa'i ngag gis song zhig/ deng
shig/ mkhas pas byin gyis khabs pa'i gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di dag gis bdag dang sems can thams cad srung ba mdzod cig/ yongs su skyab par madzod cig/ yongs su gzung
bar mdzod cig// yongs su bskyang bar mdzod cig/ zhi ba dang bde legs su mdzod cig/ chad pa spang bar mdzodacig/ mtshon cha spang bar mdzod cig/ ji srid dug gzhom pa'i bar du mdzod cage/
ba me'i gnod pa smra bar mdzod cig/ chu'aganod pa spang khur mdzod cig/ byad stems gcad par mdzod cige/ mtshams bcing bar mdzod cig/ saN gzhi bcing ba mdzod cig/ tad+yathA/achu
kha a gro te/ a mr-i taudab+hakhe/ a kr-i tasaM b+ha ba/ Ashu ste/ AshA sti ga/ mamar mAmal/ mA sa rams ra/ zhib mdzod/ nadathams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ dus ma yin pa'i chi ba thams
cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ gza' dang rgyu skar gyi nyes pa thams cad nyakhabazhi bar mdzod/ mche ba'i dug thams cad nye bar zhi bar mdzod/ bcom ldan 'das ma'i khrod 'am can/ tun+natun+ti/ ba tu/

tun+na/ tuN tu Na/ tamu le swA hA/ oM go ra de gan+d+ha ri/ tsanAl/ mAgi/ puk+ka si swA hA/ oM aM ku re/ maM ku re/ ku snga rje/ pad+d+ha sha ba ri su/ nam/ sarba sha ba ra NaM/ ma hA sha ba rANaM/ b+ha ga ba ti/
pi shA tsA/ pardzu sha bar patsit+taM/ o pishA tsapastsosha ba'i dza/ hU~MphaT pa shAtsasu/ 'phags ma ri khrod lo ma gyon ma'i gzungs rdzogs so//
dargyagar skad du/ Aru b.lab tinAm pra t+yaM gi ra/ bod skad du/ phyir zlog pa stobs can zhes bya'o// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa'
chen po snying rjechen po dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad la snying brtse ba can 'aphags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshalago/ 'byung po thams cad 'gog pa/ rims
thams cad bzlog pa/ dus ma yin par 'chib thams cad 'gog pa/ gabra' dang/ rgyu skar gyi gdon dang/ 'byung po'i gdon thams cad rnam par 'joms pa/ bdud kyi gnas thams
cad 'dzoms ba/ mi mdza' ba thams cad so sorarengs par byed pa/ choskyong kha/ srog skyob pa'i phyir zlog pa 'di brjod par bya'o// tad+ya thu/ a pa ti/ akha leka ste/ saM b+ha be/ d+ha ra

d+har d+har dz+har/ bar kha ra/ ba ra ba ra/ kAle kA le kAle/ ma hAkA la a ba lo ki te/ pra sA d+ha na/ d+ha me d+ha che/ d+hame/ d+ha mne/ sa mA date/ bdag la srung du gsolasrung du gsol/ 'jagasangashang
skrag pa thams cad las bsrub mdzod du gsol/ yongs su bskyab tu gsol/ yongs su gzung du gsol/ yongs su bskyang du gsol/ zhib dang bde legs/
chasu 'gyur bar mdzad dugasrol/ chad pa spang bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshon cha spang bar mdzad du gsol/ mtshams gcad par mdzad du gsol/ sa bcing ba mdzad du gsol/ ku'u ku/
ru ban mak+Sha/ bad+hi be dz+ha bi d+hi/ man+dasaM pra sAte/ a mr-i ta te dzu ba ti/ gnod pa thams cad las bdag la rtag tu srung du gsol srung du gsol/ mu lumu lu mu/ khu khu me/ g+ho ri g+ho
zla ra ba le kha le/ tar par/ mu ya mu ya muny+tsan/ kha le/ d+hu[%g]d+d+hanaM/ bdag 'thabs dang/ 'thab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ 'gyod pa thams cad las srung du gsol srung du gsol/
oM ku ru ku ru/ phu ruphu ru swAhA a ma le sA hA/ a kr-i ta swA hA/ 'phags pa phyir bzlog pa stobs can zhes khyab rdzogs so////// rgyag
skad du/ a gra bangu man/ bod skad du/ mchog thob pa'i rig sngags/ bcom ldan 'das ma dung can ma la phyag 'tshal lo// bsnyen pa rdzogs par byed pa/ gzi brjid rgyas par byed pa/
longs spyod 'phel bar byed pa/ dbang phyug 'phel bar byed pa/ 'khor 'phel bar byed pa/ rmo 'phel bar byed pa// dgra zhi bar byed pa// bgegs zhi bar byed pa'o// dkon mchog gsul
mchod pa phul la/ sams byams pa la gnas pas dus gcig la lan brgyartsa brgyad brjod par bya'o// 'di lta ste/ na ma sarba ta thA ga tAnaM/ tad+yathA/oMsha1 ni de ba/ A gtsA A gats+tshA/ til+lad+hani/
na rdza ya/ bI shrI/ ba tika'i/d+hI ka nan/ ba bir/ bshubasta/ A yu d+hab ni u u/ a yu pal lani/ ta thA ga tA/ spar bo d+hitsit+taM/ ma tilam bod ra/ de sdeme kha ramahU~Mli nisAg+ha/ bdag gis
'di nyid kyi sprul pa'i sku 'di nyid du mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyil bzod pa thob par gyur cig/ stongang nyid kyi don mthong bar gyur cig/ stong pa nyid kyi don byed bar gyur cig/ 'di brjod pas
bar du gcod pa thams cad kyang rnam par sal bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa mchog thob pa zhes bya ba rdzogs so////@#// dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la
bstod la/ lam gang gis na sangs rgyas 'byung ba dang// rgyal ba sras bcas chos kyi bla mar gyur// mkhyen pa'i rim par sa rnams bkod pa yi/ shes rab dkyil 'khor gang la skyabs su mchi//
phyag 'tshal dpalaldan lha mo dbyangs can ma// 'jig rten khams 'di'i sgra la dbang bar ngashos// drang srong rigagasum rig pa pha rol gshegs// don spyod pa rgyachen rnams las byung// sam
can don phyir 'phrin las chen po'i khur// bar dka' ba kun kyang khyod kyis mdzad// sa dang parol phyin pa bcu spyad pas// dge ba'i tshogs brtan yid bzhin lus su bsgyur// zhalaM gyi dkyil
'khor zla ba dri med rgyus// thugs rje'i nagyis 'gro ba'i mig 'byed pa// dus ring 'jig rten kun la bde bar gzigs// de la dbang po tshangs sogs shin tubadud//
byams shing bzod ldan snying rjebaskyed pa'i m// lha mo mchog de 'gro kun skyongakhar dgyes// thor tsugs ri bo rtse 'dra spobs pa 'phags// shes rab zab cing shes pa'i rten byed kyang// rig pa'i
gnasal mkhares tshig gi bdag/ 'jig rten na yang lha yi lhar gyur la// sdug bsngal bsal khararab brtson gnyen mchog pas// mu su rtog ge pa rnams kun kyang 'dud// yanalag rnam
par 'byes shing gsung snyan pa// yon tanadrimed bsod nams 'bar bar bskyings// rig pa mchog gi dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// blo myur tshig 'chang spobs pa 'a mchog stsol cig/ sems
can kun la rtag tu phanasoms pa// musu mchog khyed rnam grol sa la bzhugs// thugs dam brtan bacas bskul ba rnams la yang// dpol gyis dgongs shig don kun nyabar skyongs// 'di ltar
'jig rten dgan snang ba kun// sgra 'jomos khyadapar tshig gis don mtshon te// phan tshun shes shing yang dag brda sprod pa'i ng// dbyangs can khyod kyi mthuste bsam mi khyab// gzungs dang chos
kyi stobs la dbang brnyes pa// dmatshig bden grub drang srongashas nyen can// lus sems ngag rnams byin gyis rlob pa dang// yid 'ong sgras kyang 'jig rten tshim par byed// byang chub mchog
gi spyod phyir su dag mos// bdag dang gzhan don phunasum tshogs gyur pa'i// lus dang ngag yid rnam dag mchog 'dod la// bcom ldan 'das mas rtag tu don mchog stsol// bdag ni dpa'
zhing byang chub lam brtson dang// lce yi dbang po dag ming tshig btsun la// rig pa'i gtil ldan sa la thogs med dang// bad gshegs spobs pa nye bar bsgrub tu gsol// rig pa'i yum gyi rang
bzhin rtog las dben// snyan pa'i rgyal mtshan dga' ba'i shugs kyis bskyod// mkha' la sna tshogs rnam par dri'adod ltar// mtshan nyid rtogs dka'ayon taMn gting mtha' med/ na mo b+ha ga ba
te brah+maNe/ na maswA ras byid bsod rgyanu man pA da ti brah+manu man sA tA/ dpal lha mo sgra dbyangs la bstod pa rdzogs so///// rgya gar skad
du Ar+ya b+him tAdeb bu kar Na/ bod skad du/'phags pa lha mo chen med pal lung bstan pa// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis
thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun chen po 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpasam/sadapa' chen po spyan ras gzugs dbang phyug
dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' sems dpa' chen posgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po kun bzang po dang/ byang chub sems dpasams dpachen po nam mkha'i
snying bo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po lag na rdodzad ng/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po 'jigs pa thams cad sal ba dang/ de bzhin du byung chub bams dpa'
sems dpa' chen po dag byed kyi bangashasethams cad 'adzan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsod nams kyi mtshan thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams
dpa' chen po nyi khri dang/ 'jig rten 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po mu stegs kyi bkra shis thams cad 'dzin pa dang/ byang chub sams dang 'a sems dpa' chen po 'jam
dpal gzhon nur gyurapa dang/ de dag la sogs pa bskal pa bzang po'i byang chub sems dang 'asams dpa' chen po thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la ba derasong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ lha mo chen mo dpal
yang bcom ldan 'das kyi thad du song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bde ba can n gnas pa'i byang chubs mas dpa' sems dpa'
chen po de dag la'ang mgo bos phyag 'tshal ta phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgya stong du mas brgyan cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa bye bdag gis yongs su bskor te/
brgya byin dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis bstod cing bsngags sa// lha mo chen mo dpa' la gazlogs nas tshangs pa chen pa'i gsung gis/ byang chub sems da pasems rab
chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces bka'asal to// na ras gzigs dbang phyug rgyal po 'am/ blon po 'am/ dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dag basmananam/ dge bsnyen
ma 'am/ bram ze 'am/ rgyal rigs sam/ rje'u rigs sam/ dmangs rigs gang la la lha mo chen mo dpal gyi ming brgya rtsa brgyad dri ma med par grags pa zhes bya ba'i stod pa 'di 'chang na/ rgyal rigs
kyi rgyal po de'i yul dang/ sems can de dag la 'jigs pa dang/ yams kyi nad dang/ gnod pa thams cad zhi bar 'gyur zhing/ chom rkun dang/ g.yo can dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa 'jigs pa
thams cad byung bar ma 'gyur te/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mdzod dang/ bang ba thams cad rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro// rgyal rigs kyi rgyal po de'i khyim du 'ong dbal nges par gnas pa 'gyur ro//
de nas byang chub sems dpa'i sams dang 'chen po de dag gis tshig 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gsung 'dalegs par bka' stsal pa legs selegs so// legs te/ gang dag
mochen mo dpalagyi ming rnams 'dzin pa dang/ thos nas kyang sgrub par bgyid pa de dag gi yon tan dang phan yon na de dag lags so// danus byung tshubasams dpa' sems/
ma dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug gso/ bcom ldan 'dasaM la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das lha mo dpal gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba gang du bskyed pa lag/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// lha mo chen mo dpal gyis de bzhin gshegs pa gang+ga'i klung gi byamasnyad la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyadad/ sbyan ras gzigs dbang phyug sngon byung ba 'das
pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi khams na po che las byung ba zhes bya ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtshopi wum+madang/ gser gyi ri bo mdog mdzes gser 'od dpal zhes bya
ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhinagashog pa mang po gzhan dag la'ang lha mo chen mo dpal las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan 'di dag kyang lha mo chen mo dpal de'i dge ba'i
rtsa ba rnam par 'phel ba dang/ 'grub par byed pa dang/ rtag turjes su 'brang ba yin te// de dag ni 'dir lha mo chen mo dpal gyis yang dag par brjod pa dang/ sdig pa thams cad sel ba dang/ nyes
sdug thams cad med par byed pa dang/ lus thams cad dri ma med pa byed pa dang/ nor dang 'bru rnams 'du zhing 'phel bar byed pa dang/ dbul ba gcod par byed pa dang/ lha dang/ klu dang/
'bam gnod sbyin dang/ dritha dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lta 'a chen po thams cad 'dun par byed cing 'gugs par byed pa drang/ yums kyi nad dang/ gnod
pa dang/ 'thub pa dang/ 'khrug pa dang/ 'gyur ba dang/ rtsod ba thams cad zhu bar byed pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drugasgrub par byed pa'o// 'di ltaste/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal stug po la
phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'anepo tsho'i me tog yon tan gyi rgya mtsho'i nusladang/ gsar gyi ri bo mdogamadzes gsala'od dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gang+gA'i chu
stegs kyi sgo thams cad bkra shis kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tsan dan gyi me tog gzi brjid skama'i 'od kyi dpal la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhinagshegs pa
kun tu snang ba g.yul las rnam par rgyal ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan rgya mtshosnang ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
tshes kyi tsho 'phrul rgyal mtshan shugasakyi dbal la phyag 'tshalalo// de bzhin gshegs pa skur 'od zhi ba'agyes snang dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sems can gyi bsam pa
zhi bar mdzad pa'i sku'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa smon lam rgya mtshos snang ba'i dbal la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shin tuyongs
su brjod pa mtshan gsol dbal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ba'i mi ldeg pa'i 'i kho le rin po che'i gnas kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
banyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od 'khrigs dang la la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa brtson 'grus gras med pa la yang dag ra rardzogs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
pa dbag tu med pa'i gser mchog snang ba'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa gsung gi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra dbyangs dpal 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gsheg
ba shes rab sgrol ma grangs med ba'i 'od kyu tog gi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sred med kyi bu'i brtul zhugs kyi tshig snyan po'adi pa la phyag 'tshalal// de bzhin gshegs
ratshangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dbang phyug chen po'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi zla'i 'od da pa la 'khyag 'tshol go/ de bzhin gshegs
tsha/ pa zab mo'i chos kyi 'od kyi rgyal po'i dpa' la phyag 'tshol lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha'i sgron ma 'od bzung dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nyi 'od tog gi dpal 'a phyag
'tshal go/ de bzhin gshegs pa spos kyi sgronama'adapal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho'i snying po las byung ba'idang lal phyag 'tshala'// de bzhin gshegs pa sbrul pa'i
'brug sgra snyan pa 'dapal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa tshes kyi snang ba thams cad bkod pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa shing gi rgyal po ltar skyes pa'i dpal/
la phyag 'tshala'// de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro ra bo'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes 'od 'phro mtsho'i dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa
smonalam chen po' shugs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa sprin chen po'i de pal la phyag 'tshala'// de bzhin gshegs pa dran pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhi
gshegs pa dbang po tog ga rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po'i dpal 'phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nor dang 'bru thams cad sdud pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nang
'dren pa'i deng 'a la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhinagshegs pa phun sum tshogs pa 'gugs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// de baizhin gshags pa'i mtshan 'di dgarim gror byas te bcang khor
bya'o 3bklag par bya'o// de lta byas na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'angesod nams shin tumang du bskyed par 'gyur ro// lha mo chen mo dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung
bstan te/ lha mo chen mo dpal khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na'ajig rten gyi khams dpalachen po rin po ches brgyan pa zhes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas dpal nor bu ban ba che las byung bzhes bya bar 'gyur te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de'ang lha'i rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan par 'gyura'o// 'jig rten gyi khams ded de
cha bzhin gshegs pa de nyid snang ba mdzad par 'gyural/ 'jig rten gyi khams de na gnas pa'i byang chub sams dpa' de dag kyang rang las 'od 'byung zhing tshadapag tumed par 'gyur ro// nam mkha'
las kyang sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra 'byungabar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kyi zhing du byang chub sems dpa' gang dag skye bar gyur ba de dug thams cad kyang pa'i snying po dag
las skye bar 'gyur rozhes lung bstan to// de la ming brgya rtsa brgyad drim med pa lta bu zhes bya ba'i bstod pa rgyun chags bcu gnyis gang na na/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lha
mochen mo dpal gyi ming rnam par nyon cig/ 'di lta ste// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ lha thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yum/
lha thams cad kyi ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ byang chub sams dpa' thamasacad kyi dpal/ 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thamasacad kyi dpal/ tshangs pa dang/
khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po rnams kyi dpal/ lha lasogs pa thams cad kyi dpal/ gnas thams cad yod pa'i dpal/ lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin/
dang nam mkha' lding dang mi/ lce 'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ rig sngags 'chang dang/ lagan rdo rje dang/ rdo rje 'chang thams cad kyi dpal/ 'jig rten skyong pa bzhi dang lnga'i
dpal/ gza' btsaya kun/ranyashu rtsa brgyad kyi rang la la// o nyama'ibu ma 'am/ yum 'ag byed bzhi'i dpal/ bkra shis ma/ sems can gyi ma/ rnam pa rgyal ma/ gang+gam/ mu stegs thamu
cad m/ bkra shis thams cad m/ dri ma med par byed pa'i dpal/ sdig pa thams cad 'phrog pa/ rgyags byed ma/ zla ba'i dpal/ nyi ma'i dpal/ gatha' thams cad kyi dpal/ seng ge la nyon
ma pa'i ma chug 'bum gyis bkab ma/ pad+ma/ pad+ma las byung ma/ pad+ma la gnas ma/ pad+ma'adzin ma/ pad+madang ldan m/ rinapo che 'od 'bar ba'i phreng ba dum dang ldan m/ nor sbyin ma/ dka'
mo[;]dkar mo chen mo/ lag drakar ma/ bkrashas thams cad 'dzin na// bsod nams thams cad bsags pa'i lus can ma/ shes nyen gyi bu mo/ lag pa 'bum ldan m/ mig 'bum
ldan ma/ mgo 'bum ldan ma// nor bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyi cod pan dang ldan ma/ gzugs bzang ma/ kun gyi gzugs can ma/ grags ma/ shAn tu grags ma/ nam/ sprin 'drab 'i skye
gtsang ma/ zla ba ltar mdzes ma/ dge ma/ dge byed ma/ sems can thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ 'phags ma/ me tog gi dpal/ me tog gi dbang phyug ma/ li'i rgyal po
ri rab thams cad kyi dbal/ chuklung dang mtsho thams cad kyi dpal/ chudang rgya mtsho thams cad kyi dbal/ mu stegs thams cad mngon du phyogs pa'i dpal/ smanadang/
rtswa dang/ nags tshal dang/ nor dang/ 'bru thams cad kyidapal/gas sbyin m/ zas dang skom sbyin ma/ 'od gsalam/snangam/lus gtsang ma/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang
sgyur ma/ lha'i tshogs thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa'idapal/ gshin rjod nga/ chu lha dang/ lus ngan dang/ brgya byin la sogs pa 'debal/ sbyin byed ma/ longs spyod ma/ gze bdi
mi/ gzi brjid ldan ma/ phun sum tshog sam/ 'byorapa ma/ rnam par 'phel ma/ mthong ma/ chos kyi dpal ma/ khyab 'jug la brten ma/ku mu da la gnas ma/ gnod sbyin ma/ bzod
smin ma/ mthu rtsal gyi gnas ma/ dag byed dang khakra shis thams cad kyi lag ldan ma/ bkra mi shis pa thams cad 'jig byed ma/ bsod nams thams cad sdud pa'i dang la/ sa thams
tsad dang rgyal po thams cad kyi dpalaM/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po thams cad kyi dpal/ 'byung po dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ srin po dang/ ya dgas dang/ sha khra dang/ grul bum dang/ lto
'phye chen po thams cad kyi dpal/ lha'i gnas dang/ lha thams cad kyi dpal/ bzlas brjod dang/ bzlas brjod du bya ba dang/ sbyin sreg dang/ sbyin sreg khubya ba dang/ bkrashes thams
cad kyi dpal/ 'od ldan ma/ mchog dga' m/ skal bas 'gyur ma/ drang srong thams cad dga' bar brjod pa'i dpal/ bud med thams cad kyi gnas/ kun gyi gtsomo/ dpal gyi mchog/
mu 'am ci mo thams cad dang/ lha ma yin mo thamA cad kyi dpal gyi mchog/ kha nam tho ba med pa ' gnas ni 'dug m/ yid 'ong ma/ sam byed ma/ lus ngan la sdug ma/ chos kyi rgyal po'i dpal/
o sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par gzigs shing sgrol cig/ thar par mdzod cig/ bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad bdag la mngon du gyur par mad cage swA hA/ oM gang+gasati

mu khe spu hU/ oM sarba bad+d+hiswA hA/ sarba maM ga la s myur Ni swA hA/ tsatur ba das nak+Sha tra/ gag/ nAhAg nA d+hA mUrta ye swA hA/brah+maya sA/ biT+Thayaye swA// ru dras mA ny+tsa/ bid+d+hishA mu khA ya swA hA/

o grin glo nasarba kAr+ya sA d+hAni/ si ni si ni/ A pA kA/ do ba/ bashra mo DA ya swA/ de su baN/ rnyan d+ha rgya/ A ka ts+tsaM swA hA/ sarba pu ts+tsha A ka ts+tsa swA hA/ 'a dbataA kar tshe swA hA/ sarba pA paM na

shame swA hA/ sarba A lany+dzi bra sham ts+tsaM swA hA/ sarba tathA ga taa b+hi Tika ya sAhU~M/ sarba de ba ta a b+hi mu kha hA yo a yur ba la paN+Nake ra ya swA nA/ sarba btatumaM ga la da lta ya swA hA/ saM gi ba
nan sA/ pad+masaM b+hAtayo sA hA/ sarbakr-i tika khorda ba nAsha ne swA hA/ 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug/ gang la la lha mo chen mo dngal gyi ming/ nyes sdig thams cad med par
byed pa/ sdig pa thams cad 'dzoms par byed pa/ bsod nams thams cad sdud par byed pa/ bkramashis pa thams cad med par byed pa// dpal dang/ bde ba dang/
skal ba bzang po thams cad sdud par byed pa 'di dag dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshon 'di dag 'chang po dang klog pa byed pa des nang par langs te gtsang ba byas la/ sangs rgyas thams cad
lame tog dang bdug pagasolo nas/ lha mo chen mo dpal la'ang tsan dan gyi bdug pa phul tu bklags na/ des dpal thams cad mthong bar 'gyur/ bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad thob bar
'gyur/ lha thams cad kyang srungab dang/ skyob pa dang/ sred pa byed par 'gyur/ phub dgos pa thamasacad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gyis bka' stsalanas/
byang chub sems dpa' 'jigs pa med pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang/ lha mo chen mo dpal de dang/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang/ lhadang/ ma dang/ lham yan dang/ drizang bcas
ba'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa lha mo chen ma dpal lung bstan pa rdzogs so
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+yam hAshri ya/ mUtra/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dpal chen mo'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad
[z/ ]bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can na bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan
'das ga la ba dar song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la bskor ba lan gsum byas te phyogs gcig tu'adug go/ danas
bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug lu 'di skad ces bka' stsalato// dpal chen mo' mtshan bcuganyis po 'dareg song
ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma'am/ dam yin pa gzhan yang rung// gang gis shes pa dang/ gang 'da' 'chang ba dang/ klog pa dang/ 'dri ba dang/ 'dra'i 'jug
pa de ni dbul bor te phyug por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshogs thams cad kyis de ltar gyutsage ces kun nas gsol to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo'i mtshan bcu gnyis
pa bka' stsalakha/ 'di lta ste/ dpal ldan ma/ bkra shis ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng ba can/ nor gyi bdag mo/ dkar mo/ grags pa chen mo/ pad+ma'i spyan/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mo/ zas sbyin ma/

rin po che rab tu sbyin ma/ dpal chen mo/ spyod ya the dan/ dzani/ h+pheNi/ sarbaar+ya sA d+ha ni/ sha hi ni/ a lashI Ni/ mnA sha ya/ sid rgyunum man+d+ha pa rA/ swA hA/ o blo ku tA pa ra ma su b+ha ga swA hA/
lan gsum du brjod par bya ste/ gang la la dus gsum du 'don pa de'i mu mthun phyogs thams cad 'jig par 'gyur ro// skal ba bzang po dang ldan par 'gyur ro//
'byor pa zad mi shes par 'gyur ro// mi dang phrad du 'gro ba'i tshobaklags nas phradapa byas na mi des de la bu'i 'du shes skyed par 'grub tega'abar 'gyur la/ ji skadabasgo ba bzhan byed do// rtag tu
rgyun mi 'chad par bklags natshas pa dang bram zes drag shul gyi las byas kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur la/ sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur byas par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das
kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gabrigs dbang phyugayi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags
ba dpalachen mo'amado rdzogs so/// rgya gar gyi ma khan po dzan ma dradang/ zhu chen gyi lo tshob brtse yang shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa/
#// dpal gyi lha mo'amtshan bcuganyis pa/ dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa sbyin ras gzigs dbang phyugal phyag 'tshal lo/
phyag na rdorje laphyag 'tshal// dpal lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das bde ba can gyi 'jigarten na bzhugs te/ de nas
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal
ta phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dpa' lha mo chen mo'ang bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song sta drung du phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das
kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal ta phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal chen mo la gzigs nas/ spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di
skad ces bka' stsal to// spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ drag bsnyen ma 'am/ sems can gang su'ang rung bas dpal
chen mo 'di'i mang bcu gnyis ngashes da'achang ba dang/ klogo pa dang/ sgrub par byed pa dang/ rjod par byed nadadabul po sngangs nas phyug po chen por 'gyur ro// de nas 'byung po'i tshog
thams cad kyis kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces sus so// dpal lha mi chen mo' mang bcuganyis ni/ 'di lta ste/ bkra shas ma/ dpal ldan ma/ pad+ma'i 'phreng thogs ma/ nor
bdag ma/ dkar sham ma/ grags chen mo/ pad+ma'i spyan ma'i ma/ 'od chen ma/ byed pa mi/ bras sbyin ma/ rin chen 'od ldan ma/ dpal chen mo ma/ sangs rgyas thams cad la
phyag 'tshal lo// spyanaras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo// dpa' chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo// 'alta ste/ dzin/ rgyu chi/ dgos pa thams cad sgrub
par mdzad ma/ sa ma sa mi/ na min mi/ bdag gis mi shes pa thamasacad bsal bar mdzod cigasAdzA// bcom ldan 'dasakyis daskad ces bka'asul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa la mngon par dga'o// dpal gyi lhama'achatshan bcuganyis pa rdzogs so//
rgya gagra gyi mkhan po dzin mi tradang/ zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba ban+d+he ya/ sa sdes bsgyur cing zhus togatan phab pa//@#// rgyagar skad du/ Ar+ya
sarbakarmaAb ra tshasho d+ha nA ma d+hA ra Ni/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa las kyi sgrib pa thamaMs cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/
na mo rat+tatrayAya/ oM kaM ka ni kani/ lotsan rotsani/ sngoT ni tro Ta ni/ trAs na sa ni/ pra tingan pra titan/ sarba karma pa raM pa rANi me sA/ gzungs sngagasa'adi'i tshog 'di yin te/ rtag tu
bzlas brjod byas nalas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum dubazlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa 'ba'abyang khaba'agyur ro// lan cig
bzlas brjod byas na ltas ngan pa dang/ rmi lam ngan pa dang/ bkra mi shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs bam la bris nas mgul du thogs su 'chang na de la dus ma

yin pa'i chi ba rnams gtan du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gang zhig snying rjes non par dogs dang/ bya dang/ mi rung/ mi ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'i rna bung du brjod n de ngan song du 'gro
bar ma 'gyura'o// yang na nyid sa dus las 'das shi 'phos pa'i ming nas smos te/ de'aphyir byams pa dang snying rjes lan brgya'am/ stong ngam/ 'bum brjod n desems can dmyal bar
skyes su zin kyang de'i med mthar par 'gyur ro// sa ram/ til lam/ yungs kar ma/ tshugang yang rung ba 'bazlas brjod byas te/ shikha'ilus la gtor ram khrus byas nas de'i 'og
tumachod pa'i m/ yang namachod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris nas mgo la btagasan/ dngan song du skyes pa'i ng zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te//
bde 'gro mtho risakyi 'jig rten duskye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skyebasnga 'gyur// gang zhig zla ba nya ba ri khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te/ dus gsul
du gos brje zhing kha zas ma za ba'am/ yang na kha zas dkar bag bza' zhing/ sku gdung dang mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bumabazla sabarjod byas na/ de ngan song
nas thar du gnas gtsang ma'i lha ris su skyes nas sgrub pa po'i thad du'os tamachod par byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes byas ba'ang byin nasalan gsum/
bskor ba byas tAmasnang bar 'gyur ro// 'o ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlos brjod byed cing/ mchodarten 'bum byas la/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs
pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang// yang namu klung du btang 'das sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa nas thar bar 'gyur/ yang na de ltar mchod pa byas nas mjug tulam
gyi bzhi mdor mchod rtenachen po byas te/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan la sogs pas legs par mchod la/ 'phags pa'i dug 'dunala'ang mchod ston gsol nas yon yang
ba phul ba legs par mchod nas rgya ge mo zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gyur cig/ 'di khenas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/ de kho na bzhin du skyes
nas lus kyang ston cing legs so zhes bya ba'ang byin nas mi snang bar gyur to// mtshams med pa lta byed pa 'am/ dum pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur pa btab pa'i ng
rung ste 'khar rtsi ga nga la gzungs sngags 'dibris pa mthong na de las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byas pa lta ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs
pa de nyid byon nas 'di skad du/ cigs kyi khu tshur nga' gen du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa'i thas kyi sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sbyong bzhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//
rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya ba ut+ta mam hAtan+tA/ bodaskad du/ 'phags pa rig pa mchog gi rgyud chan po/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'/
thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcug na/ bcom ldan 'das gnyan yod nargyal bu rgyal byed kyi tshal mgon med zasasbyin gyi kun dga' r ba na bzhug
so/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sams dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje rig pa bye ba phrag du mas bskor nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la bder song ste phyin nas bar snang las babs te//
bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas ted phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras
gzigs dbang phyug kyang 'ag pa bye ba du mas yongs su bskor nas 'khor nyid du 'dus par gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tsholanas/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan 'byung po bya ba phrag du mas bskor nas 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te// bcom ldan
'dus kyi zhabs dang phyag na rdo rjel mgo bos phyag 'tshal te phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/ de nas gdol pa'i rgyal po phur bu gsum pa'i ng 'khor de nyid du 'dus par
gyur to// rgyal po chen po bzhi'ang g.yog 'khor bye ba phrag du mas kun nas bskor la 'khor de nyid du 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal tu phyogs
gcig tu'adug go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rjes bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gab+bar te/ pusamo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 'gro/
su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di sodatsas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad dubadag gsang sngags kyi tshig 'chad par gnang ba
mdzad du gso'/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lugan rdo rjekhyod ni shin tu ma rungs pa/ lag nardo rje khyod/shin tupartsam
pa med pa/ shin tu gtum pa yanan/ jiltar sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir gsang sngags 'chad/ lag na rdo rje khyod ni dam tshig shes pa yin la/ sems can gang dag dam tshig mi shes
par brjod pa rnams ni rdo rjes mthar byed pa yi nan/ khyod ji ltar gsang sngags 'chad/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de ltar lags mod kyi/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag rig pa mchog 'di'i
don 'don pa dang/ 'chang ba dang/ mchod pa bgyid pa de dag ni bdag gi dam tshig 'tshal bar 'gas/ bdag gi dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa lags pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar
mdzad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la// gnod sbyin gyi bdag po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi yi ge bzhi pa zhes bgyi ba 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs
thams cad kyi snying por gyur ba/ las mang pa rab tu sgrub pa// stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dpag tu ma mchis pa/ bstan du rdzogasapa ma mchis pa ste/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i rgyal po/
bshad par bagyi'o// kye kyi lha yul dang/ sa dang chu la gnas par 'byung po'i tshogs rnams khyed yode rtse gcig tu gyis 'a nyonacig/ rdo rjes mgo bkas par gyur ta'o/ danas lagan rdorjes rang/
gi rig pa'i tshogs la bltas nas gsang sngags snyas pa/ na mo rat+na trayA s+ya/ na mash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Nis+ya/ ma pAyak+Sha so nA pa tis+ya/ mahA shAkya saM bud d+hA ya/ birI/ kiM/ mirI// bing tam
yartsi ni mi 'o A hA/ de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de 'dar yi dayod nas thal mo sbyar te/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la bskyobatu
gsol/ bdo khagshegs pa bdag cag la bskyab tu gsol/ donas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor la grogs po dag ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs
@#// shig/ go pa'i rgyal podran bal gyis shig ces dbugs phyung ngo// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khorade pom tshor du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje 'di lta bu'i gsang sngags kyi tshigadag 'chad pa ngomatshar to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cug ni rog pa'i rgyal po gang na gnas/
pa de mchod par 'atshal lo// suklog pa dang/ mchod par bgyid pa dang/ sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'chang de'abartson pa bskyed par bgyi'o// bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu dag de de bzhin taM/ de
de bzhin no// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po'i las ni 'dilegs// srad bu 'ame/ thal ba'am/ chu la lan cig brjod pas srung bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags gsudan mtshon rnon po la lan gnyis
brjod dartswa shagacad do// yang na sadra'o// de ltar na'agusngags thams cad bcad par 'gyura'o// lan gsum brjod narig sngags chong bar 'gyur te/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la 'phags pa lag
a na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la rig sngags gang yi ga mtshang ba 'am/ dran pa nyams pa de lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod de rig pa'i mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig tu lan gsum brjod n rmi lam
duston to// ci ste las bcad par gyur na rtsa kushas khyab par bya ste rdzogasapa 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan bzhi brjod dag bdang ma dag bston par 'gyur ro// mi 'dod pa yid bzhin
[a]/dusbyor babagyis las rnams su 'gyur// gdonatshar gacad na thal ba'am/ mu'am/ dur khrod kyi sol bas bstsamano// yang na gzugs bgyis pa lcag mas gzhus na gtong bar 'gyur
ra yang na sa la gzugs bgyis te dur khrod kyi sol bas lag mthil la ro rdzobros lagapas bkabanagatong bar 'gyur ro// skud pa la mdud pa bor ba rnams kyis rig sngags bcing ngo//
mkha' 'gro ma rnams gcad par bgyi na yungs kar dag la lan bdun bdunabasngags te/ bstsanan mkha' 'gro ma thams cad ma lus par 'gyur ro// dbab par bgyi na rnabar bzlas brjod
bgyi'o// yang natsan dan dmar pos dkyil 'khor byugs la rdo rjer lnga pa bris te gu gul gyi bdug pa dang me tog rnams kyis dbab bo// phyag smyugazhig na mu'am/ tha lcagagam/ so
bag gi dum bu rnams kyis so// dug las gson mu 'am/ rma bya'i mdongs sam/ tshu dri'am/ mi khong gso so/mar gyi ngozhag bcu bzhi nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du zhag gsum sbyang bar byas
la lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das lagranudzurjes dmapa labar 'gyur te/ de'i 'og tudug gso ba la sogs pa dang las gzhan rnams kyang bgyi'o//
gal tamakha' 'gro ma rnams shin tugacad pa 'tsholan/ de nas lag na rdo rje'i mdun du 'bras kyi gzegs mas lan brlastong sbyin sreg bgyisanalag na rdo rjes ji skad bshad pa bzhin du
[p]@#// tshe ji tsam thub pa la rig sngags thams cad ma rus par 'gyur ro// seng ldeng gis rdo rjebagyis te rig sngags 'chang ga mong nas brjod las 'alan cig khatsugs na bshig/
pa 'gyur te/ de phyin chad rigasngags 'chang de'i gsang sngags rnams mi 'jug go/ rig sngags gcad par bgyi'atshalan/ rigasngags 'chang gi gzugs bgyis pa bcad na bcad pa bgyis
par 'gyur ro// rigasngags bshig par bgyid 'tshal bsa' sngags de ragopa mchog gi snying bo dang lhan cig brjod na' sngags thams cad bshig par 'gyur te las mi bgyid do// rig pa
'gugs par 'tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang bar bgyis la lag na rdo rje'i mdun dumachod pa bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig lanabats+tshastong bzlas brjod
bgyis na rig pa 'gugs te phyis rag pa sgrub bo// rig pa nyams par bgyis na bzlas brjod byas pas chog ste/ che ga mo'ige pa 'ganod pa mdzod cig ces bgyis narig pa de las ma bgyid do//
rig pa tshor gcad par bgyi na thal ba lagazugs bgyis te/ rig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan tsug brjod la rkang pa g.yon pas kyang phyis na rig pa smad pa dang nyams par 'gyur talas mi bgyid do/
gal te 'gasngags 'chang gzhig pa'i tshalan/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du'ag sngags 'chang gi mang nas brjod de mar me'i snying po me lce dang bcas pa bdun sbyin sreg bkyisan rig sngags 'chang bo
bshig par 'gyur bgodanams kyang 'jig go/ srog kyang 'jig go/ rig sngags 'chang de'atshojitsam par gsang sngags rnams la 'grub bo// slar gasobabagyi nam la ta'i me togamaral
bskyugs pa 'byonasrog bgyi ba lan grurtsa gsug lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sbyin sreg bgyis rig pa 'grub bo// las 'dedugan ma bsgrubs kyang bgyid do// ci ste bgyid 'tshalana' la 'dzegs
takha zas 'o skyo'i thung zhing lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyis na rig pa'irgyal po'i mchog rang gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur te/ de la bu ci bya zhes gsung ba 'gyur ro// de des bcom ldan 'das
las thams cad mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snang ba 'gyur ro// danas yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis na 'ge sngags 'chang yang 'gug go/
grog mkhar gyi sel sprul brgyus tasngagasakyis btaban klu thams cad machi'o// dbang du'ang 'gyus// gseg ma la lan bdun bsngags tamatshor bor namatshoskam par 'gyur// 'bab
chu chen por boran 'bab chuchen poskam par 'gyur ro// gang dubor ba de skam par 'gyura'o// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po 'di na rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa thams cad kyi mchog
brjod pa'o// gal te rig kha gzhan dgag las ma 'tshal na'ang sbyor ba 'dis rig pa thams cad sbyor bar bgyi'o// las thams cad bgyi dado// las bgyidanarig pa'i rgyalapo dang lhan
[@]// cag lanagasum brjod la lag zhig ma mchis na/ de'i mgodum bu themathig le'i sim bzhin du'ags par 'gyur ro// gang gi tshog sang ba pa rnams kyis gsang sngag/
grub pa de'i tsho/ las thams cad du rig pa'i mtshog bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis talag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis la basmad spyi mthun gyi
mar gsar blangs te// maragasar des seng ldeng game lan brgyad stong spyan srog bgyis na/ rig pa'i mchog 'go pa sgrub ba rnams la dam pa stsol ba'agyur ro// gang gi tshapha phol 'brog
par bgyid 'tshal na/ phub ma las lan brgyastong sbyin srag bya'o// so phag gis kyang 'phangs/'bros par 'grularo// mar gyi nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis lag na rdo rje'i mdun du aka'i
zhugs dusal/ rtswa dur ba'il ma lan brgya dastobaspyani srog bgyis nadin ragacig/dpar 'gyur// mar gyi ngo zhagakhacu bzhi nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i mdun dume tog
ku tshud dang/ zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar la kha gas pa khri me'i nang da sbyin sreg bgyis na dpal chebar 'gyur ro// mtsho'i lcab dang/ rgya so so dang/ ldong ros rnams tsha bsams te rmabya'i
mkhris ba dang la busran ma tsam dubagyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa'i mchog lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bagyis la sbrul gyis zin pa la chus bting na 'jog pos zin pa'i ng 'tsho'i
srin bus zin pa dang/ bas bldags dang/ 'brasa'aphreng ba gyur pa la chab bskol ba las gtang ngo// sprum ma'u ma phyin pa lagalas khatan bde babatsa' bar 'gyur ro// byis
pa gdonakyis zinan bdug pas bdug pas gtong bar 'gyur ro// budamed kyi nad la ni dar ba las gtang ngo// phug tu'adzug na lus bsku'o// sgrub pa na khadag la bdugs nalog 'dren thamA
cad las thar par 'gyur ro// lag na rje'i mdun dusrad bu la rig pa'i mchog brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ lag pa la btags nas g.yul ngor zhugs n pha rol gyis ma tshugs par
'gyur ro// sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal ba 'am/ thal bgatsangams kham phorab kang la rig pa mchog bzlas brjod bgyis na rkun po gang na 'dug ba deramachi'o// gang gis rig pa'i rgyal
po 'di yid kyis bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la dbang phyug chen po dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i chogs dang/ bgags dang/ log 'dren dang/ mkha' 'gro ma dang/ srin po dang/ sha za dang/
gnod sbyin dang/ 'byung po dang/ grul bum dang/ srul po dang/ mdangs 'phrog pa dang/ gdon rgyun ma dang/ ma mo dang/ lag na rdo rje'i phyag brnyan dang/ gang gis kyang glags mi rnyed//
leganadorjes da'i mgo 'gams so// bcom ldan 'das kyi sun snga 'am phyogs gtsang mar mchod pa bgyis te/ rtswa ku sha'i mdung rtse gsum pa thogasal yungs kar zho dang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ mar bsrogs ]
pa'i sbyin blugs lan nyi shu rtsa gcig spyan srog bgyi zhing nyin bdun dus gsum du gcer bus skra bshig la bgyis nanor stsol bar bgyid do// mar gyi nge zhag drug nas brtsams te/

mtsho'agram dumachis la mar gyi ngozhag brgyad pa'i bar du yungasakar dag pas sbyin srogalan brgya stong bgyis na nor dang gos rnam stsol bar 'gyur ro// 'phags ba rig pa'i rgyal po'i mchog sgrub pa ni

ri mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bas mukodapa'i las la sprinadang ma 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs su lag na rdo rjesnyan nang tshangs can gyi steng na
mchis par bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'og tu rig khari mchog khri'o// bcom ldan 'das ni gsar gyi kha dog lta bu 'o// lag na rdo rje ni sngo bsangs ta rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// rig pa'i rgyal
po'ang sngo bsangs targyan thams cad kyis brgyan la stan gor bu'i steng namachis par bri'o// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la nyin zhag gcig spyang babagyis te/ ci nus su mchod par bgyis largyal po'i
blo gros kyis rig pa'i rgyal po dgug par bgyi'o// rdo rje'akhas nye reg bgyi'o// jorje'i khas spos dbul bar bgyi'o// me kha lasome tog dbul bar bgyi'o// dpyodakar gyis bsrung bar
bgyi'o// rdo rje sor mos khrus bgyi'o// nag mos khu babacing bar bgyi'o// gyen du lta ba'i gdong gis phyogs bcang bar bgyi'o// rdo rje'i seng ge 'i khris 'dug par bgyi'o// rdo rje ldan mas
00 bgags gzhom par bgyi'o// shugs ldan ms slar gshegs su gsol ba'o// phyis rig pa mchog gi ri mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du gu gul gyi ril bu brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na/ dngos grub/
kyilatshonAmar bcom ldan 'das kyi gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur ro// zhag bdunanadon ra brgya redapar rgyu'o// yang na longs spyodaso la bka'achuraro// mar gyi ngozhaga brgyad n lag mdo rnga'i mdun

du du ru ka 'bras bu las lan brgyad brgya sbyin sreg bgyis na gang 'dod pa de skyo bar 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i mdun dumar dang gu gul gyi'i bu brgyad brgya'i sbyin sreg bgyis na sos par 'gyuralo//
ma gyi bonag brgyadal nyin zhag gcig sang ba bgyis te shing ashAt+ma'i 'dab kyi steng du ldong ros bzhagal/ ji srid kyis rnam gsum grub pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// drobar gyur na
rkang bas mchi'o// du ba 'thul nam snang bar ng lo bdunastong pu'atsho'o// 'bar nabaskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// rlungabazhin du lag na rdo rje'i gnas sum zhing kha zas mi 'dod paza'o// u thu
rAdzAnamapa'i ka du kam kr-itaa myaa horaTishitenabadzrapA Ni s+ya ma gra pa acha ka an+ni phra dzAle/ ru d+hi a ga taN til nA abs tasaM budzuya darAdza bkob padzrakAmo pasaM hati/ miste
dgra gsod par 'dod na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du sang ldeng gi zhugs bus la/ yungs karadang sku tshe'i 'bru las na brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dgra 'chi'o// gnod par sems par
bgyis lag na rdo rje'i mdun duyi dgas kyishing ga zhugs su busal/ til nag pos lan brgyasong sbyin sreg bgyis gnod par sems par bgyis par 'gyur ro// mar/
gyi ngozhag bcubazhi nyin zhagagacig sbyang ba bgyis palag na rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mtha bong bas bzung 'de'i min gnas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis na 'phral dudagror mi 'gyur// mar
gyi bozhagakhargyad lanyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis terig pa mchog gi sngags kyis btabapa'i chang gis rdo rje bkrusal/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad brgyabazlas brjod bgyis nagang gis mang
[t ]nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa [”]de gdon gyis zin par 'gyulo// rdo rje 'o mas bkrus la rigasngags lan brgyad stong bzlas pa bgyis nasos paka'agyur ro// yul 'khor gzhig pa
'dod pasas ldingagi rdordzobagyis yar gyi ngotshos bcuganyisaMs lag rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis te/ shul gyi bzhimado btsugs nuyul 'khor 'jig pa'i
'gyur ro// phyung nas bsngags na snga mkho zhingartas par 'gyur ro// mar ngo'i zhag dgu lagan rdo rje'i mdun du rig pa mchog gis sku tshe'i 'bru la lan brgyud stong bzlas brjod bgyis na
khyim phung bar 'gyura'o// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mar dang bsres pa'i sgo tsho'i 'bru las lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na brtas par 'gyur ro// mar gyi pozhag brgyad la ba sad su
mthun gyi 'om blangs te rig pa mchog gi bzlas brjod byas shing bsrungs la/ de las mar gsar blangs tathodapa'inang du bzhagal/ thodapa de blangs tamar gying zhag bcu bzhilanyin zhag
gcig sgyu nga ba bgyis la mngon mtshan gcig yod par song ste// 'byung po thams cad pa'i gtor ma bgyis pa/ thod pa de thogs te lus kyi lho phyogs su 'dug la jitsaman 'bar ba de srid du
bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas de 'thungasani'adod pa'i gzugs su 'gyur bo// nam mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// ma snang bar 'gyur ro// gzugs snatshogs ston par 'gyur// lnga
brgya'atshob 'gyur ro// bdag gi rig pa'i rgyal po'a mchog 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi gtso bo'o// bdagasung na gos kyi mtha'amaramadud pa dor ro// gzhan srung na spyi gtsug tu rgya mdud
dong// chu khu phe likhabacings na phyogs bzhiratshugator ro// stag la yod kyis dkyil 'khor bgyis na bcings par 'gyura'o// mtshams gcadra na yungs kar gyis so// zhing
srung na phur bu dag gis so// s+sa na srung na yid kyis rig pa'i mchog sbyarakharab gyi'o// gzhan yang sgrubanamagodapagyis lanadangam 'dres pa'i tshonatsi rnams kyisob pa'i rgyal bo'i
mchog bri bar bgyi ste/ mdog sngobasangs sham thabs sarapo/ lag pa g.yonan zhags pa/ g.yas pas dam pa sbyin pa bri bar bya'o// 'og tu ba pa po lag na pog phor thogs pa bri'o/
zhag bdunazas su 'oskyobatung ngo// tha mar zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis tam gyi zhag brtsuba'il nas kyis mchod khagyis laskya tshogs las zhags pa bgyis te//
lag pa g.yas par thogs tedzaspyodadu rangagi gzugasakyis mchibed sridadubazlasabarjod bgyi'o// rdo rdzo bzhi dams/ ra gzhug ste/ des bu mi bya zhes smakhama'agyur ro// des tshangs pa 'am/ khyab
'jug gam/ dbang phyugachen po 'am/ che ge mo zhes bya ba zhags pas bzung khrid de sngonatsag cesabarjod do// yangen rgyal po 'am/ gnod na nam/ srin po 'am/ sha za 'am/ gang dgug
pa 'dod na de dgug pa// de dag thams cad phyag brnyan du'agyur ro// gangabasams pa ba ratshal tamachi'o// yang na mgod pa'i ngesal ri mo mkhan gso spyong bzung bas sbyin dang sa 'dres pa'i tshon
rtsi rnams kyis rig pa'i rgyal bo'i mchog bri bar bya ste/ mdog sngo bsangs rgyanathams cad kyis brgyan ba/ stodagayogs dadakar/ sadugayogs rdzas/ lag pa bzhi pa/ lag pa g.yon
ba gcig na rdo rje/ gcig nalcags kyu/ g.yas ba gcig dang basbyin b/ gcig baconathogs par bri bar bgyi'o// 'og tusgrub ba pa lag na pog por thogs par bgyi'o// g.yas phyogs
su rdo rje khu tshur mdogagasal ltakhu rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ lagapa gnyis ka na rdo rje thogs pa khra'o// g.yonalogasaM su rdo rje blo gros dri bar bgyi ste/ de'ang mdogags lta bu
rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// de nas rdo rje sgrub pa ni zla ba gcig slong mo'i zas zos la tha ma lus sbyang khar bgyi ste/ cho 'phrul gyi zla ba nyal zhag gsum snang ba bgyis lalcag/
sna gsum la bgyis pa'i rdo rjerimo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du shing a shAt+ta'abo ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag labasgrubaste/ ji srid kyis 'barab de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas blang
bar bgyi ste/ blos ma thag tulag na rdo rje 'drar 'gyur ro// nyi ma shar bgrib dog 'drab 'agyur ro// rigasngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur bama'agyur ro// de nas lcags kyu bsgrub
