sngaras+yAd pasngar bgyis te/ rtswa ku sha rtsa ba med pa las lcags kyu bgyis la mar gyi ngo zhag btsubazhi la zhag gsum skyang ba bgyis 'dimo'isku gzugs kyi mdun du mchod pa rgyachebagyisal mo
togogi steng du bzhag ste/ de'i stang du lag pa bzhag la jisridakyis 'bar ba de srid dubazlas brjod bagyi'o// 'bar nas blang bar bgyi ste/ blas ma thag lus sog/mthong zhing rmongs pa'i
gnas su mtsho bar 'gyur ro// lag na lcags kyu thogs na sumacurtsa gsum pas kyang phral gyis mnan par mi nus so// be con sgrub pa bshad par bgyi ste/ lcags sna gsum las de
son sor bcudrug pa/ dbyibs tho ba 'dra ba zur drug par bgyi'o// sngar dpa bgyis la mar gyi ngozhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum s+sa ngab bgyis tari mortsis gzugasakyi mdun dumachod
pa rgya cher bgyis la/ sa dkar po'i steng du bzhag ste ji srid 'bar ba dprad du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas blangs ma thag tulag na rdo rje'adrab l 'gyur la// lag na rdo
dang stobs mnyam ste/ lag na rje'i gnasasam bema'agyur/dngos grub rnam pa gsul bsal par gnas par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams cad du po ta rnams kyis las thams
cad bgyis tarig pa sna tshogs sbyar bar bgyi'o// de ltarigapa'ig pa'i rgyal po 'don pa dang mchodapa dadabazhin gshegs pa thams cad machod pa lags so// mnyes pa bgyis pa lags so//
thod pa blangs te khrag gis bkang ste mar gyi ngozhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sgyur bar bgyis te khang stongs/ kun dga' ra bar ji srid kyis bud med 'byung ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o//
@# dal che ge mo zhes bya ba la gnodapa bgyis shig par brjod na gnod par bgyid do// gnod pa bgyid du 'jugago/ rengs par bgyid do// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dagugapa 'dis bkug/
tshang nas phyis rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dgug par bgyi'o// na mo rat+na pAya s+ya/ nam tsaNAbadzrapA Nis+ya/ ma sAyak+Shas nA pa tis/ tur tur/ tsuratshur/ ki pika ri/ ri 'apra tsats+tshaya Ta ya/
A gats+tsaM A gats+tshA/ ma ma aN+Nam/ par pu ra ya/ a yid d+harod tam a haM/ sta AkaraNAya mi/ ma mas in+da ma nor thapa ri pU ra kob+ha ba ma ma at+tha sidi ra dam poraM ku ruswA hA/
rtsaste chos brgyud sgrub pa'i tshalan chos bdunagyi phyem redagu gul gyis bdugs la gsang sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod do// sgrub pa ni rgyal ba'i blo gros kyis dgug go/ sgrub pa/
thams cad dang las thams cad du'ang dgug pa 'dis dgug go/ namo ratrayas+ya/ namash+tsaN+Da badzrapA Nis+ya/ ma hAyakas nA pa tis+ya/ dza ya ma ti/ dza na tin d+ha riNi/ a bshaya/ dasha
ga tapa/ deb nAg yakAkaMd+ha kAmutsa/ ru shi la pu'i hu/ grats+tsha mi pa taya/ gi kyA badzrapANi// AdzAb ya tisA hA/ rgyal ba'i blo gros 'dis dgug par bgyi'o// de nas do'o/
lcags sgrog gis bcing bar bgyi'o// namorat+tabrayA ya/ na mal tsA badzrapA u/ ma hAyakA sa nApa tu yo/ kuruku ru/ tsa tatsata/ ma lam la/ sa rasar/ par/ mu pUb la/
sa ma ya ma nu smarasad+d+ho/ na mo N+Da badzrapA Ni/ AdzA pa ya tisA hA/ rdo lcags sgrog 'dis gugul gyi ri lu gsum yungasakal gyi 'bru mar dubasnyags la sbyin srag bgyis na bcings
par 'gyur ro// rig pa gang sgrub pa dang pho nya mo'ang rung ste/ do 'di nyid kyis bcing bar ba gyi'o// rdo rje san mos ni bcing ba las dgrol bar bgyi'o// na mo rat+tarAyA ya/ na mawut+tA/
bapA Na yo/ ma hAyakAs nA pa tayo/ dulu yulu/ gtsugats+tso/ ma hAb la/ swa b+hA ba namasu na nam ga nam ya ku ru ku ru/ gats+tshagats+tshasA hA/ chab khyor ba gsum gtor/ me tog
kyang dbul lo// de nas shugs ldan gyis slagshegs sugasol// na mo badz+dzapa Na// ba rnga ba rnga/ gats+tshagats+tshA/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ma hAyakA b+hi pa ti/ tshul la ci
ni lo/ ti ri la tshon la/ hi le a ba ga ni ku ru swA hA/ shugs ldan gyi sar gshegs su gsol ba'i sngags te/ a ka ru'i bdug pa la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas so// na mo
badzrapA Na s+ya/ na ma skya b+ha ga ba ti/ badzramu khi go ri bok+ti/ gar tags te/ kin ti ki ni sAhA/ nyag bya ba'i gsang sngags so// na mo badzra pA Nis/ dzAl badzratshabo hur hur/ lasul

gu / pra tigrot+tasta/ i maM ga d+haM/ kIl kI la ya swA hA/ spos kyi gsang sngags so// na mo badzrapA Ni spyo/ da ra da ha/ pa tsapa tsa/ bo d+hapaM d+ha/ shi khi sA hA/ ma tog gi gsang sngags so/ namo
badzrapA Nas/ a tinaM/ tsalin/ khakarmaNi/ doratsal ni/ tsal ni swA hA/ bdug pa'i gsang sngags so// namo badzrapA Nis+ya/ nam sto/ b+ha ga ba tisha tamu khi/ ma hAgori mo tshul/ tsu/
tshule/ tsorakA rakA swA hA/ srad bus bsrung bar bgyi'o// na mo badzrapA s+ya/ ka ta ka ta/ ma tam ta/ rar rar/ badzrapaM gal/ ma ta dar dar ni/ ki'i Ni ki ri NaM/ ki'iNiko ri swA hA khrus
bgyi ba'i gsang sngags so// na mo badzrapA Nis+ya/ nam ste/ b+ha ga ba ti/ dasha ba tidashab ti/ sa hapra pa tiA gats+tsha/ shAg+ho ki ki ri/ shukra khaM d+ha baM d+ha sA/ srad bu la lan bdun bzlas/
brjod bgyis te khu ba bcing ngo// na mo badzrapA Nis+ya/ ut+tamarak+Sha/ a doraka/ utur dikaM rak+Sha/ ma tha ma tha/ sa ya sa ya/ snum lha ya stam bu ya/ udats+tshatu badzra AdzApa ya[']ti
sA hA/ yungs kar 'a lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjobagyis te phyogs bcing ngo// na mo badzrapA chis/ tapyashu/ brdzobaNi/ badzrasi hanaM/ badzrapA NaM/ phra yabarjob ra da kita/ dolaka rA
la ba ni/ laM bodar ba ki ta/ go ra ru pa darasha namaN+Da ra bkye ma/ maM sa sriya/ a a ti pa tigyo gu ru pU dz+wa li tataka shi i daM ma nu shasha mIr/ ma nu pra bshi ka tag ta/ pu ra pur/
rnyanang+ha na/ pa tapa tA/ balha bsgru/ sa nas/ A ba A bshe/ sa tas ta/ ka cir ya si/ b+ha ga ba ti/ ba hur ba/ ad b+hi ka su ga la ruka ra bde tra/ aTaNaT Ta has/ i ma
sa sta/ grwa tas+ya hrid yaM/ rnyid b+hod/ tshol tshulaM/ gumu gu chu/ ku ru ku ru/ A bingesha A bingesha/ badzrapA Ni/ AdzA pa ya ti swA hA/ las thams cad du rtsa kupagastsams pa la sngags
kyis btab ste bdug par bgyi'o// na mo badzra pA Nis+ya/ la la has tas/ bsngoN ku ru ku ru/ kam kamA/ tsal tsal/ dza wa dzralasA/ gshegs nas gsung du gzhug go/ namo
badzrapA Nis+ya/ dru ma sa la ma sa la/ d+hu rume a ma le/ badzrapA Ni yaka d+hi pa ti ma tsho mi kahU~M da big+haM ku ru swAhA/ yungs kar ram thal bas bgegs rab tuzhi bar bya'o// cis rig
sngags 'chang grub pa rnams kyi rig pa gcad par 'tshalan/ mar gyi nga tshos brtse lAl lags rdo rje'i mdun du ba ku la 'chi tog dag las lun brgyudastongasbyin sreg bgyis na
rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// ma godapa'i ngos la spyan drangs 'dres pa'i tshon rtsi rnams kyis rig pa mchog bri bar bgyi ste/ mdog sngobasangs rgyan tham
cad kyis brgyan pa'o// sbyin sreg bgyi ba bsrang zhing bri bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngo zhag btsu bzhi lazhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du ci nus sumachod pa bgyisal/
byang chub kyi shing gi zhugs bus tatam la'i me tog mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis na ri mo'i sku gzugs 'gulale// me tog gi 'phrang ba'ong 'gul lo// dunas mtshan
mo'i sgo mo me tog ces bgyi ba grub par 'gyur te/ lha mo me tog gi las rnams su'agyur// ga sngags 'chang gi rig pa'isgrub pa la bgags su mi 'gyuro// log 'dren gyis mi
tshugs so// dngos grub 'dis mtshan mo'i lha mo bzhidangos grub tu 'gyur to/ srod ni lha mo ma togagi 'o// 'jing ni lha mo 'phreng ba'i 'o// nam gung nalha mo ku mu da'i 'o// tho rangs ni lha mo
mdzes ma'i 'o// rig sngags 'chang ni rig pa sgrub na srod la log 'drena gnas su 'ong ste/ de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo me togagis leg 'dren mthongonas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje yid
la bgyid do// lag na rdo rje yid la bgyis pas log 'dran rnams skrag cing nyams ta21mtha gnas 'bros par gyur// lag na rdo rje rig sngags 'chang de'i mdun du 'dug cing dngos
grub kyang myur du stsol bar bgyidad// 'jing la gal te bgags byung namtshan mo'i lha mo 'phrongab des/ lha chen po labcom ldan 'das la ga nardo rje khyod la 'bodod zhes sgrogag/ des
da thos nas snying 'dar zhing myur ba myur par mdun du 'dug ste/ risanu rig sngags 'chang de mtshan la bgags su mi 'gyur ro// dngos grub kyang myur du 'grub bo// nam gung la gal te/
bgags byunganamtshan mo'i lha mo ku mu da de'ang/ rgyal patshanabo bzhi la kye kye btsun dkon gralagunu jo rngakhyed la 'bod do zhes sgrog go/ de dag gis tshig de thes nasasnyinga'adu zhing myur
ba myur bar madunadu 'dug ste/ des nadal bgrogs su mi 'gyur mo/ thoras la gal tabagrogs byung namtshan mo lha mo mdzes ma'ang/ log 'dren rnams la kye kye leg 'dron
sdang ba rnams drag po lag na rdo rjes bka'astsal tozhes bsgo bar bgyid do// de dag gis reb tshig thos nas phyogs bcur 'bros so// des na de la khagags su mi 'gyur tabadabar
las rnams 'grub par khyedado// mar gyizhig brgyadadam bcu pazhe la bud med bu byung ba'i khyi'u'i lte ba sor gnyis tsam bcad la gsar gyi gyim bag gis dkris te mar gyi ngozhag
brgyada'anyin zhag gcig sgyu babagyis te/ lagag rdo rje'i mdun lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na mi snang bar 'gyur ro// tsho'anganyis 'gyur su'agyur ro//
zhag bdun du phye thug btung// phyis mar gyi ngo zhagabasubazhi nas zhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ zhi ba'i mtshonayodapa sopal mtshan gyi stong gi lho phyogs logs su lag pa g.yas
pa bzhag ste sgra las bgyis pa'i skud pas bcing ngo// btsongs nas ji srid kyis bcad do zhes sgra'abyung ba de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi/ skya lan gsum du byung na dngos grub lu'agyur ro//
khu tshur bcangs te bsgrub bar bgyi'o// khu tshur bcangs na ma snying bor 'gyu'o// sgra lcangale'akhyil ba 'gyur ro// lo bcu drug lenapa tsam du 'gyuragro/ lo bdun brgya'atshob
'gyur ro// dbang phyugachen po'i tshogs rnams kyang phyagabarAn du'agyur ro// ci ste dgu gsad nga ra 'tshol na mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi nyin gcig sang ba bgyis te/ lnga tshal las
gzugs bgyis song ldeng gi phur bu lngas gnad du btsugs te/ dur khrod du mchis la dong brkos te dong der bcugal steng du zhugs lus la dugadang/ khrag dang/ yungs kar bsrasal
a lan brgya stong spyan srog bgyis na ngu wi tshig ste 'phral du 'gum mo// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi la ba sor mo'i lci ba sa la ma lhung ba blangs te/ sa phyogs gtsang mar gzugs bgyis pa
[nus kyis mchod// zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis la shing bil ba'iyam sreg shing zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ maral bsnyags pa brgyad stong spyane srogakhagyis nadabral ba las 'od zer 'byung/ de
nag dngos grub tu 'gyurato gsar dpogatumed pa stsol bar 'gyur ro// yang na nyin gcig bzhin du dan ra stsol bar 'gyur ro// gseg ma la lan brgya stong brgyus te dur khrod du bor na yi dgas
thams cad glu len cing gar byed par 'gyur ro// mar gyi zhagabcubazhi nas lag na rdo rje'i rkangapa'i drung du zhag gsum dab brgyusal/ shing ka ra wIra'i me tog lasaM lanabargya stong spyan srog
bgyi'o// de nas ka rawira'im tog dag las me togagacig khrungs te klu gnas su senga' bzlas brjod bgyisan/ klodang klu mo rnams dbang du 'gyur teci'atshal ba rnams redado// log tu
mig dung/ gser dang/ mchod phyir thogs kyang ka ra la'i me tog dang 'dra'o// gang nuganod sbyin mo 'dug pa de'i bzlas brjod bgyis naganod sbyin momam ste chung mar 'gyur// yang
na nor stsol bar 'gyur ro// gal tam mchin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis ta shing mdanA'i tsher ma dang/ dug dang/ khrag bsras pa lan brgya stongasang ldeng gzhugs la sbyin sreg bgyis
na de 'tshog carim sdug par 'gyur la mchi'o// gal taklu mo mi mchan de la'ang de nyid kyisaspyin sreg bgyi'o// yar gyi ngo tshes bco lnga la zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis targya mtshor 'bab pa'i
nubog zhugs la/ klu shing g me tog brgyad stod byi dor bgyis na dusamayin par char 'bab bo// zhag bduna'o skyo 'thungs la mar gyi ngozhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang
pa bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun dumatshar pa bgyis las las bgyis pa'i rdo rje bzhag ste/ de'iskad bshing apashAt+ma'ilama'aduna bzhi gal/ de'i steng du ldeng nges bzhag ste dzasrid kyis dngos
grub gsum du gyur pa de srid du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar ba'agyur na lo bdun stong du 'tsho'o// lus mdzes par bgyis lamar gyi ngo zhag bcubazhi la nyin zhag gcig sbyang bgyis te/
lam gyi sum mdo mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ der 'dug ste ldeng nges sran ma tsam zhig khar bcug la jisrid dukha'i nang dugs par gyurd de srid du bzlas brjod bagyi// de nas dngos
grub tu 'gyur tu thig le bgyis na mi snar 'gyur ro// lelnga brgya thubar ra 'gyur ro// ci'adod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur// nyi ma'i gung tshogs la bgyi'o// chos gras dang
skar ma 'dam ma 'tshal/ sbyang ba khagyi mi 'tshal bar skyes pa'i sa gsum nyams pa blas te/ rdo rjesan mo'i sngags bzlas brjod bgyisal bkru'o// rdo rje lte bas spos stsol bar
bgyi'o// rdo rje me ba'as me tog stsal bar bgyi'o// de nas po'i snying khar 'dug ste mi dotsam gyen du ma 'phags kyi bar durig pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod
bgyi'o// gyen du 'phags ma thag tuslar log tu ltung// lhung nas bud med bcudabar gnas par 'gyur te/ de dag g.yog 'khor rnams la stsal par bgyi'o// de dag kyang
stobs mnyam par 'gyur// rusnyim lan bdag bud med bcus bskor ta ma la zhon tagar dga' ba der mchi'o// yang yud kyis bsams pa de bzhon pa las 'byung ngo// la
brgyad khri'i 'tshob ma'agyur ro// rig sngags 'chang du'ang 'gyur// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bcubazhi la skyes pa shaba'i ro bzhag pa'i khyogs kyi g.yas rol gyi zur shing khyer
tasol/ phyi ma mngagyi bozhag brgyadal di mdung rtsa gsum par bgyis la slong mor 'bras bza' zhing rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// phyi ma mar gyi nga zhag brgyad nas zhag
gsum sbyang ba bgyis te dur khrod du so la mdud pa gsum pa la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ mdung rtsa gsum pa lag pa g.yas par sgrogs la/ rig pa'i mchogalan brgyud stong
bzlos brjod bargyae namadung rtsa gsum pa las 'od zer 'byung ste/ donas dngos grub tu'agyurar// mtshan mo btsugasan rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud medadag 'byung ngo// skyes
pa ci la ma rag par chas pa dag kyang nye bar gnas so// gangangasams pa thams cad red do// phyung na thams cad med par 'gyur ro// 'byung po rnams kyang phyagakhanan du 'gyur
ro tshog gang la blangs pa'i cho ga de nyid la bsgrub par bgyi'o// mar gyi bozhag khartsubazhi la zhag gcig s+sang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du cinus kyis mchod
pa bgyis la/ de'i mdun du 'bras chanagyis lam bkang ste bzhag 'phros chanami snang bar ma gyur kyi bar dubazlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dngos grub tu 'gyur/ phyis 'bras chan la 'pho bar
bgyid do// rdzus kyang 'phro bar 'gyur ro// 'bru'i rnam pa gzhan dag kyang 'pho bar 'agyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyada' zhag gcig ngab bgyis tesang lding la bgyis pa'i rdo rje la shing kun
'kha gyis bdugs la// ga pa'i mchog snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na/ gang gi ming nas phyung ste bzlas brjod bgyis pa de la brjod pyad kyis zin par 'gyur ro// rtse pog gis bdugs la
ny+tsa/ lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gtong bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad lanyin zhag gcig ng ba bgyis la/ e ran pa'ishing gi zhugs bus phab glong gi pags pa las srog blug
ma lanabargyad stong ming nus brjod da nasrog bgyis na bgrung rnams mchi'o// skyes pa'i rom sbas tshanyams pa zlangs te chu 'gram gyi phyogs gcig gam/ skums gtsang mar phonyam rnams kyis
las thams cad bgyi'o// nga nas rig sngags 'chang tema'i gung tshogs la mi'o'i mgo shar phyogs su bstan ta phyogs bzhir bsnyenabakur bgyis pa bzhigazhagabar bgyi'o// de nas rig
0 sngags 'chang de'i snying khar 'dug la ldeng nges khar bcug ste dngos grub rnam gsum thob kyi bar dubazlas brjod bya'o// 'bar bar gyuranale stong thub bo// rkang pa la bskus na le lnga brgyu

thub ste 'di ni dngos grub bo// mar gyi ngo zhag khargyadalanyin zhag gcig sang ba bgyis te lag na rdo rje'i mdun du pu 'jasha'i shing gi zhugs bus 'angashing bil ba'iyam srog shibazho dang/ sbrang rtsi
dang mar la bsgugs pa brgyadastong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing mang nas bdanatsugs chung dad// galatam rnyed na phyugs chung da mchi'o// dgru kong nad kyis btab par bgyid 'tshalan
rur btagasal bdag gi lus la dril pa'i dri ma bsags ta/ mar gyi ngozhaga brgyad lo'aganade rje'i mdun duduruka'o shang gi zhugs busal/ drim dus lanabargyad stong sbyin srag bzhong/
ming nas brjod na de mdzind kyis 'dangs so// lag na rdorje'i mdun du pog gi bdug pas bdugs la/ rigasngags kyang lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis nagaso ba bgyis pa 'gyur
ro cayar gyi ngozhag gcig la rgya mtshor 'bab pa'ichu klung du zhugs la thas su chu skyo 'thung zhingazla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyisan yul gru 'thob bo// bram za dbang dubargya na yar
ngotshos dru gnas / brgyad kyi bar du dus gsum du laganadirje'i mdun dusnyoma'i me tog la lan brgyastong bzlas brjod bgyis 'a thamar zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis na/ skyes pa 'am bud
med kyang rung ste dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi n gzhug brgyud la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bal pa'i shing gi zhugs bus la/ yungs
kar gyi 'bru mar dung bsres pa'itil las lan brgyadastong sbyin sreg bgyi zhing mang nas brjod nadabang du'agyur ro// bud med ug sa mo dbang du gyi mnyin zhag gcig yababagyis/
lag nardo rje'i mdun du arku'ishing ga zhugs dus su/ arka'i me tog mal bsgugs pa lanabargyad stong sbyin srag bgyi zhing mn gnas brjod n dbang du 'gyura'o// dus gsum
du khrus bgyi zhing lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing m dana'i tshor ma los lan brgyastongasbyin sreg bgyis na zhag gsum gyis dbang du 'gyur// mi ngas 'byung bar 'tshal namar gyi ngazhag
brgyad la dur khrod du song la dur khrodakyi shang gi zhugs bus la/ dug rlon pas lan brgyudastong sbyin sreg bgyis na mi ngas 'byungango// zhi bar bgyi na mar gyi ngo zhagabargyud la zhag
gcig smyung ba bgyis pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing tha mal nga 'i zhugs bus la ut+pal dang/ zho dang/ sbyang rtse dang/ maral bsnyags pa brgyad stong spyin sreg bgyis na zhi bar 'gyur
ro (gzhon bslad par 'tshal na bya lnga'i gshog pa yungs kar gyi 'bru mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong zhag bdun dus gsum du sbyin srol bgyi'o// 'di bsad pa'i mchog ko
dbye bar bgyin zhag bdun dus gsum dub lang ge lci ba las brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyisan dbye ba bgyis par 'gyur// las gcig gis tsheg rgyas par sgrub pa'i tshal bas/
mA ma kA thegs laM/ pad+hi'i rdzingadusong sa mA ma kA la reg par pad+ma'abum phulan rig pa'i rgyal po mchogarang gi gzugs ston ted la bu su bya zhes smra'o// rtos bcom ldan 'das
chog rgyas pa'i dngos grub stsal du gsol zhes brjod pa dang/ de bzhin bya'o zhes brjod nas mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de chogargyas pa las 'byung ba'os thams cad dngos grub
tu 'gyur ro// galutades las grub par ma gyuran de'i 'og tu lus 'di bsgrubs na dngos grub kyi mchog tu'agyur// yar gyi ngo nyanas bzung ste phyi ma'i nye'i bar du mi su
ba'i brtul zhugs kyis bras su'o skyo 'thung zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdun du'abum bzlas brjod bgyisan dobazhin gshegs pa'i gzugs 'gul ba'agyur te/ de nas tsho
gargyus pa dang dngos grub tu'agyur ro// ras sngon po la lanabargya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bagyis te/ 'og sgor bcings la lan nyi shu rtsa gtsag sbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thelabs mgo bo
bsrung bar bgyis na gyad pharAnon cing khyad kyis tshur phyir mnon no// yid gzhungs par bgyi na bram 'i khu ba maradang chab snyams la mar gyi ngozhag brtsa bzhi ' nyi zhag gcig smyung
[r/ ]@#// bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'thusan thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// yar gyi nga tshos zhag gcig nas brtsams
lagan rdo rje'i mdun dumaradang 'om bsras palas lanabargyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisapa 'thung zhing zhag bdunabagyis na theso pa 'dzanapar 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngonyal nyin zhag
gcig smyung ba bgyis te lagan rdo rje'i mdun du ang go ta'i me togabargyad stong sbyin sregabagyis nyim gsum pa la thos pa 'dzin par 'gyura'o// zhag bdun lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'od
zura'abyung ste rig sngags 'changal bskor ba byas nas gyen du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'changaltar 'dod pa'i gzugs can du 'gyur ro// lasum stong thub par 'gyur ro// mar
gyi ngazhag bcul 'ganardo rje'i mdun du sna ma'i me tog brgyudastong phul na gnas ston la 'gyur// chog rgyas pa sgrub pa pos nyadang/ sha dang/ tiladang/ sranachan gyi bag dang/ lha bshos
dung kha 'dra dang/ la phug dang/ shing thog rnam bza' bar mi bgyi'o// gal ta'adi dag kyang zosa' las kyang bsgrubs na laganu rdordzas de nyid mthar byed cing las kyang dengs grug tu
mi 'gyuyo// sang ga ni mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la grog mkhar chu mo yod pa'i mdun nas sa blangs te/ ba'i rnam zad ng bsris seng ge 'i gzugs bgyis te gso sbyong bzungalaM/ zla ba gcig
zas su 'oskyo'athung zhing thu mar zhag gsum skyababagyis tam gyi ngozhag brgyud 'asgrub bo// sngar phonya mo rnams kyis las rnams bgyi'o// bsnyen bkur bgyis pa rnams kyang
bsrungaparab gyi'o// de nas lagan rdo rje'i mdun dubazlos brjod bargyus te/ sang gi'i sgra 'byin gyi bar du bgyi'o// sang ga'isgra thos nas lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams 'byung ngo// de
dragal 'dod pa bskyad par ma bgyi'o// gal te 'dod pa bskyedanaseng ga'i nimam so// lha ma yin gyi bu mo rnams ni mchis te/ lha ma yin rnams kyang yongs su spyod par 'gyur
ro gal tid dag la 'dod pa ma bskyod nas nig gipa'i gyurato/ gang ga la zhenanas rig sngags 'chang gi bu mo brgyadartsa'abyung ngo// rig sngags 'chang bzhi stong yung g.yog 'khor du
'gyur ro// gang du 'dod pa daramachi'o// rag sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'agyur ro// 'khor la 'asogs pa'i spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro// gang gi tshe rdo rjod ng/ 'khor
lo dang/ mdung rtse gsum pa dang/ be con dang/ zhags pa dang/ mdung thung dang/ dbyug to rnams mtshib de'atshong ga sgra 'byin pasong ge'i sgras mtshon pa thams cad dapag tshad
brgyad khriramachi'o// rigasngags 'chang gi rgyal po gang dgasang go'i sgra thos pa dadago thams cad sa la lhung ngo// mtshon chad dgathams cad kyang dbang du 'gyur ro// bskal
bya// khar gnas pa'i 'og sngagasa'achang gi rgyal por 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhagabargyud lanyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis ta ba'ilcibs la malhung ba blangs paskams
gtsang ma'i phyogs su gnod sbyin gyi gzugs bgyis te/ de la me tog dmar po dwang gtor ma dmar po sbyin no// pho nya mo rnams kyis lus thams cad bgyi'o// phyogs gcig tu gnod/
spyin thams cad 'am kha lus me tog dkar po rnams stsol to// gzugs de'i mdun du arkarishing gi zhugs khus shing bal ba'iyam shi sug cing zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ maral
bsgugs pa brgyad stong sbyin srag bgyilo/ de nas gzugs 'gul zhing dngos grub tu'agyur tenyon redi na ra'i re dbulal// dpon gayog bdun gyi sras dbul// las 'di bsam
bar bgyi ste ba/tsang mar bgyis la lan cig bzlas brjod bgyis tobanag momasmad spyamathun gyi 'o ma blangs la/ bram ze'i bu mos bsrubs nga 'i mar blangs tamar gyi de zhag bcubazhil
zhagagasum sbyang ba bgyis tamtshan gacig yodapa 'am lag na rdo rje'i khyim dusopa la shing a t+tha'il ma bdun blangs ted dag gi snying duganod sbyin gyi gzugs mthe bong gi chatsam zhig
bgyi// de naso 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas sol ma reg par mid do// de nas dngos grub tu'agyuratade nyin r da ra 'o 'bul lo// dpon gayog bcuganyis kyazan
0 dbul 'go/ 'di ni dngos grub bo// rig sngags gang gzhan la khyen pa'i rig sngags de phyi drobazlas brjod bgyis la/ da kyi nag pa mchog gi snying po dang lhan cig bzlas brjod bgyis na de
la tshigs su bcad par 'gyur gyi gsang sngags su mi 'gyuro// de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
ldan 'das rig nga 'a rgyal po yi ge bzhi pa ni bskal pa bzhir gnas pa lags so/ bcom ldan 'das rig pa'irgyal po rdzu 'phrul che ba/ dbang chab/ ma rungs pa/ gtum pa/ drag po/
lags so// bcom ldan 'das mi brjod pas bdag la gnod pa lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'byungabo'i bdag po dbang ldan la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 'byung
po'i bdag po de de bzhin// jiskad sman pa de de bzhin no// 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rigi pa mchoga'adi'i rdzu 'phrul che ba'o// 'byung po'i bdag po rig pa'i rgyal po chen
po' ma'agro lding ba'agazugs can 'agro lding gi skad du brjod pa'o// 'khyung bo'abadagakharig pa'i rgyal po chen po'i mchog 'di ni phyag 'tshal ba dang bcas par yi ge sum cu rtsa gnyis pa'o//
yi ge bzhi pa 'di'ang mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa ste bskal pa bzhir gnas pa yin no// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung su bshad pa'o//
'byung bo'i bdag po 'dithosan sems can gang dag mtshams med pa ldabyed pa dag kyang samasacan dmyal ba chen po mnar med par skyabaden gnas ma yin zhing go
skabs medade/ rig pa'i rgyal po chen po rig ba mchogagi mthu ni 'di yin no// 'dilta ste/ dpon nor bu rin po che chen po lirgyal po gtsug tor ldan zhes bya ba mthengabatsam gyis nad
thams cad med par 'gyur zhingegadon thams cad kyang 'abros par 'gyur ro// 'byung po'i bdag po da bzhin du rig pa'i rgya' po chen po bzhi dag gangagis bzlas brjod byas pa de mtshon
'kha gyis 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ chus ma yin/ mes ma yin zhing/ de bar ma dor 'omibami 'gyur ro// ngan 'gro log par ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// nges
par rdorje'i rigs su skye bar 'gyur ro// de nas tshodang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskorapa byas paspyan sngar 'dug nas mgo btudade/ bcom ldan 'das la
'di skad ces gsato// bcom ldan 'dasaci'i slad du rig pa'irgyal po chen po lag na rdo 'di skad du/ rigapa'i rgyal po mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa mtshungs pa med pa 'di
bdag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ma tsho mdzadunas bzung ste bshad do zhes gsung/ bocom ldan 'das bdag gi mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis ma ma kI
[t ]daltar rdzu 'phrul che ba'ang rjes su dran te/ rdorje 'chang chen po 'di nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor ba 'jig gi gsung rab l lha rnams lamA ma kAbastan te/ 'khor 'dus pa der
mtshamasngo med pa bgyis bsems can gcig pa cang yang mi ring ba zhig na mchis pa de 'od bur gyi snang bde mthong nas yid dga' bar gyur ta rnam par bstas nas/ rig sngags 'chang
rnams kyi rgyal po rdo rje 'brang ba zhes bgyi bar gyur to// shAri'i bus rago sngags 'chang de'abasams so// dosabcom ldan 'daso lanagasum bskor ba byas te/ dang shu
ri'ibu'ang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ ban+domaldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// brjom ldan 'das de'i slad du mu mar ltar rdzu 'phrul che'o zhes bdagumachi'o/
bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal te/ ri'ibu dond derje 'chang chen po la dris shig/ de nas shA ri'i bus/ rdordzi'achang chen po 'di skodatsis smras so// rig pa'i rgyal po
mchog khyod ci'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'dus de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad nas bzung ste bdag gis 'og pa'i rgyal pochen po 'di bshad ces daskadapas/ rdo rje 'chang chen pos
'daskad cesasas so// shA ri'i bu de jisnyam dusems/ 'dabazhin gshegs pa g.yo yin nam/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pagatso bo yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin ng
gtsobo yin nam/ de bzhin gshegs pa gtso bo yin zhan/ shA 'ibu de bzhinagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa 'isangs rgyas thams cad ni shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa lasakhyul/ dra bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tuphyin pa bshad do// shAri'i bu de bzhin du bdag gis kyang rig pa'i rgyal po chen po mchog gi
snying dro la byas la/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgronam chen po 'a'od zer gyi rgyal po de'i mthus mA ma kI phyag rgya chen po'i rgyal mo chen mo de thob bo// de nas shA'i bu
cang miny+tsa bar 'gyur to// du'i bcom ldan 'das kyis/ 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan la bka' stsalapa/ 'byung po'i bdag po gang gisade bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag gang+ga'i
krung dgu bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bye masnyed la phyag byas pa bas/ gang gis rig pa'irgyalapochen po'i mchog lag na rdo rje la yid kyis phyag byas pa de ni de nyid las bsod nams mang dubaskyed do// de
nas byang chub sems dang la rtogs pa dri ma med pas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis lagatugs te/ bcom ldan 'das 'a 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das byang chub
sams dpa' lag na rdo rje'as ji srodacig nas 'gapa'irgyal po chen po dang rig sngags 'chang gi bdag por bskos pa thob ste/ 'di ting ba'adzanagang gis gnas/ 'di'i sngon gyi dge ba'i
bshes gnyen ni su lags/ 'di gnas pa gang gis gnas/ daskad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' rtogs pa dri ma med pa la 'di skad ces
ka' stsal to// rtogs pa drim med pa sngon byung ba'as pa'i dus na bskal pa gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu'i bye ma snyed 'das pa na gdul dka' zhes bya ba'i bskal pa chen po byung ste/ bskal pa
chen po la de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isas rgyas yashes sgron ma chonamo'i 'od bra zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo// gas kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed
'di na de 'tshade'i dus na rdordzogs ldan zhes bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs ba ye shesasgronam chen po'i 'od wa da ni/ byunganubasams dpa' bye ba
khrag khrig brgya stong phrag drug cu'i mun pa mun naga rnam par selang rnam par snang byed ces byapa'i chos kyi rnamagras de bzhinagshegs pa'i gsang ba 'chadad// rdo rje chang gi rigs
'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byas dpag tumed pa nas 'dus pa/ 'jig rtenagyi khams mtha' yas mu med pa'i rdul phrarab snyada'ating 'dzin dang gzungs kyi bsngags pa dpag tumed/
pa bstan pa'i phyir 'dzum ba mdzad do// de nas rdo rje 'chang chen po rojochen po'i khyu mchog tu gyur ba 'jig rten mtha' yas pa'i dbang phyug girgyal po zhes byakhal kho 'dus pa de nyid du
'dus par gyur pa de stan las las te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tugazar nas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la
gtugs nas yang ' ngas ti/ tog yangs pa chen po rab 'byam gyi 'og phyogs nas phyag rgyu chen pa bsgyur bas rdo rje blangs te/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamamatha' yas

rgya mtsho rnam pa bcu yang dag par basal nas/ de dag gis rgyal po bats+tshas par bsgyur bas rgya mtshongon po bisduba'itshul gyi nga rgyal chen po des rdo rjesu gsoranas dus kyi tha ma 'jig pa'i me lta
bu'i mig gi 'dzums pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba'idakyil 'khor gyi 'og gi phyogs kyi phyag rgya bsgyur bas rdorjod/ de bzhin gshags pa'i zhabs kyi rung du bzhag ste zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal
nas/ de bzhinagshegs pa de la 'dzum pa mdzad pa'irgyud zhus pa/ deci'i slad du/ btsamo ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor 'dus pa'i 'adzum pa bstan/ bcom
ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo dang smin mtshamasamadzodasu nas sngonam byung ba'i 'od zerakha dog sna tshogs byung/ bcom ldan 'das de'i sud du 'khor 'dis bskul nas bdag bcom ldan
'das la zhu zhing mchis na/ thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag dang byang chub sems M dpa'i tshogs 'di'i thugs brtse ba'i slad du de bka' stsal du gsol/ rdorje

bza0 bsgyings pa chen po 'jig rtenamatha' yas pa'i dbang phyug gi rgyal po lagan rdo rjes des zhus pa dang/ de nas de'i tshobcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan dpal gyi be'u chen po las mthon kha chen po dang//
b.rU rtsalta bu 'od zer nor bu rinapochechen po sku mdog lta bu'i 'od dang ldan ba 'od zer chen po'adekyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byamAmatha'ayas par cher snangaba'i 'od
zer gyi mi rtse phyung nas/ drim med pa 'od zer rnam pa'i phroba'i dkyil 'khor las lag pa g.yon pas rdo rje byas pa las/ gsang ba'i badragapo lag na rdorjerig pa'i rgyal bo chen po byung ngo/
lcags kyu'imtshan las nilcags kyu/ lulas ni 'dod ng 'dodzum/ bkra shis las ni gu rgyud/ g.yung drung 'khyil ba mchog tumasngos shing me 'bar ba lta bu las me khalaM/ bya
ma bumalas naser mo/ gdugs lasan rgyal mtshan drug po/ dordzalas dag rab ste/ rgyal mtshan mo pho mo dang/ 'khor du bcas pa bdunang de dag byung ngo// dadag gi mdun du ma rungs pa

khro bo'ogazugs stobs re tshe dang/ khro bo ki li ki lo dusakyi mtha' ma'i na bo tsho lta burdo rje khu tshur las byung ngo// lag rngamalasanikhu tshuraro// phrag po 'bar zhing mdzes pa las ni rdo rdzoganam
lcags to/ de ltar 'khor dang bcas ba'i yi nyamo bcu'o// de bzhin du drug cu phra ga bzhir bsgri'o// rtogs pa dri ma med pa 'diltar log na rdo rjeg.yog 'khor dang bcas shing/ phonyamo
[z/ ]@#// dang 'khor dang bcas pa byung nas dam tshig chen po dang ldan pa'idakyil 'khoradu/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes sgronam chen po'i 'od zer las/ das dang zhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis gsol ba btab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste/ thog mar de bzhin gshegs pas sku dang/ gsung
dang / thugs kyi gsang ba bcu dang/ gsang ba mtha' yasadakrigs phrag bye ba dang ldan pa'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal bo degadul dka' ba rnams 'dul bdang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstan
pa'i phyir du bzhin gshags pa'i 'khor dam tshig can 'dus pa'i dkyil 'khor du bshadad// rtogs padril med pa datshun chadabcom ldan 'das de bzhinagshegs pa ye shes sgron ma chen po'i
'od zer de la sogs pas nags rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu dgu'i gam du dud pham par mdzad nus bstan pa kun tu bzung bar gyur to// rtogs pa dri ma med pa dal bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa ye shes sgronam chen mo 'od zer de'i 'og tubaskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug pala'ajig rten gyi khams mi mdza'adir/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas donagazags pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das ri gsung rab bdud cang mi smra ba zhes bya ba de byung ngo// rtogs pa dri ma med pa lagan rdo rje des yang bdud pham
bar byas nas/ donagazigs pa zhes bya ba'id bzhin gshegs pa brgyudabcudang/ sas rgyas bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa gcig las bdud pam par byas te bstan pa bsrung bar byas so// datshun
chadabaskal pa dgu bcu rtsa drug lhag pa zhig 'dasanasasas rgyas gser du snang bas rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba bskal pa bye ba phrag drug cu rtsa brgyudalas bdud pham par byas tabastan pa kun
tubasrungs par gyur to// de'i 'og tude stong snyed 'das nas lag na rdordzo'adi de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa dadag gis gsang ba 'dzin pa dang bstan pa bsrungs par gyur to// de bzhin du
sbyarate tha mar de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tor can dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ thams cad skyob dang/ gsar grub drang/ de bzhin du leg par dad sel dang/ mi 'khrugs pa dang/
'od srungs sogs pa dang/ 'bastan pa la'ang ma dul ba dang/ de bzhin du gsang ba'adzinatsang bskal pa bzang po la'ajig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nyid dusangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed de/
bskal pa bzang po'o de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isaargyas ji snyedapa thams cad la de bzhin du mthar gyis thungs 'dis bstan pa la byang byas nas mngon par rdzogs
parasas rgyas te/ rdordzo'i la gyis 'gro bzhes bya ba'i banagshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sas rgyas su 'gyur lozhes/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'is sa rgyas shAkya thub pas bka' stsal to// danas bcom ldan 'dasal/ 'byung po'ibadag po dbang ldan gyis 'di skad ces
chagasol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang 'grig pa mchog galasastsal bar bgyi'o// ma god pa'i sa'amo mkhan gso sbyobazung bas sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gsar gyi kha
dog lta'adristsal to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas lol du lag na rdo rnamadogaljobasangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// lagan rdo rje'i g.yas rel dun pa nya mo bcu gnyis
to rgyal ba'i blo gros ma dang/ me bal nasngo bsangs so// rdo rje gdong dang/ dordzolta ba dang/ gdong dkar mo dang/ rdorjesor mo dang/ nag mo dang/ gyen du lta ba'i gdong gi gsar
mdog go/ rjesang ge'i khri dwang/ rdo rje ldan ma dang/ shugs ldan ma dang/ rdo rje bzhad ma nidamaramor bri bar bgyi ste/ pho nyamo thams cad kyang rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan par
kha bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon rol du dbang phyugachen po mdog dkar po ral pa can mtshan ma bsgrungab/ dka'athub bzlog pa dang lhan cig bri bar bya'o// 'byung po mdog dmar
po mi sdug pa bzhi'angabri bar bya'o// phyis rig sngags 'changagis dus gsum du khrus bgyi zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du brgyad brgya brgyad bargyabazlas brjod bgyi zhing zas su chu skyo
0 btung bar bgyi'o// tham lus skyung bar bgyi ste/ de'i 'og tuzhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis la/ gnas bzhirebasnyen bkur bgyidapa bzhikazhaga'o/ phanyamo rnams kyisolas thams cad
bgyi'o// ma'isku gzugs kyi nasdur nagasmams pa'i ngadu'adug ste/ mchod pa rgya chebagyisal gtor ma'angashin tu cherab gyi'o// lce pogagi bdug pas bdug go/
rimo'i skyogazugs kyi spyanasngaraanAleshing gos zhugs dusal/ me tog dkarapo dang/ sgrung rtsi deng/ mar la bsgugs bsame stag dag byung gi bar dusbyin sreg bgyi'o// nga'i
'og tuul sngon po lta bu'i ral gri khyung gi bar du lcags phyesasbyin sreg bgyi'o// dbyung ma thag tu sku lcang ra 'khyil bar 'gyur/ lebcudrug po lta bur 'gyur/ nyim 'char ba'i 'od
lta 'gyur/ dpon g.yog druganam mkhaM'al mtshibo'agyur ro// la khri nyis stong thub par 'gyur/ de bzhin du grogs rnams kyang dpag tshadastong du gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro//
de bzhin du'ogam dbang phyug chonapo'i ral gri bsgrub par bgyi'o// gzhan yang mal gro bsgrub pa nizla ba gcige slong mo'i zas za zhing/ phyis mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi' ra mo'i gzugs
kyi mdun du po tamo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// zhag gsum snang ba bgyis pa la gri ma chagatsang 'phaname dpa sal/ ral gri lag pa g.yas na thogs pa bar gyi
bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de blangs pa tsam gyisanam mkha'al 'phagaso/ lebcu drug lon pa lta bur 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang stong gi bdag por 'gyur ro//
le khrinyos stong thub par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang 'khor bsgrub pa bshad par bgyi'o// slong mo'i khrus bza'anyungaphyis mar ngo zhag bcubashanasazhag gsum smyung ba bgyis te/ lag
nardorje'i mdunadumachod pa rgya cher bgyisal/ gtor ma dang lha bshos kyang shin tu cher sbyashing po tamo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// lcags sna gsum las khorale rtsibs bcu
drug pa brgyas l/ shing a shAt+mani ma bdunagyi steng du bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlos brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nasas g.yo bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad skrag par 'gyur
ro des blas pa tsam gyis sgralcapal 'khyil bar 'gyurar// 'bcu drulenapalta bu 'agyur ro// mdog nyi ma shar babazhin du 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur
bar 'gyur ro// bud med brgyad 'byung bar 'gyur ro// dpon g.yog bcu drug 'gro bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gzhan brgya' 'byung ste bsnyenabakur bgyidapa 'gyuye// gang gi
gnas chog mo zhes brgyabaramachibarab sam par de'itsho 'khod pag tshadatsam dum 'bor ba sto'abyin cing 'gro ste/ sto ba ciyodapa lungab 'gyuro// lo brgyad khri thub par gyur
re gang gi tsha'achib de'its+tsalhan ng du skye'o// de nas rig pa'i rgyal po las kyidakyil 'kho bshad par bgyi ste/ brtag pa bgyis la gnas ma nyams par/ shes rab can gyis dkyil
'khor bri// khrunaMbcuganyis sgo bzhi pa// drab zhin du ni khru brgyud la// de la thog mar bribani// rim pa gnyis pa dmar po ste// rim pa gsum pa nag po'o// dkyil 'khor de yi byang phyogs
su[;]sangs rgyas bcom ldan bri bar bgyi// de bzhin bshags dang nyabarani// bcom ldan phyag na rdo rje ste// rdo rje thogs shing ga pas bskor// sgo rnams kun tu basrung bar bgyi/
sgo bzhir sgo ba rnams bya'o// shar phyogasasu ni drag po dang// gzhon nudang ni ma mo bri/lho phyogs na khyab 'jug dang// nyi zladang nitshongs pa bri// nub phyogs su ni gshonarje dang
ka t+ya'i bu mo gtum mo bro// byang phyogs sunalha mo dpal// de bzhin lha mo dbyangs can bri// lha rnams 'di dag thams cad ni// jiskadang shadapa bzhin du bri// bya ma bum mgul chings
can gyis bskorazhing sgosgoyang gzhag go/ dbus su gtushangasma'i srad bu dang bcas pa gcig gzhag go/ bya ma bumagyi lho phyogs su rdo rje bri'o// lha rnams kyang mtshon cha dang bcas
par bgyis te/ drag po'i no mdung rtse gsum pa bri'o// gzhon nu'i mdung thung ngo// ma mo rnams kyin me tshang 'o// khyaba'ajugagan 'khor lo'o// zla ba danyema'i ni gzhu'o// tshangs
[/ ]@#// pa'i niril ba spyi blugs so// gshin rje'an bson no// gzhan daga mtshon thamal pa'o// zhugs ni btubus nas su// brlung brgyatshang ba yamasrog shing// lha
[ ]bshesadringang bdug pa dang// gtor chab tsal nasalhan dang// spyan srog 'dinisgrung dang// mdung 'bras yosalanatshe dang// de bzhin yungs kar rnams kyis bgyi// lus
kar gyis ni bsrung ba bgyi// gtsang ma'agosan bgo bar bgyi// mchod pa dag nisdur bgyis te// de yi 'og tulas brtsam mo// 'jig rtenananiciyodapa'i// mna' tshig rnams kyis gna'
bsgragago/ dam tshig 'altar susrung ba dang log 'dren thams cad kyis grags ma'idatsapalas kyang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// dkona mchog gsum la dad pas dkyil 'khor sngar mthong nas
da'i 'og tu gang mchog bsgrub par bgyi'o// su zhigagazhan du bgyidanade'i rdordzanyid kyis mthar bgyid par rgyu'o// dkyila 'khor gyi chogardzogs so//// rig pa
mchog sgrub pa 'di ni 'dilags te/ zla ba gcig zas su 'oskyo'abyus la phyis mar gyi ngozhag bstsabazhi nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis tegos gtsang mar gsal/ rang bsrel dang bcas
pa'i mchod rtenanam/ sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs sam/ byang chub kyishengengam/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'ong ci nus su mchodado// phonya rnams kyis dridang/ me tog dang/
bdug pa dang/ gtor ma sbyin// de nas lcags kyi ral gra bgyis te/ bud med rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan pa khudamedabs bskor nam longs kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'os
sa g.yog 'khor 'bul// la gri dgayog 'khor la bzhag nabud medachu a'agyur ro// gal te'atshalan bud med de dag kyang chung mar 'gyuro// galatami'atshalanagayog/
'khor rnams l stsal to/ g.yog 'khor rnams dang lhan cig nam mkha' lamachi'o/ 'og 'dapagatshad stong du'ang mchi'o/ steng du'ang de bzhin no// ral gri de thogs 'khor
las sgyurab ma gtogs bar rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod do// la gyi grub bo// sgrub pa gzhan yang yod// tshes grangs dang skaram gdam ma dgos/ smyung ba bya mi dgo
so bud med dalegs par bskya zhing me tog gis kyang mchodal phonyamo rnams kyisakyalaso khya'o// da'i 'og tubudamad de kha bub tu bzhagal/ budamed de'i rgyab tuMzhonati/ bud
med du 'gul zhing sgra 'byaniya'ajigs bamakhyuzhing/ gyen du 'phagakyi radurig pa'irgyalakho bzlas brjod bya'o// yang sa'alhung ngo// lhung nas de las 'bab par byago/ donas
bud med rgyanathams cad kyis brgyanab rnams mthong apo// de'i nang nas budamed cigekhabub tu'ajug cing dbugs 'byin pa de'i rgyud du zhonanas nam mkha'al 'phag cing mdog nyi ma shar
ba lta bur 'gyur// bud med kyi glo la ral gri 'dzam bu'i chub 'i gsar gyis brgyan cing mu tig dang zin po ches smras pa'i phyang ngo// las 'di ni rgyal mtshan dang/
'dra zhes lcasanas bya'o// lel can dangabyas lagazob rnams kyis las 'dim bya'o/ ganganusal brtan zhingamathu stobs dang ldanepa rtsol khangs par byas pas las 'dibartsam
bar bya ste/ lasa'adasgrub pa pos rtag tu go chas pa dang tshangs par spyodabarubyazhinganyadang shayo ngas su spang bar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang gis ldong ros sgrub pa'i tshog l tastor n du
dgug pa'i phyir 'di brtsam par bya// rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i m/ klu 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ shA 'am/ grul bum yang rung ste/ dbab pa byas pa de la gang gis rdzas khyer ba des
ngal slar byin cig dang 'phung bar mi bya'o zhes barjod par bya'o// mar gyi ngozhag bcu bzhelanyonezhug gtsagalcangab bgyisate/ thungs pa chobatsugs la 'brum byugs tabal la reg
ba'irgyal po bzlas brjod byas na rig sngags 'chang grub pa'i ng rung/ gang yin pa de'obazhing 'ongs nas kyangs 'bul tshada'aca'ang mi bya'o// gal tami'ong na phyis snying pos
yan lag dang nying lag rnams gtubs togazhag go/ bsrung ba byas pa'i tshog sakhya'o// gzhan du nam rungs par 'gyur ro// gal tabasrung ba ma byas na grub pa rnams kyis ma
rungs par byed do// yan lag dnganyide lag gtubs pas 'ong zhing rdzas kyang sbyin par byed d// 'daskad dubcom ldan 'das yongs su bskyab tu gsol zhes snya'o// dasar gso ba'i
phyil 'bru mar gyi thos po che las 'bru mar byas te/ 'phags pa lagan ro'imadun du sange pos srog blugs lanastong spyanasrog byas nasos shing dbang du'ang 'gyurar// dbyig dug
bsal bar 'dod lag pa dang rkang pa snod dubcug la rlungagayab kyis g.yabs te/ gang du'adod pa der rig pa'i rgyal po bzlas brjod byas/ dbyig dug byung ste nad med par 'gyur ro// mig
sar gyind pasal bar 'dod n chulalan bdunabasngags laskom du bludana'atsho'o// mib nadabasal 'dod name tog rtsa ba'ang bodag la lan bdun bzlas brjod byas te sngags kyis
btang snyom dubcugana'atsho'o// de nas rig pa'irgyal po'i mchogalaganadol/ ga 'drenagyis 'daskad ces smras so// bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad kyi don gyi spyod
durige ba mchog 'di'achad dam/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis bdagasala'akhyamazhisems can rnams la'ang glags rnyed bar 'gyur bar bdag la ma gzigs sam/ da nas gnod sbyin
rgyudabang lag nadorjes/ log 'dren la 'di skad ces saso// khyod nyon cig/ gang dag dam tshig ma shesaparanga'i rig pa'i chog rgyas par klog ba darag khyer cig/ gang dag
gtsug gi lhag ma gcig zla ba dang/ lcal bul ba'idriding/ bdug pa dang/ me togalaspyodang de dag khyerag/ gang dag pa'i dam tshig shes pa dang/ chog rgyas pa las
'acung ba bzhin duspong bar byed pa dang/ gang dag rig pa mchog rdo rje'i rigasngags dang bcas/ gsang chen dang bcas pa 'dzin pa de dag glugasamatsholacig/ chud ma gson cig/ de
skad thos pa dang/ lega'adren dedag cacan s dga' zhingamagulayarings te/ laganardo rje'i rkang pa laphyag bya ba'i gsang sngags smras pa/ namorasnatrayAya/ namash+tsaNAbadzrapA Nayo/ mahA

ya san pa tAya/ tad+ya thA/ huru badzrapA chi huru badzra pA Ni/ drotatha ka badzrapA Ni/ spo Ta ya badzrapA Ni/ dar tapa tsam thabadz+dzab cha sprodaM/ rim mkhanagaso sbyong bazung bsam godapa'i sa la

spyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lagan rdo rje bro bar bya ste/ phra yang ku ltar sngo bas sa rgyanathams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// de'i g.yog 'khor laga'adren bzhi bcu bri bar bya ste/ kha dog
sna tshogs palaganardo rje'i rkang ba gnyis lamago bos phyag 'tshal ba bri bar bya'o// sna dkal gcu ba bya'o// de'i 'og turig sngags 'chang gsemar gyi pozhag bcu bzhi nas brtsams te/
ba'i rnam lngas lus sbyang ba byas la/ dus gsum du khrus byazhing ri mo'i gzugs mdun du dus gsum dubargya rtsa brgyadasbyin srog khya'o// zla ba phyi ma ma bzhag brtsa bzhi l
nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdordzol mchod pa byas nas dridang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa phul te log 'dren rnams la lang bag bcos par pa ta ka dang/ mo ka da dang/ pu ba li ka dang/
rtsa ba dang/ shing thog gzhan dag kyang phulal/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du snama'i me tog zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong sbyin srog bya'o// 'og dang ri mo'i sku gzugs
'gulazhinge ta zhes bya ba'isgro bsgragaste/ de la'ang 'jigs ramakhye'o// yang lanabargyudastong spyanasrogabyas n danasam mo sdug pa zhig 'ongs te/ dela'ang 'jigs pa mi bya'o// rdo
rdzo bzhi damasar bcugand cizhes smra'o// des lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gang smras pa de dran parab gyiso la de bzhin gyisangashag ces brjod par bya'o// de bzhin du bya'o zhes smras nas mosnang
por 'gyur ro// de'i 'og tu rig sngags sgrub pa lalog 'dren de dag dngos grub gyin ma'agyur/ nyin gcig bzhinakar sha pa Nanying+ge'u smyon par 'gyur/ dbang du'ang 'gyur/ yide
lagang ci bsams pa de thams cad byed par yang 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang brjod par bgyi'o// gang dga' go pa mtshog gs tsheg rgyas par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang/
mchod par bgyi ba de dag la ci'ang ma bgyi'o// 'dod pathams cad bra nangesgrub pa de la dngos grub stsal to// gang dag bdag cag gis gsang sngags 'chang ba de dag la leg 'dren
nam rdulog 'drenagyi bu'am/ log 'dren gyi 'khoragangalal zhig grags lta ba 'am/ gang grags rnam par tshol bde'i mgo tshal pa brgya 'gas so// bcom
ldan 'das bdag cag gis mi snyan pa brjod par bagyi'o// sgrub pa'i dus na gsang sngags 'anyid kyisame togal lan bdunasngags kyis btangalastsal bar bgyis nulag 'dren thams
cad dngos grub stsolato// sngags 'dinyidakyis gzhan labagags bgyid do// skar ma bdamami'atshal/ ngab bgyi mi 'tsholal/ lag na rdorje'i mdun dumanasranagre'u las
bgyis pa'i snum 'khur phul ba leka brgyad stong spyanasrog bgyisol/ 'di skad du che ge mo zhes bya ba'i bgags gyis shig ces brjod na/ de'i tsholog 'drenade dag dga' zhing mgu bar gyur
pa'i yid kyisaM bgags bgyidado// bsamasan zhi ba'agyur ro// castelaga'adrena rnams mthong ba 'tshal na mar gyi shog brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ dur khrod du
kha mchis la mgul ba blangs te/ dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pas brgyan pa bgyis la/ rig pa dbag tu ma mchis par bazlos brjod bgyisan dgung phyed kyi dus lag 'dran rnams machiste/
de dga' rdo rje lte bas dristsal bar bgyi'o// me khalasame tog stsalabar bgyi'o// rdo rdzo bzhi damasasgyur stsal te/ 'diskyod dusams dang bar gyis shig cesabarjod na lega'adrenade dag/
chu zhang dgod do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gas rig pa mchog dran par bgyis nad dag ma'agul te/ 'di skad du khyedasams dang bar gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// de bzhin du bya'o
zhes smras nas la snang bar gyurato// de'i 'og turig pa 'gagasami bgyid do// sngags 'di nyid kyis skyasang dang bud med dbang du bgyi bar 'tsholanam ra la nga zhag brgyad la grog mkhar
rtsa'amadun gyi dogs blangs gzugs bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du thabakhung bgyis pa thab khung gnong du dgon pa'i langag lce bas zhugs bus te/ zhugs khyenang du gzugs stsal
la de'i steng du lan tshwa'i ne srog lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod gyis tadagung bdun du dus gsum n dbang du'agyur ro// bgegs brgyad khri gtsug phud 'phyang ba zhes bgyi ba'i
bgags dastong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams bgegs bgyid pa lags te/ de'aberadubasgrub bar bgyi'o// sgrub pa'i dusan rig sngags 'chang gis grog mkhar gyi dog
sa bsagatsug puda' byang gi sku gzugs bgyis lam gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam bzhika' gan rdo rje'i mdun du bzhog// zho dang 'o mas bkrusul ma tog dang bdug pas mchod de/ 'og pa
brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyisan/ da nas yid dga' nas 'jig rten gyi 'phrul po ches dngos grub stsal to// dgos pa zhig sgrub na'ang de la dngos grub stsol to// log 'dren gyi sgrub
ka @#// pardzogs go/gi sngags 'chang gsonor bsgrub pa dang las byang bar bgyi ba'atshalan ba lang gi lhas sumachas la mar gyi ngozhag brgyad nas
brtsams tabras su'oskyo'atshalazhing 'bumakhazla sabarjod bgyison 'gu pa'i rgyal po tshangs pa'i gdugs kyi gu pal lce sbyang mo sgra 'byin te/ sgra lan lnga brgya 'byin to// de nas
dngos grub tu 'gyur tItan rastong radaci las kyang byang bar 'gyur// ste lag na rdo rje bcom ldan 'dasalaganu dordza mthong bar 'tshal na pad+ma'i rdzi nga du mas la yar gyi ngozhag
sa bdun nas brtsams tazas su 'o skyo'athu zhengo/ lan sum stong bzlas brjod bgyis nanyidakyis lag na rdo rje mthong ngo// me khal bzlas brjod bgyis pas me togadabul la//
N+NaM rdordza bzhi d mas smrar sul te/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'di skyod du bcom ldan 'das bdag yongasasubaskyab tugasol zhes barjod do// des 'di skad du bu rubye zhes brjod pa
dung du da nas bcom ldan 'das yid kyis gang bsam pa de thob par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod do// de bzhin du gyur cig ces brjod nas mi snangabara'agyur ro// de'i 'og tu
yid lagang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub bo// byis pa log 'drenagyisawanenalag na rdo rje'i mdun du lanabargyartsa brgyadabazlos brjod bgyis pa'i spos chus bkrus na
gtong ngo// gal talog 'dren gyi gnas bsgrub par 'tshalan rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngotanas brtsams ta/ zus su 'o 'thung zhing lag pa khazlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas
marachu ngozhag brgyadalanyin zhag gcig sbyang bi bgyis dmtshan gacigamachis baachis la 'byor pas mchodad/ ma tog dkarapo stong gsamtshan ma bsnunan mtshan brgyar 'gas/
te denas lega'adran gyi las dngos grubo tu 'gyur// lag 'drena rnams ngaganyanapar yang 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams gsad desnyam du khrus nga'i yid kyis bzlas brjod/
bgyis na log 'dren rnams 'gum mo// gang du bsgoms pa der thams cad brgyud do// yar gyi ngo'i tshes brgyadanas brtsams la 'phugs pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du nang par rig pa
lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// gdugs kyi gung la'ang de bzhin du bgyin/ thumaredalan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi ste/ deltar dgung bdun du bgyis na bdun pa'i
gdugs la dAn ra sbyin pa brgyad do// cinusakyisamachod par bgyi'o/ zas su 'o skyo'athung bar bgyi'o// yar gyi 'i tshesalnga nas brtsams tatshamatshor 'bab pa'i chu krungadu
zhugs lasnga dronas phyi dro 'khor dubazlas brjod bgyis nadI nar gcig red do// tshos gra sa dang skar mkhadam me'atshal/ sbyang ba bgyi mi 'tshal bar yungs kar 'bru stong las/
de rdzab gyis te// kham phor du stsal la lems kha bcad de/ rig pa brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyi'o// ras zung gcig stsol gyi bar du gzhag go/ de nas mtsho
'ur do'o// tshes grangs dang ka'am bdamami'atshal/ sbyang ba bgyi mo 'tshal bar dwapa nub tsam gyi tshab tu zhugs la lan brgyudastong bzlas brjod bgyis na sras thung gcig stsol bar bgyid
da mar gyi ngozhaga brgyad 'anyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyisol laganardo rje'i mdun dumachod pa bgyisel/ shing ngal ba'anyegasashing gis zhugs bus snama' togazhodang/ sbrang
dang mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong sbyin srag bgyis na dIr stsol bar bgyid do// yar gyi ngotshos bcu gsum l de bzhinagshegs pa'i spyan sngamachod pa bgyis te/ nyin zhag gcig/
sbyang ba bgyis lalon brgyad stongabazlasabarjod bagyisan ras khrungagacig rung do// de nas lagon rdo rjes/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsal to// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gsan/
du gsol/ yon tan bsam gyis ma khyab palasabarjod bar bgyi'o// dgung gsum dusbyang po bgyis lam gyi ngo zhig bcu bzhi'i n+ya gro d+ha'ishigacig pu mchis par mjal/ dri dang//
tshotog dang/ bdug pas brgyan par bagyi'o// tho nyamo rnams kyis las thams cad bgyi'o// de nas gasngags 'chagis ras yugamagodapasashing n+yagrod+ha dkIlan ku shah+phams pa'i/
steng du mchis shang/ rig pa'i rgyal po brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyison/ panas shing gro d+halas 'od we gcig byung sta/ sa rig sngags 'chang la bskor ba bgyis nas sa bar nub
par 'gyur ro// donas 'ag sngags 'chagis rasal btags te/ de bzhinagshegs pa thams cad dang lag na rdo la phyag bgyis la/ ras de de bzhin gshegs pa la phulan yid la
bsams pa tsam gyis skya bo bdunagyis bskor tanam mkha'alamachi'o// ci'atshal bgazugasacan du'agyur ro// dpag tshod sum stong du gyen du 'phag ga/ 'og tu'ang da dazhaneno// bsam
patsam gyis lha'i rigs thams cad 'gugs par bgyidad// sems can thams cad kyisams dang spyod pa'i ng 'tshal bar 'gyura'o// sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ro/ lakhri bdun stong thubakha'argyu'o// da'ingesam ba dang dgos pa thams cad 'byor par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang grub
pa dngas la gnas pa rnams kyi rnam paspyodayul du mi 'gyur ro// gang gi yonam mkha' la gnas pa de'i tshorig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul du mi 'gyur ro// dngos grub 'dis
lha thams cad dang rig sngags 'chang thams cad madunana gnas par 'gyur// de bzhin du lag na rdo rje'i tshig rgyas pa thams cad dngos grubatu'agyur ro// 'di sgrub pa'i rig sngags
0 @#// 'chang gi mtshams mamachis pa lnga 'byang bar 'gyur// gang gi tsho'agum pa de'i tshe lag na rdo rje'i gnas sumachi'o// yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad nas brtsams dulus
sbyab bgyis pa la zas su 'a skyo'athung shing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// bar gyi zhag brgyad lanyin zhag gcig sbyang bgyis te/ mtshan gcig mchis par mal sham thabs sar pa bgaM
zhingebasgrub par bgyi'o// de nas rag sngags 'chang gis gtor ma'i chog rgyan rab gyis lamtshan gyi steng duzhabos g.yon pa bzhag ste rig sngags brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na/ dunas
rgyu mtshan las 'od zer gcig byung te/ ris rig sngags 'changal bskor ba bgyis nas mug bor nub par 'gyur te/ dos skra lcangal 'khyil zhing gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can gyi
rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur ro// yid kyis ga'atshal bder mchisar 'gyur// la dgu stong thub pa 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'di'ang stobasadang pa laganonapa dpag
tu mamachis shing 'byung po thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin thams cad dang/ klu thams cad dang/ lego 'dren thams cad kyis ma tshugs ngalags te/ rig pa'i rigs brgyud thams cad
kyi snyingapo mchog gi gsang sngags bshad par bgyi'o// Tak+ki hUMdza/ 'didang po nyamo rnams kyi las kyi khyad par brjod par bgyi'o// snying po las rnams ni ri mo mkhan gso
0 sbyong bzung bas ma godapa'i rten la sprin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sa sargyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon phol tu kun dga' bo dang/ g.yas ral du lag na rdo rje
yabathogos ba bri bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das ni gsar gyi mdog can// kun dga' bo nisngo bsangs so// lag na rdo rje'ang sngo bsangs te/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o//
de'i 'og tusgrub pa po la gnapogapor thogs par bri'o// de nas yagyi ngo nas dgung gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/ ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi mdun du lung thang gi shing gas zhugs bus la/
sna ma'i me togo mal bstugs pa lan brgyad stong nasrog bgyisan de bzhin gshegs pa'i debral ba las 'od zera'abyung ste/ dran s das grub tu 'gyur ro// ngas yid kyis
gang bsams pa de 'byor paMba'agyur te/ 'kholos sgyur ba nyid dam/ rig sngags 'chang nyid na ma gtogasaso// gtam rgyatsher stsal bar bgyi'o// ma bsgrubs kyang las
rnams su 'gyur ba lags te/ lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'ibrel ba'am/ srad bu 'am/ chusanibakru bar bgyi'o// grogs bsrung na spyi bor mdud pa dor yi// lan gsum
bzlas brjod bgyis pas yul 'khor srung ngo// gsag tshal lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa chab tustsal bas chu srin kum ba'e dang nusrin bcing ngo// yal gas ni rims nadagasokhar
bgyi'o// chab bam ku shasan dug las gso bar bgyi'o// bgags dang lega'adren phung bar bgyi bar 'tshal bas sgrub pa'i dusanaarka'i shing gis zhugs busalarku tshe'i
'bru lasalan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis 'broga'adren rnams phungaba'agyur ro// phyugs chung dbang du bgyi bar 'tshal bsamada' thogasal lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyartsa brgyad
bzlas brjod bgyis taM/ phyugs rlung gi lag nas bzung nadabang du 'gyu'o/ chang ma rungs par bgyi ba 'tshal nalan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i gsag ma khyim gyi sgor dor ro// cham
la mi 'byong bar bgyi na shig ka'i 'bras bul lan bdun bzlas brjod bagyis te stsalanachab l 'bying ba bgyis par 'gyura'o// mar gyi ngozhag brgyad lanyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/
lag na rdo rje'i mdun du shing bil ba'i budashing gisazhugs bus la srog blugs rgya skyegs la lan stong du sbyin sreg bgyis na nad khong skams kyis 'debs pa bgyid do// ma dang gu gul
pas gyi sreg blugs lan brgya stong sbyin srag bgyis na zhi bor 'gyur ro// yar gyi nyanas brtsams to gdugs kyi gung la gas gsar pa bgosal/ zangs kyi snod du zho dang 'bras chan stsal
tagadong gdugs la bstan cing phyugs chung gi ming nas phyung stelanab stong bzlas brjod bgyis na phyugs chung mche'o// gal temamachin phyugs chung de'agum mo// gdugs bdun du/
bgyi'o// 'bras chan gyi gdugs la dbul lo// shingeshami'i phur bu so brgyad pa bungs pasrad bus dkris palag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis lagru ma'agul bar
bgyi'o zhes bgyi ste/ chab tu doran gru mi 'gal ba bgyisaba'agyur ro// mar gyi bzhaga bzhi le zhag gcig spyang ba bgyis temtshan gcige mchis pas mchis la/ 'byung po'i gtor ma
stsal tawa phyogs kyi sol shu dag brgyadastong sbyin srag bgyis na dIn gsum rnyed do// shudag la lananyi cogacig bzlas brjod bgyis ta so phrag tu lan gshags 'gyed pa'i tshog zhan
gyis lan ma thebs par smra bar 'gyupar// lag na rdo rje'i mdun duge'o wa'alan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bargyas la/ des thig le khagyisan dpal tshe bca'agyur// rgyal po'i pho brang
'khor du lan thebs par sa bar 'gyur ro// bud medadabang du bgyid lagan rdo rje'imadun du nga la sha'i shing gzhugs khus la/ sngasrolanu+olanastong rtsa brgyad sbyin srog bgyisanas
ming nas brjod na nyi ma bdun gyis 'grub ste/ za gtsug par bgyi'o// yugasasamodabang dubgyidanam gyi ngozhag dru gnas brtsams te/ bcu'i bar du dus gsum du lag na rdo rje'i
mdun du lung thangagashapel zhugs bus la mon sran sre'u lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin srag brgyasen dbang du 'gyur ro// bram ze'i bu mo dbang du bgyid par 'tshol bsam gyi ngozhagabargyan
lalag na rdo rje'i mdun du dub mamachis pa'i me mdag la rgya skyags kyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyisanadabang pu'agyur ro// skyes pa dbang du bgyi na mar gyi ngo shag
brgyad la zhag gcig ba bgyis nas/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du dong ka'ishongegos zhugs bus la yungs karal lan brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur ro// TAk+kadzarAdzA

nAm pa shika tuka me ni pany+tsamu ma por pa shA badzrapA Ni mya a gra ta pra yaM kub tashar tomapra dzul shA sar shapaM in+d+ri ya bi tsaki kri khyobashi ru d+hi aka tAnaMat+tas tadzra dzA ya sho ba to/ mar
gyi ngo zhagabargyad dam bcu bzhi nas zhag gsum/ nga ba bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du mchodipinus kyis mchod/ rig pa mchog gis dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa thams
cad la phulal/ de'i 'og tu rig sngags 'chang gis shingesalasar po las sgrom bu bgyis te/ sgrom bu der lag bu mig stsal la drob gyur pa dang/ du ba 'phrul ba dang/ 'bar ba'i
bar bzlas brjod bgyi'o// drobar gyur na dbang 'gyur ro// dung 'thulan ma snang bar 'gyur ro// 'bar na nam mkha'al mchi bar 'gyur ro// mdog gdugs shar ba 'dra bar
'gyur ro// lo bdun stong thub par 'gyur ro// lus zhig nas lag na rdo mthong ba'agyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad la nyenazhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te dur khrod dumachisal
skyes pa'irom snad pa byas te/ rig pa mchog gis dri deng/ me tog dang/ bdug pas rgyunapa bgyis la mgo bo shar phyogs su bstan to/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gcer bur phyung la/
skra bshigasU/ de'i snying khar mchiselami sogi khar mi thod pa yungs kar gyis bltams pa bzhag la yus kak+kA rnams mi snang bar gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas dngos grub tu
'gyur ro// mizod bsal mtshe'ur bo nadenasal de kyisakhasams pa tsam gyis nam mkha' mtsho ba'agyur nam mkha' lamachi'o/ ma snang bar 'gyur// rgyal por bgyid do//
bdag mi sdugaparayang ston to// sur yang rgyunathams cad kyis brgyan ba dang/ mdogagadugs shar ba lta burayang ston to// bdag gis gang bsams pa de dgathams cad 'grub bo//
stong thub pa 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhagakhargyadal nyin zhag gtsago sgang pa bgyis te/ lagand rdzo'i mdun du 'go pa mchog gis lag na rdo rjel dre dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa rnamu
dbul lo// grong giphug ron gyi kham ldong rosasalal dri bar gyur pa dang/ dub la thul ba dang/ 'bar gyi bar du bzlos brjod bgyi'o// dro bar gyur pas thig le bgyis nachab kyi nangadu
dgung zla gcig mchis shing chab kyi nangan 'chag go ganga mthong ba de dbang du 'gyur// duba'aphrulan mi snang bar 'gyur te/ masnang bar gyuran grub pa rnams kyi spyod yul du mo
'gyur ro// lo stong thub par 'gyur// 'barananam ma kha'al mtshabaca'agyurata/ dpag tshad stong tshun chad mthong shade sgra'ang thos so// le khri nyis stong thub par
'gyur/ lag na rdo rje grub par 'gyur/ chu la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas gar bgyid du stsal talan gsum bzlas brjod bagyis pa'i du bsagasang tshig sgyur stsal to// yid
kyis lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gso snarastsal to// yar gyi ngozhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdorje'i mdun dupal sharishing gisazhugs bsal
ku mu da'im tab nodang/ sbrang rtsa dang/ mal bsgugs pa brgyud stongasbyin sreg bgyis na yid kyis bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grubaste/ rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal po nyid ni mgato//
so mar gyi zhagabargyud nas brtsams tazas su'i skyo 'tshalazhing/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bir ba'i shing gis zhugs busal/ bde ba'i yum srog shi'abumasminacig bgyis
na rgyal bo nyid stsal to// tshog 'dinyid kyisa'ig sngags 'chanyid kyang stsol to// mar gyi zhag brgyuda'anyin zhag gcig skyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'amadun du seng ldeng gshing
giso zhugs bus la sku tsho'i me tog lan brgyudastong sbyin sreg bgyis nalas grub pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// char gyi bozhag tsecu bzhi la la gan rdo rje'i mdun du arka shing gsazhugs
bus la ata'i me tog lasal 'bumasbyin sreg bgyis na tin ra stong rtsolal// byang chub kyi shing gi 'og tuzas su chu grog 'tshal zhing lan sum 'bum bzlas brjod bagyis narag sngags 'chang
brgyas bskoba'i rig sngags 'chang du'agyur// 'dod pa thams cad las spyod du 'gyuyo// la dgu stong thub pa 'gyur ro// gang rig pa'i rgyal po bsgrub par 'tshal ba des mar gyi ngo
shug brgyud nas bzung ste/ zas su 'o skyo'atshala'ang rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klungadazhugs tekumada'ame tog rgyas pa 'bum phul na/ de nas rig sngags 'chalo chu'i nang du klu reg par bgyid
de de la 'jigs par mi bgyi'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das rig pa'i mchog 'grub par 'gyur to/ da grub pas cho gas rgyas pa thams cad grub par 'gyurar// ga pa'i mchog gi snying/
po 'tshog rgyas pa rdzogasaso// de nas bcom ldan 'dasal/ phuganade rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ba'i snying po 'di mchog tumi bzad
ba tshog rgyas pa mang bo 'ab tusgrubapa bgyid pa// lha dngabacas ba'ajig rtan gyis 'gal bar bgyi ba ma lags pa/ 'byung bo thams cad dang lha thams cad kyisami tshugs te/ phyur
zhing bshad par bgyi'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das kyis/ laganarje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// shod cig gnod sbyin gyi dbang po sems can rnams kyi donagyi phyir da
bzhin gshegs pas gnang gi yodacig/ de nas lag na rdo rjes thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a khor 'dus pa la rnam par bltas nas/ lha de dag la 'daskyedaces smras
so kya kyi lha'i tshogs rnams nyon cig/ nye ba'asnying po'anamechog tu mi bzad b/ de bzhin gshegs basakyang 'gal ba mdzad pa ma yin te/ phyi phyir bshad kyis/ lha'i
tshog sa rnams de nyon cig/ donasalagan rdorjes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugasanas gsang sngags smras pa/ namor/sngayas+ya/ namash+tsaN+Da badzra pA Ni s+ya/ mahA kA
pa sa nA pa tis+ya/ na mash+tsaNA pra ma tanAya sAhA/ hi'i mo ra tir Ni sa// de nas gsang sngags smras ngas stongagasum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam 'al drug tug yos so//
gzhal med kheng gnas pa'ilha rnams kyang khas bubatu 'gyalanas skyobasamedacing dbung gnyin med de 'dayod medas/ gsang ba'i bdag po cinas bdag cag srog dang bral
bar mi 'gyur bar bdag cagal yongs su bskyab tugasolazhes lag na rdordzo' skyabs su dang ngo// log 'dren rnams kyang 'agulam nus nas yidekyis lagan rje la phyag 'tshal lo//
do nas bcom ldan 'dasal gnadordzes cung zad 'dzum pa'i shin gyis/ lhadi dag la 'di skad ces smras so// grogs po khyed lengosashoge/ 'dim tshig la'ang gnas bar gyis
shig/ de thos nas lha rnams rab tu dga' ba'abazhin gyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i/nga pa gnyis laphyag 'tshalanas/ bcom ldan 'dus la'aduskyed ces gsol to//
bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rje' de ni mchog tu mi bzad ba'agasas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsalakha/ lha dag de de bzhineno// de nas bcom ldan 'das la/ lagan
rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag 'og pa 'dinawa rnams 'achi'apho bar bgyidang/ gnod sbyin rnams phung bar bgyid pa/ dri za rnams lhung bar bgyid/
pa rta log 'drena rnams nges par rlag par bgyid pa/ rdo rje'i rigs thams cad skrag par bgyid pa/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la gnod
par bgyidapa lags so// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi lta ba'isnying bo 'din bdag la'ang phur bus 'debs pa lags te/ bcom ldan 'dasamagu bar bgyid ba/ skam pa bgyid
pachad pas gcod pa lagrasaso// lha rnams 'chi 'pho bar bgyidapa dang/ gnod par bgyid pa dang/ phukhus gdabab bgyud par 'atshal bsamar pozhag bcu bzhal
zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/ ba'i ljongs la ma lhungabalas brgya byin gyi gzugs bgyisolalagan rdo rje'i mdun du bzhag ste/ de'i steng du shing kun gyashing gasozhugs bsal
leng ku'i bsagashing yus ka'i thumaral ba sprugs la brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// danas lha rnams so so nas tshig cing brgyabyin gyi gan du mchi'o// brgya
na yang lha rnams dbugs 'byin/ grogs po dgam 'jigs shig ces lha rnams dbugs phyung nas rig sngags 'changagi gan dumachi ste phyin pa dang/ tshig 'diskod du khyema'i rig sngags
'changal dag sbyong gi tshulamed do zhes smras pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis 'daskadadu/ bcomaM ldan 'das lag na rdorjes gang bshad pa de dran par gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// dgres/
nas shun tu dga' ba'i bzhin gyis rig sngags 'chol rig pa stsol go de'i 'og tu rig sngagasa'achang gi'i ge pa mchog gsos gtang bar bgyi'o// 'ge pa des 'ge sngags 'chang/
gi 'kholos sgyur bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang bdunastong gi khe dag por bskalakharags pa'i gyur lha rnams kyang g.yos bar bgyidababa'agyur ro// gnod ne rnams
kyang phung bar bgyidapa'i tshal bas/ grang na gnod sbyin nas/ gnod namo gnas bdamar gyi zhog brgyadalamachis lanyin zhagacig sbyang babagyis te/ byang chub kyishing gis
zhugs bus la a pa marga'iyam sragashing lasalanabargyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// de nas gnodasbyin de dag 'bros pa dang tshur shog ces borjod naslar mchi'o// mchiso nas kyang
00 nga'i bstan kun gyis shig ces brjod do// gdugs gcig bzhin du tin bdun bdun stsalal/ gang du bshos bud thamasacad bgyid do// dri za rnams lhung bar brgyadapar
'tshal bas rgya mtshor 'bab pa 'a klung gi ngosasum gyi ngos brgyudalanyonazhagagatsuge sbyab bgyis te/ kham po dza'i shing gisazhugs bul yungs kar ma dang bsres pas lanakhrir
sbyin srogabagyi'o// de nas yudagos kyigazugs can gyi mi zhogamachi'o// mchasems kyang rkang pa gnyis la phyag bgyid pa dang/ bdabor gyur 'gacasabarjod par bagyi'o// de nas
des rkangs gnyis la lig bumeg bzha gnas mchi'o// lagakhulig de mig khasasan dri ba'i gzugs su 'gyur ro// rkangags 'gror 'gyur ro// le lnga stong thub par 'gyur
ra dadrizo rnams kyang srung ba dang/ skyob pa dang/ sbed par brgyud do// log 'drina rnams kyang rlag par bgyidin sman as deb dang/ shing bal ka ra ba sa'atsheg gu dang ni'u
la'i spu dang/ sbrul kogs brjes pa dang/ rdzas de dag gis gnod sbyin gyi gzugasal 'dug par bagyi'o// rig ba'ang lan brgyud stong bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas rmi lam
dulega'adrenA rnams bred cing ci bya gtol med par mthong ngo// dbenang nas mi zhig 'di skad ces kyarig sngags 'chang bdag cag la gnod pa ma mdzad par 'distsoms shig ces
sla'o/ danas nang pa'i tin gcigertsolal// sgyur pa'i dus na'ang 'dug pa 'di nyid kyis bdag la bdugasazhalog 'drenathams cad nyams par 'gyur ro//
cha log 'dren gyi las bgyin 'angam gyi ngozhag brgyadalanyin zhag gcig lcengababagyisalabagyiso/ rdorje'i rigs skrag par bgyin rtsi 'bab pa sa bcag pa'i shing blangs la mar gyi pozhag
gcig sangag khagyis// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lco'abab pas bcagaba'i shing gis zhugs khusalakham po dza'iyemasrog shing brgyad stong sbyin srag bgyisan/ rdorje rigs tham
lhacad skabar 'gyur ro// ri'iringos grub kyang stsol// tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa la gnod pa brgyadenam gyi ngo zhag banubazhi zhag
gsum snang ba bgyis tamtshan gcige mchos par mtshasolatsanes kyis mchod de/ mtshan la khrag gis bskyes l khros pa dang bcas pas lag pa gnyis kas 'khyudad/ rig pa lan
brgyadastowosgras brjobagyis na namtshan 'gulal// mgalama'agyur zhing ngagatshog rgyas ba rnams kyis dngos grub stsolato// dalta mchog rgyas pa thams cad 'grub pa 'gyurar//
lag na rdo rje la phur bus gdab nam gyi ngozhag brgyadal zhag gcig sgyungab bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje mdun du seng ldengag nga gsezhugs bsal kham bo tsho'i lam srog shing brgyad stong
spyanasrog bgyis na srog blugs gsum pa'i tsha'adu'o/ khargyas tshar gcod par 'gyur// sum brgyas bskam par 'gyuro// bzhi brgya pa'i lag na rdo rje'aphur bus btab par 'gyu'o//
laga' rdzabur dus btab pasal gnadorje'i rigs thams cad dang/ tshangs pa dang/ khyab 'jug dang/ dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha thams cad kyang phur bus btab par 'gyur ro//
brgyad stong tshang ba'atsholag na rdodretshog nas mtshiste/ rig sngags 'chang ci'o dod/ sbyinecas brjod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'adas cho ga rgyas pa dngos grub bdag la stsal du gsol zhes brjod/
par bya'o// de ltar gyur cig ces brjodonas mi snang bar gyurato// da nasarig sngags 'chang gso myur bal gnardo rje'i gzugs 'o mas bkru bar bgyi'o// de nas mchos nga 'i seradangagagul
gyis lan brgyudastong nasrag bgyi'o// donas chos pa'i gyur ro// lha la'ang mchodapa ma bgyis la shugs ldan masasar gshegs su gsol/ bcom ldan 'das rago pa'o
rgyal bo sgrub pa'i 'og sngags 'chang la gal tadangos grub tumagyu na/ rig sngags 'chang des las bdag gir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// lan gnyis su'ang bsgrub par bgyi'o
mkhrubana'olas bdagagir bya ba yin par dmigs par bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ci'i phyir daskad// gsol la/ bcom ldan 'das pha 'gums pa dang
ma'agums pa dang/ tshangs pa la gnodapa bgyid pa masacan dag kyamachis/ mtshams mamachis pa lnga dang ldan pa'i sems can dag kyang mchis te/ bcom ldan
'das de'islad du bdag 'di skad cesaban 'grus brtsams bsgrub par bya'ozhes mchi'o// la bdun du'ang sgyur pa la 'jug par bgyi'o// gal tamagrub na las 'di brtsams par bgyi ste//
mar gyi ngozhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig skyabab bgyis 'dul khrodakyishing gisazhugs bus te/ sangaldagoyamagrig gshibal bdag gi khragakhyugs lan brgyad stongasbyin sreg bgyi'o// mar gyi/
bzhagabargyudalagal ta ma mchis na 'ang gisogs lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyisanamatshilar bgyi sta/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags kyi dngos grubakyang stsal bar ba 'o// las 'di ni mchog tu
mi bsradang lags te/ rig sngags 'chang dus mi bzad pa'ilas 'di thog ma'i bgyi'o// datsa'islad duzhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi byung chub bcom ldan 'das kyis kya'agal
babagyi ban lags blta bste/ gal tarig sngags 'chang gi las thog mkhartsams te/ bcom ldan 'das de nibadagal gnod pa bgyid de de khon nyid kyang mi mthong 'badag la gnod
pa bgyid do// bcom ldan 'das bdag la gnod pa bgyid kalha thams cad la gnod pa bgyid ra 'gyur// gnod sbyinethams cad la'ang gnod pa bgyis pa ra'agyur ta/ de dag gi
sngags 'chang de 'aglags tsholazhing mchis par 'gyur/ gal ta mtshams ma mchiso ba lnga dang ldan pa'i rig sngags 'chang zhig rig pa'i rgyal po sgrub nasgrubab bdun la dngos grub stsal bar
bgyi'o// gal tam stsal na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'khus ra 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gzhan yang gang gis rig sngagasa'ochang rnams kyadangos grub tu 'gyur ba'i rdzas
rnams mi 'phrogs par brjod par bgyi'o// byang chub sems dpa' chen po smyos shig/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'chang gis lig bu mig dang ldong ros la sogs pa sgrub na thog mar 'o
mas bkru bar bgyi ste// bkrus pas dngos grub tu 'gyur re// dngos grub tugyur pa'i rdzas rnams kyazigasngags 'chang gsebla ma dang/ bad gdang/ gragasa rnams la cha gsum du bgo
bar bgyi'o// b.lagridang/ 'khol dang/ mdung rtse gsum pazhig grub la/ stor na yid kyis 'di snyam dusems can gang bsod nams chung ba pa'iskor grang snyam du bsams la/ rego
sngags 'chang des sbyin sregakhagyi'o// yang nalag pa bkan tamananano// gal shin tu gnod pa bgyison rig sngags 'chang des 'di skadadu/ rdzas 'di ni lag na rdo rje'i yonenazhes brjod
bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'adas bdag gi mong thosanas yid kyis kyang 'akhubs sems pani lha dang bcas pa dang/ bdud dang bcas pa dang/ tshangs pa dang bcas ba dang/ dgesbyong
@#// dngabram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rtenanama mthong o// de nas thams cad dang bcasapa 'a 'khoradis/ byang chub samasadapa'i nang legs so legs sa//
stobs dang pha rol gnon pa dang gtumed pa khyodasangaga'isgra'adalta bu 'khyin palegagasozhes te/ legasasazhes bya ba byin no// bcom ldan 'das 'dinabadag gitaba'i snying po 'gas te/
'di lanatsag brjod pas chog chen po rgyas pa brgyudabarjod paza'agyur ro// lag rdorjod de bzhin te/ de de bzhinano// bcom ldan 'das rig pa'irgyal po 'di bdun sgrub pa dang/ gnodapa/
bgyidan yid kyis bzlos brjod bgyi'o// ci ste rig sngags 'chang rig sngagasasgrub pala'atshalan/ rig sngags 'changades theg mar rig sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyud brjod par bgyi'o// 1
ba'i snyingang 'ang lan brgya rtsa brgyadabazlas brjod bgyi'o// danus rig sngagasa'ochang gis 'gusngags bsgrub par bgyi'o// gal te gasngags ma grub na de nyid dumachisol du ba mamachis
pa mi mdag tu ske tsholas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis narig pa de nyams par gyuranas de'i mdun du mchis dngos grub stsolato// de nyed du mchis rigasngags 'chang gis yang rig pa
bsgrubasana myur du 'grub bo// gsang sngags thams cad kyi 'osakya'adiso'agrubapa lags so// spos rnams kyisolag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyise la gdugs bdun dus gsum du lan brgyu
rtsabargyad bzlas brjod bgyis lamar gyizhagabcubazhi pa'i nyin zhag gcig skyang ba brgyus te/ dpag tu ma mchis par bzlas brjod bgyis naganod sbyin ma mchib 'gyur te/ rdorje bzhi du mas
snar stsal babagyi'o// gang gitshongasache ga mozhes bya ba la rgyob cig rgyob cig/ srogasashig srags shig/ zungazhige/ myos par gyis shige/ ma'u sa par gyis shig ces bsgo ba thamA
cad 'ganod pa gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das dran pa tsam gyis kyang thams cad gyisashig rus bsgo nga bar bgyi'o// chub 'i snying po rdzogs so///nag mo khragamo'i
las rnams lags te/ gsang sngags thams cad du gsang sngags gungalasami bgyid pa de nagamodrag mo 'dis bkug na de las bgyid do// bkug kyang gal ta ma gruban phyamared lag na rdo rje'i
mdun durig sngags de lan bdunabarjod l/ de'i 'og tunag modrag mo'i sngags lan brgyartsa brgyudabarjod par bgyi'o// danas sngags da lam du ston par bgyidado// yi ge mtshang ba dang phung
btab pas smra bar bgyid do// gal tayig mtshang bar gyur na rig pa mchog gis tshang bar bgyid do// gal taphur bus btab par gyuran rig pa mchog nyid kyis phur bus 'byung bar bgyid de/
phyag re da 'gan rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa bgyis 'a sngagasad rangagi khrag gis shinge ta ka lim 'khris te/ rtswa ku shalas bgyis pa'i rdo rdzol lan bdunabasngags la bsnun nadonas phur bu 'byishe
pa'i chu'o// gdon dgubaname togages bgyi'o gdonaris par bagyin lan gsum bzlas brjod bagyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// gdonastongabar bgyin bdug ngas
bgyi'o// gdonadabab nan bzlas brjod bgyis pas so// gdonagatong bar 'dod nashakaza'i bal lan bdunabazlas brjod bgyis nagatong ngo// tsan dan dmar pos rdo rjebagyis la
mar gyi zhag brgyud lanyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag 'dordza'amadun dub lang gshas bdug pa bgyi'o// rig pa'i lan brgyud stong bzlas brjod bgyisan pa la brjod byed
kyis bran par bgyid do// rdo 'o mas bkrus la rig pa'i ng lan brgyadastong bzlas brjod bgyis na thar par bgyis pa la'agyulo// rdorje de nyid wa shachen gyis bdugs la rig pa'i ng lan
brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na'agum par bgyid do// sa gras dang skar ma bdam mi 'tshal/ sgrung ba bgyi'i 'tshal// 'di'i rgyug khro ba nyid de// dgragasadapar 'tshal bas gos na
ba bgos la khagadugs la bltas te gra'i srog bskams kyi bar dugasang sngags bzlas brjod bgyi'o// rdo rje'o mas bkrusal rig pa'i ng lanabargyudaskyong bzlas brjod bgyis nasnga
mkho bzhin 'gyur ro// gal te nagamo dragamosgrub pa'i tshalanathog mnyid du zasasu 'o skyo'atshalazhingelan 'bum bzlos brjod bgyi'o// de'i 'og tur me mkhanagaso sbyong bzung bas
ma god pa'i lasaargyus kyi sku gzugs gsar mdog lta bu bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol dunag mo drag mo bri bar bgyi'o// yar gyi ngo zhag bcubazhul zhagagasum sbyang ba bgyis
te/ mchod ba rgya cher bgyis lanag mi dragamo maba'agyur gyi bar du gang bzlas brjod bgyi'o// mchis pa dang ga pa mchog gis mchod yonadabul pe// de nas des 'gesngags 'dzin
sbyin par bya zhes mache ba dang/ de nas bcom ldan 'dasam rgyal po brgyade dustsal cig ces brjod na/ dang zhin dugyur cigacesabarjod nas mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// nag mo drag mo'i chog/
rdzogs so// rgyal bldan ma'i las rnams lags te/ lha thams cad dagug na lan gsum bzlas brjod bagyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dud 'gro'i skye gnasasu/
gtogs pa thams cad dbugan yid kyis bgyi'o// bud med dbang du gyi na yar gyi nga tshos brgyud nas brtsams te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du dub ma mchis naga'i
semadag lana'angasham gyisolan brgya rtsa brgyad spyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur// dbab pa bgyin chab ram bye 'jug pa'i 'o mas bgyi'o// gdon bcing ngam bskyod par bgyi na gu gul/
gyis bgyi'o// dur khrod kya' ba'agazugs bgyis la lan gsum bzlas brjod byas pas gdonagyis gtong bar bgyid do// dur khrod kyi sol ba la gdon gyi gzugs bgyil ]
@# ma tshon rnon bos btud nabacad par gyur tagatongango// dug lasagason yal gas bgyi'o// mar gyi ngozhagabcub 'dur khrodadu dur khrodakyi thal ba lagazugs
bgyis la/ bzlas brjod lanabargyad stong bgyis pa'isang ldeng gi phur bus snying khar btsugasan gzo thabs drag pos btab par 'gyur ro// phyun gnas osapa 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo
tshes bdun la nyin zhag gcig sbyangs bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du bya rog ma las kyi bar du'an stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyisanatiyaMcig stsolato/ sgrub pa brgyade na
mgodang 'os sbyin dang ma 'dris pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gsar gyi mdog can bri be'abagyi'o// de'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug khri
bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yas lol du'aphagasangalaganardo rje bri bar bgyi'o// 'phags pa spyan sagazi go dbang phyug 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i kha dog ltar dkarab 'o// wagon rdo rjeni srobasas
targyanathams cad kyisobargyanar 'o// lag na rdordzo'i g.yas rol du ni rgyal bldan m sngobasongs la de'ang rgyan thams cad kyisekhargyan pa'o// khri'i 'og 'du ni/ba pa bo'aganapog por thog
bar bri'o// de nas zhag gsum smyungababagyis te/ mar gyi zhag bdalar mi'i sku gzugs lamachodapa rgya che bgyisal/ gu gul gyi bdug pa sragacing mo'i sagazugs kyi
mdun du zhugs busal kaDa wi sa'i me togazho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ maralabasnyags pa brgyad stong spyin srogabagyi'o// da nas me h+phab nas kar lo'i me tog pad+ma'atshad tsamadu 'byung ngo// ka ra
wi'i pad+ma'i dbus nas ka ra wira'adrapa'iljongs 'khyung ste/ rig pa'i rgyal bo bzlos brjod bgyod bzhin dud blang bar bgyi'o// slongs pa tsam gyis gdugasashar ba'i mdog lta bu dang/
skalcapa'i 'akhyil bdang/ 'bcu drug lon pa'i lus lta bur 'gyur/ labargyud kha thub par 'gyur/ nam mkha' la mchi ba dang/ mnyam pa ma mchis pa dang/ kha zas 'tshal ba rnams 'tshal/
bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi spyod yul malags par 'gyur ro// bdag 'gum pa'idus 'tshal bar 'gyur ro// gal te sud kyis kyang brtson 'grus bskyed na tsho de'i nyis 'gyur
chub bar 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo zla ba nyal nyin zhag gcig sbyang pa bgyis te/ mchod pa bgyi'ame tog drishem palanabargyad stong phulanakar sha paN lngastsal to// dgra brgyad bar 'tshal na
yar gyi ngos gcig la dur khrod kyi gnas su zhugs bus 'o dur khrodakyi thalabs srogabagyis na bskrad pa gyuro// mar gyi ngo zhag bcu bzhi'i nyin zhag gcig skyababagyis te/
lag na rdo rje'i mdunadu prayang ku'isheng gis zhugs lus la be kang ka ta'iyam srog shing brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyisonanar sol to// dbal che ba'agyin lag naro'i mdun du til gyis
lanabargyad stong bas brjod bgyi'o// dbye ba bgyin yar gyi ngo tshos lnga'anyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag rdo rje'i tshe dun dumanasran gra'alas 9 brgyad stong sbyin
srog bgyisonadabye ba bgyis par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dang skar ma bdamachi'otshal/ sbyang pa bgyi mi'atshal te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum du ba 'a ra brgyartsa brgyad spyi'i
