srag bgyisan phyugs chung red do// bud medadabang du bgyis na gdugasabadun dus gsum du+o monasran gra'u 'as nasrog bgyi'o// skyes pa dbang du bgyin mal gyi zhag bcu banilalag na rdo rje'i
mdun dunyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis tila'asan brgyadastongabagyis na skyes pa dbang du 'gyur// rA dzAm tabashAka' mishuklasra tipa rnamaM snyebadzrapA Ne glu taarka aste ragame pa dz+wa la shA/
sa ngag pa naMargyus tshigs huyang yabadaa snyam ti bsha/ rgyal ba ldan ma'i tshog rdzogs so//derjelcags sgrogagi lasa rnams lags te/ rig sngags bcing nasra
bu la lan nyi shu rtse gcig bzlas brjod bgyis tamadudapa dor ro/ yungs karagyisanazhugs kyi re ba 'gyur// chab kyison la gru chen por 'gyur ro// thal bsan rdordzor bar 'gyur
ra dbacing ba thams cad rdo rje lcags sgroga'adinyid sbyar bar bgyi'o// gang dag bdag gi rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa la dmatshig mthong nas 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'dapazege sgra
sgrubang dedagal/ gang dag bgags bgyid dam rdzasa'aphrog pa dedaganadamatshig ma'atshalacing rigs 'khuba' gas te// de dag ma rung bar bgyi ba'i slad du las 'di brtsams par bgyi'o//
tsan dan dmar po las lag na rdo rje'i gzugs bgyis tamar gyi ngo zhagabargyad nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun dus nga rdzong gishing gisazhugs busal/ shachen po srog
blugs lan bdun spyanasragabagyis ta/ de'i 'ogatu'adisad ces lha'am/ gnod spyin nam/ grub pa ma/ rigasngags 'chang ngam/ lega'adrenanam/ leg 'dren gyi g.yog 'khor 'am//
grul bum mam/ 'byung ba bam/ sha za 'am/ gang gis bdag gi rdzas ji ltar khyer ba des sla cinacig ces brjod par bgyi'o// daskad thos nas gal te des stsalan nicang mi bgyi'o//
gal tem stsal ya/nga'adaskadabasgrug par bgyi ste/ gang gis bdag gi rdzaso'abares sur byin cig ces bgyi'o// snye ma stsalalag na rje'i rigs las phyi rol pa gnade rje'i rigs
la 'khu ba' gas pas/ byigag girtug pa gusal yang lan gsum brjod par bgyi'o// de ltar bgyis kyang m stsalan bya gag gi rtug pa lagan rdo rjel bdug cing rig sngags kya ngalan brgyud
brgyabazlas brjod bagyi'o// danasalag na rdo rje'i gsala'akhu ba des kyi hudakyihudacasamachi'atshig cing sa phyogs dar ltung dmigakya'ajaro// 'gum bayang 'gyura'o// de'i
[p]da/ gsa'abs chadapar 'gyur/ nor nisur khugs par 'gyur ro// gsad pa lan mi bgyi'o// gdon gyi las rnams kyang bgyi ste// sa zin pa'i m ma zin pa'i ng
ma rung ste yid kyis dbab par bgyi'o// bye'u drug pa'i lo ma'am/ sra rtsi pog gam/ chab kyis duga'as gso bar bgyi'o// bdag gse nango ma nad ma mchis nga cakhagyin dogs lan
brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bagyis la bskabar bgyi'o// nad kri amamamachisang 'bagyi nasrad bu la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bcus brjod bgyisal/ ga nad kri pas mchis pa der bcing
bar bgyi// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyud la nyin zhag gcig/ nga pa bgyis ta/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun dung 'ba'ishing gis zhugs bus la bil bayamasrag shing khri sbyin srag bgyis na los
sprod ragastsala'// yar gyi ngonyal nyen zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'i mdunadu apa ma rga'iyams gshing khri gopa mchog dang lhan cig sasbyin sreg bgyis na/ rdo rje lcag
sgrogamathang zhing gang bslangs pa de stsalal// rdo rjelcagasasgrog gi chagardzogs so/ ba//rdorjeser mo'i lasa rnams lags la/ gdon babs pa gtong ba bgyi nachab
kyis bgyi'o// 'dar bar bgyin mdzub mol lanabadunabazlas brjod bgyis pa bstan 'dar 'o// gdona rnam par gzham na yid kyisalan bdun bzlas brjod bgyi'o// chab kyis
0 ris par brgyudado// jig pas bcings pa las dgrolan rjes ma'osngags lan bdun brjod de/ song zhig song zhig ces brjod nagrol bar 'gyur// bcings pa dgrolan lan 'bum
bzlas brjod bakyis pas 'grola'// rkang tshul la lan brgyartsabargyad bzlas brjod bgyis pas thig la bgyis nagangabasams pa dernyed do// mar gyi po zhag bcubazhinasazhag gcig sbyang ba
bgyis te/ n+ya gro d+hagag bumachis pa mchis la mchod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ n+ya gro d+ha'i drung dumachis la shatakamadug steng+gan dur pa'i ma bzhag ste/ 'kha gyi bar du bzlas
brjod bgyi'o// 'bar nas mag bor bzhag na dam tog ga'i phreng baba'agyur/ des mgo 'o bcings na dpag tshad stong du gyen du 'phag go/ le khri nyos stong thuba'o// zla ba spyang kis zin
pa'i tshozhag gcuge sbyang ba bgyis la/ lagan dordza'amadun du ras dkar po bzhag la 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyisan/ blangs pa tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can du 'gyur
zhing le nyis stong thub po' gyur ro// rdo rjesar mo'i chog rdzogs so/// shugs ldan ma'ilasa rnams lags te/ gdon tshar gcad nadur khrod kyi sol bas gzug
brisal/ lan gsum bazlas brjod bagyis pa'ilcagasa gzhus gdon gyis gtong ngo// skalas bgyis pa'i srad bu gtun shing gis brdungs na gdon du zhing gtong// gzegs ma
las sbyin sreg bgyis nagadonagyi yonalaga'atshog pa 'gyur// b.langag lcib las khagazugs bgyis la lanabadun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i mas mig phyung na
zhar bur 'gyur/ lanabadunabazlas brjod bgyis pagasogams shing ljonapal bsnunana'apho khaba'agyur ro// dbaban me tog gis bgyi'o// ragrolan yid kyisaso// 'di dagalo sog
nga gdon gyi lasa rnams lags so// bsrung ba li shurtsa gcig bazlas brjod bgyis pa'i thabs bgyi'o// yul grubasrung b.lanabadunabazlas brjod bagyis pa'i chab kyis bgyis/
bskrad pa ni yus ka gyis bgyi'o// nang pa langs toshugs ldan ma'i sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyad barjod na/ nad thams cad las tharapar 'gyur ro// bud medadabang du bgyin mar gyi ngo
zhag brgyudonas brtsams te/ dgung bdun dusagasum dulung thang gi shing gis zhugs busal/ tilakyi srogakhrug lan nyishu rtsagasaMg spyin srog bgyisan dbang du'agyur ro// rAdzAn
ba ma shi ka ma kr-i sra a b+hamam ahoradroshi tin badzrapA Ni'i gluta tilakar kanipra dzAkya ru d+hir ak+tanaMr dziki asahasaM dz+wahAyaMbashob+ha bita/ rgya mtsho'abab pa'i chu ngogs gnyis
ka'i blangasal bam tog bgyis te/ zam tog dalogabumig stsa'al/ zam tog kyang mithodakhasbyaracan du stsal te ( mar gyi ngozhagakhargyadanas dgung gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/
mtshan ga cig mchis pa mchesel lho phyogs sumachis timakhyedathogasa' 'kha gyi bar bzlos brjod bagyi'o// bza nag blangs te ge mchog gis srung ba bgyis te lag bu mig gcig la
btags te/ lag butshig da ma dang lhan cig 'tshal na'atshal btsam gyi sa spyalcang 'khyil bar 'gyur/ mdog ut+pal kha dog lta bur 'gyur/ mtshon gang dag 'phangs pa de dag byams
lhags par 'gyur/ la drug khri thub par 'gyur/ dbang phyug chen po'i tshogs rnams grogs su 'gyuralo// mgu zhag bcuba'alonyin zhag gcig sbyang babagyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i
mnganang byang chub kyi shing gis zhugs lus la me tog ut+pal zhodang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ malabasgugs pa brgyad stong sbyin srogabagyisanayularadad// 'byungapathamasacad d dug ran

chang cong usag bgyisanayula'adad// 'di la thams cad dbang du bgyi bar'tshal bas mar gyi ngozhag gsum du smyung ba bgyis te/ dur khrod dumachis la pra yaku'i shing gis zhugs bus te mas lan brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin drug bgyis na'abyung po thams cad mam le
'gyur te/ dadag la phyag khanan gyis shig ces brjod nagang dang gang du bskos pa dedag thams cad ngagyid do/ yar gyi ngotshos lngalanyin zhag gcig sbyang babagyis te/ lakanardo rje'i mdun
dua timuk+ta ka'i mi tog stong rtsa brgyad phu'an las spyod rnams sol to/ shugs ldan ma'i chog rdzo gsaso//
rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bagyis 'bum pas gdugs bdunakhrus bgyisan sdig pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur// byis pa gang dag gdon gyis zin te khrus
bgyis nagatongabaca'agyurare// gdonagyisazin pa rnams la lan nyi shurtsa gcig khazugabarjod bagyis pa'ibadug pas bdugasan gtong bar 'gyur ro// gang dganam gru dang/ rgyal bodang/
gdon bar nanas zin pa de dag tshon snalnga'i skud pa la mdud pa bdun bor tilag pa 'khacings na gtong ngo// dugalasagasonayal gas bgyi'o// srind tikas zinapa dang/ nad tsiluta
dang ta rkangashu byungab lasa' lananyishu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod bgyis te bskusan lanagasum gyi tham lasos ba'agyur ro// phyag rgyagazhiganachab kyis bgyi'o// dbyig dug bsal bar
bgyi na cha ngalag bkrusal snodadu stsalato/ de nas rtswa ku shas byabasan 'byang bar 'gyur ro// gdon spo na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal bas bgyi'o// nad tshim mchis
ba babagyi na mtshon rnon pos sashur gyisadral yang skad du bcad na tshulumamachis par 'gyur ro// nad bre mamachis par bgyi ba'ang de bzhin no// 'dzaramamachis pa bgyi nas la
lan bdun bzlasabarjod bagyis pas bgyi'o// mar gyi bonag bcubazhi lanyin zhag gcog sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdorje'i mdun du mchod pacanus subagyis la gi'u wang ras
dkarang gi snying dang zhag ste 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi 'o/ 'bar nas blang bar bgyis te/ blangasanas thig le bgyis name ga' bar 'gyur/ 'byung po thams cad kyis mtshug
bar 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig slong mor 'i zas 'tshal zhing thamar zhag gsum sgrub bgyis la/ mar gyi ngozhag bcu b.laganadordzo'i mdun dumachod pa rgya cher bgyis te/ 'udag
chang pa'i bacangs la sbrul du gyur kyi bar du bzus brjod bagyi zhing/ des mi 'jigs 'bagyi'o// slar yang shudag tugyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// danas bza'abar bgyi sta 'tshal
ba tsam gyis gdugs shar ba lta bu 'amadog can bsgyur zhing le lnga stong thub pa 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngozhagabargyud la lhan n po 'i gnas sumachis la nyin zhagagatsag smyung ba bgyis la/ lhachen
po'i gzhogs g.yas pa lig buyig a sha 'a'i ma'i steng du bzhag ste/ duba'i thul bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas lig bu mig blangs pa lha'i skyel ba bzhag la mig labaskusanami
gda' bar 'gyur ro// 'badunastong thub pacha'agyur ro// aka'i me togadurakhrod kyi mes bsregs nas mar gyi zhag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis nas lha chen po'i gnas sumachis
la/ shing a shAt+ma'i lo ma 'a steng du bzhag ste lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis tha thag 'bagyisan mi gda' bar 'gyur ro// le lnga stong thub paro'agyur ro// zla ba gcig ' skyo 'tshal
zhingamar gyi ngozhag bcu b.lami'itsus pakhrugamaltakhur bgyis la/ de nas rig sngags 'changagis rang bsrel dang bcas pa'imachod rtenagyi drung du lagonardarje'i gzugs dang//
dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs bzhag la/ rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das dang/ lag rdo dzodang/ dbang phyuga chen ngol rgyacher mchod de/ rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo'i tshos
brgyadanas nyin zhag gcig sbyang babagyisal/ zlagamabus te ras dkar po'i steng du bzhi g la 'bar gyi bar dubazlas brjod bgyi'o/ 'bar nas blangs ta mgo bor bzhag nasi'i ded pa'i gzug
can du'agyur ro// lag na rdo rje dang/ dbang phyug chen po'i gzugs su'ang bsgyur/ yid kyis gang bsems ba de thams cad kyang 'grub bo// lo stong thub pa 'gyur ro// 'chi ba'i dus kyang
'tshal lo// zasasu 'oskyo 'tshalazhingelaganaderje'i mdun du'iny+tsa ta ka'ishi ngogs zhugs bsal/ a ba mang+ga'iyamasrag shing 'bum spyin srag bgyisan rgyal ba nyid thobapo// rdo rjegadong gachog
rdzogs so/// rdo rje lteb lasa rnams lags te/ se mkhanagaso sbyong bzung bsamagodapa'i sa la sbyin dang 'dres pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa lagan rdaN+Dimadog sngo
bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dararam sakyisham thabs can bri bar bya'o// de'ogazhasaladudordza'i stengagasabagyi mdog ltabu bribabagyis te/ de'ang rgyanathams cad kyis brgyan
par bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang zas su'oskyo'atshalakharab gyi'o// mar gyi pozhag b.rubazhi nas zhag gsum sbyang pa bgyis te/ cinus kyi mchad pa bgyis 'atsan danadamar de mthogangal
do rdzobagyis te/ rdordzar rkadapaljongares bzhag/ byang chub kyi shing gis g.yogs te/ dngos grub rnam gsum byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'bar bar gyur na bskal par gnas
shing rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mtshugs bar 'gyur ro/dpag tshad stong gyen du'aphagatsang de'i modal slar mchi'o// gang tshe 'gum pa pa lag na rdo rje'i rigs skye'o// cis dub
'ju ba nasobus te thig lebagyis nami gda' bar 'gyur/ le bcu drug 'dren pa ltabu'i lus su 'gyur/ 'khadun stong thub ba la 'gyu raro// drab r gyur nas blangs la thig ler bgyis nagang
mthong ba de dab ngadu'agyurato/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gtogs pa'i ngadabang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig zas su chugrag 'tshal zhing mar gyi ngazhaga brgyad nasazhagagasum sbyang ba bgyis te/ ba lang
gi lhas sam/ kun dag ra ba'am/ yang na gnas gtsang ma mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la// ltang 'os til gyi 'o ma bdun gyi steng du bzhag ste/ gdol pa'i bu mo'o mo mtshan nam/ 'dra ba'
bgyis pa ma mtshan gyi steng du gzhag par bgyi zhing/ gdol pa'i bu mo ral gri thogs pa bzhi phyogs bzhirab zhagapar bgyis la/ donas gi sngags 'chang gis dngos grub rnam pa gsum
byung gi bar du bzlas brjod bagyi'o// 'barakhar gyuranagadugasashar ba 'drab 'i mdog tu 'gyur/ skra lcang re 'khyil ba 'gyur/ 'bcu drug lenapa lta bu ba'agyur/ 'og
tudapag tshadastod dumachibor ra gyur/ stong du'ang de bzhinemachibar 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshunachadakyisathosashade mthong bar 'gyur/ lozonyis stong 'tsho bar 'gyur/ nam mkha' la rlung gi
shugs dang mtshungs par 'gyur// grub pa thams cad kyang 'dis dbang du 'gyur/ tshos gros dang skam bdamam 'tshal/ lcangab bgyimo'atshal/ bud med kyiro slangs lag bu mig de'i
momtshan gyi steng du bzhag ste/ mar gyi pozhag brgya la nyin zhag gcig stsang ba bgyis la/ lag na rdo rje'imadun du mchod ra bgyis// lan brgya stong bzlas brjod bgyis la/ lig bu mig de
blangasatamig la bskus nam gda' bar 'gyur/ lebadunastongathub par gyur ro// mal gyi shag brgyud la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ gdol pa'i khyim nasazhugs khungs la sang ldeng gi
shingegs zhugs bus tadug dang khrag dang bsres pa'i lus kal gyis lanabargyudastong sbyin sreg bgyisan/ gang gi ming nas smos ta nasreg bgyis pa de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo
zhag bcuganyis la madresakyi thums blos lan brgyudastong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'ikhyim skorab tsugs na dgung gsum gyis 'bros par 'gyur ro// doN+Di snyeba'ichogaljogs so//
ma kha'atshalas rnams lags te/ srung ba bgyid na lanabadun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus lagapa labacing bar bgyi'o// yul grusungan lan nyi shurtsa gcig bazlas
brjod bgyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// dbaban bye'u'ug pasema'am rma bya'i mdongs kyis bgyi'o// gdonal gnodang bgyidenachab kyis bgyi'o// khyim mam lha khang ngam kun dga'ir bar
mchisa' gang dubazlos brjod bagyis pa danasa'abyubod gdonathams cad 'bros pa 'gyur ro// gdamatshar gcad na khrag gis gzugs bris rkangapas mnan ta lan brgyartsa brgyadabazlas brjod
bgyis nagadon gyi rigs phung bar 'gyurar// rig pa sgruban thog mnyid lasakha' dbagyis ti/ lag na rdo rje'amedun du the@#taka'igongagasazhugs bus la ku ra ba'i me tog brgyad stong sbyin sreg
bgyisanalha des gsalha bzung nas khrided mchi'o// khrided mamasanasadangos grub 'gyur// ci ste log 'dren rnams kyi rogs sgrub pa 'tshalanage ga'i dran rnams kyig 'dren gyi rigs
bzhi mchis te/ so gcig pa'irogs dang/ kam padza'i rigasadang/ rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs dang/ phung byed kyi rigs so// so gcig pa 'jigs lagatsugapuba'aphyang la sogs pa 'a ga
'drenabargyad khrimachis te/ dada gnas tong gsum gyi stong chen ngo 'i 'jig rten gyi khamasanabagegs brgyad de// kam po dza'i rigs la ni dbang phyugachen po g.yog 'khorab langan pa sogasapa
bya/ labagekas drug khri mchis te/ dbang phyug chen po'i tshig rgyus la bgakas bgyid cing rig pa'i ng 'joms par bgyid do// rnam ba'ajoms la 'tshogs la ga'i jig rtenaskyong
ba'i ga yog 'khor mya nganamed la sogs pa 'ga'adrenadrug khrims te/ dodag kyang dbang phyug chen po dang phur bu gsum pa'i chog rgyas pa la bgegs brgyaded// phung byed kyi rigs la ni legan rdo rje
g.yog la khor tshu ta kal sogs pa'i lag 'dran bye ba phrag 'bum mchis te/ dadag rig pa'i mig rgyas pa thams cad la bgags bgyid cing 'geng 'ang 'joms par bgyid do// 'danelega'adran
dadag gi sgrub pa lag+ha te/ so gcig pa'i'igis kyi sgrub pa nam gyi bozhag bcu ba'i nyin zhag gcig stsadab bgyis te/ laganajordzo'amadun du dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus la dbang gi 'khris
pas sprugs pa'i ungs karal lan brgyad stong spyanasrig bgyisan/ kyi hud kyi 'ud ces 'chi ba'i sge gragyicing grub par 'gyur te/ grubanas kyang sgrub pa la bgegs tshal gyaded/ bde bar sgrubatu
mchis so// kam po dzarigs kyi sgrub pa ni mar gyi ngo zhagalngalanyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ 'gan rdorjod ng/ dbang phyug chen po la mchod pa bgyis nas/ laganadirje'i mdun duaka'i
shing gis zhugs busalatshon sranagro'u dmarab sresapa la lan brgyudastong sbyisago ba gyisan/ lag na rdorje'i gzugs 'gulato/ de nas grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas kyang dbang phyug chen po'i
[v/ ]cho ga rgyas pa bklags pa tsam gyis rig pa thams cad 'grub bo// rnam par 'joms pa'i gas kyi sgrub pa nimar gyi zhagabcu bzhi nyin zhug gcig sbyang ba bgyis da/ mtshan gacig mchis par
mchisal/ mtshan gacig pa'i machadapachen pokhagyisol/ phyoga'adren rnams 'a'angagatem bgyi'o// de'i mdun du bka ta'azhugs bukhrigadabasras payungs kar gsalan
brgyadaskongasbyin sreg bgyisanada'i 'og tugrib ma gda' zhing grub pa 'gyur// rnam par 'joms pa'i rigs gruban lega'adrena rnams dbang du 'gyu'o// bdang dngagangadudagos pa de thams
cad bgyid do// phung byed kyi rigs kyi sgyur ra naslob khyedazasasu'i skyo 'tshal zhing mar gyi zhag banuba'ilanyin zhag gcig snang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdorje'i mdun dumachod pa rgya cher bgyis la
zhugs mar gnyis dus te/ gcig lugan rdo rjel dbul lo// gcig namurtsa ta ka ladapu'alo// des rag sngags 'changagisakhasrungakhagyisal/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun dus ldangage
shinge gis zhugs dus tagashamadakarang bdag gi khrag dang bsras pas lanabargyud stang sbyin sreg bgyison/ lagan rdo rje'i rkang pa g.yas pamathe bong las 'od tha byu// don grub pa
'gyur ro// phung byed kyi legs sgrub rig pa'ichogathams cad bde bar sgrub tumachis to/ bgagasam mchisapa'o// log 'dren dag kyang phyag brnyanadu 'gyur ro// log 'drenan//
kyang rig sngags 'changal gsang sngags stsolato/ das la stod grub par 'gyur// rgyas su 'brug 'tshal zhingel na rdo rje'i mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod gsen
ma ba 'grub par 'gyur te/ gdugs gcig bzhin kar sha pa Na brgyad stongastsolato// rtag tubazlasabarjod pagyisand gralas rgyal la// ma'agying zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ 'gan
rolnga'amadunadu pad+mabargyudastongaphulan/ ge ba'irgyal po dmabacol khaba'agyur/ mkhala'atshigardzogs so////gdong dkar ma'i las rnams gas te/ me

'tsha mkhan gso sbyong ba zung bas mgodapa'i sa lasmyan dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis lag na rdo rjemadog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ phonyamakhacu gnyis kyis bskor ba bri bar bgyi ste/
kha dog lta ba bzhin du bri bar bgyi// pho nyamo thams cad kyang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan babri berab gyi'o// thamar ri'i rtse mo rnams bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar
nga tshos gnage nas brtsams takhasasu chu grog 'tshal zhing maratshangozhag brgyad la thug gi bar du bzlas brjod bagyi'o/ mar gyi ngozhag brgyud la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis ta/ lag
nardorjelamachod pa rgyache'ang gyis 'byung bo'igo to'ama'ang bzang dung bya'o// de'i 'og turig sngags 'chang gis rima'agozugs kyi mdun dubyang chub kyashangasgos zhugs bus pad+ma
yodang sbrang rtsi dang/ ma khasags pa brgyad stong spyanasrog bgyi'o// de nas catso'isgrachen po gragapa gyur/ dra la'ang mi 'jigs par bgyi'o// dan gdong dkar mo gzugs maM
sdug par bsgyunasamatshaste/ dpa' ngomi 'jigs par batsogo/ rdo rje bzhi d ma'i bzlas brjod bgyisal/ 'o'adiskad ces laganardarje'iganang chen ma bcom ldan das mkhyod lags par
byonatam zhes brjod par bgyi'o// ded skadathosanas dga' 'gyurati/ des 'adi skad du chu blab zhes brjod pa dang/ bcom ldan 'dasum le lnga stong thub par 'tshal le zhes barjod par bagyisU/ 8
bzhin dugyur cig ces brjod nas dgaba'i yid kyis lagistsolato/ danasam gda' bar 'gyur ro// ral gri de blangasanas lcala'akhyil ba'agyur/ gdugs shar ba lta bu'i mdog can
du 'gyur/ rig sngagasa'achang thams cad kyisnyinged sdugapa'igyur/ mabasgrubs pa la sa rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// dbab pa 'bagyi nagadon gyis zin pa'irkang pa'i changags mnan
tadabab par bgyi'o// 'byung po dang gza rnams dag b.lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa 'ayungs kar gyis bgyi'o// dugalasagasonaya lags brgya'i// gdenabaza' bar bgyi lan
gsum bzlas brjod bagyis pa'i mitogadamar po sa bgyi'o// gna'akhums pa bgyin yadakyig bzla brjod bgyisabs bgyi'o// dbye bar bgyidamar gyi zhag brgyadanas brtsams te/
log rdo rje'i mdun du gdugs bdun dus gsum dupa rurapishingegasazhugs bug la/ sprub khog brjes pa'i sa gnugs gsum spun grog bgyig/ leng bar khagyi nadabang
phyugachen po'i gnas su mchis lanala'i galana brgyad bargyaspyin sreg bgyi zhimin gnas aphyungan long bar 'gyurir/ la gan rdo rje'i mdun dudagabargyudabargya sbyin sregabagyisan snga mkho bzhin
du'o gyur/ gdong dkar mo'ichog rdzogosaso///rdo rjes ra mtsholasa rnams lags te/ yar gyi ngo tshosabargyudanas brtsams tadur khrod du sgrubajug bzlas brjod bagyis
nargyal po nyid stsol to// zla ba gsum bzlas brjod bagyis na nye tshopa'i ngas spyoda rnams stsolato// zla ba gcig bzlasabarjod bgyis nar khri nyis stong rtsol te// zas sun slongama'i bris
rnams bza'ababagyi'o// dgrab skradapal tsa na bya nag bkra'i 'dab ma blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lanabargyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis la dgra'i khyim du bzhagan dgra'aphral du 'bros

sorta rtagazhananadakyis 'debs pa'i tsholanamar gyi ngozhag khargyud 'alagon rdo rje'i mdun du shinge badzra'irtsa bas rdordzo' bdug par bgyi zhing/ rig pa'i ng lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bagyis gang
idel bsams pa dend kyis thebs par 'gyur// lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lcapog giso bdugacing rig pa'i ngalan brgyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis na gsos pa bgyis pa'i gyur ro//
'byung pa dang sha za rnams 'ongs par bgyin m da kyis bgyi'o// dbab pa mi leng gis bgyis te/ me'asbyin sreg bgyis pa'i thal bas dgapar phusalakhye'u dugabastanan bden pa brjod do//
gnob danayus ka'agatun du brdungs nang zhing gtong bar 'gyur// dur khrodakyisolas sa la gzugs bris la/ de'ilag pa 'amamagulapalagan rdo rje brasator nananagatong bar
'gyura'o// ma gyi zhag brgyudalanyin zhagagacigasgyug byas te/ laganaro'amadunaduyungs kar bram togatustsa'abazusabarjod bagyis nadasarag pa tsamagyis gdon ngu zhing gtong baka'agyur
ra/ dgrags dpara'atshalan dur khrod kyi sol ba byosa' gzugs dris tasnying khar mnan 'bazusabarjod bagyis 'phrul dudagra lags bar 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dang skam dam mi
'tshal/ sbyang ba bgyi mi'atshal ti/ dgra bsamab bkyin mar gyi ngazhag brgyad la shing mada' lasagazugs bgyis la lung rdzong gi phur bu snying khar btsugs te/ rig pa 'dab rgyud stong
bzlas brjobagyisanand drag posa'adabasangashibaskams pa yang 'gyur// phyun gnas ogalayang 'gyur// rda rjesaram chogardzogasas//nagasar gyi lasa rnamA
lags te/ ul grukhasunachab kyis bgyi'o// mtshamasagacad nyeshunu kha rug bzlas brjod bgyis pa'iphur bus bgyi'o// s+sa nabasrung nayid kyis bgyi'i// rkang gnyis pa dang rkang
bzhapernabasadagaranathalamos brdabs pas bgyi'o// rigasngags gcad na mtshonarnyanango sas la shub rar draanarig sngags bcad par 'gyur ro// gdonadababanayid kyis
bkyig/ gdon spo nanabadun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gis bgyi'o// yar gyi ngesmos brgyad nyin zhag gcig sbyang pa bgyis te/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chukrung du zhugs la rig pa lan brgyad
stong bzlasabarjod bagyi san 'grub par 'gyur ro// grub nas las su gyur te/ glang po cherangs par bgyi ba dang/ rtarangs par bagyib dang/ pha rol gyi dmag tshog saras par bgyi ba dang/ gang yin
la bsams pa de dgathums cad rengs par bgyid do// mar gyi ngozhaga brgyad 'anyin zhagagacig sbyang ba bgyis te/ nagam 'amadun du arka'ishongagasazhugs bus la 'bras sA lu mdzad ng bsres pas lan

zla brgyadastong stong spyanasreg bgyis na nag momachis par 'gyur te/ dal pohamo'i gsang sngagasakyisaMmachod yon phul nang khyed nyid la dam ba gang sbyin par bya zhes smra bar 'gyur ro// de la 'di/dadusa'i
bdag por gyur pa stsolacig nus brjod par bgyi'o/ des ' daskyodadu yu lagatsal gi rgyal po gyur cig ces brjod na de bzhin dugyuracig ces brjod nga ra bgyi ste/ sur gtang ba'igs sngags
kyis kyang su gtang zhing/ mdog dkar pos kyang slar batangand nas mi gdalabar 'gyur// lung thang gshing drung nagatum kha shar phyogs su bstan mchis pa de'i mdun du mngagyi ngo zhag
brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te du bamamachisapa'i mdagam mar me'isnying po brgyadakhyung bor nan stongastsal to// nag sar gyi chog rdzogs so///rdorlobastod da
'dzin pa'i las rnams laMgs/ mar gyi zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sang babakyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i 'dun dum tog dkar pa brgyad stong phulanamtshan mas btab pa stong sol to// mar gying zhag
bcugazhilazhag gcig smyungab bgyis te/ laganadorje'i rkang pa g.yas pa'i mthebang nas bzung lagazugs 'gul gyi bar du bzlas brjod bgyis na yid kyis bsams pas rengs par bgyidar/ dud
'gro'i skye gnas sumachis sems cand dag thams cad rengs par bgyid do// yid kyis grol bar 'gyur ro/ mar gyi ngozhagabargyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
la gnas derdzalamachod pa bgyis shinged taka'aphur bu byas te skud pa dmarapos dkras la/ de nus rig sngags 'chang gis pa 'asha'ashingegasazhugos bus te/ phur bu lalanang rgyu stong
bzlas brjod bagyisol/ danas dum bugasum du bcad dadum bu rol lamanyishu rtsar rab zlas brjod bagyis re zhugs su ba nanangaparatinar sum stong stsol te// yar gyi ngo tshos brgyad la
zhag gcig stsang babagyisate/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung du zhugs la pad+ma'abum lanargyal ponyidasol to// skyes pa dbang gyin mar gyi ngozhaga brgyad lazhag gcig sang babagyis
taM / lab/nardo rje'i mdunadu byang chub kyi shing gisazhugs dusal ku muda'im tog nadang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mar la bstugs pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyisan skyes pa dbang du
'gyurar// budamedadabang dubagyi nam gyi zhag bcuganyisalalagan rdza'imadun dudri mchog game togabargyad stong gi salaganardo rdzolangasnumanabudamadadabang du 'gyur ro// rdo rje bstod de 'dzin gyi
tshig rdzogs so// de rjesang ga'akhrisa rnams lags te/ dbaban gdon gyis zin pa 'am ma zin pa'i ng rung/ gu gul gyis dbab bo// gdon bcingasan yid kyis bgyi'o
gdon slag par bgyin lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i thal mos brdab par bgyi'o// gdon 'bros par bgyin tsal bas gzugs bris smyug mas basmananagatong bar 'gyur ro// gdon
bsaman gu gul gyi bdug pa sabagyi'o// gdon bza' ba bgyin lan bdun bzlas brjod bagyis pa'i[︽]shas bgyis// gdonagacad na mtshonanipis rtswa ku sha bcad na gdonabacad par 'gyur rod
dug sngonachab bam yalags bgyi'o// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams la yalags khyab par bgyi'o// churam 'bying bugagyi nalan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'i//
mtshon gyisam tshugs par bgyin yid kyis bgyi'o// maragyi zhag bcu bzhi'ilagan rdarje'i mdun du tsan dan dmar po sa gdong dmar bros te/ dal gtor m sna tshogs stsal cing grog mkhar gyis
lamadung rtse gsum pa bgyis te lag pa g.yon na rdo rje thogs pa mdung rtse gsum pa'i steng dumachis te/ lanapargyastong bzlas brje dbagyisanagater mthong bar 'gyur ro// yul gyi ngetshos ldan s
brtsams te mtsho'abab pa'i chuklung du zhugs la lan 'bum bzlas brjod bgyisayig sngags 'chang gi kholas sgyuba'agyur/ gasngags 'chang nam stong gi g.yog 'khor dang ldan par
'gyur ro// bskal par gnas pa yang 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig zas su' skyo'atshal zhingam gyi ngozhag bcu bzhi zhago gsum sbyang ba bgyis te/ dbang phyugachen po'i gnas sumachil glo g.yas
logs sumachod pa bgyis te/ bgargod kyi mchab la gi wang gis bskus laras dkar pos steng du bzhag ste/ rige pa bzlas rjod ba gyisan bgags rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung// rig pa'i
rgyal bosakhasnyan par bgyi'o// de nas mche ba de'ab rab 'agyur te/ 'banas blang bar bgyi'o// blangs ma thagatumadung rtsa gsum par 'gyurata/ gasngags thams cad kyi spyod yul dumi
gyur/ dpagatshad stong rkyen du 'phag par 'gyur ro// ladagu stong thub par 'gyur// rdarjesangaga'i khri'i cho ga rdzogs so///rdo rje ldan malasa rnams logs te/
rima mkhanagaso sbyong bzungabasam god nga 'is la sbyin dang ma 'dris pa'i tshon gyis 'phags pa phyagan rdo rjemadog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanang bri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas rol du
'jurjesde dang lag bzos kyang bri babagyi// gnyis ka'ang gsar gyi mdog can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan par bgyi'o// g.yon rol durdarjeldan s rgyun thams cad kyis brgyan/
pa bri'o// thamarami'itsamo rnams bri bar bgyi'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis tshes gcig nas brtsams dbas su'e skyo 'tshal zhi zla ba nya'i bar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas zhakagasum snang
ba bgyis te/ bcom ldan 'dasal mchodang rgya char bgyisal bal ba'i shing gisazhugs bu la brtse ba'i me tog zho dang/ sprangartsi dang/ mar la bsgugs pa brgyad stong spyin srogabakyisanadams
rdo rje sde 'gul nas 'grub par 'gyur te/ nyanegacig pazhinatan lnga lnga stsal to// de bzhin du dgod par bgyi'o// mar gyingazhagabcuba'i zhagagacig ngab bgyis te/ ri mo'i gzugs
a kyimadun du dubam mamis nga 'imadag ma la aka ru stong sbyin srog bgyisan/ mi'i gzugs kyi me tog gi 'brang ba'agul nas grub pa'i gyur te/ grubanaso yul gru stsol to// bud med dbang
dubagyi nagadugs bdunadus gsum du ka ra'i shing gs zhugs busalam dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis sbyin tsug lanabargyad stong bgyi'o// tshugasas mo dbang du bgyi nas phyogs
kha gtsangam lung thang gi shing gis zhugs busal la lan brgyud stong sbyin sreg bgyisanaugs sakho dbang du 'gyuro// skyes pa dbang du bgyi nam gyi ngozhag bcu bzhi zhag gcig
smyungab bgyisute/ lagan rdzordzamadun dulang+ka'i nge gisazhugs byas la sku tshe'i khru la'anabargyad stongasbyin sreg bgyisanadabang du'agyur ro// rdo rjeldan ma'i chog rdzogs so/
rdordza bzhi d ma'i las rnams lags te/ dbabaname tog dkar bo dag gso bgyi'o// bcangan yid kyis bgyi'o// sgyur stsalan lan bdunabazlas brjod rgyas ba'i chab kyis bgyis/
gar bgyid dustsalan gu gul gyis bdug par brgya'i// zas stsalan karatsho'im tog lan bdunabazlas brjod kyis bas bgyi'o/ brjod dus la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i
yus kar gyis bsnun na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa brjod do// gdon dgodadusalan lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i me tog gtor ro// khacingan chab kyis bgyi'o// khardegan se gol
gtogs bar bgyiso/ tshar gacan s la'an bdunasngags kyis btab lamago la bzhuganamyos par 'gyur tagadon 'bros so// gcad nab lang gi lci ba las gzugs bgyis lamatsho
rnon pos bcad n bcad par 'gyur gdon bsdigs pa dang rgyug tu gzhuganamadzub mos bsdigs par bgyi// gdonadakyila 'khor dug zhugan rdo rje'i phyag rgyas bstan nadakyil 'khor du
gzhugago/ gdon 'bros par bgyi nagadon gyi mdun du lan brgya rtsa brgyud sbyin sreg bgyisanagadon shing 'bros so// gdon sngon yid kyis gsa'atshab der rmad do// dug dbaban sAn+ti
pog gi dug da sa bgyi'o// phur budababanalung tang gi la ma'ibadug da sa bgyi'o// mas dbangan kan wu'i tog gabadug pas bgyi'o// zhes zhagabazhi dbab
rtsanamadas bgyi'o// bsrung bar gyi na lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i srad bus bgyi'o//chang ma rung ba bgyi nagaseg ma la lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis la khang stes su bor na chang ma rung
bar ba gyis paga'agyura'o// gdonagyis btab par bgyin yid kyisabagyi'o// skyes pa dang bud mdadabang dubagyimar gyi'onag khargyudanasabartsams tagadugs bdun dus gsum du phub las
kun brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyis nadabang du'agyura'o// dbye ba bgyin m gyi zhagabargya la nyin zhag gcig snang ba bgyis te/ lagan rdo rje'amadunang skyes ra 'galasalanabargyad stong sbyin
sugabagyisanarapo ba bgyis par 'gyur// las sgrub par 'atshalabs tshes grangs dang skar ma bdamamo'atshal/ sgrung ba bgyim 'tshal bas budamadakyilangasal spos dang bdug pas
mchod dmagoshar phyogs su bstan la/ de nas rig sngags 'chong gis rdorje bzhi d ma brjod par bgyis na budamedad dgod cing ldang bar 'gyur te/ de'anyal po bgyi'o// gal tatshanusanag
sngags 'changagasal goradurig pa mchog dran par bgyi zhing/ snying po gnyis kabazlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnun rab gyi'o// da nas budamed de dgod cing mchu ste de rtsa
bar bgyi'o// de nas bud de sbrum par gyur te/ de nas 'ag sngags 'chang gis rdo rje bzhadam bzlas brjod bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnunapar bgyi'o// de nas de mi'aka' b.la'o gyur mod//
mang 'ag pa mchog gis khungs kor gyis bsnunab bgyi'o/ de nas lto'ags do rdzo bzhi dam bzlas brjod bgyis lam la blang bar bgyi'o// mal blangasanas kyang yungs karagyis bsnunan
dum bub rgya la 'gyur ta pra ra 'inang du stsalal/ mi thod gsum gyi steng du mchis la yongs su smin par 'gyur gyi bar du rdo rje bzhadam bzlas brjod bgyis la blangs te grogasa rnams la stsal cing
'tshalan/lcanga'a'akhyil bar 'gyur/ gdugs shar ba ltabu'im dog tu 'gyur/ labcudrug 'dor lta bur 'gyur/ nam mkha' lamachis par 'gyur/ rigasngags 'chang thams cad bran
du 'gyur/ dordza'i 'khor los sgyur ba'akhyur/ dpag tshad stong can du 'phagasar ra 'gyur/ dpag tshad stong tshud chad kyis thos par 'gyur/ lo brgyad khri thub par 'gyur/ mtshon chas
lus la mi tshugs par 'gyur/ darjenyid du 'gyur/ bdag 'bo 'tshaba'agyur/ lha'isgrub pa ni zla ba gcig zas su chu grog 'tshal zhing/ dra'i 'og tumar gyi ngo zhagabargyud nas
zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis to/ lagan rdo mchod cing thams cad kyang mchod par bgyi'o// da nes rig sngags 'chang gis lagan rdo rje'i mdun du ldong ros shing abat+tha'i lo ma bdun
gyi steng du bzhi g ste dngos grub gsum 'byung gi bar dubazlas brjod bgyi'o// 'badrab r gnanam mkhal mtshibama'agyuro// duba'agrul na mi gda' bar 'gyur/
le lnga stong thubapa'i rig sngags 'chanyid du'agyur/ lnga stong thub pa'i rkang gis 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs ganganaganod sbyin mamachis pa der mar gyi bozhag brgyad nas zhagagasum sangab
bgyis ta/ gnas dben pamachis la dur khrod kyi shing gis zhugs bus seng ldang gi yam srogashing khrag dang dug la bsgugs pa'i n brgyad stong sbyin sugabagyisan gnod spyin mo di mchis
par 'gyur te/ mches nas 'di skad du byashesamachab dang/ des 'di skad dugang bsams pa de gyis shig ces brjod par bgyi'o// gal tobatub nu'adi skad dudapag tshadabargyanas bud
med nga'i gan du khud da shog/ grogs po brgyad cu la zan byicige/ nyin gasig bzhinasazungabargyad dang/ kashapa chab rgyada brgyad bulacig ces brjod dang doltar ba gyi'o zhes mchiber
'gyur te/ de'i 'og tu bud med khridad mchi'o// yid kyis bzlas brjod bagyi'o// yid kyis sur gtang bar bgyi'o// dordzo bzhi d ma'i chog rdzogs so//
nyamo thams cad kyisana'adigs te/ rig pa mchog gi phonyamos thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bgyi'o// lasaThams cad du'ang rig pa mchog gisnying pa dang lhan cig sbyang par
0bgyi ste/ sgrub pa ma'agasanga'i rig pa'i ng sbyab par bgyid do// srinabu ka ta'i dug gis gnodapar gyur pa rnams 'anam ga bri ba'i gzhi dang snag tsha dang/ smra gu'ang sngags lan bdun
bdunagyis bsngags la gang 'dod pa bris te bskun sos par 'gyu'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das lu/ laganang sa'adi skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'dasagazhan yang gang
gis rig pa thams cad dngos grub du'agyurab stsal ba'irogapa'i lha thams cad kyi gsang ba brjod pabagyi// gal te rig sngags 'chang rig pa grub pa'i tshalan gupalca dal 'das/
mgu bar bgyi'o// mar gyi ngozhag bcubazhi'o zhag gcig smyung ba bgyis to/ rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i chu klung gi ngogs gnyis kas khungs lha'agazugs bgyis te/ sbyin dang ma
'dresakha'i tshon gyis lha'i kha dog ci'i dra ba de 'drab r bar bgyi'o// maradang sbrang rtsis ltadagababagyi'o// me tog pad+ma'idabus su khyu de gzhag par bgyi'o// pa'i bani a
ka rudangatsanadanagyis bsku bar bgyi'o// dusakhasumadubadug pas kyang bdug khabagyi// gu gul dang/ du ru ka dang/ ga duranang/ shigami'i mitogadang/ de rnams bsras
pa'i bdug pas bdug par bgyi'o// gdugasagasum gyi bar dubagyi'o// de nas bzugs da 'oma'inang dustsaladazhig kharam gyurakyi bar du bzhi gal/ zhi gnas 'om rgya mtsho
gru@#// rngabab pa'ichab nangadustsal to// de nas sbyor ba 'dis lha de mguba'agyugazhinga dga' ba mthong sa myur dudangos grub kyang stsolato// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni reg pa'i rig
thams cad kyi gsang ba lags te// 'dis thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba 'dazhibadag gi sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad dubarjod do// bcom ldan 'das
[~ ]rig pa'i rgyal bo bdag gis bshad pa 'di ni rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po ste/ rig pa thams cad sgrub tu stsal ba/ tshungs pa mamachis pa// mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa/ zlam mchis pa lags/
sa 'di ni bdag gsasems can thams cad kyi don gyi spyodadu bshad do// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i kho 'dus pa la bka' stsalapa/ grogs po dag
byang chub sems dpa' sams dang 'tshanapo stobs chen po lag na rdo rjes grong ma/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das mthong lag so// bde bar gshegs pa mthong lags so// bcom ldan
'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ grogs po dag byang chub sems dpa' chen ngolagan rdo rjel gang gis 'di ltar yid kyis phyag 'tshal na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa stong phrag dgu la phyag byas
ba pha'agyur ro// de nas thams cad d ldan ng 'khor des lagon rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs taphyag 'tshal nas 'di skodacas/ byang chub sems dapachonabo khyod de bzhin gshegs bs/
ba stod cing bkurata bsngags pa legs so legasaso// brtson 'grus dang brtul ba chen po dang ldan palegasas zhes bya ba smras so// de nas gzhan nu rdo rje snyes bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs dang lag
rardo rje la phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa lag na rdo rje 'di skad ces smosas// yababadag kyang rig pa mchoga'adagababs gang gis rig pa mchog sgrub pa'i ge sngags 'chang laganod sbyin
thams cad dang/ log 'drenathams cad dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad dang/ grub pa thams cad dang/ ku thams cad dang/ yi dgas thams cad dang/ grul bum thams cad bgegs bgyid
ba 'i rab sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad dugasang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o// danas gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la gan jo rdzas/ gzhonanu darje snga'adi skad ces smras s// bzhin bzang
khyod sems can thams cad la phan par brtson pa legs so/ bzhin bzang khyod rig pa mchog gi don gyi phyir gsang sngagasalcosashig/ danas phas gnang bas gzhonanu rdo rje sde dga' maguyirangs
to bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal nas lega'adrenanges par gzhig pa gsang sngags smras pa/ namobud+d+ha ya/ namod+harmAa/ nam/ saM g+hA ya/ dmad+d+hAny+tsaNAbadzrapA Na ya/
ma hAyak+Sha sanang tam/ mo badzrasinAya/ kumA rApa d+haraNi/ apra tihatA ya/ ma tAl par kramAm/ rtso la/ ku kul/ ma tham tha/ nagayasarba big+hAn/ banAya
kan ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ spo Ta yaso Ta ya/ mgar/ ban+deban/ ye mam du/ ts+tshanasaMmu lin+tadzam+b+hamo hayan/ sum ya sa ma ya sAgA/ sgrub pa'i dus na grog mkhar
gyis las rdo rjebagyiso ta bsrung ba bgyi'o// srung ba'i dusan til nag pos sbyin sreg brgyad stong bgyis nabagags thams cad bcom par 'gyur// sgrub pa'i dus na lanabadunabazlas brjod
bgyis pa'i yungs kar gyisa mtshams gcad do// rkang rjes kyis 'am thal ba lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis bsrung ba bgyis la/ sgrub pa'idus 'jim pa las rdo rje sde'i gzugs bgyis
te spos dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pas mchod la/ rig pa lanabargyad stong bzlas brjod bgyis nasgrub pa'i ri byin gyis rlob par bgyid cing dngos grub tu 'gyur// lha rnams dbaban gu
gul gyi bdug ngas bgyi'o// kludakrug par bgyi nado rje'i phyag rgya bgyisal lagan dardzo'imadun du brgyadabots+tshabagyis te/ gang na klu gnas pa'imatshodir bo'an ku thams cad skrag par 'gyurayo
dri tho rnams g.yos par bgyi nam kyi bzhi g brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdordzo'imadun du dur khrod kyi sol bas dri za'i gzugs bris la/ de'i khar srin lag bzhag
ste rig pa lan brgyad stong brjod nasnying po brjod pasamachis par 'gyur te/ mchis naas bar snas sman 'dorati/ de 'tsholan thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur/ driza thams cad kyang
bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin rnams brlag par bgyi phyogs gang na gnod spyin nam/ gnod sbyin mo gnas pa'i phyogs der mchis lcags phur so bzhi pa bus/ lan brgyu/
rtswa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te btsugs na gnod sbyin 'byos par 'gyur// ci ste bsgrub par 'atshalanari mo mkhan gso sbyong bzung bsam god pa'iras la sangs rgyus kyigazugs gsar
gyi mdog can bri bar bgyi'o// de'i g.yon rol dul gan jo rdzomadogasngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas lol du rdo rje gzhonanu'i gzugs
'dzanang gsar gyi mdog can lag pa g.yonapan pad+magayas pas dam pa sbyin par bri'o// de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa po lagan pog bu thogs pa bri'o// da nas rig sngags 'chang gis
zla ba phyed bras su'o skyo'athung zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bgyi'o// de nas mar gyi ngashag brgyad la nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te rgya cher mchod la/ gtor ma'ang rgya che'abagyi'o// de nas
rig sngags 'chang gis snama'im tigabargyad stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa la phugaparab gyi'o// dngos grubakyi na tsha ma nim me'i me lce gyen du mchisdu zing zhes bgyid na dngos grubatu'agyur
bo[;]yid kyisagangabasams pa de stsol te/ rig sngags 'chang nyid dang 'dod pa dang ldan pa ma gtogs so// las thams cad du'ang sbyar bar bgyi ste/ yid kyis sa bgyi'o// rdo rje
(@#/// sde'i tshig rdzogs so//kades muts+tsha da kas/ logs derdzola'adaskad cesalcasaso// yababa dga'akhyod kyi rig sngags kyi chog rgyas pa thams cad
cha bgags bgyid lags madakyis/ ganga dga'ag pa mchog sprubapa de dag la bdag sur bcinge ba stsal bar bgyi'o// bdagabacingasan 'go sngags 'chang de la su'ang bgags brgyudang rami 'gyur
ra de bzhin bzang de de bzhin te/ bdag cag bde ba smos shig smos shig/ de nas murtaT kasalag na rdo rje'i rkang pa gnyis la gtugs te bdag bcing bgisang sngags smras pa/ rnamorat+na twA

yasu/ namany+tsan+tabadzrapA Nis/ tad+yathA/ rdzi rdzoru ruba'ib kha'i/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ sol la ya/ badzrapAmasu/ akro d+ha b+hashad+haM/ sa skya ra/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha sa nA/ laganardarjod ngamu ra ka'i
mdun dum tog dmar de dang bdug bsamachol/ dran s sgrubang 'i dus nasrad budaka' ngal mdud pa gsum dor ro/ su zhig rtag tu'achangab de 'thams cad das grub tu 'gyur ro// sgrub pa tham
cad dang las thams cad du'ang snga u0f97tshilalasau Da ka'agazugs bgyis te/ lag pa g.yonanamadung rtsa gsum ng thogs nga ra bgyi'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang gisatsan dan dmar po'imadung rtse
gsum pas snying khar btsugs pa de'i 'og turdo'anag pos bkang// dngos grub stsal gyi bar du gzhag par bgyi'o// de nas ga sngags 'chang gis mdung rtse gsum pa phyungal 'o mas bkrus/
/ rig pa lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bagyis 'thamasacad bagyi'o// ga' las de ltar ma bgyisan dngos grub tum 'gyur ro// murtaTaka'i sgrub pa lags te/ rimo mkhan gso sbyong/
bzung bsam godapa'i sa 'dra sangs rgyas kyi gzugs gsar gyi kha dog can bri bar bgyi'o// de bzhin gshegs ng tshigayonarol luganardorngamadog sdobasas rgyan thamasacad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas sol duna'aphags pakun dga' bo gsar gyi mdogacan lagan rdzayab thogs pa bri'o// lag na rdo rje'i 'og legs su mu Ta kamadag dmamalamig gsum pa 'dod pa'i gzug
'dzin pa gdamortagad 'byin tsang/ lag pa g.yas pa/kha'agram du bzhi g pa bri'o// danas rig sngags 'chang gis mar gyi ngozhagabcugazhi'i nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis la/ rima'i gzugs la
mchod pa rgya cher bgyis la/ de'i mdun du a kangashashing gis zhugs bas ta yungs kar dang/ tilarnag mo dang/ 'bras yos dang 'di rnamasumaredong bsras lanabargya stong bgyis na ji
ma'agazugs kyi me tog gi'aphrang ba 'gul bsarnagyurata dngos grub tu'agyur ro// dngos grub tugyur na de'i 'jigs thams cad kyi dengos grub tu'agyur ro// las gzhan dag kyang bgyis tasbrul
gyis zin pa dbab nasra rtsi reg gi bdug pas bgyi'o// gdon brgyadan zhu rjes kyis sa gamatha'o dumadung rtsagasum pa bso la bstananagadon du zhing 'bros so// skyes pa dang bud med dbang
du bgyi namurtaTaka la phyag bgyis gdugs gang yang rang steshasme taka'ashing gis zhugs dusal/ ba ru ra'i me tog brgya stong sbyin sreg bgyisanadabang du 'gyurar//
0 mo mtshan bcing ba pa'i tshalan dur khrod kyi thal ba dur khrod kyi ras kyis bcingsal/ rig pa'i ngalan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod bagyisanamamatshabacings par 'gyur ro// dgrol na du'o/
byas pa gdon skem byed kyis thon pa rnams ni[︽]b.lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis te bkrusan sos pa 'gyur// 'byung po dang/ 'dre dang/ chu rnams bsadan thal mo brdabs
danas byang chub sems dang ba spyan ras gzogs dbang phyug gis bla gos phragapa gtsag tug byas te/ dusamo g.yu
pany+tsiwa ngas la btsugs nasaM/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skadabus gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang l gan rdo rje' gsang sngags stsal bar bgyi'o/ lag na rdo rje 'di ni kho bo'i
gos dkar mo'i snying pa bton pa tsam gyis 'grub pa ste/ 'ad kho bos brjod par bgyi'o// 'di btonapa tsam gyis sems can thams cad rengs par 'gyur ro// nam/ sarba tathAgatad+d+ho
la thug ba te/ a b+ha ya nA shan pusan/ rtas ya/ hUM kuTi tib ta tis tA/ rig pa 'di bton pa tsam gyis bgags thams cad bcom par 'gyur ro// bdag bsrung na thal ba lan bdun
bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// gzhan bsrungan spyi bor lan gsum bzlas brjod bgyis taskamadud par bgyi'o// sems can thams cad rengs par bgyin yid kyis bgyi'o// dbang du
bgyin yar gyi ngo zla banyal zhag gcig bsrungababagyisal/ 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gamadun du byang chub kyi shing gisazhugs bus la til gyis lanabargyudasong sbyin srog bgyis
nadabang du 'gyur// ma rung bar bgyi'atshalanam rusakyi phur bu byas nabargyad stong sngags kyis btab// dgra'i khyim du btsugasan dgramarang khur 'gyur ro// dutha' gam na mar
gyi zhag brgyal du khrod kyi thol bslangs tedur khrod kyi zhugs su lan brgyad stong spyan srog bgyis na 'gum mo// bsaman mar gyi shog bcu bzhal chab lte ba nub tsam du zhugs la dgra'isrug
bskams kyi bar du bzlasabarjod bgyi'o// mtshams gcad para'atshal nas nig ldeng gi phurapa sor bzhi pa blangs te/ phur bu re re 'bar nabargyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod bgyis la phyogs bzhir
gtsugs mtshams bcad pa'i gyura'o// yul 'khor bcinganawan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzus brjod bagyis pa'i chab kyis bgyi'o// sems can rnams bskrad nalan bdun bzlas brjod bagyis
pa'i yungs kar gyis bgyi'o// lig bu mig dang ldong ros bsgruban zla ba gcig brasasu 'o skya'atshal zhing/ yar gyi ngo tshos brgyad nas zhag gsum sbyang ba bgyis te ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i
@#// mchodartenanam/ sangs rgyas kyis gablugasakyi spyasngarngashing shA 'ilen bdun gyi steng dulegabumig dang ldeng nges bzhag pa dngos grub gsum byung gi bar dubazlas brjod bgyis/
ka/'banganani stong thub par 'gyur// 'gi sngags 'chang sgralcala'akhyil ba can du 'gyur// dur thulan nami gda' bar 'gyura'o/ le dgu stong thub pa 'gyur ro/ ma 'a'akhe mang
bar bgyidapa'i tshal bas mar gyi ngo zhagabargyad 'dur khrodakyishing gis zhugs bus yungs kar dang/ dug dang/ khrag dang bsras lanabargyudastongasbyin srugabagyis na yu 'khor b.rus
par 'gyur// mar gyis lana brgyad stong sbyin sug bgyisan bar 'agyuyo// dgra'agum tshes grangs dang skam bdamachi'atshal te/ lung thangag gang gis zhugs byas shing maNa'i
le lanabargyudastong sbyin sreg bgyis nazhagagsum na'agum mo// gshags 'gyed na rig pa bzlas brjod bgyisa' gdong brugasan rgyal ba'agyur ro// khros pa'i mdun du bzlas brjod
bgyisana dga' bar 'gyur ro// yugs sa modabang du bgyi bo'atsho'akhas yar gyi ngo zhag brgyal 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs dbang phyug gAmadunadume togadakarapo brgyad stongasbyin srogabgyid
nadabang du 'gyur ro// dgra tshar gcad na' phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gimadun du dbamamachis pa'i ma dag mar rgya skyegs kyi lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg bgyi'o// bzlas
04 brjod bgyis nag/'dod pa dernyed par 'gyur ro// mkha' 'gro ma thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bcing ba yungs kar lan bdun bzlas brjod bgyis pas bgyi'o// nusrin kum ba la kha ba'i tshe
nags gamal lan bdunabazlas brjod bgyis tachab tubon kha bcingeb 'gyur ro// sang ga dang/ stag dang/ ma re dang/ glang po che dang/ rgyal po dang/ chom rkun gyi nang du chung na bsam
par bya'o// ri mo mkhanags spyong bzung bas ma god pa'i rasal sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs bri bar bya ste/ g.yonarol du ni lag na rdo rje/ g.yas lo du ni'i phags pa spyan ras gzigs
dbang phyug go/ de bzhinagshegs pa ni gsar gyi mdog can du bri'o// la gan jo nale bcu drugatsam lenapa gzugs 'drakha dog sngobasangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa bri'o// 'phag
pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug gi g.yasarol dun lha mo bre/ de'ang 'dam bumada' rgya ltar dkar ba'o// 'phags pa spyan rasagazigs kyang de dang 'dra'o// lhamo niba'i'aphrang
bas brgyan par bri'o// de'i 'og rol du sgrub pa pog por thogs par bri'o// sgrub pa khru ba gcig gi bar du'+ras su'o skyo 'tshalazhung yar gyi nga tshos brgyud lamachodapa rgya chen po bgyis te/ lha
tshol 'od zer byungagabar du bzlas brjod bgyi'o// 'od zer de de bzhin gshegs po zhabs kyi mthe bonganub par 'gyur ro// de nas dangos grub tu 'gyur targyal po nyid stsal to// yid
kyiso gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'byor to// yar gyi ngo ba nyanasazhag gsum sgrub bgyis ta mtsho'abab pa'i chu klung du zhugs pad+ma 'bum bonalham nyid mthong
ngo dam pa gang brus pa de rudadargyal po nyid du'agesngags 'chanyid du 'gyur// thAm zhag gsumosbyang bgyi'o/ 'phags pa spyanaras gzigs kyidabang phyugagecho gardzogs
de nas bcom ldan 'adasakyis/ laganardo rjel 'disodaces bka' stsalato/ lag na rdo rdzongs kyang gang gisajorje'i rigs dang/ tshag rgyas pa chen po

gzhan dag kyang 'grubapadra'agyurab 'i gsang sngags cho ga rgyas pa 'di'i sbyin pa bgyi'o// da lta bas na chog rgyas pa thams cad du 'di gcig pu sbyar bar bgyi'o// lag na rdo rje 'di dran pa tsam gyis
rig pa'iny+tsa thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro// namasarbatathAg tabyo/ b+ha ga bad+d+hA/ oM ru ru spu ru dz+wa la tib+hAsing 'atsasarba ams d+ha ni swAtA/ lag na rdo spyan 'dinasems can thams cad
kyi don gyi phyiradabazhin gshegs pa byibaphrag bcusadragos te/ ngas kyang da lta sums can rnams kyi don dang/ khra bo rnams dga' b.rubya ba dang/ gdul dka'akha rnams gdul ba'i phyir
bshad de// ri mo mkhan gso sbyong dang ldan pasam god pa'i sa la spyin dang ma 'dres pa'i tshon gyis sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gsar gyimadog can chos ston pa bri bar bya'o// de'igs
lo du'aphags pala gnas domadog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan chos nyanaparabri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon rol du 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang phyug
'dam bumada' ltar dkab/ sa'i thor tshugs dang cod panacan/ stag lpags kyi sham thabs gyonapa/ lag na yab thogs pa khri bar bya'o// de nas zla ba phyed zas su ro sa'athung
zhing rig pa bzlas brjod bya'o// des mar gyizhig banu bzhi lanyidazhag gcig sbyang babagyis te/ mo'agazugasalamachod pa rgya cher byas rig pa lan brgya stongakhuzlas brjod bya'o//
de bzhinagshegs pa'i grogayasanas 'od zer byung ste lag na rdo rjel nuban grubapo'agyur// rgyal po nyidadab rag sngags 'chang nyidad dam pa gnyis sbyin par byed do// rgyal po nyidadu
gyuran rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'agyuro// rig sngags 'chang nyid duk+tarananirig sngagasa'achang drug khri'i bdag patim shang blta bu madog can le bcu drug
'an pa lta bu 'alus su 'gyur ro// lakhri bzhi stong thub par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi skadashas khaca'akhyu'o// myongamo'izas bza' zhiba'i rnamararing bsrel dang
bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du me tog dkapo zho dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ mal bsnyags pa 'bum nasreg khyu 'del 'bum bzlas brjod byas na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
gzugasamangodasum du 'gyur te/ mthong nas gang sgrubasad 'grubab// su zhig rtag tu lan gsum brjod cinguphyag kyang dzatshalanadas de bzhinagshegs pa khyab phrag
[+ ]bcul bas stong byas pa dung/ thumar byas pa dang/ rim gro byas pa dang/ mchod pa byas pa'i gyuralo/ grangagashibade'i tshobade ba can du skya ba'agyuralo// mar gyi pozhag brgyad la nyin
zhag gcig sgrub byas te/ bcom ldan 'dasa'amachod pa byas 'a tsan danadakarapos dkyil 'khor byugs te/ rig pa'i nabargyud stong bzlas brjod byas n do nas dngos grub tu 'gyur ro//
de'i 'og tuu0f8bsa thams cad sbyar bar bya'o// mig la lanabadunabasngagasan gang mthong ba dadabang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'amadun du ldong ros lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas nas
cig la bskusazhigang mthong ba dodabang du 'gyuratshogs// rkang rjes kyi sa blangs lan bdun sngags kyis btab ste/ bud med gang gi mgo bar gtor na da dbang du 'gyur ro// bdag gamachil
lan bdun bsngags ta thig le byas na gang mthong ba de dbang du 'gyu'o// gang gi ming nas brjod dayungs kar b.lan brgyad brgya spyanasrug byas pad dbang du 'gyur ro// bud med dbang du bya
natilanag ro la lan brgyad brgyasbyin sreg bya zhiming nas kyang brjod n de dbang du 'gyur// kriSh+Thatsaturd byonashrIta/ phunam mkhrungs hasaN/ badzrapA Nirahanatab/ rA dza pa da
niya shob ti/ ldong ros kyis lagamathi'i dugazugs brisolaming nas brjod cing nyi ma la bstas da lan brgyad brgya bzlos brjod byas nadabang du 'gyur// dur khrod kyi sol bslasatartsig nges
lagazugs bris la molatshon gyi steng du mdzubamo bzhi gasolapargyadabargyabazlasabarjod byas n dbang du 'gyur// spratsholal gzugs byas taldan pa g.yas par bzhi gal 'anabargyad brgya bzlas
brjod byas nadab du'agyur ro// ga'u wangadung/ shu dgadang/ dung ga lteb dang/ rgyasos nams bsros tabatags la rig pa lanabargyad skyongabazlasabarjod byas tu zas dang/ skom dang/
bza' ba'inang dubatab nadabang du 'gyur// dur khrod thal babasa'a'aganaroN+Di'i dun du lan brgyadabargyabazusabarjod byas rtagangal gtor ba dbang du 'gyur ro// lag na rdo rje'i
mdun dume tog dkar bo brgyud brgyagator dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrod kyi sal ba blangs tartog sal gzugs brisa'ashing ka ware'i mi rtog brgya rtsa brgyadamemtshan du phog par byas na
dbang du 'gyu'o// galangag lcibs la ma lhung ba blangs te zhi ba'i mtshan gcig byas l/ de'i mdun durtswa ku shalasamadung rtse gsum byas pas nyin gsum du yungs kar dang/ zho dang/
sbrang rtsi bsres pa'i srig khrugasalan bdun bdunaspyin srag byas n dbang du 'gyur ro// lag nardarje'i mdun du sbrum bubashaka'i yam srog shing brgyadabargya sbyin srogatusan dbang du 'gyu'o/
0 @#// gzhon num dbang du bya na ma rang gname tog brgyadastong gisolag na rdo rjel phog par byas na gzhon num dbang du 'gyur// yugasas mdabang du bya na lag na rdo rje'i mdun du
mon sranagre'u sbyin sreg bya zhingaminas kyang brjod nadabang du 'gyurar// thal b.lanabadun sngags kyis btabastabadumed lagato nadabang du 'gyur ro// bud med kyi mdun du rig pa lan brgyad
brgyabazlas brjod byas nadabang du 'gyur ro// shing bu sor bzhipo blas tagayabasan 'ong zhing dbang su'agyur ro// me tog dkarapo blangs te 'gan jorje'i mdun du lan brgyudastong bzlasabarjod
ka byas la bud med mthong bar g.yabasan 'ong zhing dbang du 'gyur ro/ gzhan yang las byed pa 'dod na bumo gtsong mas bkal ba'i skudang brkyang nas blangs te/ legan rdo rje'amadun du nyis khugs
dang ba'i khugs byas pa bzhag bzlas brjod byas togatsagalagaciga'akhrilan dgongs pa 'grub par 'gyur gi'u wang bsgrub pa la 'dod ngs nyim bdun bris su 'o skya'athung zhong yar gyi
ngo tshos bcu bzhal nyin zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lagan rdo rjel mchod pa rgyatshor byas l gi lung pad+makhaMsteng du bzhag// 'bar gyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'baranas blang bar bya'o
tshablangs pa tsam gyis nyi shar ba lta bu 'omadog dang ldan ng ma'agyur so// dgos pa thams cad la de kyis bsams pa tsam gyis 'byung bar 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sod
0 par 'gyur/ 'dagu stong drubapa'i gyura'o// zla ba phye dbus su 'o skyo'athung zhing/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis grogamakhar gyis lanor rgyas kyi gzugs byas la de'i steng du'adug ste/ nam
'gul bar gyurakyi bar du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na longs spyod steng// 'das pa dang/ ma'os pa dung/ daltar byung ba rnams ston pa la'agyur/ lo lnga brgya thub par
'gyur/ bde bstan du skye ba'agyur/ bsasu 'o skyo'athungashongolag na rdo rje'amadun du lan 'bumabazlas brjod byas na longs spyodaster to/ zla bgatsugag pa duslongama'i bras babranang
yar gyidAtshos bcu bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis te/ lag na rdo rje mchod pa byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la'ang lhag nga mchod da/ 'ganado rnga'irkangapa nas bzung larig sngags
bzlas brjod byas te/ laganajorje'i gzugs 'gal bar gyurakyi bar du bzlas brjod bya'o// 'gul bar gyuran grub pa thams cad kyis mthong bar 'gyur ro/ yid kyis bsam
bas kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur/ lalnga stong thub par 'gyur ro// donas gnodasbyin gyi dbang lag na rdordzis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sangs rgyus
bcom ldan ' das gang gsems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gsang sngags 'dilta bu gasungs pa'i ngomatshor tezhes nas/ 'khor thams cad mtshar dugyur to// sangs rgyas kyi spyin gyi
chog rdzogs so/// de nas 'byung po'abadag po dbaldan gyis thugs phrag pa gcig phyagazanas/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lho ngasal btsugs te/
bcom ldan 'das gang na bde legasasu thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gi ming 'di ni ge pa thams cad kyi gtso mo lag/
'di dran ng tsam gyis bdagagis dngos grub stsal bar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang sams3na rnams kyi donagyisad du byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na jorjel mang dbul bar
'tshal// 'byung po'i bdag po rdobashan du gyis shig/ de nas 'byung po'i bdag po dbang ldan gyis/ lagan rdo rje'i zhabs gnyis la gtugasanas lag na rdo tshon 'di skad ces smras so// gsang
ba'i bdag po khyad kyis rig sngagasa chen po'i ming 'di bzhes su gsol/ namo ru ngu ya/ lal/ lalalal/ ka mu kA ya swA hA/ lag bu mig bud med kyi skus bcings rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i
chu klung gi ngos gnyis ka'i 'jim pa blangs pa nang dubucug stabasregasal/ dbang phyug chen po'i gnas su song nasamar gyi ngozhag brgyud dam b.rubashel zhago gnugasbyang bu byas talag bu mig/
blangasaM lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas nas sbyang bar bya ste/ mig bskus nas gal bltasan de dbang du 'gyur ro// mar gyi zhag brgyad la dur khrod kyisol bslangs te mi'i thod pa la
brdu gnas lanang rgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas thegol byas n ga'akhaltas pa dadabang du'agyu// sol ba'angabaslabangar byaste/ zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su chudangaphyi'i'adug gusrazhangamar
gyi ngozhag bcu bzhale zhag gcig sbyang ba bgyis tadurakhrodadusol/ de nas thag la skyang nul bko tsam byas ta mtshodo chen po byas nas durakhrod kyi sol bslangs te/ de nas rig sngags 'chang
ges sol khama'i thodapa'inang du bzhogalalag pas mnan tadudapal 'khrul bar gyur kyi bod yig sngags bzlas brjod byas nas blangs tethiga'abyas nalus mi snang ba 'gyur zhing/ bsams pas
kyakhabras 'khyungabar byed de tsholo stong thubapar 'gyur ro// dbang phyuga chen palas rnams baklags pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur ro// tshes grangs dngaskaphama'ang bdam me'atshol/ sbyang ba'ang
bgyig 'tshol ba bud med shi ba'i rograngasaladrid mi tog gis brgyanato/ du'amamtshan du logyi lom bzha gnas / de'i steng dung rosazagacig gam/ srang phyeda bzhi g la'abar bar gyur kyi
bar du ge sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ 'bar bar gyuganadabang phyug chen po'i gzugs dang ldan 'gyur zhing rab tu'ajoms pa'i tshogs kyis bskor la/ dgustong thubang dbang phyug chen
pa'i tshogs rnams dbang du 'gyur ro// dur khrodakyi thol ba byas tami'i thod pa'isnod du bzhag la/ mtshonagacig 'dug pa'i gnasasuson gnas azhag gsum sbyang ba byas te mar gyi ngo zhag
byabya// bcubazhi'i 'byung potsogator marang byas la/ dmas thod pa'i snod la ga dubyas tadangos grub rnam gsum du gyur kyi bar dubazlas brjod byas nas/ dud pa 'thul bsan
lus m snang bar 'gyur zhing tsho'abargyaskyong thub par gyur// 'bar bor 'gyur tathegal byas pas na lcanga'a'akhyilabar 'gyur zhing/ nam mkha' 'gro ba dang/ tshogs stong thub par
'gyulo/ gi'u wang bsgrub bar 'dod pas naame'agyi ngozhag gcig sbyang byas to lagan rdo rdzomadun dumachod pa byas la/ 'ganado rje'i lag tu gi'u wanga bzhi g nas 'bar ba'agyur
kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas to/ 'bar bar gyur na byas pa tsam gyis stobs glang po che dmanyam zhingepha rol gyi mtshon gyisakyang mi tshugs 'tsho sum stong thub par 'gyur ba dang/ gang
gtam byas pa de dbang du 'gyur zhing dbang phyugachen po'i g.yoga rnams kyis nyin gcig bzhin tin ra bcu gnyis dang gos thugs bcuganyis sbyang ra bgyid rung/ sngon ma byung ba'i budamed kyang
khridad 'ong b.la'agyur ro// dbang phyug tshon po'i chog rdzogs so// de nas ma thagi rgyal po phur du gsum pas/ lag na rordza'adismad a ts+tshas so// lug
tshan rdo rje bdag gis kyang sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyi ming dbul bar bgyi ste// 'didren pa tsam gyis bdag gi cho ga rgyas pa thams cad 'grub pa re'agyur ro// donasam thang gi
rgyal bo phur bu gsum pas bcom ldan 'das dang laganardarje'azhibalamakobos phyag 'tsho'anasagasang sngags smas ba/ mobarjod mis+ya/ ma sAyakasenApa s+ya/ nam / nam/ trig
takarmatogas+ya/ aTib Ta/ u buriNi/ gor gor/ hand/ pa tsa pa tsa/ sanurang ya/ ture tu'u/ kam ya sA/ yar gyi de tshos brgyad kyi groladakyil 'khor skyal
nulakhyos byugasas/ phur bu gsum nga' dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa lul te/ bcomaMldan 'das dalaganardo rje'i 'du bdug pa gso'anas zhag gcig sgrub byas te/ rig
sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas 'grub par 'gyur// de'i 'og tu las pa'i m rang bya'o// budamedadabang du byan tshes grangs dang skar yang badam [”]mi dgos/ smyung
ba'ang bya mi dgos pa ka lawa ra'i yamasra gshing gas mang nas sos sheng brgya stong gis sbyin srag byas na dbang du'agyuralo// dkyil 'khor skyalatshul gyis phyug lan las gzugaso
byas nas mtshon rnon posarkang ranas brtsams tagacad bang/ dud pa med pa'i mdagamal lan brgyud ba sbyin srog byas na yang dabang du 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngotsos lngal yang mi'i rus
ba'aphur busal btabaste/ de'i steng dumarame pal mar med mi lce 'bar b.laname pa'i mkhab kyis btsugs timing nas smosashabargyad brgya spyanasregabyas zhadabang du 'gyur ro//
@#// yar gyi ngo chos brtsagasum la ras bal gyi 'dab ma rgya skyegs kyis kha dog bsgyurab sredamedakyi bu'i chungamal phul ba lasam ma'i snying po byas tamaram sbyar la ka ra wA'i
ma tog khab kyis btsugs te/ brgyad stongasbyanasrug byas n yang dbabu'agyur ro// yar gyi ngo tsha borgyada' zhag gcig sbyang byas taatiut+taka'am tog brgyad stong gis dka'abazlog ma'i mi
mtshonalabasnunan yang grong dang longs spyodakyi bzhispyin par byed do// mar gyi zhag brgyad la zhag gcig snang ba byas te/ erang gna'imitog gosodaka' bzlog ma'i rkang la khasnyan bumo thob par
'gyur ro// bud med dbang du byan lags rdo rje'i mdun dum tog dkar po brgyadabargyaphulan dbang du 'gyur ro// yang ngos zhag gcig sbyang ba byas takam po tsa'ishing gisam sprul kosha
taka'am ga brgyad stong gsamin gnas smosashade sbyin sreg byas na mo mtshan la ba 'gyur// dka' bzlogara'i 'o mas bkrusalarig sngagasarkyang stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas nasos par
'gyur ro// phur bu gsum pa 'tshog rdzogs so/ ba kad nas niamam kha la sgruba'i ma mo bdun gyis bod du gnya'i sgrab ta gnas 'kha' na nyid du 'dus par 'gyur te/ 'khor
'dus pa dedag thams cad lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshalato/ bcom ldan 'adasa'adaskadas gsolato// bcom ldan 'das
bdag cag gis kyang byang chub sems dpa' chen po'agan rjesngo lags ng sngags kyisha' bul bka'atshale/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyiso/ mamo de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// sring
mo gang dag gang khyadasems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa'i legs so legs so// da nasamamo de dag gis tshigamathun par laganado rdzal gsang sngags rab/ namabud+d+ha ya/ namo
badzrapA Na ya/ ma sprul spyanA pa taa/ tad+yathA/ bu lu hulu/ la hu' tu/ tahati/ tipatiSh+Tha/ b+hAm ma/ ban+d+haban+d+ha/ kha dakhad/ ma rtsomekha debig+hA ka riti/ mi hani mi han/
naya tin ya/ mA li ni be she thA'i/ a mo gru'am/ sA/ rig sngags 'di dren pa tsam gyis 'gepa mchog sgrub pa'i rig sngags 'tshang de la bdag cagamam bdun gyis dpagi chodagacagag bor du bsrung
babagyi/ yang dag paso sor bskyab par bgyi'o// rig sngags kyi las rnams 'byung ste/ sa gsar pa la sbyin dang ma 'dres pa'i rtsis lagan rdo rdzomadogasngo bsangs la bcu drug lon pa zhig
gzugs can rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ ma mo bdun gyis bskor ba'abri'o/mam bdun 'ojig pa'i tshul bsgrub pabya'o// de nas zhag gsum sbyang bar byas te/ mar gyi zhag bcu
bzhale ci nus kyis mchod pa byas te/ chang dngashagator mang spyin par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis mi'i sku gzugs kyi dun dusang ldengagashongogs ma sbapal yungasaka khrag gis
[n/ ]@#// bsgos pas lan brgya stong sbyin sregabyas te/ de nas rima'i sku gzugs 'gul ba mthong rig sngags 'chang gis 'ag pa mchog dran pa bya'o// bud medamachibagartsigs
cha pa'i ng 'bama'agyur/ das 'jigs par mi bya bar sringam khyoda'ongs pa legs so// rdo rje 'dzin gyis dmatshig byin pa gang yin pa dadran pa gyis shig ces smosashig/ daskadathos nas natso'i

sgra phyungasnyadang zhin du bya'o zhes nasamasnang ba 'gyur ro// de nas nyin gacig gshen du ten ra re sbyin par byed tsang don thams cad sgrub ste/ rig sngags kyi dengasakhrub kyang sbyin par byed d// las
gzhan thams cad kyang 'byung snyalag 'dren phung bar bya ba lan ste tshod lanamo nasrog 'an brgyudabargya bya'o// gdon gzhag pa naskye gtugs pa'i bdug pas bdugasana'adon thams cad 'jigs
par 'gyur ro// gdon gzhim panimadzubamos bya'o// le togam rung bar bya ba nimajagyi zhag bcu zha'ani a 'bra'ishing gi phur busor brgyudapa blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'imadun du len
brgyudabargyabazlas brjod byas nas zhing la btab le togamadapa ba'agyur ro// chang ma rung bar bya na'oma'i srog blugs nanyishu rtsa gcig sbyin sreg byas nam rung bar 'gyurayo// dgra
la mi sdug par byan lam gyisum mdor skyu ru'i shing gisame sngarato/ dgra'i ming nas smosashang dug gis lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas zhadagra'ilus la mi gtsang ba'i drimanam pa 'gyur
[no ]ro phyiragaso bzhilagan rdo rdzolamachod pa rgyas bar bus tam dang gu gul gyis lan stong rtsa brgyadasbyin sreg byas n phyi 'tsho ba 'gyur ro// dbye bar bya ba ni ma gyi ngo'ag brgyad la zhag
gcig sungab byas/ lag ni jarje'in dun du nam shing gis me spar la phubams lan brgyad nga spyin khug byas nadang bar 'gyur// dgra bsladapar 'dod nga sa namar gyi ngo'og brgyadal
na'u ka'i rus pa blangs nas dgra'iming nas smos taM/ sbrul gyi khu burab tsugasand ma thugatudagra'abriso par 'gyur ro// rig pa mtshog sgrubapa'i rig sngags 'chang gi chag rgyas pala'abyung ba'i
lha rnams la mchodang khyus la/ btsugs nas byung na'ang rtag tu 'dri babya'o// dbacanges nango ga rgyus par 'grubang ra'agyur te rig sngags kyi rjes grub las su'ang thugs tshol
bar mi 'gyura'o// gang la rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyusal thams cad rdzogs yodapa dathams cad na lha rnams yo da dga' bar 'gyur tarigasngags kyang sbyin par byed do// da ma yun na
la ga mardo rje'i bya bsgrub pa rnams gugasatsho ba'i pa 'khod do// rig sgyupa sgrub pas chog rgyas palas bshad pa bzhin du 'gal ba rnam bsrung bar bya ste/ udang sha spang bar bya'o//
rtag tu sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun la mngon par dga' bar bya'o// gang dag nga'i rje'i gas mchod pa byed cinganang bar byed pa dang/ rig pa'i mchog 'don ci mchod
pa dedag pa'i dam tshig shes pa yin no// de dag ni la shas chedung ste de dag la nga zhi borasams so// lhathams cad kyang zhi bar sams pacha'o gyur ro// gang/

chadag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul las phyi rol dugyurama'i 'dod do cog thab dang/ dag sbyong du mi 'dzin pa dang/ bram zeram 'dzin par chogargyus pa 'disgrub pa de dag lag na rdo rje 'dzin gyi rje
rjes bshigang ma'agyur ro// lha thamasacad kyang m dad nga 'i sems su 'gyur ro// log 'dren rnams kyang grags ltazhingeklanakatshol ba'i phyir 'khod do// dam thagacund kyis 'debs shing
lega'adren rnams kyis nenang ra 'gyur// mamo rnams kyichog rdzogs so////de nas rdo rje khro bobadud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis 'khor 'dus pa thams cad 'grang po cholta stas
kyis bltasanas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di'i bams can rnams n bsod nams dman pa dang/ tshul la mi gnas pa dang/ pha la ma gus pa
dang rta ma'am gus pa dang/ bsod namasachungab dang/ dadapa med pa dang/ grags tshol ba dang/ 'chal pa dang/ rtagatu thang zil brkam pa dang/ rtag tu'og 'dren dang/ mtshab
can dang/ sha tha rnams kyis zane pa lags te/ bgags dang log 'drend dag gzhig pa dang mthar gtugasapa 'islad du gsang sngags bshad pa'i tshal lo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/
dorje khrogol bka' stsal to// bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gang khyod sems can thams cad la phapa'i phying zhugs pa legs so legs so// khyada' de bzhin gshegs pas gnang gis/ sems can
thams cad kyi phyir gsang sngagasangashod cig/ de nas rdordzagro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyis bcom ldan 'dus dang lag na rdorje'i zhabs la gtugs nas gsang sngags bshad pa/ nam ratAyA ya/
nam@# NAbadzrapA Nas/ ma h+phayasenApa ta ya/ nam badzra kro d+hAya/ pra dzulo tadIpA ri karngag+haa b+ho mgA ya/ a si musal/ badzrab r shupA sha ra sa ya/ tad+ya thA/ e hulustsalu a maM
ta tshu la/ khakhakha kha khA rA khAnAkA nAlAnA/ kA da' dkA dkod/ khAhitAhikA hikAhe/ tib+hUti/ han han/ da had ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ gats+tshagats+tsha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ gtsAgarje/
taN+Da ta// bi Ta ya bi po ya/ b+ha ga bI/ a mr-i ta kuN+Dal/ mAn+tan ta ya badzraNasarlabagru banAyakaMni bA ra am smug Na pa ti/ dzib taka rAya/ mUphaT phaT/ a kro ngug Naya
swA hA/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyoragyigasang sngags dang po'o// namo rat+tatAAyo/ namash+tsaN+DabadzrapA Naya/ ma d+hAyakrus nApa ta/ namom badzra kro d+hAya/ daMcha kaTab+ha rab ya/ asi
musal pa ra shu pA shanahas ya/ hame/ pa ta pa ta/ d+hapa d+hapa/ kha kha/ khAtilA hi/ a mr-i takuN+Dal/ tiratiSh+Tha/ ban+d+haban+d+ha/ han han/ gardza gardza/ ga Na ti/ dz+wa ba
taan+d+ha ka ra ya swA hA/ gsang sngags gnyis pa'o// na mo rat+na tra Aya/ na many+tsan+tabadzra pANaya/ ma hAyak+Shas nApa ta ya/ namo badrogo ya/ bi mal kun ka
dzaduganaya go ga na/ a mr-i tasaM b+habA yaM/ gartam lcaanul/ panasI yA ya/ badzra pA Nipra yA ya/ badzrapA Nil+yA/ b+hug yud banA g.yak+shar k+ShasapramadzanAya/ tsAlokya/ ga tsar

ya/ gtamya n+ya ba traka rayu dridanan/ gan+d+hot+taAya amr-i takuN+Dale/ e #hiriT+Thitaka Tab+ha ra bag+ho bi hud phrol sgyu yi ka gAn du re ra photitisaM bud+d+hA/ oM kha khu ba kha/ grits+tshagri// ban+d+haban+da/
tan han/ gardza gardza/ bi spo Ta ya bi spo Ta ya/ d+haka pAka/ la dzul/ pra dz+wal pra dzal/ gra sa gra sa/ sarba big+ho bi nA yakAnAn hU~MrayaMs togan d+hatshadradayaM pa tA/ rAk+Shas sdod ya
sa tas dzar drar ya spata/ sajatuN+Daka phrad ya ta/ sarbanA gAnIdayaMs pa/ huraM sata/ dahadag/ partsopa tse/ Abasha a bingesha/ a daMtsami kAr+yaku ru badzrad+ha ra adza
pa ya tes/ gsang sngags gsum pa'o// na mo badzra d+hA ya/ dka Ta b+ha rAdzAya/ tad+yathA/ dulu hulu/ khakhakhakha/ khA hi khA hi/ ti tiShA/ ban+d+ha ban+ta swAhA/ khro ba
bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi gsang sngags bzhapa'o// donas 'di dag gi snying po don yodar gang 'dod pa dang/ bzlas brjod byas shingebasgrubs nabadagag gsang sngags thams cad btonatsang bzlas
brjod bgyis pa dang/ bsgrubs par gyur pa d bshad pa'i tshal// da' 'di ni bdag gi snying po lags so// mo arba tahU~MphaT/ bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi sIs rdo rjekhrobo bdud rtsi thathA
sbyor gyis gsang sngagasa rnamos bshad m thagatusa chen po 'di rnam pa drugatsugayosaso// lega'adrena rnams kyang skrag ste skyabs mdatsang rtan med pagyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i thud du
song ste/ bcom ldan 'das bdag cagagaskyabasa mdzad du gsol/ bdebar gshegs pa bdag cag gi skyobs mdzad dug la zhes de skad smra zhangemago bo thur du gtugs so// kye kye ga
'dren ma rungs pa rnams 'angs pa'i ngag nyon cig/ doju kun tu 'abazhi rab tu'abal/ kun tu rab tu 'bar bas khyed kyi skyo po gshegs sar/ ngas phal pasar pa can rnams kyi
gsang sngags kyis lha'il stongakha'adulog 'drena rnams bcom pa dang/ gtubs pa dang/ brdungs lu dang/ gzare ba dang/ bskums g.yonapa dedran par gyis shag nga'emathu
dang [$ ]brtson 'grus dang/ pha rolaganonapachanangodran ng 'akyisashige/ gang ngu'i gsang sngags 'dzin cing 'don pa dang/ sgrub pa dang/ des parubyed pad 'gagasam tshol cige tal sprus
pa 'a ma gras ngan pa za'adarung/ sha za'ang rung/ grongag chon na sud kyang rung ste/ rig pa'i mchog la sogs pa rig pa thams cad sgrub pa grogs mtshol cig/ zanab+ba ba'i tsho'ang kham
dung la sngags kyis btab ste dbul bar bya'o// nyim shar ba'i tsholan bdun brjod nang du'i phyi bzhin du rtag tu 'brang// log 'dren rnams kyang gragasami tshol lo// dpalasngags/
nyadang/ sha dang/ til dang/ sran chan dang/ panatshoyang rung/ snum skur pa rma tadang/ la phug kyang rung ste/ thams cad zar bran kyang ngade'irig sngags 'dzin nanga' thams cad 'grub
par 'gyur// gangapa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa niba'ab mayonepa za shong bya ba ma yin pa byed du zin kyang/ dral gang gsalog 'dren rnams grogasatshol b.labartun 'khod par mi 'gyur
ba'i gsang sngags bdab bstanapar bya'o// rig sngags 'chang sgrub pa na gangadulug 'dren rnams kyis glags rud par mi 'gyur ba'i gnas kyang bstan par bya ste/ nges par byas pa lan glugs
tshel ba'abartunapar mi 'gyur ro// nges par gnas pa la'ang gnas nias gnas su 'gro ba nagom ba rer laga'adrena rnams khrugs tshelanga'i phyi 'khod pa yod do// leg 'dran sa'i spyi phud ces
bya ba gang dang sa brtol nas 'byung ba'ang yod do// de la bgags kya mtshonama'ang bshad par bya ste/ dadagan gom pa rim 'dzin par byed do// dadag gis zin nabagags su 'gyur te 'a 'akyi bar
'gyur ngebargyal ba dang/ skyug ba dang/ mgo 'khor bar 'gyur ro/ log 'drend dgan bsod namasakyang zad pa byed d/ log 'dren rnams kyis reg pa tsam gyis lha longs spyodastong gi
bab dupha ro'agatuphyin pa drug bsags pa'i bsod nams kyi phupo'angashal bar rlog par badang/ rig sngags 'chang rig sngagasosgrub ba'i bsod nams zad parubyed de/ de nas rig sngags rnams
'grub pa 'gyur ro// dbas na gi sngags 'chang gis lus kyi ya las shes par bya// maradang sra rtsi pog gis bdeg nyid bdug par bya'o// danas lega'adren dedag gis gtong bar
'gyur ro// gangapa'i gsang sngags 'dzin pa de lanaglags tsho'abar brtunaparami 'gyur ro// dbasan rig sngags 'changags rig pa'i mchog dran parabyas na/ dmanyes par gyur pas 'dzem/
ba'i bzhin gyis dngos grub myur du'ubyin pa'i byed d/ log 'dren rnams kyis ma mthong bar grub pa ma'agyur// log 'drenasa'i spyi phud ces bya ba rnams kyimtshan nyid rdzogs so//
'go 'dran multar g.yo ba zhes bya ba dadaganamun gnas te/ gasngags 'chang khrus byed na 'dzin par byed do// dudag gi mtshan ma 'byung stesams 'khrug par byed de/ 'dod
pa la lharasams pa dang/ brubasagazi'i ring kha brasa'a mngon parachags pa dang/ 'jigs pa'isems skye bar 'gyur ro// de bsan rig sngagasachang gis bdud rtsi bus sbyor dran par
bya ste/ dran ng tsamagyis lega'adrena rnams 'a che bar 'gyur ro// donas rig sngags 'chang gis snying rje'osems bskyed par ba// rig pa mchog dran par bya'o// de dran pa tsam gyis
'bras bu che bar 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi lha de dag gis leg 'dran rnams myos nga mthong nas dgakha'isims kyis dngos grub myur dusbyin par byed do// lag 'dren tshultar
g.yab zhes bya ba rnam kyimtshan nyid rdzogs so//// loga'adran rig sngags kyi lha'amangaga gzhugar zhes bya ba rnams zhir thucha bste/ de dag narigasngags 'chang rig sngags
las ldab 'dzin ng rabyed de// zinapa gyur na lus kyi tshul las rtogs par ste/ lus tshobaca'agyur/ dngad bar 'gyur/ sdog pa'i sems 'abyubur 'gyur// dus rig
sngags 'chang gis da dug phyi gzhale ba bya ste/ gtsugapuda' phyal 'dug pa thams cad spyin zhing/ rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na/ phyin chad lega'adrend dug gug
tshol ba la brten par mi 'gyur te/ dga' bar gyuranas dngos grub kyang sbyin par byed de// lag 'dren 'di dag kyang rig sngags kyi lcathams cad kyi phyi bzhin 'brang zhing gnas pa yin no//
rtag tuglags tshol ba'ang yin te/ su zhig sngags grubar// su zhig sngags 'don nga// sumachodang byed pas de la bgags kyang byepa 'dunab zlog par byed d lela'ang 'jug par byed de/
de bsan rig sngags 'chang gis ma legs su kha bltasal rtag tumu khyorogagator nas khro bo'i rig sngags kyang lanabadunabarjod ng ra bya ste/ 'di skad du bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba rig sngag
drag mo zhes bya ba sgrub kyis/ khyed yad dag 'bar gyis shig ces kyang smyos shig/ dus thams cad dud skad skyas nas da thog 'dran rnams dga' zhing mgu yid dga' bar gyur//
dngos grub sbyin 'byed tsangesamasakyang dang ba 'gyur// grub pa'itsho'anganang rim legs su kha bltasal thal mo sbyar nas rig sngags brjod d/ 'di skadadu bdagame 'de zhes
bgyib rig sngags che gam zhig sgrub kyis/ khyedade dag 'bar gyis shig ces kyang smosashege/ de nas gtsug phud 'phrul sogs pa leg 'drenadadag nyid du'adub 'gyur/
rig sngags 'chang gis khro bar byaso'akhyedam 'gulatsug cas smosashig/ de nas lega'adrend dgu bcings shing gzir bar gyur tadangos grub myur dusbyin par byed do// log 'dren
rnams dgrolaran yid kyis bya'o// lega'adren lha'i madrag gzhug ces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyidardzogs so// 5 lega'adrona'ajig rtenamo tog ces bya ba rnams
ni gang gi tshe rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub cing me tog 'bul ba nade'i tshog 'dren dadag gisa'adzin byed de lag 'dran dadaganyid kyang me tog gi khongasasu 'jugatsang gnas/
phyis debasan rig sngags 'chang gis thogamanyid dume tog de dag rig sngags 'chang bzlas brjod byed bzhin du blang bar bya'o// blangs nas gu gu'agyi bdugangs bdugs te/ donas
lha la yul lha rnams yi dedag 'baka'agyurar// bad bag tu'agrub pa la'agyur/ bdug pasamakhadugasapa lhad dga' lag badran rnams kyis gnod par 'gyur
ta' grubalarami 'gyur// log 'dren 'jig rtan matogaces bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogasaso///log 'dren zas su dri bu ba zhes bya ba de dganarig sngags 'chang dril
rgyu rig pan 'dzin par byed de/ susnyi'ig sngags 'chang gisadri dag lha phul lha de dag sems dngang mdAcingargyakyis phyogs pa ba'agyurata/ lag 'dren de rnams m thabs 'phang ba 'gyur zhing
rig sngags 'chang 'grub par mi 'gyur// da bsanarig sngags 'chang gis thog ma nyid du khro bo'i bzlas brjod byed bazhin du u0f74brakhar bya'o// des laga'adrenade dag 'byaratarmasapar yang
gyu'o// danasakhalha de dag dris tshim par byas bas dga' ba' sams kyis dngos grubatsal to// leg 'dren zas su dri zaba rnams kyi mtshonanyidaN+Dagasaso//leg
'drenanag pa zhes bya ba rnams nibadugab nyidalas 'byung ste/ gang gi tsharig sngags 'chapal 'badug pa 'bul band tsho'adzin par byed d// log 'drenagyis zin pa'i mtshan nyid nin pa'i m
pa dang/ rig sngags gtong bar 'gyur te/ bdug pa mthong bsalho 'phang ba 'gyur zhing dngos grub 'grub pa mi 'gyur ro// de bsanarig sngagasa'achang gisathogamanyid du lag pa g.yon bas
mar byas la kham phor gyi nang nas bdug pa phul nad phyin chad 'tshig 'drena rnams 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// bdu bdas kyang lhathamasacad tshom bar bya'o// lha des kyang dngos gruba myur du sbyin par
byed d// nag po dang zas su dri babani mchonanyidagacig go nag po zhes bya baomtshan nyidardzogs so///log 'drenagatsug phud gtsug pa zhes bya ba rnamasu nimathu chazhing
brtson 'grus chab// log 'drenade dag kyang mar me'i me lcanyid las 'byung ste/ dbasan rig sngags 'chang gis thogamanyidadu'adiltar bya ste/ ras dkar po las snying po byas tam miganyis/
sbangonas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du kha thur dubastan te bzhag/ rig sngags kyalanabargyudabargyabarjod n log 'dren thams cad kha thur du bltas ta 'khod pal 'gyur ro// rig sngago
kyang bde blag tu grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub pa thams cad la'ang thog mnyid dulas dedag bya'o// log 'drenagatsug bud gcig pa zhes bya ba rnams kyi mtshan nyid rdzogs so//
bcom ldan 'das gang su log 'dren rnams 'dzin pa'i gyur ba dang/ gang durig sngags 'chang rnams kyis dngos gruba'agrub pa ra'agyur ba'ilog 'dren rnams kyi gnas bdag gis bshad
lags so// bcom ldan 'das log 'dren thams cad kyi srog mthar thug par brtse b.lasa'adi'ang bshad la'atsholalo// sgrub pa'i tshorig sngags 'chang gis rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
skyang tshul gyis byugs la/ karangashing gisamesbatshul/ ka ra 'am tog ba dag gi khrag gi nang dub stugs pa'i sreg blug nyishu rtsa gcig gis spyin sreg bya ste/
las de byas nas lug 'dren thums cad bcing po zhes brjod nabatsas bar 'gyur// log 'dren thams cad kyi mthar thugapar gyis shig ces brjod lego 'dren thams cad 'biba'agyur ro//
bangs pa las bkrol 'daud kyis bya'o// las gzhan dag kyang 'byung ste/ bsrung bar byana'an bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus mgo bor blugs sa// mtshams gcad na lan nyi tsa
gcig bzlas brjod byas pasing ldeng gi phurabus khya'o// gdon dbaban tahazhes bya ba dang gu gul gyi bdug pas bya'o// dug las gso bar byanas gol lam yal gas bya'o// gdon gros
parubyaname tog dkabos lan bdun bzlas brjod bya ba 'am gu gulatshes bdug par bya'o// dgra bsladapa' dodar sanim gyi zhag brgyadal zhag gcig sgrub byas te/ rdordzakhro bo'i
dkyil 'khoraskyang nul gyis byugasanas bri yang ku'i shing gis me sbar taphubama'i sbyin srog lan brgyadastong byas/zhag bdunagyis 'bros par 'gyur/ dgra gisad par 'dod n dur khrod du
sol rdo rje khro bo'i dkyil 'khor skyal nul gyis byugasaba'adebusasu salas gzugs byas pa de'i khar dur khrod kyi shing gisame spar te/ musakagyi sbyin srog lan brgyad stong byas nadam
0 thag tudagra'achab ka'agyuralo// mar gyi ngozhag brgyad la gan jo rje'i mdun du kakaku'ametog dus gsum dubargya rtsa brgyadazhag bdun gyi bar dusbyin sreg byas nakhrag 'dzag pa 'gyur/ 'phagro
b.lag na rdo rje'i mdun dumachod byas takamara'ame tog dkarapo stong rtsa brgyadal 'bar 'gyur ro// de nas skyes ba dbudamadadabang du bya khatha'adodanam dan las gzugs byas ti/ ma da
na'itshom bdunagyis gnad rnams subatabal tshab gsum gyis snying kharab kang nas zasakyi rams kyang rkangaparab tsugs la spyi bor phyungasko/ zhag bdunagyi bar dudus gsum dubazlas brjod
byed bzhin dusengalceng gi me srag cing dus gcig kyang lan brgyartsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pa'i mjug tunyag gcig sbyang byas med pa cherangs te/ lan ba stong bzlas brjod byas na
gyes par ngabudamed dbadu'agyur ro// mgyi bzhag bzhi zhagagacig sbyang ba byas te/ laganadirje'imadun dubol ba'i shing gis me sbal/ kang ka ta'i yamasregangashing yungasamar gyi
nang dubaslugs pa brgyad stong gis sbyin srug byusan tanarare re thob par 'gyur// yugs mo dbang du bya bar 'dod yaratshungozhag brgyad nas brtsams zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du
bar ma'amo togakhargyu rtsa brgyud kyis 'gan rdo rje'akhasmananadabang du 'gyur ro// bumo dbangadabye ba'adod nazhugagasum sgang bcas tayaragyi tshos btsugasams sa'adod pa'i lha'i
gzugs byas te/ 'di'i khag 'bras kyi spyone srog lan brgyadastong byas n bu mo dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas mdzub mo bsgrub pa'i don zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mar gyi ngo
zhag bcuba'i dur khrod dusong nas b.lang galce de sa la ma lhubs dkyil 'khor skyang tshulagyisakhyugasate/ dkyil 'khor gyi dbus ma'i thodapa ma chagamanyams ba khazha golatsananganadamar po'i
T+Tha chus gtor nasamatog dmar pos mchodal/ de nas sgrub pa posamadzub mos g.yabasanas gang gi tsho thodapa 'gu'an de'atsho'agrub par 'gyur// gangal mdzubamos bsdigs pa da dbar du
