'gyur ro// de nas gtor dbyung bar 'dod name'ispyin sreg gi thabatulcags bzhag pa blangs pa las rdo rje byas la/ rdo rjed b.lanag gi skudang sa dkris tam gyi ngo zhag bcubashi zhag
gcig sbyang ba byas nas/ lag na rdo rje'imadun du rdo rje de lan brgyabazlas brjod byas nade'i tsho'agrub par 'gyur ro// bsgrubasanas kyang gtir gangan yod pa der bzhag pas rdo rjes gterado
bangs 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas khro bo bzlas brjod byid bzhin du byung bar bya'o// de ste med rdo rdzonyid 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas gshad byed basrang 'dod namar gyi ngo zhag bcu
bal zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdorje'imadunadudur khrod kyi shengegasamo sbal/ b.langag shas spyanasreg byas pa dang/ ji tsomanama'i thabanas gshad byed 'byung bar rgyu
gal yid kyis bsams pa de bskyabs pa 'gyur// mi nad 'byung bca' redanamar gyi ngazhag bcubs padur khrod du song ste dur khrod kyishing gsamasgrasal/ sgenamor byungazhing/
bshigasU til dang bsres pa'i yungs kar gyis brgyad brgyasbyin sreg byas ng min 'byung bar 'gyur// 'phags pa lag nardo rje'i mdun dupad+ma'i sbyin srog lan stong rtsa brgyad byas zhib 'gyur
ro mimang po gzhig par 'dod natshos grangs dang rgyus ya nga bdamasi'atshol/ sbyang ba'ang byag dgos pa khubo nyide mchog tu brtsam par bya ste/ dur khrod du song la dur khrod kyi shing gis
mel laspegamor byung shing sgra bshig ste/ nam pa'ims bsregs pa'i dur khrod kyi thol ba'i sbyin sregalana brgyad song byas n mapo 'jig par 'gyur ro// zhib 'a dod nasna ma'i me
tog zhodang/ sbyang tshudang/ mar nang du sprugs pas lan brgyudabang nasrog byas n zhu bor 'gyur ro// rdo rje khro bo bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gyi chog rdzogasaso//
dran sama mdzad kyi dag patshangs pas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'daskad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdud rtsi thabs sbyor gang gis log 'dren rnams kyi gsang ba'a gnas a'adid bshad r/
nibartson 'grus dang/ mthudang/ phathol gnob lags so// bdag gis kyang de bzhinagshegs pa'i sngagasa rnams kyi dngos grub rnams kyis dadu/ gangagis rig sngags rnams
grub pa dang/ gang gis mi 'grub pa yongs su zhu bar 'tshol lo// de nas com ldan 'das kyis/ tshangs pachen 'kha ba dkod ces bka' stsal to// tshangs pa chen po gang
khyod sems can thams cad 'khanapa'i phyir zhugs te/ dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ 'grubapa mi 'gyur bde bzhin gshegs pa la yongs su zhu bar byed pa legs legs so// tshangs
pa chen po khyod la rig sngags rnams kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'grub dang/ 'grub pa'i m 'gyus 'isgru bshad rab ste/ 'jug par bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa gang yanang dang/ tshangs pa chen po'adzom
kha bdang/ rigasngags la smed pa gang yin pa de 'an rigasngags 'grub bar m 'gyur/ mi bzad pa'i las byed ng bam/ sdig pa'i ngang tshul can nam/ brdzun ther ba'am/ rig sngags gcod
dam phurabusa'adebs pa g.yon pa de la'ang rig sngags 'grub par ma'agyur ro// tshangs pa budachub kusems yongs su 'dzin pas naayidakyis kyang lcagazhan la phyag mi bya'o// gsal pa/
ba bcom ldan 'das dmidalags s// bka' srulapa/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bum ga byang chub kyi semayongs su 'dzin pasalha gzhan l phyag byas nabyang chub kyisoms yungasasu 'dzin pa/
yin pa'i phyid la lhadem dadapa'iphyirati/ de'iphyirades kyang rig sngags 'grub rami 'gyur ro// dud 'gror skyes pa rnams la 'jug par byed pa gang yin pa dang/ sbrul 'dzin pa dang/ khas
rtswa gcod par byed pa gang yin ng de la'ang rig sngags 'grub pa'i m 'gyur// pad+madang khya mchog la rkang sa reg par byed de la'ang rigyi sngags 'grub pa mi 'gyurar// tshangs pa gang gis rig
sngags 'grub par mi 'gyur ba dusamador bstan yin no// de nas imajed kyi bdag bas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'adusasangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
rnams da lta sems can dag bde blag tu'agrub par bgyiba'a gnas a rnams ston pa thugs rje che lags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshas pa 'a 'daskad cesabaka' stsal to// tshangs pa
gang dag la ge sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur ba'i phyogs lagatsam zhig khyod la bstanapar ste/ sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dga' bgangayin pa dpa dang/ dge ba bcu'i
las lamadang ldan pa gangayin pa dgadang/ phalo gus pa dang/ mal gus pa gang yin pa dang/ rig sngags lamachod pa byed cing rig sngags la bkur sti byed g.yonang dang/ gsang sngags 'dzin
parabyed pa gang yin pa dang/ 'byung po'i zas ngan pa dang/ til smras pa ma tho ba dang/ sems can thams cad legs par lta pa gang yin pa de lani rig sngags 'grub pama'agyurar// de nas mimajed
kyibadag po tshangs pa dag 'azhing mgo 'ayi rangs te rab tu dga'anas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag
dgis kyang lagan jo'acho ga rgyas pa la gang gis rig sngags 'chang rnams bsrung ba'i gsang sngags dbul bar 'tshal la// bka' stsal pa/ tshongs pachen po gang khyod kyis sam
can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir bsams pa shodacigashod cig/ khyod la de bzhinagshegs pa/sa gnang ngo// de nas mimajed kyi bdag po tshangs pas lag na rdordzol gsang sngags pulang namorany+tsatA
masu nam shacha badzrapAni// ma hAyak+ShasanA pa tis/ tad+ya thA/ namash+tsa dakloNi/ a tini ro a sa b+hig ya/ mamadapyidanatso/ A tar sa/ bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'din pasaMm
@# gyis 'bebs badran rnams las thar par 'gyur ro// 'di dag gsa rnams 'byung ste/ bsrung ba'onabadun bzlas brjod byed pa'i spyod pas bya'o// mtshams gapyad pa dang dug bcing bde'i nang rgyal brgyud
bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o// dugalasagasobani yal gas bya'o/ (rgyagazhom banichusabya'o// dbab pa ni gu gul gyis bdugasar 'am chus bya'o// gdon bsing ba dang/ gdon skyodapanamathe
bos bya'o// gdon 'khor d gzhug panomadzub mol bzlas brjod byas tabasdigs par bya'o// skyes pa dang bud med dbang du byanayar gyi tshos gcig nas bsnums te/ zhag bdun gyi bar dudus
gsum dasnama'i me tog stong rtsa brgyad kyis lag na rdol bsnun nadabang du 'gyur// bum pa la lan brgyad brgyarab sngags tabadag nyid khrus byas na log 'dren thams cad kyis gtong ba'agyur ro//
rigasngags sgrub pa'i tsho'agags zhibar bya lan bdun bzlas brjod byas ra'i labagatsangams 'o// gzhan la bgegs 'byung 'dod narig sngags 'changagang ges nub mo'i rig sngags sgrub pa de da
kyisanubamolog nardo rje'i mdun du kang kata'i yamasrogashing brgyad brgyas spyanasragabyas na/ pha rol la bgegs 'byungabar 'gyur/ 'phags pa lagan rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags lon brgyud brgya

bzlas brjod byas n lam duyang dag pa jit+tab bzhin du sbyin par 'gyur/ gzhag pa'i dod na laganarordzo'i mdun du zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du lha la phul ba'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin sre bya'o
rims kyis 'debs parubu mgyi zhag brgyadan zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du ma shAt+tharishing gisame sbaranas yungs kar khrag gis bsgos pas lan stong brgyad sbyin srog
byas n de ma thag turimasakyiso 'debs par 'gyur ro// dkor gzhag bdun gyi bar dudus gsum du phubama'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyadabya'o// gdon gzhig pala'adod na gdon gyi mdun du til
dang thal ba'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyadabyas nagadanagyi rigs 'jigs par 'gyur ro// gdonamadongs par byan zhim thig le'i ma sbyin srag brgya rtsa brgyad byas namados pa 'a gyur ro// yungs
karakhyoragang btags te'aphags pa lags rdo rje'imadunangulan stong rtsa brgyadabazlas brjod byas naslar gshags 'gyed ngal lan thabs pa 'gyur ro// nor 'dod pa na yar gyi ngo zla ba skalazhag
dgacig sbyang ba byas te/ lagan rje'i mdun dunim pa'i shing gis me sbar nas til gyi sbyin srogastongam brgyad byas n tinar re thob par 'gyulo// de nas mdzubamo bsgrub
bca'adod nam gyi ngozhag brgyadol zhag gcig sgrub byas te/ khang stong ngam dbang phyogs su budamedakyi chomtshan dumadzubamakhatsugs tarig sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas n 'grub
paba'agyurata/ de nas ga'amadzub mos bsdigs pa dadabang du 'gyuro// gos 'dodonayang a gyi ngos brgyudazhag gcig sbyang byas te/ ltab nub tsam duchu'inang duzhugs 'aka ra wIr
ka'am tag brgyadabargya pul nagos phrugs re rathob par 'gyur ro// kumachod pa tshos lnga'azhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ grog mkhar gyi steng duso la de 'dug nas rigasrags stongartsa brgyad bzlas
brjod byas te/ danas sbrul mthong ba de la tshegamozhig gi thad du song la zo zhig ces smos shig/ phyir gson yid kyis byaste/ gcig busagaso nusakyi/ gzhan sus kyang gso mi nus so//
tshongs pa'i chog rdzogasas///denas rgyal po chen po bzhisabcom ldan bas kyi zhabs gnyis 'phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das 'di skad ces gsol to// bsem
ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang rig pa mchog sgrub pa la das grub stsalababa'atshagate/ bgags gzhil ba'igasang sngags kyang bshad par 'tshal// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
parigs kyi bu dag sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyi khyed kyis shod cig/ de nas rgyal bo chen po bzhes bcom ldan 'das dang/ laganade rje'i zhabs gnyis l phyag 'tshalanas tshigamathun par gsang
sngags bshad pa/ moran+natrayAya/ many+tsaNAbadzrapA Naya/ ma tAyak+ShasonApa taye/ tad+ya thA/ u grwaya swA hA/ a tiu grwa yasA/ u gru ba Ayas/ a u grwa bi yA ya swA hA//
u grukro d+hanAyasA hA/ a ti u gu kro d+hanAyasatwA/ tsaN+DarongaNA ya swA hA/ ro dram nAya satA/ prahar mdzopa taraNisatwA/ aTaTim Tim tinihaste tA/ bcom ldan 'das 'de dran pa/
tsam gyis gdon thams cad pa' bye bar 'gyurar// yi dgas thams cad ng/ sha zathams cad dang/ grul bum thams cad dang/ 'byung po thams cad dang/ gnod spyin thams cad 'byor bar
byed de'agum pa yaba'agyur// danasajigesngagos 'dilas rnams 'byung ste/ dbabab byananizhim thig 'dems bya'o// gdon thamasacad mnyabar byan gos bsreg par bya'o// gdon
gyis zin pa'i lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i gtun shing gis bsdigs par bya'o// gdon 'bros par byan du khrod kyi sel ba'agazugs khyas te/ mtshonanonapas bcad na gdonatshongos
'debasashi'abros par gyur ro// gdon gyimadun lan tshodang semo'i sbyin sreg 'an brgyad brgyabasan gdon gyis tshogs 'debs par 'gyur ro// b.lang galceb las gdon gyi gzugs byas
te lcags kyi thur mas mig tubatsugs yod bca'agyu'i// gdon gyi mdun du ngu bama'i nasrog stong brgyad byas na/ gdonagyi rigs brlag par 'gyurar// gdon
gyimadun dumalesham gyi srog blugasanyi rtsa gcig spunasrogabyas nagadon khragatuskyug par 'gyuro// byis pa gdonagyis brin bal bdugasapasagatong ba'agyu'o// nyiste mi gtong nas
gtubs bdang/ lug ru dang/ sgog skya dang/ sbrul gyi pags pa brjes pa rnams kyis bdugasanadamathatugatong bsa'agyur// byis pa gdon gyis zin pa rnams 'bazlos brjod byas pa'i
nasna lnga'i skud pas kyang gatong ra'agyuralo// bdog bsrung lan gsum bzlas brjod byas paN+Dalabasar+ya'o// pha rolobangan lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'iskud pas bya'o// mtshams
gcad galanagasum bzlas brjod byas pa'i gsog mas bya'o// sprul bsladanalan gsum bzlas brjod byas pa'i chudang thalabs brdabs bar bya'o// maro bcan thams cad kha bcing bar bu ba
dang smad bacing bar bya ba yi dkyus bya'o// gtar bcing nalo nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pa'isi ldong gi phur bus btabanagater bcings par 'agyurar// changs rung bar
dunati'agyisrag khrugs lanabadun sbyin srag bya'o// nya brgyad namam pa'im lalan bdunabasngags tamatsho'i nang du boran nya'abros par 'gyur// dud 'gror skyes pa rnams nad dgaNazhi
bar 'dod par byan/ lagan rdo rje'i gzugs coms bkrus la bzlas brjod kyang stong rtsa brgyad byas nani der 'gyur ro// dusam yin par chadabab pa 'dod na yang yar gyi ngotshos lnga lazhig
gcag sbyang ba byas taM/ lteb nub pa tsam du chunang dazhugs nas pad+ma'i sbyin srogakhrange 'an dus ma yin par charayaM 'bab par 'gyur ro// zhi bar 'dod na yar gyi nga tshosabargyad la zhagagacig
sbyang ba byos la/ 'gan rdo rje'i mdun du byang chub kyi shing gi bud shing gis me sbar nas ut+pala'i sbyin srog stong rtsa brgyad byas n zhi ba'agyurar// dug gzhom par 'dod n ma ku shasakhyago/
dugo bsalamakhu tshur gyis bya'o// gdon brar gzhuganalanabadun bzlas brjod byas pa'i ab rata'am tog gso bya'o// g.yul 'gyed na a pa ra tsi'i me togalamanyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas
brjod byas te mgol btags nagazhan gyisam thub par 'gyur/ gung gi tshor sngags 'chang 'ag sngags 'grubapar 'dod nazhagagasum sbyang ba byas l nang par bum pa gsar pa bzhi blangs
tanus kazhas rig sngags 'chang gis phyem red leshamadakarapo 'alananyeshurtsagacig khus brjod byas te/ bumapa redag gin du blugasakhumar dedag 'phag cing sdudapa 'gyuran rig sngagA
'chang gis rig sngags 'grub par shes par bya'o// des me'agrubanani'iphag par mi bya'o// 'ag sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub panazhag gcig sbyang bar byas la salas gzugs byas pa
bkod de me'i phyogs su kha dog dmar po gzhag pa bya'o// gshin rje'i phyogs su ni bdogs pa// tshulha'i phyogs su sngakhasungs so// rlung gi phyogs su ni nag po ste//
char 'di degaso so'a gnas ji lta ba bzhin dudagod par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang bag sngagasasgrub pa natsasti bgegs kyi gzugs dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ dus grub phal sgrub gshin rje'i phyog/
nas yi dugs monag mo zhes bya ba debagogs byed// stag gi gzugs su ston pa dang/ wa'i gzugs su 'tsho bar byed do// de lta la sogs pa bgegs byed pa dang/ rig sngags 'chang gis
gshin rje'i phyogs su lan bdunabazlas brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnunanabakagasa rnams med baba'agyuyo/ gshin rje'i rgyal po'i g.yogayi dgasaku mu da zhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba yi
dgas sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ kumu da de'ang rig sngags 'chang de dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na bgegs byed d/ ku muda'i bgegs 'byung ba'ang la lanAyi dgas kyi tshul/ 'khalanasrin po'i
gzugs/ 'ganakhyi'imago can/ la nirngamo'amago can/ la'azhibong bu'i mgo can gyi yid gasate/ de dag 'ongaba'itsho'angatatazhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cinges mda brgyad g kha nas 'byin
par byed do// dela'ig sngags 'chang gis gshin N+Da'i phyogs kyi gzugs lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thalabs bsnunand mthag tu bgegs thams cad med par 'gyur ro// rgyal po de'i
phyi bzhin 'brang bsgodaponamasna chadamazhes khyab rdzu 'phrul zhingamathu che ba zhig yod de/ snachadamadan bgags chen pa byed pa yin no// de'ang des gasang sngags kyis bzlogapar minus// de'ong
bdang skar mda' ltung ba ston cing lcags pa'i ng lenataM/ snachad ma des dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams seng ldeng gi phur bus btab patshamtshan gyis 'byin par byed d// dkyil 'khor gyi[︽]tshams thal
bsabacad panabusaMbasamed par byed// dkyil 'khor gyi mtshams chu bcad pan mchilamasamed par byed d// yid kyis dkyila 'khor gyi mtshamakhacad pan bzhinagyisa'abral bar byang ngo/
de lta bu'i tshul dag gis dkyil 'khor 'jig par byed pa dang/ de la rig sngags 'chang gis myur du sna chama'i ming nas smos te/ sring mo sna dam khyod 'ongs pa legs so legs so zhes byas nas/
lanabadunabasngags pa'is ldeng gi phur bu sorab zhi pagashin rje'i phyogs kyi snying khar gdab bo// de nas snachadamades 'bod kyi sgra phyung nasamed par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kya'agrub par
rig sngags 'chang rig sngags sgrub pananistama'i phyogs nas bgagasakyigazugasadag 'byung ste/ dngos grub
phal sgrub paname'i phyogs kyi rgyalango'i g.yogamosrin mo rtsod mowanazhes byab yod de/ danabagegs byed yin// srin mo rtsadachos de'abya'i gzugs su ston par byed ngangaromi snyan nga'ang
'byin par byed do// de cigasngags 'chang gisama'i phyogs gzugasa' lanabadunasngagasakyis bsngags pa'i yungs kar gyis bsnunan med pal gyur// dngos grub

chen po sgrub pan rgyal po de'i g.yog srin mo mi sdug bzhes bya ba rdzu 'phrul che ba srin po sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ mi sdug pa de'ang rig sngags 'chang la 'gags byed pa yin te/ mi sdug pa de'ong ba
dang tu mi sdug pa de'i rnam nga'i srin po dag dang/ lag khyim go can dag dang/ la la glang po che'i mgo can dag dang/ lar seng ge 'i mgo can lta bu'i bgegs kyi rnam ba dgatusnang ste/ lal
ni brag 'phenapor byed/ la la ni 'byung bo'i 'khrul 'khor ston cing 'jigs pa'i sgra dag kyang 'byin te/ skaramada'akha dag kyang kha nas 'byin par byed do// de la 'ag sngags 'chang gisame'i
kyi phyogs kyi gzugs la lan bdunabasngags pa'ithol bos bsnyenan bgegs rnams med pa 'gyur ro// rgyal po de'i g.yog srinapo so dkazhes bya ba mthu chazhing brtson 'grus che bzhig yod de/
sodakarade'ang rig sngagasa'achang de lanamagung gi thun la bgags byed do// de'ang gsang sngags kyis bzlog par ma nus te/ de'od dang du 'bad kyi sgra chen po ni 'byin/ ri rnams n g.yo/ ri
dgasa rnams ni gar byed/ wa rnams ni/ glang po che rnams ni skad 'byin te/ de'i sngags 'chang gis me'i phyogs kyi bgags yin pa shes par bya'o// so dkar de'ang bus pa'i
gzugs kyis sgra 'byin cing 'ong ngo// yang lha'i gzugs kyis 'ongs te/ des kyang bltas pa tsam gyis dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed do// de la rig sngags 'changagis myur du
lan bdunabasngags pa'i sibaldeng phur busobazhi pasama'i phyogs kyi gzugs la btab ste// 'di skadadaso dkabcom mo zhes kyang smras na/ pu' bod kyi sgra chen po phyun gnas med par 'gyur
ta gsang sngags kyang 'grub par 'gyurar// me'iphyogasakyi chog rdzogs so////rig sngags 'chang gi sngagasasgrub ngan ste rlung gi phyogasanas srod tshabagegs
kyigazugs dag 'byung ste/ dngosagrubalu0f8bsgrub ban rlung gi phyogs kyi rgyal po'i g.yog mo so ma zhes bya bzhag yod pa de'ang bgegs byed de/ mar me gsod cing lha bshos skye bas 'bags
par byed do// de'i phyiragazhi'akha bya ba ni rlung gi phyogs kyigazugs la lan bdunabasngagasapa'i yungs kar gyis bsnunan bgegs rnams med pal gyur ro// dngos grub chen po sgrub pa na rlung
gi phyogs kyirgyal po'i g.yog gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po drug khri'i bdag bzhag yod de/ tshub ma gcig pa zhes bya ba de'ang rig sngags 'chang de la'ajang gi thun la bgegs byed do// tshubs gtseg
pa po'ang 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can yin te/ ched 'i ga'awa gzugs/ ched 'ga'anistag gi gzugs/ ched 'ga' ni khyu mchog gi gzugs dang/ gzugs sna tshogs su bdag/
nyid ston par byecing/ ched 'ga'anihahazhes bya ba'i sgra 'byin cungaskumada' brgyadag ltung bar byed/ gnam lang grubabar byed// da larigasngags 'chang gis rlung gi phyogs kyi
gzugasa' lan bdun bsngags pa'i thilabasabasgyunanabagegs rnams medaba'amo// rgyal po'i sgo dbonamalcags kyudakar mo can zhes byabamathuNazhing rdzu 'phrul che'abagags khyod nga chen mazhig
yod de/ de'angagasang sngags kyis bzlog khason te/ de'i nam gung gi thun la 'ong// de 'ong ba dang dus ma yin pa'i char 'babacing 'brug kyang risgrog gnam yang grub pa'i byed de/
lcags kyu dkuram can da' ngamadog dkar zhing gzugs kyi lus bstan pas kyang dkyi 'khor 'jig par byed d// de la rigasngags 'chang gisa myur du lan bdun bsngags teseng ldengagi phur bu sor bzhi
bas rlungagi phyugs kyi gzugs la btab ste/ lcags kyudakar mocan bcomamanyes kyang smras n pu 'bod kyi sgrachen pophyung nasamed par 'gyur// gsang sngags kyapa'i grub par 'gyur ro// rlung
gi phyogs kyi chog rdzogs so////rig sngags 'cha'agasngagasasgrub nganamu lhaphyogasanas bgogs rnams 'byungahU~M/ dngos grub phal pasgruban chu lha'i rgyal po'i g.yog
maku mo rgyal bamo zhes bya bzhag yod// rgyal bamo de'ang srodal bgegs byadad// thog tu'olakhog skam 'dor bar khyadacing pha gu 'dzin pa byed do// de la rig sngags 'chang gis ru'i phyogs

kyi gzugs la lan bdunubasngags pa'i yungs kar gyis basmananamed par gyur ro// rgyal bo zhig yog kumo so brtsigasazhes bya bamathu chazhing rdzu 'phrul ches kru sum khri'i bdag po zhig yod de/ so brtse

dbang rig sngags 'chang de la 'jing gi thun la bgags khyadasna tshogs rnam pa mang po byed// so btsugs de dur khrodad skyes pa thams cad kyi lugs dag tu snang zhing/ kun tu rgyu dang gcer bu pa lta bu'i
bgegs kyi lugs dag tu snang ste/ de'ang du 'bod kyis chen po 'byin cing skamada' dag kyang byin par byed d// de 'go sngags 'chang gis chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugasa' lanabadun bsngags
pa sus karagyis bstan named pa 'gyur ro// tshulha'i phyogs kyi rgyal po'i sgodaponamamag sa ram zhes bya ba mthu chazhing rdzu 'phrul che babagagasatshon pa byed pa zhig yod de/ de'ang gsang sngags
kyis bzlog pa minusati/ rig sngags 'chang de rig sngags sgrub pa nanam gung gi 'bagegs byed de/ des kyang sgra phyung bas dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jig par byed ri/ me'i khe zug
kyis bgegs byed la/ skar mda' stong dag snang bar byed do// dalag sngags 'chang gisa myur du lanabadunabasngags pa'isi ldeng gi phur bu sor bzhi pas chu lha'i phyogs kyi gzugs la btab
cing 'di skad du/ migasar ma' dug cig ma na sbasana'adugacig 'dug cig ces bya bathos nas bdag ni phab bo snyam ste/ du'abodakyi sgra chen po phyung nas mad par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi
dngos grub kyang grub par 'gyur// nulha'i phyogs kyi chog rdzogs so///de bas 'jam pa'i las 'di bshad d/ rig sngags 'chang rig sngags
cha sgrub pan lan bdun bsngags bsing sdong giphur bu sor bzhib tshon sna lnga'i skud pas dkris pa/ bgegs thams cad kyi gnas su rkang pa g.yon pas mnanan bgags thams cad bcom pa dang
ris par byas pa 'gyuro// zhag gsum smyungab byas tamangagying zhag brgyadadamazhag bcupa le dbang phyug chepe'i gnas asu song ste 'byung po'i gtor ma 'du ban la/ rig sngags na brgyad brgya
bzlas brjod byas zhabagegs kyi las thams cad grub par 'gyur// bsams pas bgags thams cad yod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rtenaskyong ba rnams kyi cho ga rdzogasaso//
de nas 'jig rten phan 'dod pa// thub pa kun dang lha chen gyis// lagan rdo rje'i mdun du bdar// lhan cig tun dus par 'gyur// rim bzhin du gzi 'bar zhing// dka' thub rnal 'bar
ldan pa yi// thub pa 'ba mchog ldan pa kun// nyin mo bya khyasanasapa'od// thub pa dganathams cad dang// bde byed lha tshog salha rnams kyis// lagan rdo rje sams dpa' che/ 'byung
po kun dabang rjel zhus// 'jig rten dngos grub byed pa in// bgegs rnams dgazhig la 'byung// de dag gi ni tshog thos nas// lagan rdo rje grags pa che// dga' bar gyur nas dris pa
0/de rgyus yang ni ba bshad do// bgegs rnams ji ltar 'byung 'gyur ba// thub padag ni kun gyisanyon// lha rnams la yang lha min rnams// 'thab pa'i phyir ni ldang bltar// sams
can rnams la bgegs bya'i phyir// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'byung 'gyur// ji ltar lhais lha min rnams// g.yul du lan brgyar bcom pa dang// brgyabyin gyisanagayul bam ltar/
de bzhin bgegs rnams bcom par gyur// datsholhakun dgaragyur nas// 'jig rten grags pa de dag ni// thams cad stobs dang ldan 'gyur zhing// de dag nga rgyal dregs pas rgyas//
'jig rten don dang wa rnams kyis// brtson 'grus dang mthu bskyed phyir// bde zhing byamatsho chen po ni// gshad byed dang ni byung babartsams/ grub pa dedag rmongs pa ste// phan pa/
byas na stobs kyis rgyugs// ngargyala'adisani 'jig rtenanas// ring por ma thogs thatshom med// danas drang srong lharabs rnams// ca co'i sgra ni dbyugar ba rnams// rtsom pa chen po
skad cig tu/ 'jig rten dun grags pa 'gyur// de nas lha rnams khrub par bcas// khro ba spun gyur pan// lharab cas drang srong de dag la// lha chen gyisan tshig smras pa// chongs
[E]cas lha rnams khyed kyi mthus// brtsams pa dag nim byed cig/ de 'chang ba dang la ldan 'di// gnod sbyin tshogs kun bdag po ste// gnod sbyin bad bdag ba po// sems can kun/
00 @#// la phanapar dga'// ma sa 'di dag rlag byed ng// brtsam zhing tshar gacod nus pa yod// de nas lha ya mchoga rnams kyis// lags rdo rje dang la ldan mchog/ sbyor ba/
mnyes shing sbyoragasanas// dpung chen dgan 'i basprul pa// rgyal po'i blo gros rdo rje'i gdeng// rje'i lte ba gdong dkam// rdo rje mig sa 'og pag can// rdo rjenag ma nya che// dbang
phyag chen mo gnam ngom// drag mo rdo rjesangaga'akhri// shugs ldan m dang rdo rjecan// de bzhin bzhadamardo rjecan// gtum mo rang gablugs dngani// nyepa'i snying po las kun byed// 'byung
po srinab po nyamo// rnam pa sna tshogs ming grags pa// ma rus gdona rnams bzlog pa dang// bgagasa rnams b.rug phyir sprul par gyur// de nas dpung da dgar gyur nas/ dpal gyis/
su 'khyud pa bzhin// lagan rdo rje'i pho nyar// kun nas bskor cing 'khod par gyur// de nas rab 'bam bzad cing// 'byung po thams cad rlag byed cing// lag na rdo rje'i rdo rje de//
phyogs brgyad dag tu 'bros par gyur// dunas stobasachenubartsonachamo// pho nya mo dag songabar gyur// de nas sku gnas gdond dag/ thams cad brdungs de sems stor cing// de rjenag
mas 'jig gzir bas// bskyabs kyang rnyed par ma gyur te// rdo rje sgrogs kyis 'pham byas shing// jo rje can gyi ul dubcom// de nas de dag yid kyis su// de bzhin gshegs laskyab+bA

yang smras pa// kye kyi tshogs rnams zhib gyis// skal ba rnams lcog pa gyis// gdon kun dga' re byas shing// zhi bar gyur kyis ma gzhom zhig/ lagar darjelhas bsten pa'i//
thad du yan khrid pa gyis// mi bzad tshogs kyis de mnyananas// gdon rnams de dag thams cad ni// rnal 'byor bstanabacos mthus btulanas/ lagan rdurje'i thad du khrid// bam
ldan rdo rje ldan pa des// mthonas tsan+ti gson 'dod n// rig pa'i mchog phyag byos la// phyag rgya mthong nas bstan la gnos// gnas nas rnams thong zhig ces// gdona rnams lan
bgad de smras// de skad smras nas gdon dadag/ kun gyis tshe bstan smras pa// khyod kyi lasu 'di mchog yin te// gzhan gyis mi thub drag cing dag/ mnga' bdag khyod kyis bka' stsal pa/
de bzhin dun bgyi lapa'i tshol// sangs rgyas naskyabs su mchi// chos dang dge 'dunadabazhin te// zhil ma rungs 'dul ba po// khyod la rtag tu skyabs su mchi// sems can kun la phan
nga 'khyer// stobs chen gyis ni skyes palegs// bdag cag gi 'tsho ba yi// thabs kyi phyir yang bka' stsol cig/ de nas dpal ldan rdo rje'achang// bgad nas tshogs la smras pa/
khyod kyis blang bar bya ba dang// mi byung ba yang bstan par bya// gangadag rtag dubardzun smras dang// drin du mi gzogatsang sbyar med// byang chub samasazhi rab mas pa/ skye
bdedag rtag long/ nyidazhasogs bdapa/ mibya bdag byed pa gang// rkang pas phyag rgyu'i byed pa// skyabo dedag khakhar bgyi// niste gsod pa 'dod na// gang dag bden pa'i
tshig snyadang// drin dugathonAngengasal gnas// srog gi phyir yod byang chub sams// gtong bar mi byed rab bsdams dang// rtag tung la dad pa dang// de bzhin gsa mchog 'gasal
gas// ganga rnams ni khyim dag tu// gas rgyaladam pa rtagamachod dang// nga rig pa yi rgyal po mchog/ sgrub pa dang ni bcus brjod byad// dadagalamizhi bar gyis// yi ge bzhi pa
zhes bu yi// jarjodon yod chen po yis// gdonagang ngal dadami 'dzin// deyaspyi bo'agems par byed// rtag tung dang rigasa mchog la// da bzhinadad pa lhur byed dang// dmatshig shes pa
gang yin de// khyedakyi rtagatumachodapagyis// lagan rdo rje'i tshig 'di dag/ khyos nas kyang log 'drenanams// dga' zhing catha'i sgra byin nas// skad cig gis ni snanga'agyug/ rig
ba mchogaki daphyimalasalog 'dren 'byung po rdzogs so///las 'danadam pa'i gyur ba dang/ drag ming don yod la gzhan gyis mthub mi dag bayin te/ dngos
grub sgrub pa'itshadud pa mdang rimadab ma la rig sngags kyi rgyal pos til nag po'i sbyin srog lan brgyud brgyabyas n bgegs thams cad 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// las 'di dag ni mchog yin te//
'jig rten rnams kyi dngos grub phyir// rig mchog mgo bor bzhag nani// spyana rnams dngos grub ston par 'gyur// sangs rgyas yul dang chos spyan la// gang zhig phyag 'tshal dal
ni/ bcom ldan gsungs pa u0f7alas 'asogs// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa yi// cho ga 'didang rdo rje'i rigs// de dag thams cad 'grub 'gyur te// yul yang yid la bzhag nas ni//
dngos grub mchog bsgrub par bya// las 'di dag kyang byas nas ni// dngos grub mchog 'gyur shes par bya// gang gis nyin mo yang rung ste// zhagagacig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i
mdun dudri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa lanas ba sajamo'i bsam lhung bas lha mo'i gzugs byas te/ lag pa g.yas par rdo rje thogs par bya// de'i 'og legs su sgrub pa
bo snyim pa bzed nu'adug par bya'o// gnas rig sngags 'chang gis yid 'khasams te/ rig sngags brjod nas ni gzugs 'gul bar 'gyur na de ma thag tulas 'grub cing/
rig sngags kyang bdablag tu'agrubaste/ bgegs thams cad kyang bsams pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa 'gyur ro// yang na sgrubapa po'i lag tu dordzo byin nasa'ibadag por 'gyur ro// yang
na bcom ldan 'das malas 'od za 'byung ste/ 'dab nas phogapar gyun ni rig sngags 'chang du 'gyur zhing/ glang po che'i stobs dang ldan la rgyalca'akhyil ba dang/
nyi ma shar ba'i kha dog can du'agyurashalag tu bal gyi 'ong bupa'i gyur/ de thogasab 'ge sngags 'chang thams cad kyisomasol sgyu 'phrul dag kyang byed r 'gyur// gang gi tshe gnyid kyis
lag pa den lagri de dpag tshadagag tsamanasamagal me'i 'khobazhin du kun nas 'khor bar byed cing sad panashugs su 'gro ste/ tshol khri bzhi stong thub cinganam 'chib ri'atshobad ba can du skye
ba'agyur ro// las de byas te dngos grub kyi mchog bsgrubasan chog rgyas pa'i dngos grub sbyin par byed damasakhulabya ba bzhinen// dngos grub sgrub pa'i phyi dbang phyug chen po mdor bstan to/

de 'don chog rgyas pa'i dngos grub mchogaskyab pa bstanapo ste/ lagan rdordzo'i mdun du byang chub kyishi nga gas me sbar layungasam dang sbyarab sa'anabargya stong sbyin sreg byas na khru de'am khru gsum
tsam du dud pa'i 'a khri'i 'byung ste/ de nas tshig sngags 'chang gis rig sngags kyi rigs 'grub pa dang/ cho ga rgyas par 'grub par shes par bya ste/ de nas lasabartsam par bya'o// yid la
bsams taphurabu gsum pas bshad pa'i chog rgyas pa dang/ lag na jorjes bshad pa bsgrub par bya'o// rnab gshibs te bzlas brjod byas nadas grub kyi mchogaston par 'gyur te/
caza' nub kalag na rdorjelamachod pa khasal/ lagan rdo rje'i rnab g.yas khararig sngags lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlasabarjod byas na/ caste rmi lam du bram ze mthong na las 'grub pa/'gyur ro/ 'deg
mkhanamathon 'grub par mi 'gyur te/ da lta zhibs bsgrub par bya'o// mo gzugs gang gis mthong bdes ni rdo rje'i rigs mthong ba yin na// rnarje'i rigs mthong n las 'byung
par gyur// las byung na dngos grub kyi khachog thob par gyur te/ rasam nyams pa 'amo mkhanagasosbyong dabaldan ngs tshon ni spyin medu rasasangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs gsaram kha dog
can chos ston pa'i tshul du 'dri gzhug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yasalegs sa mo gsar kyi kha dogatsan tshosanyanapa bri'o// de'i 'og legs su gan rdo rje'imadog sngo bsangs la rgyan tham
cad kyis brgyan pas nyanaparabri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yonalegs su dbang phyug chen pomajal rgyu'i mdog can thoratsugs dngacan phan thogs kharabri'o// de'i g.yon phogs su
phur bu gsum pam tang gi lugs can chos n pa'i tshul du bu/ de'i 'ogalegasasu dbang phyug chen ngos 'dam bumada' chu'i kha dog cag thobatsugs 'chang ba'i mgol khru pa'i mtshan ma yod la mig
gsum dang ldan par bri'o// de'i drung dum tang gi rgyal po phurapa gsum pa mdog sngo bsangs rgyan thams cad kyis brgyanapa/ ma tang gi lugs su bri'o// de'i 'og legs su 'jig rten skyed
babazhi kha dog tha dad pa dang/ rgyanasna tshogs kyis brgyanab chos nyan pa'i tshul dubri'o// lag na rdordzo'i gsasunorjesde dang gtsu gnas khyung rtse zhing 'dug par bri ste/ rdo rje sngon
chagasar gyi mdog cal rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'o// gtsu gnas byung gi mdog dmalamig gsum yodapa glang patsho'i pags pa'i smad gayogs can/ klu rgyal donor rgyas kyis so
phal khagrogasal/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyanabar bya'o// khyadang dardo rje sde'ajungadu rdo rje khro bo'abalalog 'dren rnams 'dzoms shiba'athob bri'o// rig pa'i mchog 'dod dgur
bsgyur ba'i gzugasazhalanaciga mthong ba tsam gyis ngoshes pa tsam dugs lag na rdo rje'i kha nas 'byubur bri'o// gzugs de mthong n sngon gyi sdig pa thams cad las grolab par gyur
te tsu log 'drena rnams kyis kyang mtshog saso// gang 'a ma'i gzugs 'di sgrubapa des ni dngos grub mchog nges par 'grub par 'gyur ro// sgrub par 'dod pa'i rig sngags 'chang gis
zhag gsum spangs byas tazla banyal mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgyus par bya sonas gsang sngags snga ma dgagasalas rnams bya'o// 'oms bkang ba'i snod zhidang/ zhes bkangab
bzhi dang/ de bzhin du btung bdangasbyarathug gis bkang ba bzhingazhe dbul zhing 'byung po'igator ma'ang spyin no// danas rig sngags 'chang gis dngos grub kyi mtshan ma byung gi bar du
nam phyed kyi dus su me tog drishim po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lan re re glu zhing/ bcom ldan 'dasam sangs rgyas kyi yum la bsnunan mo'i gzugs 'gul bo dang/ me tog gi 'phreng ba
g.yob dang/ lhamo las 'od ze'abyung ba'agyurato/ rimo'i gzugs 'gulananadabab pa las dung/ zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa'i chog 'grub par 'gyur ro// ma tog gi 'phreng ba g.yon
nadabab pa'i rig sngags kyi chog 'grubapa 'gyur ro// 'od zerabyungananichog rgyas pa'idangos gruba mchog tu 'gyur tu/ sgrub pa gyuranardo rje'i rigs thams cad 'grupa par 'gyur ro//
'phags pa spyanas gzigs dbang phyug gdong latshanamo'i rig sngags kyi chog rgyas pa lhag ma dag kyang 'grub par 'gyurar// sto dbang phyug chen po'i cho ga rgyas ba sgrub pa 'dod n rig sngag
'chang des m togadamar bo stong rtsa brgyud rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod lar re dang sbyarato/ dbang phyug chen ngol bsnunanade'iyang dangos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur/ dbang phyug chen po 'i chog rgyus
pa'i ba'agrub 'gyuro// ci ste phur bu gsum pa'ib rgyas par sgrub par 'dod zha rig sngag+ha 'chang dus me tog nag po stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod na'adang sbyarati/ phur bu gsum pa'i
mol bstsanadab ngadangos grub rnam bgsum du'agyur te/ phurabu gsum pas byas pa'im thang gi chog rgyas pa thams cad kyang 'grub par 'gyur// sems can rnams la phan pa'i/
phyi'i/ chog bden bdagagis bshad/ khyed rnams yid dga' bzhin sa// dngos grub dam pa sbyin pa gyis// gsas rgyas kyi yumadran tsam gyis 'ong
labartsami byed na/ dngos grubakyang sbyin pa mi byed nad bzhin gshegs ral snyinga'is pa yin ti/ sakya rdorjes spyi bo dgas par bya'o// gang chog rgyas pa 'di'achang ba de la gdon thams
cad dang/ log 'dran g+gams cad dang/ sha zathams cad kyang 'byor zhing skrag par 'gyur ro// gshigachog 'das mchodab// del lha mchog rnams kyisamachod// gang zhig dngos grub
mchod dul// dayis chog lhamachod bya// gang zhig chog 'dimachod dang// thams cad rdzogasaparamachod byadang// de yi lag nardo rje yis// khashadapa bzhin du nges par 'grub// gang zhig
cho ga 'di'achas// sangs rgyas kun gyisabyin gyis brlabs// lagan dorjedapal ldan pa// de yalus kyi spyi bor gnas// yig bzhi pa zhes bya ba rig sngags kyi rgyal ra'i chog rdzogs so//
dunas bcom ldan 'das lagan rdo rje brugos phrag pa gtsabod tu gzar nas/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das ganganang dum legs su h+phalamo
sbyar ba btud nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad cesagasol to// skye bo phyi ma rnams dang/ sems can bsod nams chung ngu rnams kyi slad du rig sngags kyi rgyal bo dang/ lha thams
cad kyi chog phyim rgyas par bshad pa'i tshalan/ de bzhin gshegs pas gnang bar mdzad dugal/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad du gsol/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal/
pa/ rdo rje 'dzin rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i las phyi ma rnams ngashod cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gan rdo rjes gasngagasakyi rgyal po chen po la bsams nas las phyi ma rnams bshad do// de nas
ga sngags kyi rgyal bo mchog gi las 'byung ste/ dgon pa 'am/ ristsa mo 'am/ dben pa'i phyogs su skyang na'akhya ste/ thab rabyibs gru bzhir byas na lha bshos su sha dbul bar bya'o// gsog

byed pa rnams la zho blud do// yang nangos kun tu khrubcupa'i dkyil 'khor sbyang nul gyis byugs te/ der me sbruba'angashar phyogs su kha bltas pa'i du gnas bkang ka ta'i yam srog shing srid du khru gang
spomasasuchang pas 'khyudab/ 'phanamed pa stong rtsa brgyadazhadang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ ma gyi nang du bsrugasatadus gsum du sbyin srag bya'o// zas su phyu dang 'o ma'i bdag gur ra/ slong mo'i zas
bza'ashangalas byas te/ masmra bar 'dug tsang dus gsum du khrus byasgo/ khang pa'i shar phyogs kyi glo grog mkhar gyis las lagan rdo rje'i stegs bu khri'i phang can byas la dri dang/ me tog dang/
bdug pa dang/ lha bshos dbul zhing phonya mo'i sngags thams cad kyi las byas shing ci'abyor samachodab byas nas/ rig sngags 'chang gis bcom ldan 'das ma'i sngags kyis btab par
chus kha zas bsang gtor byas takhaza'akhar bya'o// dga' ba'i 'dod pa'i ng gsol khar bya'o// sbyin grogada' bzhaganyi shu rtsa gcig la bar dubya'o// de nas bcom
ldan 'dasalan jorjom thab de'inanas byung ngo// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa 'am rdorjestsolakhamadzod de/ rdorjed laganathogs pas laganarjod ng mthu stobasamanyam pasatsagyur/ bslu
cad du'ang thogs pa med pa 'gro baba'agyuyo// mig btsums pa'i yud tsam gyis kyang 'ogamin gyi gnas su 'gro bar 'gyur shing bsal par gnas par 'gyutaM/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyang
des bsgo'abazhin byed bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chalatshog rgyas pa'i dngos grub kyang sbyin par mdzad de/ chog rgyas par bsgrubs na las thams cad dordzobasgyur ba tsam gyis 'grub pa dang byed
ra bka'agyuratabaskal bar gnas par 'gyur// dbang dubyon gtsang sgrar byas tamachodarten lam tog dang/ sriding/ bdug pa dul zhing/ bcom ldan 'dasalan rdo rje la'ang mchod par byas la
mdun dudakyilo 'khoraskyang n gyis khyugasunasazhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum dume tog dkarapo snyim babcugastami nas sos shing/ lan stong rtsa brgyad cu brgyad bzlos brjod byas
ga laphyogasa mtshams mnarab mchod rten la boran dbang du 'gyur ro// gto dang lham yin gyi phug gang na yodapagayungs kar gyis bsnun na lha ma yin gyi phug 'khrul 'khoratshogs par
'gyushing/ gtar gyi 'khor thams cad tshogs par 'gyur te phyin par yabargyu'o/ thams cad d skudapas bsrub bya'o/ gtararung lha ma yin gyi phug gi gnas sgrub pa thams cad la
bgegs dang log 'dren thams cad med parubyakha'iphyir/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'phags pa la gan rdordzomadun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs zhag gcig sgrung
khabyas nas niam pa'i shing dang arkakhudagingagosamasgranas yungs kar dalanamousam gyis khasgosapa 'am/ mnganamar dang 'bras yos kyis 'bargyad stong spyan sugatsaste/ sas
rgyas bcom ldan 'dasalame tog dri zhim po dang/ bdug pa dang/ lhabashos dbul zhing gnardo rjela'ang mchod pa byas nas de'i 'og tu las brtsam par bya'o// donas mi'igatso bo dbang du
khya ba 'dod na'aphags pa'og na dordzo'i mdun dudakyil 'khor skyang nulakyis byugs zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du dri dang/ me tog dang/ lhubashos phulanas byang chub kyi shig
bud shinge gis ma skul 'brus yos kyi zugags sbyin sag stong rtsa brgyad rtsa brgyad byas n dbang du 'gyur to/ jisad/sapa bzhinabyed cing nor sbyin pa 'gyur ro// bram ze dbang du bya
mchog de nyidakyis til gyi spyin sreg brgya stod bya'o// rgyal 'gos lananas kyi sbyin sreg bya'o// rdzo'u rogasal ni nas dang lan mo'i sbyin sreg bya'o// dmas rigasal ni sbyar thug go
07 @#// rgyun srogabya'o// yugs sa mo dbang du na yungs kar gyi spyin sreg bya'o// bumadabang du byan musukabagyi sbyin sreg bya'o/ 'di dag la'ang de bzhin du dri dang/
ma tog dang/ lhabashes dbul zhing sbyin srag lan stong stong byas dabangadu'agyuratatha gcig par bya'o// dgralukha byan mgu zhag bcur zhi'amamar chu zhog brgyadazhagagacig sbyang ba byas te
dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa skyang nulagyis byugasanasasengalding gi khudashing gsemastsalasema'i spyin sreg lan brgya stong byas na de mthug tumad patha'agyur// dgra gsad na zhag bdun gyi khaMr du dus
gsum du dug dang khrag gnasreg stong rtsa brgyudabyas zha'achibaba'agyur// gnodasbyin dang gnodaspyin mo dbang du byan/ gnod sbyin dang gnod spyin mo phyogs gang na gnas pa dem gyi ngoshag brgyud
'azhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugasanas dri dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug spos dang/ cham phul tamangar gsum lhabashos kyang dbul// de nas angasho
ka'i budashing gsemesbagal/ ahoka'i me tog brgyadastongagi sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyurayo// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig gis rdurje'i rigs gtso bor chog gaming tsam 'dzin pa de la'ang lha
thams cad kyisazilais mnanab minusan/ gangamadonyid 'chang ba lta smos kyang ci'atshol/ danasa'ajigs pa thamasacad lan skud pal brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas pas bsrung
ba byas par 'gyur// dug go rtogalan tshul m rmabya'i mdongs kyis khyabs medaba'agyur// zhag gcig sbyang ba byas tanyim bzung ba la 'khob chu'agram dasong me tog brgyad stong
lan/ me togagi kha dog lta bu phul ba daltabu'i gsa rnams zhag bdunatshunachad kyis thob par 'gyur// gzhin nu'ogadonagyis byis pa zin pa la ni dkyil 'khor skyang nulakyis khyugs
'dre dang/ me togadang/ lhabashosasu nas byas pa shar phyogs su khabastan ta bzhi ga'abadug bas bdugs tabyab pa'i du byas nas/ lagu b.la'ang skudapa btagasanasos por
'gyuro// rig sngags bsgrub pa thams cad dang/ langs bsgrub pa dang/ bdaganyid bsrung dang/ phyogs bcongabadung/ phal bsrung ba dang/ mtshams gcad pa dang/
bsgrub pa thams cad l rig sngagos kyi rgyal bo 'degacig pus byago char dbab pa 'dod naru klung gisa'agram gnyis ka'i sas rdo rje byas lamar gyi ngozhag bcubasal zhag gcig sbyang/
byus ti/ muklung rgya mtshor 'bab pa'i'i gramadusol/ sa dalta bu lanor rgyas kyi gzugs byas te/ ladridamapo dang/ me tog dmar bo dang/ bdug pa dang/ marame phul nugaM/
de'i mdunadu rdo rje la na brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ bzlas brjod bden dus ma yin par char 'bab par 'gyur// gcad n lagan rdo rje'i mdun du lag na rdo rdzolaphul ba'i mi tog rmi
@#// bakhargyabargyus nasrogakhyasazhabarladapar 'gyur// 'gying zhag bcuban 'azhag gcige sbyang ba byas targyashug dang band ka'i shing byusal/ ma gying zhag brgyad
sad lazhag gcig sbyangs byas nas durakhrodadusol dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugasate/ dridang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa phul nas niam drob gyur kyi khanarig sngagasakyirgyal rolan stong
brgyad cu brgyad bzlas brjod byas na'agrubabapa'i chur/ grubanasad 'changon rgyalago la bzhag na gzhan gyis ma sgrub par 'gyur tacinyid 'a'aphral du zad pa'i gyur/ rabong gi khrag
dang / mig gnyis dang/ bzhin du sprul pa'i mig gnyis dang/ dgas kr-ia le mig gnyis blangs nas skar ma rgyal dang sgrubashing zhag gcig snang ba khyas te btagasal/ laganarjo/
rje'i mdun dutilagyi'amakha'adu bzha gnas drobangagyurakyi bar dubazlasakharjod byas n grub 'gyur te/ rkangapasamagyogasapa'i sman du 'gyur// sumaMga'akhaskus bcudrug lon
pa yodadang ldan ba'agyuzhugater thams cad mthong ste/ tsholjabargya thubapa 'gyul/ tshon bomo'i stobs dang ldan ba'agyuro// maragyizhagakhanubashage zhag gcig snang ba
byas taM/ dur khrodadusoladakyila'akhongaskyang nul du byugasanas/ 'dabus 'bras phyolasami'i gzugs byas te/ de la gtor ma rgyas par ng/ dang/ me tog dang/ bdugapa'i ng
byin la laoma'i spu gri la sogs bsreg pa ltamya/ de'i g.yas phyogs su mi'izidapa dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pas brgyan te bzhaga' thod pa'isnyad 'dug pa bzhin du rig sgyu
'chang gis rig sngagasargyal bo' lan brgyadabargyabazlas brjod byas te/ de nas thod pa khungs tedur khrod mes bsregasan thodapa chag pa de'i dum grugs blangs tagazugs byas te/
do'ilciba'isnying du bzhi g stelana brgyad bargyabasabarjod bya'o// donasaT+Tadaba'idum grugs blangs te/ lag na rdo rje'amadun du btags lan brgyad brgyabazlas brjod byas pasalus
bskusana'adodadagur bsgyuba'i gzugs can du 'gyur// gang drim zhim pa de dag kyang dri zhim par byed cinganuklung rgyun du 'babab byed l/ lo bdun brgya thub par 'gyur tesrung ba'i
chog byed pas bya'o/ tshusrin nag bkradang sbalapa'i tsho'i khrungs til mar dang sbyar te/ 'phags b.lag na rdo rje'i mdun du bzlas brjod byas zhas tilamarades gdobaskusan tshulenang
du zla badrug gabar du 'dug nus b.la'achu'o// mig sman sgrub khar 'dod natshos grangs dang rgyas rayang bdam mi dgos/ sbyang ba byam dgos par phag gi mig gnyis dang/ glangapo
tshabomigaganyis dang/ lig bumegodang/ pha wang long bu dang/ stangaladang/ butan dzin dang/ 'da rnams byas nas mar gyi ngozhag brgyudal zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/
lagan rdo rje'i mdun du droding/ me togadang/ bdug pa phunas 'ge sngags kyi rgyal polanabargyad brgya bzlas brjod byas te/ des mig bskusazhalus nadamed pa rnam
med par 'gyu/ gdon gyis khron pa'i ng gdonagyisade mthong gyur te/ mthong nas 'bros par 'gyur ro// klu dbang du byan ba lang gi lhasasamakun dga'i bdakyil 'khor skyong
rgyunu'adu byugs lasid bya'i shing gisolas+sarate/ rig sngags kyi rgyal bos snama'i mi tog brgyadastangasbyin sreg byas na tang zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur ro// donas las de 'grub par 'gyur te/
kumathon tshur shog cakharjod na/ sa'i nga na gnas pa'i klu 'am klu'i bumo rnams 'ongs te/ yid la bsams pa tsam gyis thams cad 'ong bar 'gyur// sgrub pa thams cad la rgyal po/
tsha chen po bzhi rnams shes par byakhalas 'dibyas nabagags thams cad medang 'gyur so// rig sngags 'changagis sgrub pa'i dadan lag nardo rje'i mdun du som/dza'i khu bas lega'adrenagyi
gdong bris la/ de'i snying duseng ldeng gishing gis me sbar te/ le brgan rtsa'i mi tog rgya skyegs kyi khu bas kha dog bsgyur babargyad stong spyanasrug byas n bgags thams cud bcomazhing btags
par 'gyur go// da na chadasgrub rnams ma'i dodapa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur ro// gzhig som radza'i khubs log 'dren gyi gdong brin yang sgrub po thams cad l bgags med par 'gyur
ro[}]gtum ponub phyogs su kha bstanab mdun dum gyi zhag dgu zhag gcig s+sa ngagabyas temachod pa rgyas par byas nas dradang/ me togadang/ bdug pa yulanab kangaga'i bud shing gasami
sbyar ta 'bras las byas pa'i khu b.lanabargya stong bungasanas sbyin srag byas na/ lhago'adzol banasa'od ze'abyung ste/ donas 'grub par 'gyur ro// grubanas kyang tin lngakhargyu 'am yang
longs spyod kyi gzhe sbyin pa'i gyuyo// dgralagatsob 'dod nam gyi bzhagalazhagagacig sbyang babyas taM/ durakhrod du songa' 'bras phye las gzugs byas nas seng ldeng gi phur bu dug gi
dunang sa bdugs pas tshogs rnams su btabal/ rig sngags kyirgyal polana brgyad stobazlas brjod byas na dgrayan lag b+hums cad du zug par 'gyur ro// phyungs 'oms khakrusan
sosab 'gyur ro// dpyid zla 'bring po'i tshos gsum la'adodapa'i gzugs byas l/ dwa'i mdun dus ldang gi phur busobazhi de bzhag stazhag gcig sbyang bcos mchod pa khyusate/ rig
sngags kyi lango'ana brgyad stong bzlasabarjod byas zha'agrubababa'agyumaro// de nas zad medakyi bu'i chung ma la phul ba'is bal gyi 'dabam rgya sogasakyi 'bas 'dog bsgyurab dug gis bsgos
pas mtshan gyigazugasabyas to/ budamadakyilong nas smos shing phur bu des phuganabudamed kyi mo mtshan yangekhrag 'dzag par 'gyur te/ byunasos ba'agyur/ smigs bu'asadadam
lcesbyang giskad dam/ wa'i skad shes pa 'dod n dur khrod dam/ khyim gtsangam ma/ lhakhang dul gyi tshos dag la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ dkyil khor skyang nul
chag gyis byugasal/ laganadordzogazugs bzha gnas / g.yas phyogs tshalhachen po bzhugaste/ lhachen po'i mdun du 'bras bye lagasmigs bu'i gzugosasam/ lcasbyang g gzugs sam/
wa'agozugs byas ya bzhi gnas / 'phags pa'i gan rdordzolamachod byas l/ lhachen bo la'ang lha ya bshes 'byor pa phunasasmigs la 'bras chanazhadang sbyar ba sbyin no// lcesbyabazhi
ngag sbyin// lan 'dod pa sbyin no// denus rig sngags 'chang gis yid la bsams te rig sngags kyirgyal po bzlas brjod byas na/ rtsis sgrigs bu yid la bsamasazhanasmigs bu /
ba'a'agyur// lce sbyang yid labasamasanas lce sbyang sla bar 'gyurasro/ khu yid la bsamasazhanA lAs ba'agyur ro// yang na dedagathams cad yidelabasamasazhathams cad bar 'gyur
ta smosan 'grubaba'agyur/ grubanas kya'adzam bu'i gling yod ba'i don thams cad ston ba'akhyugo/namamachiba'angaston bar 'gyur// no yang ston par 'gyulo// rig
sngags gang zhig las 'khrub par mkhyadan gi sngags ra'i n gnas smosashing/ 'ganadorje'i mdun du u dumab pa'i yamasugashing brgyadashong spyanasreg byas na/ ga sngags brgyudang
ldan par 'gyuzhingadangos grub kyang myur dusbyin par byed do// 'khrub dbang dubyakha'adod zhag gsum slabu byas tamar gyi bzhi ga brgyad l dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas/ de'i
dbus su tshon rtsi sna gsum gyi phyams lagan jorje'igazugs byas to/ de'i g.yas phyogasasu 'byung po'i bdagabo gzhag go/ de nas lag na rdo rje lamachod pa bya ste/ 'byung po'i bdag po la
lha bshos rgyas pa dbul zhing byung po kha zas kyang sbyin pa bya ste// sangs rgyas kyi spyan dragoru byas la rig sngags kyi rgyal bodang bcas te/ lanabargyad stongabazlasabarjod byas nas
ba ra'ishing gs mesbal/ bar ma'i sa bon chub 'i snying pos lan brgyad brgya spyan srogabya'o// donas 'khyungobanag po zhes bya ba'ong bar 'gyur// 'ongasanas ming zhes zer ba dang/
des yide'anyidang bsams pa thams cad gyisashig cesasosashego/ de nas de ltar bya'ozhes sanasam snang bar gyuratibasams patsam gyis dpag tshad rgyur yang 'gro zhing de bzhin du
phu'e ya'ongado// dbag tshadabargyanas budamed khrid de 'oyong phyir yang skyelal// kun dga' ra ba dang/ skyed mosatshal dang khangakhyim dang/ mal stan dag kyang lakhar byed do/
gachog[>byed 'gyur ro// bza'abadang/ gzhabo pa dang/ balhagapa dang/ btung sogs pa'i ng sbalapar byono// cholasumakhA thub par 'gyur te/ lus
@#// zhigan lcang la can duphye ba'agyur ro// zhagagasum sar byas tamar gyi zhag bcugazhi lamacho'i nang du song nasamachod pa rgyas par bya// gtor ma'ang rgyas par byas
cha nas rta bcom ldan 'dasams bsrung ba bzhang po nyamo rnams kyisangs thams cad byas la mar me gnyisosbar te/ stang thil bso'i gabcu'i nang dubcu gnas mchogicomo'i mdun du bus mo
gnyis btsugs ta'aduga'alag pa g.yon pas mnan te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal ba lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas dngos grub kyi mtshonam 'byung bar 'gyur te/ dro ba dang/
dud pa 'bul ba dang/ 'bar b.la'agyur ro// bal 'babaninamamakhal 'gro bar 'gyur zhing/ nyim shar ba'i kha dog dang ldan ta'abcu drug lenapa'i sha tshugs can du 'gyulal/ rig
sngags 'chang thams cad kyis misod par 'gyur// dudang 'thul nilus li snangaba'achu zhing/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigasame tog ces bya ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigs
drizhes bya ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yid gs zhes bya ba'i rig sngags thams cad kyang shis pa'i gyur ro// de la rig sngags 'chang gi rig sa me tog ces bya ba de dag ni gnod sbyin
mnams dang lhan cig turtse zhing dga' l dga' mgur spyod de tsho'i stong thubal rig sngags 'chang drizhes bya ba rnams kyis mi tshugs shing dbang yang mi byed do// rig sngags 'chang gi rigs dri
[o/]zhes l bde dag ni rgyal bo'i btsunamo dag dang/ dedadabon chen po'i rigs rnams dang/ khyim bdag khyim chen po'i rigs rnams kyi bud med gang yin pa de dugadang lhan cig tu rtsa zhing dgal/
dga' mgur spyod de tsholnga brgya thub bo// de dag kyang rig sngags 'chang mi tog sa bya pa rnams kyisami tshugs so// rig sngags 'chang gi rigs yi dgasazhes bya ba de dganami 'dod do// da
dgag mi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po'i bu mo'akhyungaba'agyurato/ dadagar lhan cig tutsazhing dgala dga' mgur spyodadi'i sum brgya thub bo// me tog gi rigs rnams ni me togagiming
gis dgug par bya'o/ bri'i rigs rnams nasro'i ming rnams kyis dgug par bya'o// yi dgas kyi rigs rnams niyodags kyi ming gis dgug par bya'o// da bkugan skyagaste ngung du
'ong bar 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi mnga' bdag tugyurato/ ming smosapu tsam gyis kyang rig sngags 'chang rnams skrag bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig rgyudaphyi'amatha' dag
chub pa byed 'gig sngags kyi lhathams cad dang/ rig sngags kyi rgyal chen ngo lanadoji'ang phyi bzhin 'brangabar 'gyurato/ lho thams cad kyang samasarangs bar 'gyul/ dngos
grub kyang bdablag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// chog rgyas ba rgyud zhi dbacas b.lagan dodzad ng/ lha chen posaganga bshadang 'ani bcom ldan 'adas kyis bstod cing bsngags te/ de
la lha thams cad samasadagab nas dngos grub sbyin par byed do// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa'i snying po brgyan pa/ bcom ldan 'das
mi mchog la drag tusul ba byed pagadaman pa de'i snying bo tshonapo rig pa mchog gi snyingapol drug tuskul bar byed ng 'angasa bshadab+ban to// rig sngags mchog la drag shul can phal
gnon pa gangamin budodagaladrag shul skulab byed ng de nyidakyisnying po'ang ngas bshad brin te/ 'din dngos grubaganyisaka sbyin par byed pa yin bs na/ des lko rnams kyang de bzhin
du yid skyodapa byed do// nyeba'i snying po bshad pan lha'itshogs 'khodapa g.yineb de dag skrag cing 'jigs par 'gyur to/ de dag khacom ldan 'dasalagan rdo rdzolamago bos phyag
'tshalanas 'khodad// de nas bcom ldan 'das phyagan rdo rjes/ lha dag la bka' stsalang/ lha dga'agyi sngags bshad pa byas zhag 'khod la snying po mchog gi las rnams
nyonacig/ de nas snying po las rnams 'byung// bsrungabalen bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i thalabus bya'o// mtshams gcad pa lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i phyir
bus bya'o// bsladapani skyas bya'o// kum borekha bcing bar bya ban bdunabazlas brjod byas pa'i gsag mas bya'o// las thams cad dang bsgrub pa thams cad la'ang rog
sngags kyirgyal po'i snying po sgrarab byag sgrub pa'i tshobagegs bsal ba'i me sbagal/ yungs kar bdag gi khrag gis bsgos pasa'an brgyadab sbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams
cad choms bar 'gyur// bgegs thams cad rengs par byanatsam pa kas bon lamanyishu rtsa gcig bzlas brjod byas pas bya'o// langs rangs par bya lan gsum bzlas
brjod byas pa'i lus karagyis bya'o// rolangasakhasgrub pa thams cad dang/ bgags rengs par bya ba thams cad lani snying bos bya'o// bdag dang grogs rnams bsrung ban
bcom ldan 'dasams bya'o// mtshams gcad pa'i rigasngags kyi rgyal pos bya ste/ rtsa ba'i las rnams la'angasbyaro// phyi ma'i las rnams ni bcom ldan 'das ma yum gyis
bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal po'i snying po las rnams bsgrub pa nasnying pos bya/ phyim las gzhan rnams rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang/ bcom ldan 'das mas bya'o// gi
sngags kyi rgyalapo'anibcom ldan 'adasam yum gyis bya'o// nyiba'i snying polanasnying po 'am/ yumamam/ rig sngags kyirgyal pos bya'o// pho na gsang sngags rgyud
khyim dang bcas pa thams cad nibcom ldan 'das mas sbyarab r bya'o// nobar dod par gyi shag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na dordzo'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas ba'i
khyasal smra ba'i shing gisame snyan s 'bras dmar po la dordzabyas te/ mar gyi nang dubasnyagasab stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas nadas grub kyi mtshan ma'am tog gi
'phreng ba'akha 'gyur ro/ de grub nas kyang tin labargya'am/ yang yul smin pa byed d// skyes pa dbang du byonamar gyi zhag brgyadazhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas
gusong gzugasakyigamasazigasasasuarka shing gasemesmra nas/ zhag gsum gyib dus ldangagi yamasrog shing skadabs dkris ba stong rtsa brgyad rtsi brgyad sbyin srag byas na rgyus
bya dbang du gyuralo// mi'i gtso bodabang dubyabar 'dod yar gyi ngotshos brgyad 'khazhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ gragakhar gyi lung bo gcig 'dug par song nas/ de'i steng du me tog dang/
hing/ bdug pa phu'al/ de'i 'og tu a shAt+yA'ishengagisamesbyar tayus ka gyi sbyin srog 'tshostong sbyin sreg lus nami'i ga'i dbang du 'gyura'o// bud medadabang du bya ba 'dod nazhag
gsum gyi khor du dud pamadaba'amadag ma 'bras dang phubasubasus bas nasrog lan rgyartsa brgyad byosan dbang du'agyur// mugasasamo dbang du bya lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lar
gyi ngo tshes brgyadal zhag gcig smyungab byas te/ pa'i shashing gisame sbanas ske tshodalanatshulanabargya stong sbyin sreg byas nayugs sa mo dbang du 'gyur ro// smanalamagatogs
bar gang gsang sngags thams cad la snying gzi bar byed pa dang/ gdung bar byed pa dang/ rig sngagasakyi rgyal bo gdung bar byed ba'i snyingegod bcas par sbyar bar bya'o// de ltar sbyaranabad
blag tu 'grubabara'agyuro// zla ba gcig gab du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing snying bo bzlas brjod byas bal/ de'i 'og tu ma gling zhag brgyad la skyes pa'i mnyams pa blangs tesnying bos
gtom sbyin zhing/ dalag cu'i gsum ga bzhagal/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byas ste/ yi dgas kyis gesngags 'chang gi lag tulig bumig 'bul bar 'gyur
gyi bar dubazlas brjod bya'o// donas 'grub pa 'gyurata/ des mig gnyis la bskusanag/ngal ragapadogasar du 'gyur// nye ba'isnying bo thogs pa medacing stobs kyis pha rol
gnon pa'i phyimalasa rnams 'byung ste/ bcom ldan 'adasayang dag bar tshogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rig sngagasathams cad kyi yum gsungs ba gang dran bar byas naM/ 'ag sngags
thams cad 'grub bar 'agyur yin pa dang/ ga sngags thams cud kyi nyiba'isnying po dam pa 'jug par byed pa ngas bshad gang yin pa'i spyan dgu ba'i snying bo dran parabyas na/ 'og
sngags sgrub par dka' ba thams cad kyang 'grub par byed cing/ rig sngags rnams las gang dang gang bsgyur ba dbanga myur du byed par 'gyur ro// rig sngags gang las thams cad
lalasami byed r rel gyi sngags 'chang gis yum danyeba'i snying poldan ngs/ lagan rdo rje'am lhachen po'i mdun du rnama'imag mar gyi nangadubasagasapa brlastong
gis sa thams cad bde blag tudangos grubasmin pa'i khyadad// rig sngagasayidalabasams tagragamakhar gyis la gzugs byas la dradang/ me tog dang/ bdug pas brgyananasal ga
na rdorngamadun dukha'agaste/ yum dang nyaba'i snyibo ldan pas snakha'i me tog brgyud brgyas bsnunanalam du ston de bzhina'agrub partsa'agyur// tshelamanyid du ga sngags 'grub
pa'i m/ yang na mi 'grub pa yin pa rig sngags thams cad ston bar byed ni/ deltar rtogasanas rigesngags bdablagatubasgrub par bya'i/ gzhan du nam yin no// yar gyi nga tshos
brgyadanas brtsalas targya mtsho'ababanga'i chu klung ginang du zhugs la slong ma'iwas drazhangalan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nashul sbyin par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngotshos brgyud nas niya'i bar
du rgyas 'os dang bye'i bdag gu bzhing rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na/ gzhan gyiu'agrakho' gnadang byed par 'gyur// danasazas su rgyudang po'ib dag khu zazhing bzlas
brjod byas na dmag gi dpung 'joms bar byed do// mar gyizhag brgyada bzhi g gcig sgrub byas ta/ 'phagasaMralaganardo rdzo'i nang pa g.yas pa'i mthebong bzung nas nye ba'i
snying bo bzlas brjod byas na/ jitsaman lagan jo rdzo'i rkang ba'i the bong las 'od za'akhyung par 'gyurato/ 'od zer des kyang rig sngags 'chang g.yas phyogs su bskoranas lag na rdo rje'i
spyibo'i snong bar 'gyura'o// de nas 'grub par 'gyur targyal po sbyin par byed tsang bo brgyagrub pa 'gyur ro// slogro'i zas za zhing rgya mtshor 'bab pa'ichuklung ginang du zhugs tanya
bsnying pospyanadang bcas par lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ das rig sngags 'chang gis chu'inang du yungs kar gyi spyin blugs lanabargyad stong byas na bar snang la ral gri mthong akhar
'gyuratad blabar bya'o// ciste snang ba'am byed nani'og sngags 'chang gis rig la mchog bzlas brjod byas n snangang 'gyur te/ 'og bag can gyirig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin
du blang bar bya'o// dbyangs bas sgra lcabal 'khyil ci'abcu drug lon pa'ingesha tshugs can du 'gyur te/ dpag tshad nyis stong gyen du 'phug ba dang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis
misodapa dang/ tsho'anyis stong thubapa'i gyur ro// gter 'byung bar 'dod na rig sngags 'chang gnas gang gtor yodapa song la/ tshes grangs dang rgyu skarayang badramam dgos/ smyung
ba'ang mi dgos bar bil ba'i mi'i nang du yungs karadang pad+ma'o ma bsregs pa laskaba'i snying pos lan brgyad stong spyanasrag byas n gtar gyi lha des rmilam du ston parabyed do//
denas rag pa mchog gis bgagasa rnams kyi spyanasrog byas nas blang bdubya'o// dga' byed gadong gis gnas bsrung bar bya'o// nyaba'i snying po gnam mesar bar bya ste/
tshabang gi 'u arka'i shing bal gyis dkris la/ bas kho'im gyi mar me sbarab gtaraganganayodapa da brtol tasgra tshig/tshigapa 'byungaba'agyur/ yang na srin pus aka'ashing b.lagyis
dkris la rdo rje khro bo'i sngags dang ldan bas srog chags go ta'i tshel gyis maram sbyar// mtshan gnadanyid dang 'dra'o/ na ga pa la'i a rka'i shing bal gyis g.yogs te bar 'irgyusapas dkras
'ge'itshel gyisame sbyar tagazungang// mtshan man de nyid dang 'dra ste snying po chen po zhes bya'o/ lha rnams ngs rnam pa sna tshegasa mthong nas nyaba'isnying palas rnams bshad ba yin na//
sgrub pa'i snying ngo stobs ldan pa// gang dag snying stobasamed pa dang// bsod nams chung du de dag gi/ pha rol phyin pa rdzogs bya'i phyir// gter gyig yikhyad par dag/ bdag gis su
bshad par bya// bcom ldan lagan rdo rje yis// de nas tshig 'di skadasmras// gter sgo gang dag tshangs pa yis// gsang sngags kyinisbyor ba dang// cho ga yisanings bzhag pa//
mi rnams cho ga med pa dang// stobs dang mthunamed pa yis// rtag tutshoms par mi 'gyur to// gang gsami rnams bde blag tu// lengs par spyad par 'gyur ba dang// pha rol
ma/ nanga'i rdzogs byed dang// jiltar no rnams ba bzhag dug/ dadag bdag gis bshad ng ra bya// bcom ldan lag na rdo rje yis// de skadadun tshig kyang smras// gter gyi sgo na rebangashad
pa sa mthar rgya mtsho thug pa yi// sayi 'og nas gang yin pa// bdag gisasunar ba bshad kyis// lha rnams kyis mnyanang ragyis// de dag ginakha dogamtshan/ gsang sngaglu
gang gis gzhom pa dang// chog ji bzhi n lasa rnams dang// bad blag tu ni thob pa yi// sbyar sman bdagagis bshad parub// de dag gin mtshan ma yang// so so runa bshadapar bya//
gru gsum dun zla gam dang// zlum po dang ni thur bzhi dang// pad+ma chu shi'amadang// d bzhi ni gzhan s bsil yab 'dra// gter gyi sgon brgyadangashadang// de dag kha dog lags
pa nyon// ngang mdog 'dragatarasayod// kawAra'i mdog 'dra dang// 'damabu chugasha'adrab dang// rgya skyegs khu ba kha dog 'dra/ ljang khu'i mdog can gtor sgo
yod babu'imadogada'adra ba dang// ga'uwangaginakha dog 'dra// de bzhin 'bringagar dang mtshungs// kha dogakhashadapa 'dag gis// gar sgo rnams kyi bgags bsal
bzhen// stengadangs 'og gnas bayi// bgegs rnams gang gis brlag 'gyur ba'i// smin sragalasanichog rnams// rab tu bshadakyisamanyan par gyis/ gtor sgo
gsang sngags gang gis dgod// de dag rim pa bshadupar bya// namo badzrapA Naya/ namo rar yu/ na mo ma hAbatsonA dzAya/ b.ru driNasA hA/ raranAranAhA//
bsaakhanAya swA hA/ birAbiNipAhA/ tib+ha risAhA/ mukatinisAhA/ bi mo tinisatA/ pra tahasAgA/ bder NisAt+tA/ horga kho hA/ ga ga nisAdA/ ba'iNis kaM/ oM garaNis kA
'tsha biragaNisA hUM/ ma hAb reti pak+Sha/ ra NibaNis// karab rab ka ra sUt+tA/ b.rUpas tA/ mar ngo sA/ badzrani// gaN+DanisAhA/ marmaNis// kunupa tanas/
sal dkyil 'khor gru bzhi'i skyang nul duphyugs 'akusha'i stan bti'ashar phyogs su kha bltasi ta'adug nas gtsang sbra dang/ tshongs par spyad pa dang/ dbangango dul bar bya ste/ zas su chu
grog 'thung zhing las brtsams la chog 'dis lha thams cudabakodanas 'khur babashis ldan dang/ pan tsongang/ nadan drishomabo dag phyogs dang mtshams kyi lha rnams la dbul zhing nyo dang
tshu dam bag spangs te/ stags snga masasha mya'i yamasrog shing mar gyin ng dubasugasapa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// bgegs thams cad phung bar byed pa'i gcod byed ces bya ba'i rig sngag
bstanaparabya ste/ namo badzrapA Nis/ ku tika te/ tsiti tsiti/ mi timo ti/ riNi'iNi/ mo tin pramo tinese/// rig sngags 'dis yungs karal lan bdun bzlas brjod
byas te phyogs bzhire gtonabasrungab byas par 'gyur// namabadzrapA Nis/ am ra a ma ra/ ma Tikatin ti latisAhA/ rig sngagasa'adis yungs kalalan bdun bzlas
brjod byas te mgo boragaton bgagasa rnams 'atshob mi byed// namo badzrapAtshes/ kutikuti/ tutItu ti/ hahar sAsh+tsa/ gasngags 'di la bzlas brjod byas pa'is
bzhagan me'i 'jigs ba mi 'byung ngo// gtam sgro kun bgegs rnams na/ mababargyud du 'ba bshad de// mi 'o dgan ma'i byung dang// 'jigasab rab d ba skad cig pa//
glang bo che dngamahetadang// rab tu'ajigs bsrin po dang// stag dang bya dang spyi'abotsam// bgagasa rnams brgyud bo rab kha'adar// de dag phung bar bya ba'i phyir// rig
stagasa'adin sbyar babya// namo badzrapA Nisu/ a' ba ra/ mi'i/ ci'i me'i/ par bazhiraNi/ kiri ki'i/ ka ka'i/ mi'i 'o/ shing g raM/ nan/
suM b+hanan+taM b+han/ mo han sa hA/ rigasngags 'di deng rig sngags kyi rgyal pos yungs kA'abazlos brjod byas// phyogasabazhi'i gtor nabagagasams nad mi snang bar 'gyur
ro rnyanamor tAAya/ na mo b+hagab tapra tA ya/ kharibi ki'i/ na' de na re/ mahan tar bor Ni hA/ rig sngagasa'aditshul bzlas brjod byas te/ phyogs bzhi'i gtor
nabagags thams cad bcomazhing misnakhaba'agyu'o// na mo badzrapA spu/ namog mor/ tsan dItsanarA/ man+tisAt+tA gsang sngagasa' dachul bzlas
brjod byas te/ phyogs dang phyogasamatshoms rnams sugatongan phyogs bcing bar byas par 'gyur/ khra yi gzugasa' mi snanga'agyur// 'phur zhing chal gsum du snang// smyalapotsam
zhes bya bani// phyogs rnams kun tu l 'gyur// gtam gyi sgro yi'i mon// thodapa rab 'dra rtogs par bya// don phur bu zer snang// 'jag khugs 'dra ba'i 'od dang bcas// phur
bu danedang la gzugs ldan// dal lag pas regamo// lus n sbyarasman bskus nas kyang// nas phur bu dbyung bya// ga ngagis sal de lhung ba'i// nam mkha'i khubam shu dgayung
hi/ ma pa'i lam ldong ros dang// sgog skyanas dang shing kun rnams// mi khrag gis ni sbyarab yi// byug pas de'abasku bar bya// de nas sal lhung bar 'gyu// de ltar ma byas nusalaM 'gyur//
ga gi yig yi me tog dang// de yi rtsa ba shun phrags dang/ ru tar+ya spos 'bri hati/ yungs kar 'di rnams cha mnyam pa// ra gcin dag dang btag par bya// lus la bsus pa'i sbya'i snyan
'di khrag 'joms pa ya mchog yin no// ru rtadangani chospos dang// lig bu mig dang ldong ros bcas// sbal ba'i tshol dang ldanubs te// dudapa'i mig re bsgyur ba// 'do no mig
[z ]rtsi'i rgyal po ste// gtor gyi sgo rnams gcod pa yin// nyapa kun da'ishun phragasabla// sin du ba'igi'u wabacas// bring ga'i dudapas rab tubadugs// 'di spyir sman mchog yin te
gyurasman gyis nalus bskusanas// de nas phur bu dbyung bar bya// nisi snang bar mi byed na// khu yi 'khrul 'khor rangs byed cing// bgegs kun phung bar byed pa yi// rig sngags 'di ni de yis/
sbyor karig 'ug/ dI bya/ rA bi Na/ kanatsum pa ka ga tA/ saMgrub bdad lun/ ku min/ hIhIn/ hApAhAni/ ki ra ker/ kal ka ra NaM/ ma hAb bya/ hab har har ha
ra hur/ la tsa lasol// rar ra/ tha tha tha/ shangashasha/ stam+b+ha ya na ga yu nAsha ya/ hu'i hur/ gin gni/ hunatsun da grin mu ya// han bram+maNi/ ba tani/ mo tani dgi
ni'i ma ban/ tha tha ra/ mi tii ti/ si tes ti/ micomi/ ba ro si/ tir ti'i/ de myand myan/ bi khrab tapo ta tani/ pa tani/ hahahan grwahA/ phur bu dbyin ba na
'dom gsum du bcal te/ chudang yungs kar gyis bsnunan khrad ras pa'i gyur ro// yang na rgyang ring pogalcaba'agyur te/ rig sngags 'dis nibagags thams cad bcom par 'gyur
ro nyanamo badzrapA Nayo/ namo rungu ya/ namobrah+maya/ gshiri'i ro/ si gi ri'i/ mi ri/ ba ba pa swA hA/ rig sngags 'dim/ yang na gos dkar sha gyis gtsug phudabatsong
bar bya'o// gang gis nor rnams byabagi/ gru gsum 'joms pa 'di yin te/ kho ra khor yug sbyang byas la// rab tu bsgrims tabartag par bya// des mtsha
kyidabus dag tu// tshogrugasum gnag pa yod// ci sdudaltar masnangan// de nas lo mar gto bar bya// a pamarga'ithol sman gyis// mkhasapa dag gis rab gtor shing// dung gi
phyems babya// khorakhor yug gtor bya zhing// gtor dang byi dor byas nas kyang// ci ste mtshan ma mthong 'gyuran// sbyar sman gyisan bskusan yang// lcags kyi khar bsabardab
byas zhu// chag bar 'gyur tagazhanadu yin// zla gamadag gi dbus dgan/ bkra shis ldan pa'i gzugs kyang snang// ci ste de ltar mi snangan// thal ba'asmaka'adispyir bar bya// i
'drabyi'u rug lama rnams// mnyam par bzhi g pas btsir nas ni// bgan dag dang lhan cig sgyur// bskyo' nas gtor ba byas nas ni// bkra shis ldan pa der snang ste// 'di la blo ldan
khatsama med// sgyur sman gyis ni skusanas kyang// lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab par bya// phos nas la de ltung ste// rnam pa gzhan du 'gyurab med// zlum po gzhir ba'i chog yis/
sbyar bar bya ba rab bshad do// kho rakhor yug sgyungasanas nii// rab tu bsgrims te brtag par bya// pad+ma'i rtsa ba'i mdog 'drab// sprulamago gdengs ka'iri mosnang// i ste de dgami
ba snangan// thal ba'i sman 'disbyar bar bya// ka'asha sa bon dang// btsod rnams dung ni po gcin gyis// sbyar nas kun tu blugs par bya// de nas mtshan ma sna 'gyur to//
sbyar sman gyis ni lus bsusanas/ lcags kyi 'khar ba brdab bar bya// des nadas na 'o jig 'gyur te/u0f38/ rnam ba gzhan du 'gyur bamed// gru bzhi po yi rim yang// gru
bzhalen te bshad par bya// cesnyademasnangan// thal ba'its+tshana'adisbyar bar bya// smasha ra'iyal ga byas// mnyam par bzhi g pas btsor byas l// ba gcan gyis ni
sbyanas kyang/ mkhas pa yisan glegasang ru bya// rlags nusamtshan ma snang 'gyur te// de'asmanagyis bskus byas shing// lcags kyi 'khar bas brdab byas na// chag par
gyur togazhan duin// pad+mayanadabusasu yang// snyingapodagunasnangab yod// sman rnams kyis lus boskus nas// rdobayisani brdab bya zhing// den snying po gzhom bar
bya don yod par the tshom med// ltar bdag gis bzhag pa bzhin// lhag bayani blang bar bya// chushang lama'i dbyibs 'drab// myur ba'i thabs ni mnyan bar bya// dan
mtshan ma snang ba ni// gi'u wang thegal 'drab yi// rim gnyis sam gsum yang rung// yan bzhi'am lngayodado// mtshan ma 'di dag snang ba 'gyur/ sesamtshan ma mi
snangan// tha'akhasman 'di sbyor bar bya/ da khahAt+tAdang pa tapa'i// lam a pa mgo rnams// ra yi gcin gyis sbyar nas su// kho 'khor yug blugs la ba la ra bya//
blugs ma thag tu snang 'gyur te// sgyurasmanagyisanabaskusanas kyang// lcags kyi kharab brdabasan// chag bar 'gyur tagazhan du min// bsil yabadagadang 'drab naM// bar bcas
par snang bar 'gyur// gshe gyis la gsar rasbyang byas Ml// de yi mtshan mabartagabarabya// tsa dazham snangan/ thal ba'i sman 'disbyar bar bya// ishing la ma dang// nor rkun dag gi
lam dag/ rtayigacin gyis sgyur nas kyag/ kho khor yugablugasanas ni// de nas mtshan masnang ba der sbyar sman gyisanibaskusanas kyang// lcags kyi 'khabasabarda byas na// chag
pa'i gyur tagazhan dumin// chu shing lema'adra las// rus sbal rgyab dang 'dra ba dung// rdordzasterang 'ongs pa// de nigazhom du med pa yin// gtagyi sgo ni thams cad la// phur bu rnam pa
bzhi yodado// dbang po gshin rdzalus ngan dang// khyaba'ajug phur bu bzhi pa'o// gter gyi sgo ni thams cad du// bag sngags 'dis gtor ma sbyin par bya ste/ gshin rjel nibasreg bya rnams//
khyaba'ajuga'adi'ibras chan sna tshogs pa'o// kupanisbyar thug go/ dpal ldan lagi 'bras kyi thugasbyin bar bya'o// na mo badzrapA Ni// nan+tasunan+te/ gowin+te/ ri tiri// mi ti/
[ra ]miti d+ha maratisAhA/ sngags 'dis 'o dod pa 'gatong ma thams cad byinel/ dan las brtsam par bya'o// gzhor gyi sngagasana'i diyin te/ namo badzrapA Nis/ ti ya ba tig ya/
namol hAyA ya sAny+tsa/sngags 'di dag gis tshulakhazlos brjod byas te bsang gtor byaste/ de nas su bya'o// dal gter sgo gsog pa'i mchog/ rdodza rnams dang gzhan yang gang// khra
yarags rnams gcog pa yi// sbyar smana rnams kyang bshad ng rubya// kan kayi lcab dang/ mashanag ta'igi wang dang// spyayortseb 'di dag rnams// atudar pa'i shun phrags
dang 'alabusranatsam byas nas kyang// grobem dogatubasamar ru ru// gtaMrasgo thams cad gcog pa 'di// 'byung po 'a mchogatsesaM khyab yani// 'bam bo dang gcoda rnams dang// ga'u
wangaldang res bcas pa dang/ kar wA ra'i rtsa ba dang// arkadakar ngo'i nyin thugs dang// shin ka yangeshun phrags dang// 'di dag tshanibasnyams byas l// bgacanod dang brtag pa'
bya gtor sgoThams cad gacog pa ya/sbyar sman dgage dam pa ste// lag naangos bshad pa yin// ah+phamatshu'i ma dang// aranAya rtsa ba dang// sna hagashe ri sgog skya rnams//
bgatsadagadag dang brtag par bya// gter sgo gcog pa'i sbyar sman 'di// rdo rjazhisani bya ba yin// ka rawAra'i rtsa ba dang// chu shinges bon skyor pa dang// yung dang nag tam la dang//
[d ag]// gar ka'adekabo rnams// ba gdag dang btagapa bya// smrar sman gyi nargya'aba'adi// gtar sgo gcig pa'i chog yin no// bcu dzahAtshog ti/ de bzhin
nyagayungs kar rnams// bgacin gyis ni legs sprul// gter sgrogathog ngadumapa yin// b.lud gnam tog dang// sha'al ka yi snying bo dang/ 'bam bosne hakyi ri dang/ mi
wang dag dang ldan ng tshani// rag na dgadang bag byos la// jo rdzo'ajoms pa mchog yin na// koshataka'i sa bon dang// ko ba'i ya'abras bu dang// durukami'am rnags ba
gnyin dagadang btag byas l// zhag grangs bzhi bcudaguragazhag pa// do rdzo'joms pa'i dam pa yin// pa ri dzA ti'il ba dang/ su bar sna dang takadang// payi lom
dang spang rtsi dang nishing kradang// giwangadag dang sbyar ba yis// gtor sgo gcog 'damapa yin/ sgyur smanadam pa 'di dag ni// rdarje'joms pa yin par bshad//
gsara rnamasebang bca'adod pa yi// lag pa bsku ba las nyon// rurta dang ni spos dang// a ta dang mo rato// lag pa bskuba'i mchog yin// rdo rjekharabye'ajigs
pa yin// zhim thog la yin s bon dang// nagatama'i 'bras bu rnams// ba gcin dag dang sbyarab ni// bde ba byed 'ilag skud yin// pad+ma'icu brgyasos dang// sar
gshadang spu rnams na// ya gcin dalegs sbyaba'i/ bde bar byed ba'i lag skud An// ka gna' dzayis bonadang// karanika ra'i me tog dang// pri yang ku dang rgyu gos dang// su
rab dung zhi danadakar// ga'u wang dag dang ldan pa ni// bde bar byed log skud yan// sgo grags lag pas reg ngan// mtshams nas kyang 'byed gyur// denyidarengs par bya
ba'i phyir// rig sngags 'din sgyub bya/ namo badzrapA Ni@#// tir tir/ ma'i sAhU~M/ rig sngags 'dis tshul lan bdun bsngags tasgo glegs kyi ngos 'gator narengs b.la'agyur
te bde blag tu gzung bar 'gyur ro// gter gyi sgo rnams thams cad la// rig sngags 'don sbyar bar bya// rengs byed rmos byed dge ba ste// bgagasa rnams thams cad rAjoms byed ba//
tshas pa nyid kyis byas pa ste// rmongs byed sgo yi thim ba'i phyir// ring ba brtol nas byubs// drithalha mo rnams dang ni// ma 'am gsib tumachod 'joms par byed tsange srog
byed pa// lha yi gzugs ldan blo gros che// rig sngagasa'ani bshad ngar bya/ ki li kilo/ galak+Sha hahab+hi maM gi/ han han/ len bi da ra ya badzraN/ kili kilishabren/ stam+b+ha ya
ru Na/ donahan hanashak+tin/ kiriko ri/ tsa ri tsi ri/ miri mi ri/ naruten ru ti/ tho ra tha ra/ tha tha/ ra ra/ pa taya pa ta ya/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+haya/ pa ta ya pa ya/ gardza gardzo/ mirdza
0 @#// maN+Da/ taN+Da tadzra/ kikyin kikin/ dulhu b+hi dum+bub+hi/ shuka daMt+taka ra wAnan/ kanan de bya rupe/ tsam brnyesaMm dA/ dpya ba g+ho/ bshan/ ka nyakaha/khaT ga haste/
khrin tra/ ru dwaya ri kAn/ ya rwa kri das/ glo pA ga glo bu ga globA/ oMr ba raNi/ an+d+he kAres yaM kag kam Ta/ tsan+d+raka/ share/ de bganad+harma/ yak+Shabid+ha/ daro a tsati/ subA dzita/

drogA drodA/ b+hi[é ]/ma ba pa sngarumab/ hahab/ kakaM ba/ kr-itra/ tanahan/ stam+b+ha ya stam+b+haya/ma hA'i tsa turmu kho dzapa ya tisAk+Sha/ rig sngags 'dis yungs kar dang/ chudang/ thal ba rnams M
'as gang yang rung ba gcig tu blangs te/ rig sngags bzlas brjod byas la phyogs bzhir gton bgegs thams cad rings bapo'agyur zhing dgra'ang bcom par 'gyur// de nyid kyis sad pa dang/
gnyid 'og tu gzhug pa dang/ mun par bya ba dang/ garadang/ rgyudang/ la mo la sogs pa byed du gzhug pa dang/ gzhan yang sems can mi snang ba gang yin pa dag dang/ snang ba gang yin pa dag dang/

bgegs dang log 'dren gang yin pa dang/ tsa kyi rgyal bo'i pho brang ngam/ dur khrod kyiganodapa byung ngam/ sbrul gyis btsas nga'ang rung/ gzhan yang sems can gnodang ra byed pa gang yin pa de dag thams
cad 'ajoms par byed cing rmongs ba byed pa yin zhes/ bcom ldan 'das rdordzo'adzin gyisadaskad bshad do// gser len ban rdo rje 'gan thogs shing rig sngags mchog 'dis sbyin sreg
rtsa7 legs par bya'o// na mo badzrapA Nisu/ ba be tAyasAhA/ tisdusu ka'ad+maya swA hA/ hU~M bany+dza na ya/ pa'in as nA ya swA hA/ ni dud+hipa ta ye swA hA/ sha yi yur bA yus hA/ li bi gar traye
swAhA/ ba hu yak+Shaya swA hA/ ya swA hA/ ga Na yasAhU~M/ ga Nang tayi swA hA/ kam ru pa ya sA/ kaMlen swA hA/ baglu d+hing ya sAhU/ rAkA sA ya satwA/ rakasA d+hi pa ta la spu rgyu/ khar ya/
hA khar d+hi pa ta yasAhA/ ru dA ya swAhA/ yamA ya swA hA/ ba ruN+Dal hAhA/ ku be ra yasA hA/ pri thi ba gA hA/ mu khribasA/ brah+maya swA hA/ gang gsang sngags 'di dgagis sha ma'i
yamasrog shing brgyad brgyasbyin sreg byas na bgegs thams cad bcom pa 'gyur ba las/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do// de'anga' khul 'khor thams cad 'dzoms pa'i ba'i
snying bo dbaldan pasasbyin sreg bya'o// yungananya ba'i snying po gcig pus bya'o// daltar m byas nabarlag par bya'o// de nas dbang ldan gyis/ bcom ldan 'dasal gan rdo rje la zhus pa//
bcom ldan 'das stobs po chepha rol gnon/ mi rnams la phan pa'i bu nyanapa 'tshal ba de bdagal gsungasashig/ khra rnams bshad ng duzhigamachis// brtson 'grus mthu stobA
jitsam lags// bdag gi tha tsamad dgagasungs// ji bzhin dunagasungs pa sogs// rdordza'adzinachonama'i bdag gis// dbang ldan gyi tshig thos nas// dbang ldan gzi
brjed ren bob// tshangs bas bshad pa'i khrid nyid// sngon sa 'di'i snying dgan// rtag tugatara rnams mang po yod/ gtor dodag nape ba'akhyir// tshangs pa
nyid kyi khra rnams yod// khra ya rnam pa brgyad bshad ng// brtson 'grusachazhingastobs poche// lagan rdo rjebaka' mchog gis// de dag gang gis brgyal 'gyas dang// gtor m sngags rnams
bzhin pa// danag bdag gis bshad ng rubyu// gnag dang dkar dang de bzhin dmar/ mgrin pa'i then kar grags pa dang// ka ngan dzaramig dmar dang/ 'dab bkra dngashel mig
can/ d+hade la nag po nagashin rjelhar ra dzin pa yin no// dkar po ni tshongs pa lhapa'i dzin pa yin no// de bzhin dumagi nang mthon kani smin drug gi bu lhar 'dzin pa yin no// ka ngan dzaran khyab
'jug lhara'adzin pa yin na// mig dma'anikub ralhara' dzin pa yin no// de bzhin du 'dab bkranidabang lhar 'dzin pa yin no// shel mig nan nasa'i lha 'dzin pa yin no// khra de
khu dag gi kha dogamtshan// rtagasa rnams bdag gis bshadung yin// de dag gi ni mdog dang dbyibs// rimabazhin du ni bshad nga la bya// nag po yin gzugs gang dang// mthustobla
gang ya'aba bshadad// khadag rab tu gnagapa dang// bong tshad chazhanga'ajigs par byed// dpag tshad gtsagan gnas bzhin du// dril bu'i skad 'dra'abyin bar byed/ gtor ma
'dod phyir yang dang yang// de bzhin rgyun du skad kyang 'byin// gang gis zhi bar 'gyurab yi// sa rnams kyang ni bshad par bya// sha btsos de bzhin brjes pa rnams// byarjelan sbyin par bya//
myur du sngags kyang sbyar bya zhing// gtor ma yang na sbyin par bya// na mo badzrapA Nis/ kaMrAk+Sha ya/ kaM d+hing ya sAhA/ gtor ma la'ang sngags 'dis bsngags la donas sbyin par bya'o//
dkarapo yi ni gzugs gang dang// mthustobs gang yin rab bshad de// nam mkha'i dag bskor byas nas// dani chu skyar mdog 'dra yi// 'dabama'i shugs kyis 'ongabar 'gyur/
rgyun du kho ra khor yu gnas // 'dab ma'i gshog sgra chen po yis// 'brug sgra chen po 'byin par byed// gnas rnamasun lan cig gam// lan gnyis lan gsum skor bar byed// gdon
rnams lan gsum tshang ba'i bar// dusrid du na gtor ma sbyin// sna ba 'bras yosamar dag gis// gtor m rnams na sbyin par bya// sngagasal/ namo badzrapA Ni su/ sho d+ha ya
shod+ha ya pa pa tayo/ sho pa rnying taya sA h+pha dmar po yi ni gzugs gang dang// mthu stobs g.yin rab bshad de// bzhadabazhin dun skad 'byin zhing// zab mo'i sgranib
tu sgrog/ lan lnga'abar du skad 'byin zhing// da ni myur du 'ong bar byed// ji sridalan lnga skad 'byin pa// dasrid du nigator ma sbyin// dridamaradanami tog dmar// dul
'a ka spyin bar bya// bza' ba dang nil dudang/ til gyi khu ba sbyin par bya// sngags la/ na mo badzrapA Nis/ rak+ta rak+ta/ kyerak+tad+hare taya swA hA/ mgrin ba mthon
ka'i gzugs gang dang// mthu stobs g.yin r bshad d// sdomos kyang 'bad bar byed/ ngan 'a ltangaskad 'byin cing/ lan bdun bar duskad 'byin te// don myur du 'ong bar 'gyur/
gto'am myur du sbyin par bya// sngags kyang legs par dran par bya/ lanamed pa'i sha sbyin cing// dam srog shing yang sbyin par bya// gtor ma'i lasana'adi dag gis// den tshul dulhung
bar 'gyur// sngags la/ namo badzrapA chi su/ nIlagasho/ nAl tadzo/ nIlA d+hi pi taya swA hA/ ki pan dza ra'i gzugs gong dang// mthu stobs gang yin 'ab bshad de// srin bya bzhin du
yang dang yang// skad bo cheni 'byin par byed// myur ba myur bar skad 'byin cing// dang zhani sgra yang lan gsum 'byin// nyob dag tu'ong bar 'gyur// nga tsho zas kyang sbyin par bya// gsang
sngags kyis na bye ba yin// khragagis su ni bkang ba yi// sngon sum dag kyang sbyin par byed// d bzhi zhe 'dang sha rjen sbyin// sngagasal/ namo badzrapA Nis/ kuli/ bkar lo/ kar/
d+hi pa taye swA hA/ mig dmar gyi ni gzugs gangadang// mthustobs gangayin rab ngashadade// rtabazhin dun skad 'byin cing// 'khar ba'i sgo ltar tshor tshor po// de bzhin sgra cher sgrogs
bar byed// ma 'khorab kha nas 'byen// the tshom med cing myur bu ru// de la gtor ma sbyin pa bya// de bzhin shanaN+Din pa dang// chagis bkang ba'i snod kyang ni// sngagasal// na mo/
badzrapA Nos/ rak+tane trerak+tani ba/ rak+ta d+hi pa tayaswA hA/ 'dababakra ya ni gzugs gang dang// mthu stobs gang yane rab bshad de// 'brug sgra bzhin du skad 'byin cing/ de bzhin duni'ong par
'gyug/ rang golus las de bzhin 'dab// glogagi rgyud 'drar snang bar 'gyur// jaltar n brtulashange 'ong// dur pa bzhin du yang dang yang// lan brgyad duniskad 'byin cing// de na
myur du 'ong bar 'gyur// de la gtor ma sbyin bya zhing// gsang sngags kyang ni bya ba yin// bu ram nodang sbyar ba yin// zas kyang rab tu sbyin par bya// sdugs la/ na mo badzrapA Nis+ya/tra/
tsa trak+Sha/ btsotAd+hi pa taya sat+tA/ shel mgin gyi gzugs gang dang// mthu stobs gang yin rab bshad de// nam mkha' dgan khabs pa 'byed// denadal nas 'ongab byed// gling bo/
moltar skada'abyen cing/ 'dab mas rlung nagayob byed// 'dabs donirlungags su// grab rayang ni byadapar 'gyur// skadan lan gnyis 'byin khyadacing// den khodakyis 'ong bar
'gyur// do' gtor ma sbyin bya zhing/ gsang sngags kyang n byab yin// de bzhin mdang sgyur bya yi// nasakyi zas kyang sbyin bar bya// ba lo mar dngad bzhinasha/ bu ramachang
gis bkang ba sbyin// sngags la/ na mo badzrapA s+ya/ kakaraklu kakaradri ti/ ka ka ra d+hi pa ta ye swAhA/ khra 'di dag ni bdag gsasu// mtshon bcas chog ldan bar
bshad// gang zhig khrananag po yi/[… ]/sngagasolasabartan talas rtsom pa// dela'ajigs pa rtseyang rung// cung zadokyang n 'byung mi 'gyur// de la sbrang rtsi'i mar sbyar// de las/
'gal ba las bya ba// gang yin de ni bdag nyid brlag/ bdag nyid chen po khru'adi dag/ mchod pa byas na ldog 'gyur te// lagan rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// khra thams cad kyi gsang sngags ni
lhag par spyan dang rig sngags kyi rgyal po dang sbyar bar bya'o// khrugazhom pa'i rig sngags tshangs pas smras pa ngas bshad rbate/ dedang sbyar zhing las bya'o// ngas kyang khra thams cad phung bar
bya ba'i phyir gtum po mi bzad pa'i rig sngags gang thos pas khrag la thog thog 'bab pa bzhin du dum bu brgyar 'gro bar 'gyur bar bshad par bya'o// na mo badzra pA Nis/ ma hatsan tsan
namanatsamane/ stam+b+han/ dzesnyani/ mo tani/ hihig ka re ya sA khrathams cad bzlog la yus kar gyis bya'o// de nas rdo rje 'byar byed gzhom par 'dod na rdo 'byar byed la
bltasal/ rdordzakhro bi nyid bsngags tabla bar bya'o// smana'adodig kyang gtobar[S]ste/ rgyasran gyi khub dang/ su sru'i rtsa ba dang/ 'om bu bsrags pa'i khu ba dang/ so
dang sam tab dang/ sam dza tidang/ 'di rnams bsrasapa'i chus gtaral nyi ma'i 'od kyis gdung bar bya'o// gang nanyis med nga da nor bu me shel bstan par bya'o// dunas bcos ma'i/
rdo rje 'byar byed gzhagang la'adod nasArAka'i thal ba dang/ gcam dang/ kanug dang/ abayag dang/ kun+ti ka'athal ba dang/ 'di rnams bsras pas bshig na des 'jig par 'gyur
