ra da nas bcos ma'i rdordza'abyar byed bya bsa'adod na lhang tshor srang gnyis dang/ so ma ratsa'is bon srang gcig dang/ ba bya srang byed dang/ mon sun gre'u'i phyi ma srung gnyis dang/ phyi
ma zho gnyes dang/ sa mdza ti zho gnyis dang/ ku ta dzazhiganyis dang/ ka' pa ti'i sa bon zho gnyis dang/ 'di rnams lhan cage tusbyar te phye ma zhib mor bya'o// lhang tshog yang
brtag par bya ste/ ka rtsa pa 'khasrogs pa'i chudang/ 'om bu dung/ in brig sha bsreg pa dang gcig pusbyaral/ ma thang gis bskus pa'i stod kyi nang du zla ba gcig gi bar du
bzha gnas / kra kan dang mu bre'i phye mas ba tab na/ de nas rdo rje'abyar byed dodag dang bar 'gyurato/ sgo grags sam/ rtse ga ngos sam/ gang 'a dod pa la gtumapa'i phyir gyis bskus
na jo rdzo'abyar byed de angashoka'i me tog 'dra bar dmar par 'gyur ro// las thams cad la'ang nye ba'i snying po dang ldan pa 'gyur ro// gter sgo 'di dag ngas bshad de// gti ro
rnams 'din yod do zhes// mngon pa'i rtagasan gang dag gis// nges par rtogs par 'grul 'di nyon// rdzas kyi tshod ni ji tsam pa// dkun bdag gis bshad
par bya// shing med khradakhrod gnas dag na// sa'atha yipishing 'adrapa// dkar zhing dri zhimasnangal yod// thabs sum 'gradraganyis tsaman// nor rnams khri phrag drug yodad// ngan
dang ldan pa yin// shing gi gnas ni duman// pad+ma'i'adabam 'dra ba dang// pad+ma chen po'i drazhimayod// bras su mi 'greng gnyis tsam yod// nor ni drug khri lnga stong yod// du ni
srinadang ldan pa yin// shing med pa yi gnas dgan// sa la thala'i 'bru 'drab// btula'i dri dang ldan pa yod// zabs su mi 'grangaganyis tsagan// 'bu'as lhag pa'i nor/
tshud de// don gnod sbyin ldan pa yin// shing med pa yi gnas rdugan/ sa la lashenga'adrab// gcig pu dri zhim ldan pa yod// zabs su ma'i grong gsum tsam na// nor rnamu
bya ba snyad yod da// dana rnam thos bu yi gnas// gongamed pa gnas rnams na// saNa' taye mog 'dra ba// dkar zhing drazhim ldan ba yod// zabs su ma'agradagsum tsum na//
nor rnams bzhi khro drug stongayod// de dag nani dbaldan yod// shing medab la gnas rnams na// caste sa la'o khra 'drab// rkang pa bzhil ldan pa ste// ka taka te dris na yod//
da na byeb snyed yod do// den klu dang ldan pa yin// mtshon rtags chen po 'di degani// bshad zinagazhanayang las nyon// dbul zhing skam 'tshub pa dang// dgunazhing gsang mar gyur pa
dang mdza' bo de bzhin gyi la sbrul// lhan cig gcig tu gnas pa dang// de bzhin sprul dang ni'u la gnyis// khung gcig nani lhan cig gnas// gangan go dra dkar po dang// byi te
dkar po lhan cig gnas// gang na wan nyal ba dang// tsa ste sa phyogs dro ba dang// khyin rtag tu grong bor nas// dgon pa'i phyogs gcag gang nyal// shengon thur du ma 'khrung ba//
ces thur du 'khrung 'gyur dang// 'om med las 'o ma 'byung mu tu'i rtse nag dugs 'dra dang// rgyalamtshan 'dabam 'dra ba dang// shing rnams gang dag bum pa 'dra// rtsa las rtsa
'byung ya lag 'byung// tshubatsakha 'dra ba dang// bdabam skam zhing lo ma snyam// dus ma yanepar me tog 'byung// rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa dang// tshoram med las tshor ma 'byung//
tshar m can las tshoram med// rtsa gcig shing rigs gangayanang// ci ste kha drag gyur pa dang// shing drung grogamakhar phung chon yod// dus ma yin pa me tog 'byung// shing drung
gangan gzugs yod la// rtag 'bras bu mchod pa dang// mchod pa medatsang gzi brjid ldan// shing drung gin phyogs gcig na// bad byed mtshan n snum byed yod// shing drung gi
ni phyogs gcig na// ci ste rdo bshad pa dang// grangag phyogs gcig ma ma yis// gnas yod mchod pa med pa dang// khronanga'i phugs gcig sas rgyas bzhag/
spyi khrenang gi phyogs ga cigan// bde byed mtshan ma stags bur bcas// rtag tu snyam pa gnas pa dang// khron pa yin phyogs gcig na// rdo leb ming dang ldan pa yod// zhing gi phyogs gcig
klu rnams kyis// mchod cing stags bur bcas pa dang// rtag tu snyam dang ldan pa yod// zhing gi dbus ni gang dgan// jo yi phungab chen pa yod// da na khung gi skyo yang yod// zhing dgagi
nadabus rnams na// rdob zur gsum yodang dang// rdzing budag gi 'gram dag na// ma mo rnams kyi gnas yodab// mchod ba med cing gzi byin ldan// mchod du byin kyang gazimed na/
sa bdenanorayod do// grong gi phyogs gcig sar song nas// rwadang rmigapas rkabar byed// khang pa brtsegs pa'i kha dog nas/ bya'ogathu du lta bzhin du// rtag tu skad kyang
'byin par byed// rdzing bu yin 'gram dgan// nusteganod sbyin gzugasayodadang// chu klung 'gramanas nigs rgyas gzugs// dbang phyugatshod lhan cig gnas// gongadangagrong
gi phyogs gcig na// sa 'bagasazhes bya rdo leb yod// grong rnams ni dbus dgon// snyigs bu med pa'i mchodashing yod// ku yi mchod shing stegs bu dang// lcan tsuganani
00 gnas yod// de dag gan lce phyogasan// grog mkhar phung bo chen po yod// grang ngam yang na dgon pan// mam gnas ni mchod pa med// sangs rgyas gzugs dang ma'i gzugs//
naste dedagagayon phyogs na// gang la nyi ma'igazugs yod la// klu dag dang nalhan cig gnas// zhing dbus rdo phung chen po yod// grog mkhar dngayang lhan cige gnas// sa gzhe dag
kyang dudapar 'thul// rtswa yang rid par 'gyur bste// rtag tuyang nogazi byin ldan// muangashin tuskam par 'gyur// chu ngogs phagu phung chen yod// sa dag kyang ni bye ma 'dra// khang
nga btsugs pa'i phyogs gcigen// rtag tududapa 'dra bar 'thul// grong ngam yang na dgon pa 'am// zhingangam yang na khyom dgan// khra dang phug ronalhan cag tu/ gangan shon tsumango'i
khrar 'gyur// gangangam tshu ma bkris pa'i m// skom pa yis ni gzir bzhin du// daltar dus ni thams cad du// phyogs gcig tuna dga' bar 'dzin// zhing dag gi ni dbus dag tu// rdo
leb mang dang ldan pa yod// shing rnams gang la b.langaji// srubs gzir zhing skomabs gzir// rtag tu'adzeg cing rtsa ba dang// sdug bsngal de bzhinarab bdar 'dzin// dus kun tu n
ba lang rdzi// gang dudabazhin rtsa byed cing// grazhing grang ba med par 'dzin// de bzhin dun skyo ba med// pad+ma'i sdong bugacig pal/ pad+ma' nipad+maskyes// de bzhin ut+pal ku mud//
ci ste kha dog ldan par 'gyur// dri yang zhum par mi 'gyur bar// 'dab ma dag kyang 'khums pa dang// gang la 'bras bu mchogs pa// de la bad+maku mu da// bgacin/
cha/ dungan rtagasudang// rdo thal rnams dang lhan cig sbyar/ de dang de yi me tog dang// tshu rnams la nigator byas nas// gang nagator de gnas pa yi// sa phyogs de dang ru rnams dang// me tog/
sngon po dmar por 'gyur// rtag tus phyogs gang dgan// mun khyiragangatsam yod la// sa gzhi de yang dro ba dang// khang pa brtsigs pa gang dag la// jo thal sngon por 'dug pa dang/ byu
rultakhuramadog dmar zhing// bar ba r duni gnas pa dang// yanarab tumadog sngo zhing// phug ron mdog ltar 'dug kyang rung// de bzhin ro ni khab dang// gangan gzugs nimadogasnam/
zhing/ bkras kyang shing dusnyam pa yod// de bzhin dri dang me tog 'phreng// dan snying por ldan ba ste// yan lag 'brumar bskus pa la// mi yi lce yis bldag byas nas// myur du yul bar 'gyur
tsha ba dang// gangan rdo rjegazugs yodapa// thur du yang nalta bar byed// phyogs gcig nanalha gzhan gyi// shing ngam angan rdo gzugs yod// mgo la rdza thogs ci stesnang// tshing 'gram gyi
gnas dag na// nor lha yinibu yi gzugs// nub phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug bzhin// shar phyogs logs su lta ba dang// rdzing bu'i 'gram na mtsho gnas// nub phyogs phyogs pa de 'dug
bzhin// shar phyogs legs su lta ba dang// khron pa'i phyogs gcig sangs rgyas gzugs// sa ste dur khrod gnas dag na// sangs rgyas gzugs 'dra snang ba dang// chumed phyogasanasbrul gzuglu/
dang / rtagang/ mi ro mgo med 'dra// rda 'am yang na shing l byas/ lam gyi bzhi mdogang dag na// cisnyadabang po re gzugs snang zhing// sgra chen lan zhinabazhin du// bum pa mgo la thogasanas
kyang [}]thur du lta ba yad nga dang// mi rnams yongs kyi mi gnas pa'i/ shing med pa yi gnas dag na// ma mo dag kyang gnas 'gyur la// mtshan ni thur du lta ba dang// shangag tshel na gong
dag na// rtsiste glingachen gzugs yod dang// gron gnas kyang ni rgyang ring ba// gangan phug gi gzugs yod nga// rdo 'am yang na shing las byas// shing gitshol gyi dbus dag dang/ shing mchims
bar la sogs pa na// dbang phyug gi gzugs yodad// den rtag tuthur du lta// khron pa'i phyogs gcig gnod sbyin gnas// gzugs brnyan stegs bur bcas pa ste// gang na klu dang
gnadasbyin dang// yang na gtum po'am brgyabyin gyi// sha tshugs 'dra'i shing rigs grogs// gang na grung gi thugs yod dang// glang gi gzugs nangashing las byas/ yang nas las byas
ba yod// shing girtel gyi phyi rol na// gnaku yi rdegazugs yod// lam gyi bzhi mdo gang dag na// kun gacig pu gnas pa la// shing rnams kyis kyang bskorab ste// mi rnams med
bas phyogs bzang// chumed pa yudegon pan// klus echodashingekha gragru bzhi// dur khrodazhani sprul 'dra'i shing// ya nganaklu la'atshodashing yod// dur khrod dan shinge yod ba/
chakrungashing dag gis kun nas bskor/ dur khrod gangan khyi dngani/ ya sha wanirtag tu gnas // grog mkhar ba la dus kun tsu// wa rnams snangang yodapa dang// dgun zhing grong gi phyi rol du// phyugs
nirtag tunyal bar byed// phag gam yang ni yang rung// so nas rtag tulta bodang// rkang lag dag gis 'dra bar byed/ byurdzogasal 'dug nas ni// rtagatuthur du ltabar byed// grogaMgakha
gyin phyogs gcig na// gang du bya rog mtshudagags// rtag turkabar byed pa dang// san rteb dang dud par ba thulaM// gan san dekarapo'i snang/ dbyazhing skam la nub pa dang// rtag tu yang
ni dud par 'thul// gtsang ma'i gnas ni gang dgan// rtag tum gtsang snang ba dang// nyi ma nubakadab tuyang/ dud pa med par dud 'dusnang/ dbyar zhing dra bas khebs 'gyur la// kho
ra khor yug gos pa dang// rtag tu yang ning btu'abar// shing drung gang na rtag 'bar dang// gol ba 'khri shing med pa la// dbyang zhing thog thog 'bar ba dang// rtag tu ma smi gang dag/
san 'kholog pa dag gis// khebs par snang ba yod ba dang// grang ba'i dusanadro ba dang// ba'i dusan grang bdang// gzhan dag gsanam 'dres pa'i// shing gi tshalagyi
dbus dgan// mi yi thod pa khung chen yod// anan dza dzin kan to// shangemed gnas ni gtamed do// khang pa de gang dag yang/ brag cha'asgri na yo dang dang// me tog med cing 'bras bur
ldan 'bras bu la yangs tog chags/ shing ga 'bras las 'bras bu 'byung// me tog las kyang me tog skyes// dkyil 'khor gzhidang 'drab yi/ sani reb tu 'bar ba yod// gang
na yal ga gcig bu las// 'bras bu 'byung gi gzhan las min/ lem med pa'i yal ga las// me tog gang nas 'byung ba yod// nyin ba lem 'khum 'gyur zhing// mtshan mo 'dubar/
'gyurab dang/ shing ganyis rtse mo'i el ga dang// rab tu'adu bar 'gyur ba yang// rdzingag 'graman stobs bzang gzugs// shar phyogs su naDib lta zhing// sred med bu yang lho phyog
'dug// casterdzong gi 'gram dgon// sangs rgyas sku gzugs yodapa dang// kun dga' rab 'i phyogs gcig na// ci ste gnod sbyin gazugs yodadang// kub yi ni ma rnams// phur
mar gsangashing buguyod// rtsisazhang gi dbus dag no/ klu yigazugs dang sku laka/ yang na bde byed mtshan yod dang// rtsiso zhingagi dbus dag na// khron pa 'ga' zhig yod ba dang//
bdo byed gnas kyi stegs bu yi// phyogs gcig n ni gzugs gzhan yod// lam gyi bzhi mdoreshing drungan// tsacu khron pa yod pa dang// dur ba dkar bo'i phyogs bzhinas// rtsa
rnams kyis kyang bskor ba dang// shi' ste gzugs yod dang// sa la sbrang mas rtag tubaskor// sa phyogs bzang por dbyar gyi dus// srin phyis phung po snang ba
ba ni yod[»]rtags 'di rnams las gtor rnams kyi// mtshan ma dag ni brtags byas te// 'byungabu dag na ngas bshad zin// do nas blugs par byaba'i smon// gang dag gis ni rtag
'gyur nas// rtag tu the tshom med 'gyur ba'i/ blugs sman cho ga mnyan par gyis// 'bras chen zhes sbyar til phye dang// kul+la a me tog rnams// ma ha'a'oms sbyar bar bya//
sna ma'i me tog btag par bya// ka ra wAre'i me tog rnams// ma 'a'i ma bo gcin sbyar// sran chung tri'i dngo lhan cig tu// tshuyis su zhi btag par bya// kun pa'i me tog blangs byas la// 'o
ma tsan dan dag dang sbyar// in+d+ra drig sha'i lam rnams// zhig chudang btag par bya// nyalcibasasan blangs nas kyang// chu dang lhan cige btagapar bya// kun+da mi togam bye ba// blangs
nas 'oms sbyar bar bya// ache dmar po'i ma rnams// 'om yis ni sbyor bar bya// ashanan zho dang sbyar// mkhas pas blugs sman de byas la// rang bzhin gyur bar rtogs nas ni//
nor go dpar nibastan pa yin// gzhan dag kyang na bshad byoste/ ma bgrogs payi kham phoradag/ 'bras phye lde gus bskus byas la// mdzub gang brkos nas gzhag par bya// rang
00 bzhin gzhan du gyur na ni// nor rnams yod par shes par bya// yus kar a pa'im toga rnams// gang bu dag tu brdzis nas ni// rang bzhin gyur nanor yod do// 'bras rnams til dang lhan/
cag tu// zhodang sbyar togong bur byas// kham phor kha sgyur nang bcugal/ mdzub gang brkos pa'i gtugazhage/ rab zhinagyuran nor yodado// dgun smad dus su dus rnams ni// mar
gyis bkang ste brkosanas gzhag/ zhu bar gyur na nor yod do// lha rnams sems can don gyi phyir// blugs sman dam pa'i cho ga rnams/ bdag gsos na bshad pa yin// sems can rnams
la phan gdags phyir// mig sman gangags mig bskusan// sa phagatar kun mthopa'i gyur ba'i// mig sman rnams kyang bshad par bya// 'ug pa'i machim zags pa yis// lag bu/
mig ni bsgos nas kyang// ldong ros dgadang lhan cig tu// blo can gyisan mig kyang bsku/ ldong sa dang ni shing mngar dang// ki'u wang dang ni'ug ba yi// mig rnams lhan cigasbyar byas
la blo ldan gyis namag kyang bsku// ra yi gcin dang de bzhin du// byi la yin gsuzhi blangs la// 'gab migadang lhan cig tu// dudu pa bkagaste bsreg par bya// 'di ga bu mig dang
sbyar byas la// blo ldan gyisani mog kyang bsku// rdul bu rang rishib yi// khong du lig bu mig bcugal// dud pa bkag stabasrogs pa na// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// 'dzin
lo mgo bo'i nang dag tu// log bu mgan be cug nas kyang// dudapa bkag bsregs nan// mag sman rab tubazang ba yin// ne'u le'i mgo bo blangasanus na// de
yin ng du ldong ros gzhug/ dudang bkag ste bsregs pa ni// mag sman rab tubazang ba yin// mthonalasgo dubya gagasgong// de bzhin sbrul mgo de dag rnams// dud pa bkags
gzhag khani// mig sman rab tu bzang ba yin// na ma karalamago dang// lig bu mig dang sbyar byas nas// dudab bkag ste bsregs pan// migasman rab tu bzang ba
na nyarangasha ba yi sprul dag gi/ khong du lig bu mige bcug la// ldong risodang ni lhan cag tu// dud pa bkagastabasrags pa ni// mig smanarab tubazang ba yin// nam skar gi'u
wang dang// 'ug pa yi nimig rnams dang/ 'jonamo'amago dang chamanyam par/ dudapa bkagalcebasreg par bya// lung bong ge ni mag gnyis dang// de bzhin byi ba'i mog gnyis dang//
byargod mgodang lhan cig tu// dudang bkag ste btsugs na// mig sman rab tubazangabayon// spre'u'i mjug ma dgadang ni/ de bzhin 'dzin mo'atshog gnyis dang// sprul gyi mgodang lhan
e tu// dudang bkag ste bsregs pani// migasmanakun gyi mchog yin no// sems can rnams kyi don gyi ngore// mig sman gyi nosbyorab mchog/ lhan ms bdag gos bshad payin/
ba00 mig sman rnams dang thugs sman rnams la ba'i snying po sbyar bar bya'o// gtad kyi las thams cad ni rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bya'o// nyeba'i snying po'i sa rdzogs so//
ngasasngarab shadapa'i pho mo gang yin pa thams cad kyi pho nyamolasa bshad bar bya'o// lha rnams rig sngags chen mo stobs chen mo'i 'phrulagyi rig sngags de dag gi rog sngagasakyi ro
galas kyang bshadapar bya'o// de la pa nyamo thams cad kyi las 'od yin// las spyod kyi gzhu sgrub pas dod pas zhag gsum sbyang ba byas l// 'phags b.lagan rdo rje'i mdun du

lha bshos sna tshogs lanasamachod pa byas te/ pri yang ku'angeshang gis me sbyaral dri yang ku dang/ gi'u wang dang/ ril bu stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg byas na zhag bdun gyi thumar longs spyod kyi gzhi
'thob par 'gyurjod/ mar gyi zhag banubal mchod sbyin byas pa'i mchod sdong byas nas mi ro bsragasan// rig sngags kyisnying po dang ldan parab zlas brjod byed bazhin du mdag ma blangs la/
blangs pa de spyan gyi sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du phug ron gyi khung dushibar byas te/ phyi mamar gyi ngo zhag bcubazhi la lha chen po'i gnas su song nas log 'dren gyi sngags kyis gtor
ma'i cho ga thams cad byas la/ zhag gcigesgyub byas rjes buso ma'i 'dab ma bdun blangs pa'i steng du so la bgazha gnas / gzugs kyi lho phyogasasu rigasngagra bzlas brjod bya ste/
dud pa 'thul ba'i bar du bzlas brjod byas l// de glangasazhasanangang rabram za rnams dang dgamyong gdge 'dun la mchod ston byas la/ de nas sbyar bar bya ste/ thigal
byas na lus masnang bar 'gyur zhing/ lelnga brgya thubal po nyamo thams cad dbang du 'gyur// zasasu 'o ma'i bdagagu brazhingatshos gcig la brtsams te/ tshes bdun gyi bar du rig sngags
bzlas brjod byas nas 'gagatsagesbyang ba byas la dka'abazlog ma'i gnasasusong ste/ 'bras lasamadung rtsa gsum pa byas pa brgyud stong sbyin sreg byusan yul gru thob par 'gyur ro//
chog 'ad nyid kyis ma mo'i gnas su song la mchod pa byas tadabang phyug chen pakaM sngags kyis las thams cad bya'o// mamo'agatso bo'imadun du 'bras phyi las 'khur ba bkra shis ldan/
par byas pabargyad stong sbyinesrog byas n yulakru sbyin pa byed do// o~M gyi bzhagabarub la zhag gcige sbyang byas ta/ 'phags laganardorje mdun du snyam 'i me tog kham bye ba brgyad stong
spyan srog byas n po nyamo thams cad 'asaso cogakhyodabar 'gyur ro// rigasngags kyi rgyal po sgrub pa las rnams ni phonyamo rnams sgyur ba'o// phanyamo rnams n bdud rtsi thebasbyoradang/
dga' khyodagadong sbyar bar bya'o// bdud rtsi thebasbyolasogs pa'i gsang sngag tham cad rig sngagasakyi rkyelabo dang sbyin sbyarab r bya'o// yang nabcom ldan 'das mnyitshigyur bar bya'o//
0 gdon no cog dbye bar 'dod n ma dana'itshor mdug dang khrag ginang du bsagasab brgyad stong spyan srag byas na 'byi bar 'gyur ro// ma gyi zhag bcubazhi zhag gcig sbyang ba byas tesmin drug gi bu'i
gnas su song nas/ rigesngags lan brgyad brgya bzlas brjod byas gzhan gyi yodedu 'ong bar 'gyur ro// skyes pa dang budamadadabang du bya bar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhag baicu bzhil zhag gcig smyung
ba byas te/ lha chen po'i gnasasu song la gzugs kyi lho phyogasasusang ldengag shing gis mesbyar nas/ yungs karagyis lan brgyud stong sbyin tsug byas n skyes pa dang bud med dbang du 'gyu'o/
ro[}]mar gying tshos bdun la rgyus sar la babapa'itsho/ bil ba lasashing ba'an bdunaskyes pa brus nas dug mo yungs kyi shing drung lan stong bzlas brjod byas tabatsugasanagrong khyatshe
mthoms cad gnyid 'ag par 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyud 'gos kyi reng bu byas te mi'o tshel gyis bsgos nas mar gyi ngo zhag bcub zhag gtsagesbyangs byas te/ lha chen po'i gnas
su song nasamachod pa rgyas par byas la gzugs kyi lho phyogs su spos kyi 'o dgagusamadung rtsa gsum pabras nas/ de'i steng du mi'ithid nga bzhag pal 'dug ste/ thod pa'i snod mtshel gyis
bkab zhing du spos kyiring bu bzhag pa las bod pa'i nang du dud pa chags par basanas/ da blas pa lagan rdo rje dang/ lha chen po dang/ grogs rnams la'ang skal ba byin te/ dazhas/
a @#// mig gnyis bskus na lus snang bar 'gyu zhing/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can stobs po rir ledagu brgya thub par 'gyur ro// gdon las thar bar byababa' don a
shu 'a shenge gis ma slar lan cha dang sgo tshos na 'daston gnas rog byas na tshe ngo bton nas gtor ba'agyur// dgun zla tha chung yagying tshes bcu ba 'khazhag gcig sbyang byas te/ 'phags pa
laga' rdo rje'i mdun du akarishingegs me sbar nas drin bu' 'am rtog brgyad stong sbyinesrag byas nab nya mo thams cad kyis dam pa sbyin bar rtagyur// tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can nipo nyago
thams cad kyi gzha'adebs pa dang/ sgrub pa byed par sa bskos ta/ da dran par byas n po nyamo thams cad mdunan ba bod pa 'gyur ro// nga dang lha rnams kyi snying po lta bur gyur// 'byung
po'i bdag po chog rgyas pa sgrub pa ponya mo thamasacad kyi yod dang 'thadab tshog sakyi bdag po lcags can bshad par bya'o// namor tsAya/ nam NAbadzrapA mi// ma sAyakrus nApa tis/
tad+yathA/ 'barab/ d+habadUb/ ma mar/ b+hany+dzab+hany+dza/ han han/ dahad ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ groT+Tagro/ ts+tshi n+da/ b+hin+d+rib+han+do/ tan la hakabadrinaNasA hA/ lcagasacan snying lta bu gyur
ba d+ha 'byung po'ibadag po chog rgyas par sgrubab// tshogs kyi bdag po'iphanyamo thamasacad kyi yod dang 'bod pa bshad de/ na mo badzrapA Niyi/ nam A kAr ya/ namonan+dakeshwarAyA ru lu ru lu/
'atam taM gi/ 'a dka/ dus minan A be sha ya swA hA/ 'di ni tshogs kyibadag po lcags can po nyamo rnams kyis gzhan 'debs pa dang/ sgrub par byed pa thogs bamed pa'is
can na// gdon dbab pa thams cad laname tog gis bya'o// las so cog la'ang tshogs kyi bdag po lcags can brjodon las sbrams cad bya'o// zhag gsum snang ba byas nas mar gyi ngo
zhag brgyad la laganardardzo'i mdun du dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs te dri dang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa yul nas bkaMka shangegs me sbar ba'iba'iyam srog shing brgya stong sbyin sreg
byas/ de'i 'og tu tshogs kyi bdag po lcag sa can gyis mtshan mo ma len du bstan par 'gyur ro// de nas bonyamo rnams las thams cad byed pa 'gyuralo// pho nya mo rnamAkyachog rdzogs so//
leg 'dren rnams kyirige sngags bshad pa gangayin pa de nyid snyingapo'i mchog kyang bshad nga rabya ste/ namo badzrapA Ni// a ba tetam tes// snying poralas rnams 'byung
ste/ sgrub pa thams cad dang/ las thams cad 'khas 'danyid kyis bya ste/ gu gu'adang na yungs karadang/ gi'u wang shu dag ru rta dang// sug smel yang ni de bzhin tu// sgron shing dang
ni thang sha dang// tsan dan dang na a ka ru// a' ka pad dang// gesala'adi rnams chab snyam sal// mudang lhan cigabatagapar bya// gan sbyar sman 'de gnas pa// derani'ajigs
pas 'byung ste// chom rkun ma yana mtshon rnams mane// sbya la rnams mayin lha min min// 'gan rdo rje 'das bskus bas// sa steng dag tu rgyal bar 'gyur// 'di
lus lus la bskusapa ni/ log 'dren rnams las thar bar 'gyur// sbyar smano 'don byas nas kyang// sgrub pa thams cad bsgrub byas na// lag 'drenanams kyisamatshugs te/ 'gan
rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// 'thog 'don rnams kyang gzhen 'dabs pa// sgrubs byed par 'dod ngan// 'phags pa lagan rdo rjes bdud rtsi theb sbyorab skos so/ mar gyi ngozhag brgyud la zhugagatsuge
sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lagan rdzamadunadu tsan dan dmar po'i khu bas 'phags pa bdud rtsi thabasbyor bri'o// dgayog sug cu rtsa gnyis kyang thal bas bri'o// de'i 'og 'dren
rnamaMs la gto'am sbyin par bya'o// bdud shag sbyor yang lan brgya bzlas brjod bya'o// danas 'gan rdorjes bshad pa bzhin du lag 'dren rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// luga'adren rnams
kyichog rdzogs so////'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyidabang phyug gi rig pa mchog las bcom ldan 'dasam gos dkar can bshad pa gang yin pa de'i phyi ma'i shes
rnams ngasa bshad kyis/ lha rnams nyon cig/ sgrub pa thams cad la srung ba yin to/ tshom rkun dang/ stag dang/ sbrul dang/ musrinanabakradang/ ma sAka ra rnams las gnas bsrung ba dang/
mtshams gcad pa dang/ kha bcing bar bya ba rnams yid kyis bya'o// gter srung ban gtor gangan yodang der song la sgrung ba byas te/ dkyil 'khor skyang nul gyis byugs nas ba'i bkeshing gi me cin
duyungs kar mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyastong sbyin srog bsananga' 'og tu gtar ston par 'gyur te/de nas byang bar bya'o// mar gyi zhag brgyadal zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa spyan
sa gzigs dbang phyugagi mdun du mchod pa byas nas snama'im tog brgyad stong lan re bzlas brjod byas te/ 'phag pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi brang du bosnun la bzlas brjod rdzogs pa'i
til gyis lan brgyud stong sbyin sreg byas na/ dngos grub grub pa'i mtshon ma 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi yon lag dang nying lag 'gul bar 'gyur ro// de nas grubanas yul gru
'am yang na gsar sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gi ba duslong mo'i zas zazhing ragi sngags bzlas brjod byos la/ danas rigasngags 'chang gis zla ba ta la zhag gcig sbyangs byas/
ras ma nyams pa la tshon rtsi sbyin madangs 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'dri'i gzhug ste/ 'dam bu mda' rgyu'i mdog can/ thobatsugs byas pa/ lagapa g.yonong na pad+ma thogs
ba g.yas pan sngags kyi nor bu thogs te/ bran dpal gyi be'u yodapa/ pad+ma'abazhugs par bya/ g.yas phyogasasu bcom ldan 'dasam gos dkacan 'dam bu mda'achu'i mdog
dang ldan ng/ thor tsugs byas shing pad+ma'i 'phreng bas brgyan pa/ par l ngo zhugs te yade tsam gyis 'dud par bya'o// de nas rigasngags 'chang dbu byas pas mar gyi ngo
zhag lnga la sku gdung dang ldan ba'imachod rten gyi drung du ri mo'i skegazugs bkram ste/ mchod pa rgyas par byas la lha babs kyang rgyas bar dbul la// rimigazugs kyi mdun du pra yong ku'i phyi ma
brjes ngas gzugs byas ta/ spyan ras gzigs kyi gsang sngags snying po dang bcas pas lan brgyadabargyabazlos brjod bya'o// de nas 'ajug brtul tarig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod/
byas ngas mtshams gcad par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das masan steng dang 'og bde bar bya'o// steng dang 'og bcing ba na lho phyogs su skalamada' ltung bar 'gyurata/ nas dngos grub 'grub
pa rimtshan mangashes par bya'o/ de nas rigasngags 'chang gis yang nyareg byas lari mo'i gzugs kyi mdun du ku sha'i stan la 'dug ste/ rig sngags lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byason ri mo'i
gzugs 'gul zhing sa'ang g.yo btsuga'o// danas 'grub par 'gyurata/ bum la phyag byas nas rig sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du gyun du 'phagasabu bya'o// 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i
gzugs can du 'gyur zhing/ dpag tshad stong du rgyan du 'phags shing dbagasangazhing migarno bdang/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyis mi sodapa dang/ tshol dgu stong thub par 'gyur ro// lus
dang bral ba'i 'og tu'ang bdab can du skye ba 'gyur// gas dkar can gyi rig sngags kyi chog lagazhan 'debasangashingesgrub par byed pa'i gsang sngags chen po'ang sa sprin pa'i byago/ o paNAr/
gsani/ na dzoTam ku Ta d+ha ra NasAhA/ kobaka ba ka bkaM bi re swA hA/ 'gasngags 'di 'gan jorje'i mdun du 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gigazugs gzhag par bya'o// de'i g.yon pho
du ni gos dkar can gzhag par bya'o// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis yar gyi ngo zla ba nyal nyin mtshan du sbyang ba byas te/ dridang/ me tog dang/ bdug pa 'gogs bas mchod pa byas nas/
zhag gsum gyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na/ da nas gos dkar can 'grub par 'gyur ro// gos dkacan gyi chog rdzogs so/// lha rnams sa 'bags ba spun
ras gzigs dbang phyug gi las rnams bshad brin// gzhonan rdo rjesde'ithogs pamed pa'e sa rnams kyang bshad par bya'o// ston zla rab chos brgyud la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas/
lag na rdorje'i mdun ka ra wAra'i me tog brgyad stong lanarab zlas brjod byas bas 'phagasab rdorjesnga' bsnun namadun du 'dug b.la'agyur/ phonyamo rnams kyis lhatshikaMsaso cog ga
par 'gyur zhing/ del dngos grub nang 'jug ste/ mngags ma thag tuyid re sems pa 'grub par 'gyuralo// gdona rnams kyisnying gzhom par byanan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i
yungs kar gyis bya'o// bca' sga 'a'abadunababasabarjod byas tagadon la bstan gdon gyi lus tshabs 'dangs bar 'gyur ro// nad de chog 'a sa' lan bdun bzlas
brjod byas te byin nanadamed par 'gyur ro// gzhon nu mchog gzhon 'debasashing sgrub par byed pa 'osnying po bshad zin to// drag tu bskul ba gzhan ya nga bshad par bya'o// namo badzrapa/
o puyu huyu sA hA/ 'phags pa dordzasde'i snying po'o// mar gyi zhaga brgyad lo'agagacig sbyang ba byas te/ lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rdo rjesde bzha gnas me tog dkarapo brgyad stong snying
po dang sbyar ta'aphags padojusde labasnunan/ do nas 'phags pa rdo rje ste 'grub par 'gyur te/ drag bskul ba'isnying po mchogabazlas brjod byas pas las thams cad khyed ra'agyur ro/
'phags pa rdo rje sde'i tshig rdzogs so/// lha rnams sa' phagasab dongosdo'i las gang dag gis myur dumadun na gnas par gyur ba rnams bshad zin te/ 'gying
bar duga' khamathu dang pha rol gnon ba dpag tumed pa'i rgyud phyi ma gang gis rtse bzhin du bdabag las rnams byed pa'i ng bshad par bya'o// mchu zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba
byas te/ 'phags pa laganardo rje'i mdun du arkatIshing gisi me sbar nas yungs karAmar dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin srogabyas zha gzhon nu mchog 'grub pa 'gyur// las dgrub
pas chog rgyas par gzhan dag bde blag tu 'grub par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang rigesngags sgrub pa na gzhan nu'i gsang sngags dran par bya ste/ dran pa tsam gyisa myur du mdun 'dug pa
'khrul// rtse zhing sgruban lha thams cad gzhon nubalta ba'i phyir 'ong bur 'gyur te/ 'os nas des grub sbyin par bya// zhag gsum sbyang ba byas temar gyi ngo zhag bcubo'i lha chen po'i
gnasasam/ yang na kun dga'ir ba'am/ khang stong du song nas re'u dkarapo byas tadri dang/ ma tog dang/ bdug bas brgyan la kha lho phyogs su bston nas sbrang rtsi dang alam bums lag paganyis
bskus te rkangapa g.yasapa byug par bya'o// rigasngags kyang lanabargyastongabazlasabarjod byas taba'u s+sa ' gzhugago/ das/ lami btubana'angalanabargyad stong bzlas brjod byas te/ donas smar
bcugan ci bya zhes smra rab r 'gyur// des kyang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par gyis shig ces smos shig/ de nas yid la gang bsams pa de thams cad 'grub bar 'gyur te/ tshol stong nyisabargya
thubapar 'gyur// gzhon nu'i las 'gasngags kyi rig sngags sgrub par byed pa bshad zin to// ste rordza'i rigs sgrub paka'adodanalagan rdo rje'i sras gtsu gnas byung gtum pa/
drag pa/ 'duladaka' ba bstenang ra bya'o// sgrub par 'dod pa gang yin pas yum snyinga'adran par byas sras gtum po dran par bya'o// 'di'i las gang sgruban rdo rje'i rigs 'grub par gyur par ng
bshad par bya ste/ marang zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang babyas nas/ 'phags pa lagan rdo rje'i glo g.yas phyogs su ni 'phags pa rdo rjesde/ g.yon phyogs su na'ebags pa
tsha gtsug nas byungagazhag go/ dedag la dri deng/ me tog dang/ bdug pa rnams dbulabar bya ste// 'phags pa rdorje sde ni 'on danadakar po dbul lo// 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dang gzhon nu lana'on
dan dmar po dbul// me tog dkar po dang dmar po 'ang tshuladadang 'dra bar dbul bar bya ste/ da'i mdun du sang lding gcig nge gisame sbaral yum gyi gsang sngags kyis tsan dan dmar po'i yamasrog
shing gar gyi nang du bsnyags pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas gzhon nu'agrub par 'gyur te/ bgags medang bde blag tu chog rgyas pa 'grubapa'i chug/ lagan rdo rjes bshad pa bzhi/
rig sngags rgyal po mnga' bdag mchog/ gang zhig phyag 'tshalamachod byed pa// gzhag rtag tu lan cig gam// yang dang yadurjod byed ng/ gzi chen srasan yumadang bas/ lag
mtsha pa ru dran par byed// dalangasan khor zug tu// lag nardorjesabaskul ba bzhin// dngos grub kyang ni sbyin bar bya// gangazhagechog rgyas pa 'di// gsang bcas gsang chen ldan pa dang//
lagan rdordzas sngagasa bshad dang// gzi chen phyi ma'i rgyud klog dang// gzhon nu dam pamanga' bdagani// spyan dang lhan cig ldan pa dang// byama'i rgyud las bshad pa yin// las rnamA

tha gang zhig lta byed pa// de la dpalaldan rdo rje ba dzani// lus kyi spyi bor rtag tu gnas // de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjesasangs rgyas kyi spyan spyi la bskur te/ rdo rje'abar ba'i ting nge 'dzin
snyoms par zhugs so// bcam ldan 'dasalagar rdo rje s rdo rdzo'abar ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs kha thag tulha thams cad sams 'jigs pas 'gyur talhags nas/ khyab 'jugan
bcom ldan 'das kyi glo g.yon phyogs su 'dug go/ lha chen ngo ni g.yas phyogs su 'dug go/ smin drugamana'adzom bzhin du rgyab logs su 'dug go/ dka' bzlogamanAmadun phyogs su
'dug go/ gzhon nu dril mdzes dang smin drug gdun glogayus phyogs su 'dug go/ tshogs rnams nigayon phyogs su 'dug go/ pho mo drug gis bskor ba'i dbal gyi lha mo gzi brjid
chen ro shin tu'od 'bar ba drag ma pha rol gnon pa drag mo ni phyogs gcig tu 'dug ste/ de'awe yul dang/ lha ma yin dang/ grub pas bstan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor der ma zhugs
sa danas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje ting 'dzin lasabazhes talha de dag laglang bo che'i lta stangs kyis bltasaso// de nas phyogs gcig na 'dug pa'i deb gyi lha mo dang/ po/
nyamo stobs chen mo'i pha rolaganon pa dang ldan pa drug kyang bltas so// de nas pho nya mo drug po rnams kyis dpal gyi lha mochen mo legs par bltasanas/ phanyamod dag gis bstod
da phanyamo chen mo me lce ma dang/ me stag ma dang/ 'phreng ldan ma dang/ mdzod ldan ma dang/ 'bar ldan ma dang/ kha 'bam dang/ 'di dag gisodapal gyi lha mo la bstod
pa ag dzihAsU yaMnam/pItAraMrAya nam/ yamA yanam/ dahanAyanam/ bin+d+ra dzi yAyanam/ Adar nA yanam/ brongesha lA yanam sa nA/ melcams bstodonasalha rnams dga'
bar gyur te// me stagama'i roge sngagasa bshad de/ tsu ru tsu ru/ mu ru mu ru/ pu ru pu ru snya/ a kats+tshab tasA hA/ me stag mas bstodanas/ 'phreng ldan ms bstod// namobadzrapAN1
du bti/ de pa ya/ ci ma lo/ ku'i pra tIts+tshab deb te swA hA/ 'phreng ldan ms bstodanas/ mdzod ldan ms bstod// namo badzrab Naye de ba ti rA bA yAtib ri so ro'o/ bya dur/ yin
tod naswA hA/ mdzod ldan ms bstodran s/ 'bakaldan masa mngon par bstod do// nam badzrapA Nis/ nam/ pra tsaN+Das+ya/ namas+saM tusajab+hAta/ pra shamani/ sarba a sadunan bshe mi
nan nan/ mo han ma han/ hi hibadzrapA Ni// 'baraldan mas bstod nas/ kha'abarams mngon par bstod pa/ griya ma hAkhriye// mo lamahAtsal/ irnyed dkan/ ma
b+ho gin/ b+ho ga ba ti/ ma ma ba le kas/ kha'abarams bstod nas lha'i mig gisa rnam par bltas so// de nas dpal gyilha mo chen mos lanardo rje la bstodanas/ de nas bskyodabar
za za brtsams so// dunas lha'i dkyil 'khor de dag gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong nas myur du langs te/ lagan rdo rje'i g.yas phyogasasu 'khod do// stobs po che'i tshog
brgya la gtum byed dang/ gser can dang/ rmugs byed dang/ rdzong ldan dang/ lcags can dang/ so can dang/ mtshan sbyin dang/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor la sogs pa tshog sabargyad po dodagagis
mngon par bstod do/// tshogs rnams kyis dbal gyi lha mo tshanamo stobs chanam bstod pan/ spyan dalagan rdo rje la phyag 'tshal nas/ thog mar gtum khyed ma brjod pa// namo brjod Naya/
da ma da ma rigA laM gA/ gag ga ya ga a grag yo/ tsan+dako dzA pa ya tisA/ gnyis pa ste gsar can brjod pa/ na mo badzrapA Nigya/ banaban/ la pa lapa/ namo dzAko baya tisany+tsa/ gsum pa ste

rmugasabyed brjod b/ na mo badzrapA Nis/ dra had ha/po tshapartswa/ nornany+nyo na/ nAshaya/ brinAshaya dzib+haka dzApa ya tis hA/ bzhi pa ste rdzong ldan parjod pa/ nam badzrapA Nis+ya/ tsu ru tsuru/ tata
tati d+ha ma ta ma ta/ kot+tatakota ta pa ya tis/ lnga pa ste tshogs chen mo lcags can brjod ng/ namo badz+dzipA Nis/ tad+ya thA/ rab rab/ dbad ba/ ma ra ma ra/ mA ra mA ra/ b+huny+dzab+ha/
han han/ dahad ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ shrIts+tshagro/ tshin+ditshin+da/ b+hin+dabin+do/ han le haka badzraNasAt+tA/ drug pa ste so can brjod pa/ namo badzrapANes/ phutahuta/ grwa sa pa hari mi brjed na/
su pu tin dan tako dzApa a tiswA hA/ bdun pa ste tshugs gziba'i stobs po che mtshan spyi brjod ng/ namabapA Nis/ tiShA tiSh+Tha/ b+hom gra habaphros te na su pa ti pa ba

dal to dzA pa ya tisA hA/ brgyad pa ste tshogs chen po bdud rtsi thob sbyo brjod pa/ namo badzrapA Ni// hulu hulu/ tiSh+Thati a mr-i ta kuN+Dal/ khakha khA khA hi/b+han+dab+han+d+ra su dA/ lhad dag gis tshogs
chen bargyad po de dag las brtsams te/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la bstod nas/ tshogs chen po dadag gis kyang dbal gyi lho ma chanamol rim gro byed cilagan rdo rje'i bar khyadagyila 'khor du song ngo//
dazhusa gzhonan smin drug gi bus lha mo drel bstod pa mthong nas rang gi rig sngags kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen ma la bstod pa/nam badzrapANis/ drilekyakhanib rngu ba Ni/ sarbad+ham+maNi/ samani/ sami
ra Na sarba ka ba shaM kari/ dza dzamu dzaM/ phrad yaM/ a brtan/ mi la malo/ mal tsal ya/ sarba le ko tas dan/ a nunatan sA hA/ donas dbal gyi lha mo chen mo gzhonan smin drug gi bus
bstod nas yid rab tu dga'azhing/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyin du song ngo// de nas dpal gyi mtshan mo 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nang du song ba drug masa mthong nas rag rig sngags kyis
bstod pa// na mo badzrapA Nis/ nam/ sa t+yA pA Nanan/ sa rkyab tsanas taM/ ba tinas taM ba de sa t+yaM/ bahitadzab ti/ mA lan/ hariNibartani/ jatod la/ sarba le ka bgo ka ri/
sa At+manan mu nas+ya/ ke bi ti/ yo ga mdar/ la hili/ namos tes hA/ drug masabastod pa dka' bzlogams mthong nas mngon par bstod pa// na mobadzrapA Nis/ sud de/ da ya te/ a titra/
so mi bra/ ba da ni/ rig shi/ nak+Shatu tre/ yasnyad dras byen/ nyib tu ka ya nas hA/ dran s dbal gyi lha tshogs chen m 'drug ma dang dka' bzlog ma gnyis kyis bstod nas/ drug ma dang dka'
bzlogamaganyes la'ang bltas te/ lag dornga 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang dusongang/ de nas dang la gyi lha mo chen mo lha rnams kyis bstod de/ lagan rdo rje 'khar gyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du

zhugs nas rig pa mchog gi cho ga chen po rgyas pa bya zhing 'phel bar bya ba dang/ rige ba mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po brgyan pa dang/ rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen pa rgyas pa bsgrub pa dang/
rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po'i dpal bskyed pa dang/ rig pa mchog gi cho ga rgyas pa chen ng rig sngags kyi las thams cad bya ba'i phyir/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po'i mtshog lag na
de rjes rjes su yi rang ba/ ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa// grub pa rnams chudas za bar byed pa/ 'dod pa thams cad rab tu sbyin b/ rtag tudapa la mngon par 'phel bar byed pa// dkyel
'khor thams cad gsal bor byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad la'ajug par byed pa// dkyila 'khor thams cad sgrub pa'i rig sngags
bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen ngolag rdo rje spyi bo'abakur tarig sngags 'di bshad ro// namo bud+d+has+ya//
namod+harma s+ya/ na ma/ saMg+hagya/ namo badzrapA Ni gyi/ na mo ya kA NAn/ namo ma hAshule/ ri li/ unam da/ praman+te/ pradz+ha/ shi ye/ mkhal/ shAya/ a kar Ni/ u pa ti/ u
patiSh+Tha/ a mo pu ru khaM/ nam u pa tiSh+Tha/ ma ya ram/ gri de hri he/ deb tibagrosAmAn sA hA/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngagasa bshadam thag tulha rnam
tsho kyis de thos nas snying 'dar te/ lag na rdordzi'i zhol du lta zhing 'khod do// danas 'go sngags kyi rgyal po chen po gan rdo rjes/ lha de dag la'adiskodacas smras so// lha rnams khyed kyis rigo/
[– ]sngags kyi rgyal bo chen po dpal gyi lha mo chen mos rig sngags bshad ng gang yin pa nyin cig/ rig pa mchogagi chog rgyas pa chen po'i phyare'aphel bar bya ba dang/ rig ba mchog gi chog rgyas
ba chen po brgyan pa dang/ rig pa mchog gi chog rgyas pa chen po bsgrub pa dang/ rig pa mchog gi tshig rgyas pa chen po'isgrub pa dpala mngon par bskyod pa dang/ rige mchog gi chog rgyas
tsha pa chen po'i rig sngags kyi las thams cad byakha'i phyir/ mgrub pa rnams grub par byed pa/ grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed pa/ 'dod po thams cad rab tu sbyin pa/ rtagatu
ba dpal 'ape la bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad gsal bar byed pa/ dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi nang du gtogs pa// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug par byed ba/ dkyil 'khor
thams cad sgrub pa'i rig sngags bshad pa de/ bzod ldan dag khyed kyis rgyags pamed pa'i soms kyis nyon cig/ ngas rdo rje 'bar zhing rab tu'abal kun tu rab tu'abar bas spyi bo gshag
sa'i des lha rnams snying 'dar talagan dzarje'i zhal du lta zhingo 'gesngags kyi rgyal po laganardo rje la dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa'i rig sngags kyis kyang mngon par bstod de/
rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpal gyi lhams rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de dag gisolag nadordzol bstod nas tshig 'di skad ces skyasaso// rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po dpalagyi
lha mo kum yulta bachen po'i rig sngags kyi dkyil 'khor gyi nang du gtogs pa las rnams bshad du gsol bshad du gsol/ danas rig sngags kyi rgyal bo chen polagAn rdo rje s/ lha de
dga' 'adi skad ces smras so// lha rnams sa bshad kyis khyod nyon cig/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpa' mngon par 'byung bar byed pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor dpal thams
cad skyed par byed pa/ pha rol phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal pa dongs bshad par bya ste/ gang mthong nas rig sngags 'chang thams cad kyi dpal
thamasacad kyi mngon pakha'agyurab dang/ lhathams cad bskyed par 'gyur ba dang/ log 'dren thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang/ rgyalasrid thams cad bsten
'gyur ba dang/ dgra thulakhar 'gyurab dang/ rig sngags 'chang gi dngal rnams 'phel kha 'gyur ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po de ngas bshad do// sa gzhimanyam par bartagabyas la//
shes rab can gyis dkyil 'khor bri// khru ni bzhi'am khrunubecudrug pa// gyo mi dang ni gsag ma med// dur khrod yang nashinge gcagadrung// yang na chuklung 'dus pa'i m// sagazhi de
dag brtag byas la// danas mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri// sa de lta bu mthong nas sbyang ba byas taM/ gso sbyong dang ldan pas du gu la'ices dkar po khagos la/ lasan pog porashogs

nas phyema'id kyi dus 'tshams su dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngagasakyis lha rnams spyan drongabar bya'o// de nas nam phyed kyi dus sam yang na nangapadakyil 'khor bri bar bya ste/ ci ste gsol gyi phye mas
brananalha' drapal thob ba'agyur ro// dngulagyis ni dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur// zangs kyis zhi bar 'gyur// yang natsan dan gyi phye mas brisazhan debal thob par 'gyura'i// tsan dan
dmarapo'i phye masan degralas rgyalabar 'gyur ro// dungashel phyis ni grong khyer zhib 'gyur ro// yang 'bras phye dkar bsabrisonan dpal thob par 'gyur ro// nas rngon pa'i phyis bris
gan dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// gzhan me'i bsreg bya byas pa'i thol bas bris nan zheber 'gyur ro// ci ste so cag gi khyim 'am/ sol phye'am/ dur khrod kyi thol ba'ang rung ste/ tshon rtsi 'di
gsum kyis dkyil 'khor bsenayul 'kho la gnod par 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang bdaganyid dag par bya ste/ rgyu skar dang mthun pa'idusasu sbyang bubyas la/ nyim bzang ba 'am/ yungan
yar gyingachos lnga'adakyil 'khor khrub drug pa'i m/ yang na khrubanubazhipa bri'o// ste thog ma shar phyogs su thog btabanan rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi dbal 'khel bar 'gyur ro// ci ste lho phyog/
su btab nan grongakhye' gnad bar gyur ro// rtsis nubaphyogasasu btab nanarigasngags 'chang rnams phanatshun ma mthunab 'gyur ro// ci ste byang phyogs su btabanan dgra thams cad las
rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ci ste thog mar tshon dkar bo bkyananirgyal po rgyal ba'agyur zhing rig sngags 'chang rnams kyi las 'grub par 'gyurar// ci ste tshon dmar po can ni grong khyazhi bar 'gyur
ra d+harusnyenag po bkye na nigrong khyer lam dag bar 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gas rig sngags kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bazhin du dkyil 'khor bri b.rubya ste// byang phyogs su
gangs kyi rigazhagag/ lho phyogs sun rtsi'i bigs byed gazhag go/ de nas khor yug gi 'os bskor bar bya'o// dbus sun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dasakhri'o// g.yon logs su ni
ba0 @#// lag na rdo rjebri'i// bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas legs sun dpal lha mo chen mo bri'o// lags rdo rje'i drung dun po nyaso drug bri'i// byang phyogs ngos sun khyaba'ajug dang//
lha chen po dang/ tshongs pa rnams de dag dang mthunaba 'khor dang bdud rtsi gzhag go/ nub phyogasasu drug ma dang/ dka' bzlogam dang/ gzhonanu 'khod ngabacas pa gzhug go/ lho phyogs su
nitshogs drug cu rtsa bzhi po rnams gzhag go/ sgo re'iyang tshogs rnams gzhag parub ste/ shar phyogs kyi sgoragatum byed dang/ gsarathan gnyis gzhag go/ lho phyogs kyi sgorani
bdud rtsi thab sbyor dang/ rgyugs byed ganyisagazhagag/ nub phyogs kyi sgo nardzong ldan dang/ mtshan sbyin gnyis gazhag go/ byang phyogs kyi sgor ni lcags can dang/ so can gnyiso gzhag
gonang dunabecom ldan 'dasaM tshigaldan m dri'u'i 'a khor gyisabaskor bgazhag go/ kar sha pa Nabargyartsatshong ba 'am/ yang n pa Na brgyas rdo rje byas ta bzhi gal/ de'i steng spyan gyis bzlos
brjod byas pa'i bum pa mi gnag cing rtsa ba med la mgrin bcings dang bcas pa gzhag par bya ste/ bum pa de'i nang du sa bon thams cad dang/ rin po chathams cad gzhug cing 'om
dpa'i shing gi yal ga gzhag go/ gru bzhir yang bum pa bzhigazhag par bya ste// mgrin bcings dang ldan palas bon dang rin po che thams cad bcug ste/ 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi
ga' go gzhag go/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gang dgad lam rig sngags 'chang la byub 'bras bu'adodanag sngags 'changed yum la bsnyenabakur bya'o// bum des kyang rig sngags
'chang smyung ba byas pa/ byang chub kyisems yongs su bzungab gso sbyong gi yan lag dang ldan ng/ gos gtsang ma bgosapa// dar dkar gyis gdong g.yog pa dkyi'o 'khor du gzhugapa ra
bya'o de la nub phyogs kyi sgor bcugan ni dbala mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur// lho phyogs suni rtag tu rgyalabar 'gyur/ shar phyogs su ni'athab mo 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byung
phyogs su ni bla ma'i sgo yin tajug par mi bya'o// dunas bla ma'i rig sngagasa'achang dug la sa dkarapos gdong g.yogs la/ dpal kyelha mo rig sngags kyis mgo bor bsang gtor
byas to gzhug go/ danas 'gran bu brgyadabargya lha la dor bar bya'o// 'gron bude'ang lo mas dkrisananirog sngags 'grub par 'gyura'o/ las dkar po dkris tabon na zhag bdun gyis
dpal 'ong bar 'gyur// rig sngags 'chang de dag la lha rnams kyang bstan par bya'o// de nas phyir byung ste byang phyogs su song la dbus kyi bum pa'i chus khyer ba'i nang du sbyin no//
rigasngags 'chang rnams kyis kyang lag pa g.yon pas mnos pa dang bas btung bar bya'o// rig sngags rnams la'ang sems can thams cad bdag gis yongs sugazungang zhes sgros
shig ces bsgo b.ruphyago/ de'i 'og tu dag gi don gyi lo re bdag gis pha 'dutu phyin pa drug po rnams yongs su rdzogs par bya'onyis/ ra gzhug go/ de'i 'og
tude dag gi don gyi phyirarig sngags kyi tshogs rnams bdag la grub par gyur cigaces smrab gzhug go/ de nas rigesngags 'chang ba spu ldang bar 'gyur zhing bstod pa b+he gru'i sgra'ang thos par
'ga'o// de'i 'og tu 'o ba'abremaza rnams kyang rgyalakha gyurakaM/ dar kha chu zhig ces brjod par 'gyur ro// dung gi sgra dang sgra'ang thos par 'gyur ro// caste bud med
tshogos dkar po bag zhingesnod gang ba thogs pa mthon ni/ lagonados ji skad bshad pa bzhin du rig sngags 'chang de la dpal 'ong bar 'gyur ro// ci ste thub ba gangab mthong nan
rgyal srid dam/ ul gru 'am/ grang gi bdag po thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dpal thob par 'dod na dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung ba byed pa'i
dkyil 'khor chen po 'di mthong na 'ge sngags 'chang thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur te/ rig sngags 'chang thams cad las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// ci ste dpal thams cad mngon par
'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad mthong na ni de'ang rgyal bar 'gyur te/ dgro rnams btul nas sa'i steng 'khor bar 'gyur ro// ma thal pa gang la la dpal 'dod
pas dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyila' kher chen po mthong na'ang skal ba can gyi khyad par du 'gyur zhing/ rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag po 'am grong gi/
bdag bor 'gyur te/ dkyil 'khor chen po 'di'i las 'di nidin yod pa yin no/ zhes jorje 'dzin ng sa bshad do// de nas rig sngags 'chang go sngags kyi dengos grub 'dod pas/
dpal thams cad mngon pa 'byungab byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen mo mthong la/ mthong nas zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gter du nges par gnas par bya ste/ gasngags gang 'dod pa bsdus
brjod byas na zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis de 'a'agesngags de 'grub par 'gyur ro// rgyal pos d mthong tazhag nyi shu rtsa gcog gibar du nges par gnas pa'i ng yid la bsams pa thams
ud thob par 'gyur ro// las rnams zin nas rig sngags kyi lha bshos sna tshogs dang/ me tog sna tshogs 'dipa da rnams kyang bsdus la dur khrod dam chu klung gang yang rung bar dor ba
bya de nas rig sngags 'chang dbang phyug nyams de nam/ rgyal po'i dpal nyams pa slar gso bar 'dod na rig sngags 'changadis zhag gsum skya ngab byas te zla ba nya'inub
mo gnas dben pa 'am/ yang na nu gro d+ha'i drung du dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor khru bcu drug pa/ sgo bzhi yod pa/ me'i sbyin sregabyas ba'i la bas dri zhing//
ba@# @#// dpal gyi lha mo'i rig sngags dang sbyar te/ de'i dbus su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri'o// g.yon phyogs su na rdo rje bri'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yas phyogs su ni dpal
gyi lha mo chen mo brago/ de nas rig sngags 'chang gis dkyil 'khor gyi shar phyogs kyi ngos su bum pa nyi shu rtsa bdun dgod par bya'o// byang dang/ nub dang/ lhor yang de bzhin du dgod pa
bya'o// bum pa dadag gi nang du'ang sa bon dang rin po che thams cad gzhug go/ bum pa thams cad kyang mgrin bcings dang ldan par bya'o// bum pa de dag thams cad du 'o ma yod pa'i shing gi yal
ga'ang bcug ste lan bdun bdun bsngags so// de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje dang/ dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing mtsho
brgyas par bya'o// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sdur dkyil 'khor gur kum gyis skyang nul du byugs la/ de'i mdun du b.li ba'i shing gis me sbar te/ ba sar mo be'u yod pa'i
mar gyi nang dua ka ru'i lam srog shing ngam/ yang n pa brgyad stod bskugs ta zhesrag byas la mar gyi mar ma brgyad stong sbyar te danas las bya'o// las bzhi nas bum pa de dag/
gis rgyal po de khrus byed du bcug la/ zhag nyishu rtsa gcig gi bar dunges par gnas par byas na than pa'i rjes la rgyal srid thob par 'gyur ro// pha ba pa gang la las khrus byas na de'i
longs spyod kyi gzhi 'grub par 'gyur te/ rgyal srid dam/ yul gru'i bdag bo'am/ grong ga bdag por 'gyur ro// ci ste b.lang dang bram ze gsod par byed na'ang sdig pa thams
da las thar bar 'gyur ro// gang dang gang 'dod pa'i phyir byas na'ang 'dod pa de dang de thob par 'gyur te/ ji ltar nga de bzhin gshegs pa'i zham 'bringan rtag tu gnas ba de bzhin du
dpal gyi lha mo chen mo 'di de'i thad na gnas par 'gyur ro// ji ltar rdo rje 'di rtag tung la gnas pa de bzhin du dpal gyi lha mo 'di rtag tu de la gnas par 'gyur ro// gang zhig rtag tu
dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar khyed pa'i dkyil 'khor 'chang ba de la ni rtag tu lha rnams srung bar byed cing zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang ngam/ rig
sngags 'chang gi bu 'am/ rig sngags 'changam gang zhig dpal thams cad mngon bar 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong n thams cad 'phal par byed pa'i dpal thob par
gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyila 'khor rdzogs so///de nas drang srong lnga dga' ba'i tshal du 'khod nas gcig la gcig
bltas te 'di skad smras so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di nyid ni// sems can rnams la phan 'dod phyir// thub pa'i drung na gsang ba'i
sngags// rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis su// rig mchog cho ga chen po gang// lha rnams lan grub sbyin zhing// thos nas rtag tu lha rnams ni// lha min las spyi
ldon khyed kyis// sems can rnams kyi don gyi phyir// gsang ba'i bdag postobs kho che// zhi ba dang dul ba yi// thad du song nas bri bar bya/ de nas lha'i drang srong 'od zer can dang/
dang/ kun shes dang/ gnas 'jog dang/ ma sbyin gyi bu la sogs pa/ bcom ldan 'das dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ dpal thams cad man bar 'byung bar byed pa 'i da kyil 'khor gyi rgyal po gang
na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ lha klu dbyangs kyis bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la mngon bar bstod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gan de rjes dkyil 'khor de nag la sa nas/ lha'i drang srong de dag
la lcas pa/ drang srong chen po khyed rnams sems can thams cad la phan ba'i phyir brtson pa dang/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyir zhugs pa dang/ dpal kums cad mngon par 'byung bar byed
ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po'i nang du 'ongs pa lags so lags so// de nas dga' ba'i tshal chen po yid du 'ong ba dang/ shing chen po yongs 'du la gnas pa 'i srin mo nas gru zhes bya ba stobs chen/
brtson 'grus chen mo/ 'jig rtan gsum n byis pa rnams gsod pa/ 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can de'ang drang srong de dag gi thad du song ste mthong nas ltad mor gyur te/ dkyil 'khor
wa bde dang nye ba zhig tu song nas rgyang na 'dug cing/ rdo rje 'bar ba'i gabarjid kyis de'i nang du 'ong ma nus so// de nas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa lha rnams dang/ ma sbyin gyi bu la sogs
pa drang srong rnams lag na rdo rje'i zhal du lta zhing/ rdo rje'adzin sun mo nam gru zhes bya ba stobs chen mo/ brtson 'grus chen mo/ 'di ni skye bo gnas pa dang 'gro ba 'jig par byed pa lags
kyis/ rdo rje 'dzin chen po sra mo'i 'jigs pa de las bdag cag yongs su skyobs shig/ de nas dpal dang ldan pa rdo rje 'dzin khros te mig dmar por bsgyur nas rang gi dpung la bltas te/
lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// lha rnams re zhig 'khod cig dang/ 'jig rtenan sdang ba gang ji snyed yod pa de dag gzhig par bya'o// de nas lha rnams dang drang srong de dag gis
lag na rdo rje dang spyan la bstodanas/ rdo rje 'dzin srin mo chen mo/ brtson 'grus chen mo/ stobs chen mo khyod kyi dkyil 'khor du 'jug mi nus kyis/ rdo rje 'dzin khyod kyis kyang srin mo chen
mo 'di la bstod par mdzod cig dang/ des na dkyil 'khor du 'ong bar 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes lha de dag la snying rje sems kyis bltas nas srin mo nam
gru la rang gi cho 'brang las bstod pa/ nam gru khyod kyi tshe 'brang dang// mtshan nyid dag ni bshad bya na// nor bu'i rang bzhani khyod kyi lus// rgyab ni 'dzam bu chu bo'i gsar//
[z/ ]@#// khyod kyi gdong yang dngul yin te// lto ba 'i ngos na rdo rjes gtams// mang po mdzod dang mdzod srung ba// khyod kyi ma ni kun 'gro ma// khyod kyis ni rlung
ma zhes bya// skal ldan shing rta khyod kyi rus// lha yul dgag tu grogs pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rjes srin mo nam gru rang gi tsho 'brad la bstod nas/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ rdo rje 'dzin pa bdag nyid che// tshangs dang gsum la phyag 'tshal te// dbang phyug che la phyag 'tshal nas// sa 'dzin
rlung rnams gang yin dang// gang dag gnod sbyin stobs po che// grub pa rgyu ba dri za rnams// drang srong lha dang lha min pa// de nas 'byung po thams cad dang// 'od zar can dang 'od srung
dang kun shes dang ni khe nas 'jog dang// thub pachen po sbyin bu// dbang po gtum po khyab 'jug dang// 'di rnams bdag la grub sbyin shog/ namagru mo ni bshad bye na//
mtshan monagamo'ajigs byed ma// gshani rdzo'i sring mo chen mo ste// yongs 'du'i shing la gnas pa yin// ril khyab 'jug gcig pu ni/ 'di bar la bar mi nyam ste// des ni bya yi/
gzugs kyis su// mtshan mo khyab 'jug skrag par byed// lha mo nag mo stobs mo ches// de mthong nas ni 'ong bar 'gyur// de nas rtsed mo byed bzhin du// byis pa gsod pa'i mgrazhi pa nas// lag pa
g.yon pas bzung nas// 'jigs pa'i sgra yang 'byin par byed// rna gnyis kyang nas mthong ste// sems nyams pas ni de mthong nas// shin tu byed de ngazhin yang gyur// khyod ni nga la ma
'tshe bar// lha yi dga' gnas dga' bar gyis// de nas khros nas de nyid du// byis pa gsod la bsgo ba ni// logacig pa dang lo gnyis dang// lo dgu pa la ma 'jug par// khabang so song la skye
dgu 'di// rang gi las kyis bza' bar gyis// ba lang rnams la gor yang byas// wa rnams dang ni wa gsod dang// ri dgas la ni de degs nad// mi rnams la na tsha ngas byos// kyong kyis lus
la deng brlag gyur// byis pa rnams ni rtse rgyur cig/ byis pa rnams la phan gdags phyir// ma mo rnams la snyam g ba'i mchog/ mi rnams kyang ni ma bzhin du// de ni bdag gis bshad
bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'di ni mthong ba la// gdon ni gang zhig ldog gi byed// gdon mang dag gis de spangs nas// mun pa mi bzad gnas par 'gyur// gang gis su ni zhi 'gyur ba/
'di yang lha rnams mnyan par gyis// gang na bud med srung byed ba// der ni byis pa bsrung bya ste// gsar dag dang na lung tang rnams// dud tun ji ba lig pu tshig/ gi'u wang mor dang
sbrang rtsi dang// yang shu dag gro ba rnams// 'di dag gang gi khyim na yod// de na byis pa bsrung bar bya// de nas gsang ba'i bdag po lag na rdo rje stobs po ches rig sngagru khashad pa/
na mo badzrapA Ni s+ya/ rtsil tsi'i/ b+hin+da b+hin ( muny+tsa muny+tsa/ hi ba la kanaswA hA/ badzrapA Ni rA dzAb la tiA hA de bA sa mA dzA pa ya ti swA hA ra shi ya/ sa mAdzA pa ya
ma tisAhA/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje stobs po ches 'di bshad ma thag tu sran mo stobs mo che nam gros skad chen po byung nas/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar
klu byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lagan rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// stobs bo che tshogs mi bzod pa/ mchog tu ma bzad pa
mchog tu 'jigs pa las bdag skyab tu gsol/ de nas rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen po lag na rdo rjes/ srin mo de drag la 'di skad ces pas so// na mo ma 'jigs shig ma 'jigs
shig/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po stobs po che dran par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'dras shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dran par gyis ge dang/ des na 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro//
bskal ba chen po ldog par gyis shig/ stobs po che nga'i bka' nyon cig/ de nas srin mo chen mo nam grus/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la 'di skad ces smras so// byang chub
sems dpa' chen po bdag gis gtong lags kyis bdag gis ci bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/ de nas bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rjes/ srin mo de la smras pa/ gangan rig sngags kyi
rgyab po gnas pa der khyod la 'jug cig/ dpal thams cad 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba gang yin pa dang/ khyod kyi cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid grwa ga la bris te 'chad
nga der yang khyod kyis srungs la zhib dang bde legs su gyis shig/ smas pa/ stobs po che de ltar bgyi ste/ gang bdag gi tshe 'brang dang mtshan nyid gro ga la ga'u wang gis bris nas snod
du bcug ste 'chang ba dang/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba dang/ yul lam grong khyer gang na dkyil 'khor chen po 'di 'dra ba'i yul de ni ba
dang bde legs su 'gyur te/ des na sems can sdang bar sems pa rnams kyis khyod kyi bka' mnyan nas srung bar byed de/ zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur ro// byas pa gang nam gru'i cho 'phrang
dang mtshan nyid snod du bcug ste 'chang ba de lan gdon thams cad kyis 'jigs par ma 'gyur ro// gang zhig dbal thams cad mngon pa ra 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po khros pa'i
dbus su rdo rje'i dbyibs kyi thab khung byas te/ rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud chen po las khro bo stobs po che ngas bshad pa gang yin pa 'am/ yang na rig sngags kyi rgyal po chen pos gu gul
lag 'bru 'i sbyin sreg byas na/ lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin du yul lam grong khyer gyi mind zhi bar 'gyur ro// zhi ba'i chog rdzogs so///de nas bcom
'das lag na rdo rjes/ lha de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/ bzod ldan dag khyed nyon cig/ dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen
po las ngas rig sngags bshad pa gang yin pa de dag gi las kyi 'bras bu ston pa rnam pa sna tshogs ngas bshad par bya'o// rgyas ba/ rig sngags kyi rgyal po sngags thams cad kyi las shod
gi shod cig/ sus pa/ lha rnams nga'i bka' gcog pa de ni ngas rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu rab tu 'bar bas spyi bo gshag par bya'o// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil

'khor chen po'i cho ga ngas bshad pa gang yan pa de 'ang de bzhin du gyis shagra/ nam gru'i tshe 'brang dang mtshan nyid kyi cho ga bshad par bya ste/ yul gang dum nad kyi gnod po byung ba der sa cho ga
bshad pa'i chog des dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dekyi la 'khor chen po bris la/ de'i dbus su rab tu grub par byed pa'i rgyud las bshad pa'i rdo rje khro gi gu gul la sa 'bru'i

sbyin sreg bya'o// srinamo chen mo de'i gtor m gang gsal nad zhi bar gyur pa'i ng bshad par bya ste/ 'bras kyi 'o thug sbyar thug drung// 'bras chen mog sran gre'u sbyar dang// 'bras chen bu ram sbyar
ba dang// til dang sbyar ba'i snum 'khur dang// 'bras kyi zhing de nu zho dang// ben tser 'khur ba bkra shis ldan/ 'bras kyi chung red la phug til// khur ma'i 'o ma nya dang sha// til phyogs las
byas 'khur ba dang// chang dang du phyag dang bas pa dang// me tog 'phreng ba dri dang byug/ gtor ma de dag byin na ni// mi nad kun zhi ban par 'gyur// lha thams cad la'ang lha bshos sna tshogs
dbul bar bya zhing/ der shin tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i ng bklag par bya'o/ rnam par rgyal ba'irgyud chen po las/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo chen mo

rma bya chen cho 'i rig sngags bdun brgyas bskor ba gang yin pa de'ang dor bklag par bya ste/ rim gror bya zhing bla mar byas la/ dridang/ ma tog dang/ bdug pa dang/ bshos rnams kyis mchod par bya'o//

nas thu'i cho 'brang dang mtshan nyid kyang bklag par bya ste/ gro ga la bris nas mgo la btags na yul der zhi ba dang bde lags su 'gyur te/ yul der ma nad kyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// nam gru'i che
'brang mtshan nyid ni// lag na de rjes bshad pa bzhin// dani bdag gis nges par bstan// pho nyamo stobs chen mo rnams kyi las kyang bshad par bya ste dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar

byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la pho nya mo stobs chen mo drug ngas bshad pa gangayan pa rnams dang/ tshogs rnams kyi nangan pho nya mo rnams kyis las sgrub pa lcags can bstan pa gang yin pa dang/ mthong bar

dka' ba bshad pa pho nya tshogs drug gis bskor ba tshogs chen po lcags can gang gis mthong ba des pho nya mo rnams dang/ 'grogs pa mi bzad pa dpa' bo'i tshogs chen po dad pho nyamo rnams dang lhan cig
gnas pa drag po ma bzad pa las drag po byed pa gzugs bzang po nga/ lcags can bonya mo rnams dang lhan cig na gnas ba stobs po che sgrub pa ni mar gyi do zhag brgyad la sbyang

ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs de bzhin du byas la/ de nas pho nyamo stobs tsho che drug gzhag par bya'o// de la dbus su lag na rdo rje stobs po che drag
ba'i las byed pa gzugs bzang bo gzhag go 'og logs su ni rkang pa g.yas pa'i lho phyogs su na yenya mo stobs mo rtse drug gzhag go/ rkang pa g.yas pa la'ang 'dag par bya ste/ tshogs chen

kho lcags can stobs po che tshogs bdun gyis bskor bas lag pa gnyis kyis rdo rje 'dzin chen po'i rkang ba g.yas pa ston cing 'dzin par bya'o// de nas lcags can gyi 'og log su chen po tshathams cad dang 'bru

khams cad gazhag par bya'o// yang na kar sha pa Ni brgya rtsa brgyad tshang bar dbul bar bya'o// lag na rdo rje dang/ lcags tshan la sogs pa tshogs rnams dang/ botamo stobs mo cha de dag kyang tshon sna gsum

gyis bri bar bya'o/ donas lag na rdo rjedang/ tshogs chen mo rnams dang/ pho nya mo 'tshogs de dag la lha bshos sna tshogs dbu la khur bya'o// de nas tshogs chen po lcags can gyi sngags lan brgya rtsa brgyu ba
bzlas par bya'o// de nas mtshan mo rmi lam bzang po rmibar 'gyur go yang na skyes ba 'am bud med mthong bar 'gyur ro/ ci ste skyos pa nag po mig dmar la gos ser po gyon pa zhig mthong na de
ha/ phyin chad rig sngags 'chang bag zhi ba dang/ rgyas pa dang/ drag shul gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste bud med gos dkar po gyon pa mdog gnag pa 'am/ sngo bsangs sam/ dkar ]

bo mthong bar gyuran/ de ci ste dkar po mthong na na ldong ros bsgrub par bya'o// ci ste sngo bsangs mthong n ni mtshon cha thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// ci ste nag po mthong na ni lig bu mig dang/ pha

wang long bu dang/ stad thal la sogs pa'i mig smana rnams 'grub par 'gyur ro// pho nya mo rnams kyi las thams cad la ni nang par bla ma dang tshogs lag na rdo rje dang 'dra bar bya ste// bdag nyid kyis

ba nya mo rnams kyi thabs su bud med gang yang rung pa ku sha'i stan byas pa la 'dug pa la ci rigs pa'i kha zas kyis ston na/ pho nyamo drug dang tshogs stobs po che brgyad po rnams 'grub par 'gyur te/
zhag gsum na pho nya mo'i tshogs rnams longs su ma gu bar gyur pas glo bur du skyes pa dad bud med kyi gzugs kyis shing thog sbyin par byed do// de nas rig sngags 'chang gis shing thog blangs

la bdag grub bo snyam du shes par byas nas/ lag na rdo rje dang pho nya mo'i tshogs rnams la mchod par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje pho nya mo'i tshogs dang lhan cig tutshon tshe sna gsum gyis dris pa 'di na

gang gis mthong na'ang pho nya mo'i tshogs thams cad 'grub par 'gyur na/ sgrub pa dang 'chad ba lta ci smos/ dbyase de dag kyang lag par bzhag ste bla ma la dbul bar bya'o// bul nas kyang pho nya mo'i tshogs
rnams bdag la grub par gyur cig ces smras la/ de nas kyang bsgrams te pho nya mo'i tshogs kyis bltas pa las 'di bsgrub par bya'o// de nas pho nya cho ga dang tshogs stobs po

che brgyad po rnams las sna tshogs kyi sa bsgrub par bya'o// pho nya mo rnams kyi las sna tshogs rnams bshad par bya ste/ me lce cha'i las 'di rnams bsrung ba ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i skud pas bya'o//
mtshams gcad pa ni thal bas bya'o// dug las gso ba na yal gas khya'o// gdon thams cad la ni yungs kar gyis gdab pa'i las bya'o// gzhon nu'i gdon la na rna bar gshibs te ba zlos brjod byas
pas gtong bar byed de/ gzhon nu thams cad la rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o// dbab pa na gu gul gyis bdug par tsu'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la cha

yatog dkar po stong gis bsnun na longs spyod kyi gzhi sbyin par byed do// zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing rig sngags bzlos ngarjod byas nas mar gyi de zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang nga byas te/ 'phags

ba 'gan rdo rje'i mdun du lcags can bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas par byas la/ de'amadun du dong ka'ashang gsam sbyar la ldong ros ba lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas lan brgyud stod sbyin sreg byas n glo bur du
ha ha zhes bya ba'i sgra thos par 'gyur te/ de nas tshogs chen po rmugs byed 'ongs par 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas cha gsabyed kyis ldong ros sbyin par byed do/de thogs bas 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs tsan
du 'gyur zhing/ lcags can dang kha dog mtshungs la bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// yang na slong mo'i zas bza' zhing dben pa'i gnas su lan 'dum bzlas brjod byas na tshogs chen po lcags can/
gyis ral gra sbyin par byed de/ de thogs pas stobs dad parol gnon pa dpag tumed cing bskal par gnas par 'gyur ro// na lag gi tshang nas shing bu blasal/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i
mdun du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nas grwa thogs pas yade la gang bsags pa de 'grub par 'gyur te/ skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ zas dang/ gos dang/ mal stan rnams yod la bsams
bas 'grub par 'gyur ro// de lta bu'i shing bu chu klung chen por bor te/ de nas nyi ma la bltas la chu ngogs su bzlas brjod byas na yid la gang bsams pa de dag thams cad 'grub cing tshe le khri thub
par 'gyur te/ mi'i thod pa la dbab pa dang/ ral gri dang me long la dbab pa'od byed nus par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo zla ba nya la brtsams te slong mo'i zas za zhang/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i
zhabs kyi drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na bud med thob par 'gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i las bya ba dang/ lha rnams la dri dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags
kyis bya'o// malce ma'i cho ga ste dang po rdzogs so//mo stag ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pa ni lan bdun bzlas brjod byas pa'i chus bya'o// rgyu gzhom pa ni so
phag gis bya'o// dug las gso ba ni yal gas bya'o// sdon dang lu tis zin pa rnams ni byab pas khyago/ mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang pa byas te du [.]
gsog ma blangs nas/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lan brgyad stong bzlas brjod byas nasagasag ma de thogs pas gang la bsdigs pa de rgyas btab par 'gyur la/ gu gul gyis bdag
grol bar 'gyur ro// mi ro la bltas te longs zhes smras na ldang bar 'gyur te/ don du gnyer ba'i mchog ston par 'gyur ro// de nas rma bya sgrub par 'dod na zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ ma[。]

ngo khag bcu bzhi la gzhon nu'i gnas su song la tshon rtswa sna gsum gyis rma bya khris nas de'i lus la rmabya'i sgro bzhag ste lha khagos sna tshogs phul la/ de nas skad lan gsum M phyung gi bar du rig
sngags bzlas brjod byas na de phyin chad dug gsopa'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// rma bya'i sgro dang dud pa bkag ste bsregs la/ sa mig bskus na ma red lus mi snang bar 'gyur 1
yid la gang bsams pa'i sgo de byed nus par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad la'ang mtshams gcod par nus so// 'bru'i zhing gi stong du song la lan stong bzlas brjod byas na 'bru rnams rgyus
par 'gyur ro// 'bru ma rungs par bya bar 'dod ni ma'i rus pa'i phur bu la lan stong bzlas brjod byas te btsugs na ma rungs par 'gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i
dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog dbul ba dang/ lha thams cad la lha bshos dbul ba'ang 'di'i ge sngags kyis bya'o// ma stag ma'i cho ga ste gnyis pa rdzogs so//
ldan ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ bud med dbang du bya na zhag gsum gyi bar du dus gsum du lan tshu'i sbyin sreg byas na dbang du 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gi bar du dus gsum du khrus byas te dus
gsum du lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas na zla ba gcig lon nas/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje mthong bar 'gyur te bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed cing tsholo lnga
brgya thub par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngo nagabargyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ dgon pa'i gnas su lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na glo bur du 'ongs ba 'gyur te/ 'ongs nas gter sbyin par byed

la de 'ang ma zad par 'gyur ro// zhag gsum spyad pa byas te yar gyi ngo tshes lnga la dum pa sa bon dang rin po che thams cad kyis bkang stamagrin bcings dang bcas pa gzhag ste/ rig sngags kyang lan brgyad
stong bzlas brjod byas la chu des rgyal po 'am rgyal bo'i bu khrus byed du bcug na yul de dpal dang ldan par 'gyur ro// de nas gnod spyin dbang du bya bar 'dod n dgon pa'i gnas skyes pa dang bung mod

mad pa'i phyogs su zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing sa las gnod sbyin gyi gzugs byas te dus gsum du lan brgyud brgya 'am/ lan stong bzlas brjod byas na zla ba drug lon pa na gnod sbyin gyi bdag
po 'ong bar 'gyur te/ de na u0f7a/ bdag cag gis ci zhig bya/ dmakha slong shig ces zer ba dang/ de nas des 'di skad du dpag tshad brgya tshunachad kyi gnod thams cad bdag gi dgong
du [”]gyurag ces smos shig/ de na re/ de ltar bya'o zhes smras nas mi snang bar 'gyur te/ yid la ci bsams pa de thams cad byed cing dus ma yin par rtsa ba dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu dang/ zas dang

gos dang/ rin po che dang/ tin ra gang 'dod pa rnams sbyin par byed do// de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi blang bar 'dod na zhag drug sbyang ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'dus lag na rdo rje la mchod pa phyir zhing rgyas par

byas la/ zla ba nya'inub mo a ka ru dang/ gu gul dang/ du ru ka bsreg cing namanangs kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas te zhag bdun gyi pod du nges par gnas na/ de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi chen po thob bar 'gyur ro//
dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i mar ma rnams kyad 'di'i rig sngags kyis dbul bar bya'o// 'phreng ldan ma'i cho ga ste gsum pa rdzogs so
mdzod ldan ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du rig sngags lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas nand thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// dag pa na gu gul gyis bdug par bya'o// ma

gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gsum sbyang ba byas la/ gu gul dang bal kha lhan cig tu sbyar te lan stong bzlas brjod byas na tin ra stengakhob bar 'gyur ro// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyud la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas tedur khrod pa

mag song nas mi 'i thod pa blangs la ra'i 'o mas bkang ste/ thod pa gsum gyi steng du bzha gnas rag sngags bzlas brjod byed bzhin du 'bras sa lu'i 'o zug btsos la/ zin pa'i 'og tu rig sngags khazlas brjod
byed bzhin du 'thungs te/ slar thod pa'i nang du skyug par bya'o// de nas yi dwags 'ong bar 'gyur te/ ya de gsan re/ rig sngags 'chang ngal 'o thug byin cig ces zer ba dang/ de nas rig sngags 'chang

gos rig sngags thams cad kyi rgyal po bzlas brjod byed bzhin du yi dgas de la sbyin par bya'o// yi dgas des 'o thug 'thungs nas 'chi bar 'gyur te/ de'i lag na sdong ros 'dug pa blangs na de thogs pas lag

na rdo rje dang mthu stobs mnyam zhad paskal pad gnas par 'gyur ro// rig sngags 'chang gis zla ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas za zhing/ rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na 'dod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs
par 'gyur ro// kun dga' ra bar zla ba gcig gi bar du slongamo'i zas za zhing lan 'bum bzlas pa rjod byas pa'i mjug tu nag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mtshan rangs par bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas shing
gi lhas gzugs ston par byed de/ de las 'grub par 'gyur la/ de phyin chadanags kyi lhas kha thas spyan par 'gyur ro// dpaMl thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po lha
thams cad la bdug pa dbul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags kyis bya'o// mdzod ldan ma'i cho ga ste bzhi pa rdzogs so//lta'abar ldan ma'i chog rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pa ni gu gul/
gyis bdug par bya'o// bsrung ba ni skud pas bya'o// mtshams gcad pa ni so phagags bya'o// bslad ba nithal mo brdab pas bya'o// sas ni 'bras dang phol mig
rnams mad par 'gyur ro// zla ba gcig gi bar du ma tog dkar po la lan bdun bsngags te phyem red khyod phyogs su bor nas zla ba gcig lon pa na/ bcom ldan 'das ma 'grub par gyur te
bsams pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur zhing lo lnga brgya thub par 'gyur ro// rna bar gshibs te bzlas brjod byas na gdon thams cad kyis gtong bar 'gyur te/ gzhon nu rnams
la rtag tu sbyar bar bya'o// mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la ma tog dkar po stong gis bsnan na longs spyod kyi gan sbyin par 'gyur ro// zla ba/
gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zan bza' zhing rig sngags bzlas brjod phyis nas zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ mar gyi ngo zhag bzhi la 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du lcags can bzhag nas mchod pa

rgyas par byas te lha bshos rgyas par phul nas/ de'i mdun du dong ka'i shing gis me sgyur la ldong ros la ba lang gi mkhris pa dang sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na/ glo bur du ha ha zhes bya ba'i
sgra thos nas tshogs kyi bdag po chen po rmugs byed 'ong bar 'gyur ro// 'ongs nas rmugs byed kyis ldong ros sbyin par byed do// de nas 'dod dgur bsgyur ba'i gzugs can du 'gyur zhang lcags
can dang mthu stobasamanyam la bskal bar gnas par 'gyur ro// yar gyi ngozla blta la brtsams te slong mo'i zas bza' zhing/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na dpal
thob par 'gyur ro// dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i las bye ba dang/ lha rnams la dra da bul ba'ang 'di'i rig sngags kyis bya'o// 'bar ldan ma tshe ga
ste lho pa rdzogs so////kha 'bar ma'i las rnams 'byung ste/ dbab pan chus bya'o// bsrung ba ni khungs gar gyis bya'o// mtshams gcad panas lag gis bya'o/ du khreng

kyi thal ba drungs temar gyi ngo shal brgyad sazhag gcig smyung ba byas nas/ lagan rdo rje'i mdun du lan stong bzlas brjod byas na thal ba des gang la reg par byas pa de gdon gyis 'debs par 'gyur zhing/ tshig gis
bsgo bas gtong bar 'gyur ro// lus gtsang bar byas te lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na b.lad brgya thob par 'gyur ro// de nas skyes pa dbang du bya bar 'dod na zla ba nya la zhag gcig smyung ba

byas te/ mchod pa rgyas bar byas nas gur kum dang gser phye mar dang sbyar bas lan brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na brgya byin yang dbang du 'gyur na mi rnams lta ci smos/ dge slong dang bram ze brgyad brgya
mchod ston byin la nges mas can thams cad la'ang byams pa bsgoms na ni bram ze gsodapas kyang 'grub par 'gyur ro// mar gyi do zhag brgyad la khag gcig skyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje mdun
du dur khrod kyi shang gis me sbar nas dur khrod kyi yam sreg shang skud pa dmar bos dkris ba brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na/ de nas rma lam tshogs chen po lcags can ston par byed de/
denas 'grub par 'gyur ro// chu khyor gang la lan bdun bstags nas gang la bltas te gtor ba de gdon gyis thebs par 'gyur la/ chu klung gi nang du zhugs te lan brgya stong bzlas brjod byas na gtong bar
gyur go// kha 'bar ma'i cho ga ste drug pa rdzogs so//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ lha de dag la lcas pa/ lha rnams dpal thams cad mngon par 'byung bar byed pa'i dkyil
'khor chen po la pho nya mo rnams kyi las rnams 'byung ba ngas bshad zanite/ tshogs chen bo rnams kyi'ang bshad par bya'o// bdud rtsi zab sbyor gyi las sdar ngas gang bshad pa gang yin pa las de

tshogs thams cad la sbyar bar bya'o// rab tu grub par byed pa rgyud chen po las rdo rje khro bo ngas bshad pa gang yin pa de'i las kyis kyang tshig sa chen po stobs kho tsho rnams la sbyar bar bya'o// lha rnams 'byung po'i
bu gzhon nu mchog smin drug gi khu stobs po che'i las rnams ngas bshad kyis/ sems rtse gcig tu byos la nyon cig/ gang la bsams te bzlas brjod byas na de'i dbang du 'gyur do// rgyu gzhom pa

ni nus bya'o// bsrung ba ni skud pas bya'o// mtshams gcad ngani thal bas bya'o// dud mad dbang du bya ba ni zhag bdun gyi bar du dus gsum du yungs kar gyi se lan stongacabargyad brgyad sbyin sreg byas na
dbang du 'gyur ro// mi'i gtso bo dbang du bya bar 'dod na zhag bdun gyi bar du zas su ro ma dang phyi 'dag gu za zhing/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje la mchod pa byas te/ dus gsum du ba kang ka ta'i yam

srog shing gis 'bru mar dri zhim pa 'a nang du bsnyags pa stong rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg bgyis na dbang du 'gyur go/ mar gyi ngo zhag bcu ba zhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phag pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun

du gzhon nu smin drug gi bu bzhag nas/ de'i mdun du tsan dan dmar po'i shing gis mo sbyar nas seng ldeng gi yam sreg shing mar gyi nang du bsnyags pa brgyad stong sbyin sreg byas na gzhon nu'i ma tog gi 'phred
ba pa 'gul bar 'gyur ro// de nas bgrub par 'gyur te zhag bdun tshun chad kyis gzhon nu' sde'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ro// mi rnams kyis ma sod la bdag gatshe'i tshad kyang shes bar 'gyur ro// zla

ba gcig gi bar du slong mo'i zas bza' zhing/ de nas mar gyi ngo zhag brgyad dam zhag bcu bzhi la zhag gsum sbyang ba byas te/ tsan dan dmar bo'i mdung thung bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang gi tshad du byas
pa ras dmar po'i steng du bzhag nas mchod pa rgyas par bya zhingelha bshos rgyas pa phul la/ de nas rig sngags 'chang brtswa ku sha'i snyan gyi steng du 'dug pa'i lag pa g.yas pas mnanal 'bar bar
'gyur kyi bar du bzlas brjod byas na 'grub par 'gyur te/ da thogs pas pha rol gyi yul 'khor 'byed par byed cing gdon thams cad 'joms par byed par 'gyur te/ yul gang du btsugs pa der
sa[g]// rgyal bar 'gyur ro// klu 'am/ klu mo 'am/ dri za'am/ rig sngags 'chang rnams la bltas te bsngags n de dag thams cad bka' bzhin du 'gyur ro// glang po
chargyags gang myos pa la bltas shing bsngages na glang bo che dbang du 'gyur ro// slong mo'i zas za zhing cho ga 'di bzhin du 'khor lo bsgrubs na rig sngags 'chang gi 'khor los sgyur ba'irgyal por
'gyur te/ bskal par gnas shing rig sngags 'chang brgyas bskor ba la ma long la dbab pa dang/ mthe bong la dbab pa dang/ bum pa la dbab pa 'ang nus par 'gyur ro// dbye ba rat+yA na zhag
gsum gyi bar du phub ma'i sbyin sreg lan stong rtsa brgyad brgyad byas na dbye bar 'gyur ro// smin drug gi bu'i tshig rdzogs so/// lha mo chen mo drug ma'i las rnams kyang
bshad par bya ste/ bsrung ba ni thal bas bya'o// dug las gso ba ni chus bya'o// ma tshams gcad pa ni so phag gis bya'o// de nas longs spyod kyi gzhi bslang bar 'dod na gzhon nu'i gnas su
song la lha mo la mchod pa byas te sma nama'i shing gis me sngar nas 'o thug dang/ mar dang/ sbrang rtsir sbyar bas lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas la/ de nas nang par gangs la 'phags pa a

tsha[–/ ]na rdo rje la mchod ba byas te/ gur kum mar dang sbyar bas lan brgya rtsa brgyad brgyad sbyin sreg byas nag bdun pa'i nyin par sde'i bdag por 'gyur ro// de nas 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs
kyi drung du lags ldan lha chen po dang/ gzhon nu smin drug gi bu dang/ lha mo druga mtshonatsi sna gsum gyis bris la/ rig sngags 'chang gras su 'o ma dang bye 'dag gu za nang lan 'bum bzlas brjod
byas na lha mo mthong bar 'gyur te/ dro'ang 'dod pa thams cad sbyin par byed do/ bton pa tsam gyis rgyun skags khasargyal bor 'gyur ro// de nas bdag nyid kyi tsho'atshad shes par 'dod na mar gyi ngo
zhag daru bzhi la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ bcom ldan 'das lag na rdo rje la'ang mchod pa rgyas par byas/ a ka ru'i bdug pa dang/ du ru ka dang/ gur kum dang/ gu gul dang/ sbrang rtsi dang/ bom

gyi mar me bzhi phyogs pazhir sngar la/ de nyid du rig sngags bzlas brjod byas te/ de nyid du nyal na 'jig rten gsum na yod pa'i don rmi lam du ston par 'gyur ro// khyod tsho 'di srid du thub par 'gyur ro
zhes zhing nam 'chi ba'ang ston par byed de/ ga ge mo zhig tuche ge mo zhig gi tshe srog 'dor ro zhes ston par 'gyur te/ 'di ni dengos grub mchog gi lam no// de nas 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i

lam shes par 'dod na slong mo'i zas za zhing/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i zhabs drung du zla ba gcig ga par du bzlas brjod byas na/ de nas bung ba 'ong bar 'gyur te/ bung ba de 'ang na drung du ma snang
bar gyur nas 'jig rten gsum na yod pa'i don ston par 'gyur ro zhes rdo rje 'dzin gyi bshad do/ drug ma'i cho ga rdzogs so//lha mo dka'i bzlogam dral mdzesakyi las
kyang bshad par bya ste/ mag la bsngags na gang bltas pa de thob par 'gyur ro// gdong la lag la byugs te nyal na rmi lam ngan pa che bar mi 'gyur ro// de nas sde dpon

'dod na yar gyi ngo tshos dag la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te bgatum mo nub phyogs su khastan pa la bltas nas/ mchod pa rgyas par byas la mar dang gu gul gyis lan brgya stong sbyin sreg byas na sde dngo na/
thob par 'gyur ro// de nas mi'i gtso bo dongang du byabar 'dod na mar gyi ngo zhig brgyad la zhag gcig sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa byas nas mtshan rangs bar bzlas
brjod byas na mi'i gtso bo dbang du khugs par 'gyur ro// de nas ral gri sgrub par 'dod na zla ba gcig gi bar du slongano'i zas za zhing rig sngags lan bdun 'bum bzlas brjod byas la/ de nas zhag
gsum sbyang ba byas te/ 'phags pa lag na rdo rje'i mdun du mchod pa rgyas bar byas nas rig sngags kyi rgyal pos bsrung ba'i cho ga thams cad bya'o/ de nas lag pa gnyis gu gul gyis bskus la/ lag
pas ral gri bzung ste rig sngags bzlas brjod byas na dngos grub rnam pa gsum du 'gyur te/ ral gri di lag na thogs pas rig sngags 'chang gi rgyal ba bskal par gnas par 'gyur zhing lha chen
tsha1 po'i pho brang na 'dug bar 'gyur te/ legs ldan lha chen po de dag kyang 'bras bu thob pa sbyin par byed do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang lhan cig tu gnas par 'gyur zhing/
'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyag dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur la// de dang lhan cig tu de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur te/ lus dang bral ba'i
tsho'ang bde ba can du skye bar 'gyu'o/ de nas lha rigasang ba mngon sum du mthong bar 'dodon zhag gsum sbyar ba byas te/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje dang gnyis la
ci nus kyis mchod par bya'o// de nas yud tsam bzang bo la bdag dang/ rgyal bo 'am/ gzhan yang rung ste du gul ras dkar po bgos te/ de nas a ka ru srog cing rgyal po dang gnyis
kazad kar 'dug ste mig 'dzum par bzlos brjod byas na/ mig snga na 'dug pa'i lhas gang gi don bstan pad rgyal bos kyang ji ltar thos ba de bzhin du mthong bar 'gyur ro/ cho ga 'di ni bsten
