kyi dga' bar khrus bya'o// rdorje'i phyag rgya la mdzub mo bkug pan de nyid spyan drang ba'i 'o// gnyis ka brkyang ba na slar gtang ba yin te/ bdud rtsi thab sbyor gyi phyag rgya yan no// lag pa

g.yon pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa ni khro bo chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ bcang ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi skabs su bshad pa'i las gang dang gang yin pa de dang de la khro bo chen po sbyar bar bya'o// sbyan drang ba dang

slar gtang ba la'ang phyag rgya rnams ji lta ba bzhin du sngags dang sbyar bar bya'o// rigs kyi phyag rgya thams cad la'ang de dag nyid kyis sbyar bar bya'o// snyam pa las mthe'u chung dngasrin lag phan
tshun bsnol te mthe bong gnyis glo la gzhar/ mdzub mo glod de dbus bkug la gung mo gzhibs pa'i tshigs dang por bzhag pa na rige gsum r gyi spyi'i mchod yon gyi

phyag rgya'o// de bzhin du sor mo phrug gsum phan tshun bstsol la mdzub mo brkyang ba'i thor to spradanas mthe bong gnyis kyi blor bzhag ste sAm pa'i thabs su byas pa na me tog gi phyag rgya'o// snyam
[%]pa bkan la mthe'u chung gzhobs te/ de'i rgyab tu srin lag gzhabs to gzhar/ de'i rgyab tu gung mo gzhabs la mdzub mo gnyis logs shig tu brkyang ste/ gzhibs nas mthe bong gnyis glo
la gzhas te snyam pa'i thabs su byas pa ni bdug pa'i phyag rgya'o/ snyam pa bzed mdzub mo gnyis cung zad bkug pa na spyi'i lha bshos kyi phyag rgya stenang du me tog gzhag par bya'o// lag pa g.yas

pa skyabs spyan gyi phyag rgyar byas la g.yon pa mkhrig ma nas gdu bu ltar bzang ba ni dri'i phyag rgya'o// lag pa g.yas pa khu tshur bcangs la mje bong dang gung mo gzhabs pa na spyi'i mar me 'i phyag rgya'o//

mthe bong dang sune lag gnyis kyis sngags kyi nor bu bzung la mthe'u chung dang gung mo brkyang ste/ mdzub mo'i dbus bkyig nas gung mo'i rgyab kyi tshigs dang por bzhag pa 'di ni rig sngags kyi nor bu'i
phyag rgya'o// snyam pa'i nang du sngags kyi nor bu blangs la gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na dag par byas par 'gyur ro/// lag pa g.yas skyabs sbyin gyi tshul du byas te bstan la mdzub mo bkug

cha0 nas mthe bong ya nga lag pa'i mthil du bkug pa ni ma sbyan drang ba'i 'o// mdzub mo dang mthe bo'i thor to bkug ste lhan cig sbyar ba ni mi slar gtang ba'i 'o// g.yas pa'i rdo rje gang yin pa de nisims
dpa' yin no// lag pa gnyis gungamo gnyis dang sprad de sbyar la gzhan bsnolanas bla 'og tu bstan te dra ba'i thabs su bya ba ni rje dra ba'i 'o// mdzub mo dang mtheb chung gzhabs la mthe bong
gas bkyed nas khog dang thad kar sa la bzhag ste/ gsang sngags bzlas brjod byas na las thams cad las gzhi bsal ba dang yongs su bzung ba byas par 'gyur te/ rigs kyi spyi'i snying po'i
phyag rgya lanano// lha rnams la bstan na'ang lha rnams dga' bar byas pa dang/ bskul bar byas par 'gyur ro// khro bo ka li ka la'i phyag rgya bcanges la phyag 'tshal ba'i thal mo las sor mo rnams/
sbyar ba na mchod pa'i phyag rgya'o// bsnol mar sbyar ba ni phyag 'tshal ba'i phyag rgya'o// me tog la sogs po ma 'byor na'ang phyag rgya bcings pas 'byor pa byas par 'gyulo// las thams cad

la'ang bskrad pa ni las kyi rdo rjes bya'o// sangs rgyas spyan gyi phyag rgya ni thams cad du ragi sngags bsrung bar bya'o// sor mo phan tshun sbyar takhu tshur bcangs pa gung mo gzhibs pa'i phyi loru
mdzub mo rdo rje ltar byas nas mthe bong gnyis glo la gzhar banadam tshig chen po'i phyag rgya ste/ na du byas pa dag la'ang srung ba chen po yan la/ lta 'khor du mtshams bcad de 'khor los sgyur ba'i
mtsho/ @#/// bzlas brjod byas su zin kyang gus kyang 'ge sngags kyi gaju nyams par byed ma nus so// khro bo 'tshol pa'i sgras pa'i phyag rgya la'angabasrung bar 'gyur te/ 'di dag ni
sgrub pa rnams kyi spyi'i phyag rgya yonano/ de las gzhan yang sbyin sreg gi gsang sngags las gang gi skabs su bstan pa lung las ji skad 'byung ba de dag la'ang las kyi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya'o//

tshirje'i phyag rgya ni rdo rdzong rigs thams cad spyi'i yan no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis bshad do// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ na mo badzra d+ha ra s+ya/ na mo bde gan gya sU/ 'din sAng po yin te
de bzhin du// rdo rje rigs chen de dang ni// rig sngags 'gres na thams cad kyi// rig sngags blon mobadun dag dang// rige sngags yan lag bdun dang bcas// 'dod pa'i rirje 'dzin
gyis bshad// dang po 'dod pa'i dri rdzom// rig sngags rdo rje ma tog bzhin// las mchog lan gnyis pa yani// rdzu 'phrul drung ni stobs ldan pa// rdordzo sgrog ces bya ba dang// 'og pag
sar mo gtum mo dang// de bzhin rdo rje tshugs par dka'// rig sngags chen mo bdun de dag/ nyin bdun dang stobs mnyam zhing// sems can tshogs kun mchog rnams la// thal mo
sbyar te phyag kyang bya// gzhan yang ya mtshan las 'das shing// dus kyi mtha' yi mi 'dra ba// rtogs po khro bo khro bo che// de la yang dang yang du 'dud// de bzhin rdo rje thog thagan/ 'byung po
rnams la thog thog bzhin// gzung dka' ge sngags las kun byed// lho phyogs sgon srung ba dang// rdo rje khu tshur mchog sbyin dang// gtum pochen po stobs po che/ bdag dang
gzhan kun srung ba'i mchog/ byang phyogs sgo na srung bdung/ [– ]/pho nya chen mo grub pa bcu// de bzhin de dag g.yog mo rnams/ pho nya ma drug cu bzhi// rig sngags tshog san sna tshogs
dang/ rdo rjod byug panyi ma la// rdo rje rigs kyi slob dpon gyis// grub pa'i rdo rje cho ga yis// snying nas kyang ni phyag byas nas// de las gzhan rnams bshad par bya// las kyi dkyil
'khor gtsobo ni// ji bzhin du nubrisanas kyang// gdon gyi las rnams bsgrub par bya// gangagamang na smos tsam gyis// ma bcos par yang gdon rnams 'jig/ dbang po'i rgyal mtshan
bstanab yis// ma bcos lha mine 'pham pa bzhin// 'byung po kun las grol ba'i thabs// 'jig rten kun tu mchog gyur gang// thams cad zhi bar byed pa yi// dam pa gang yin
bshad par bya// gang zhig tshul bzhin dran byas shing// bsgrims te mchod pa byas na ni// 'byung po kun gyis mi tshugs la// 'jigs med bde bar gnas par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'jig rten
slob dpon 'dra// 'jig rten gyi ni snang byed mchog/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad kyis// rtag tu lha chen nga zhin du mchod// mchog gyur mchog gas mchod pa des// chog bzhin du rgyas
kha @#/ par na nyagadon gyi mtshan nyid bar du yang// legs par rab tu bshad por bya// zla phyed yud tsam nyin mo dang// rgyu skar dag ni bzang ba la/ gtsang zhing gos/
sa gtsang bgos pa dang/ khasdams nga nges par gnas pa dang/ gtsangama'i grogs dang ldan pa dang// gtsang ma'i lam du zhugs pa yis// yar gyi ngo'i tshes gcig gam// chos
ga nyes de bzhin lta yang rung// tshes drug gam ni brgyad dam bcu// bcu gsum yang n nya dag gi/ nyin bar yongs su gzung bar bya// dab pa dngan bal pa// bengashAde bde bzhin te///
gangan te'u tu la 'ang rung// zhag phyed yongs su gzung bar bya// go ta ma trab la dang// sha ra ma zla a ba tsa ]/dza ya sobu mo'i yud tsam la// dkyil 'khor dam pa bya ba gi/ bsgrims
te laganardorjod ng/ rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngon chad las byas pa'i sa phyogs mkhas pas 'gro bar ng/ kun dga' tshong dus gtsug lag khang// grong dang grongakhyer
byang shar mtshams// de bzhin lho nung mtshams kyang rung// mnyam zhingamadangs dga' mdog sdug dang// tshad ldan sgo med pa dang// rjod ng gseg ma rus pa dang// skyon kun med pa des mchod
lta nas/ rtade 'dra'i sa de redanas na// rdo rje lcags kyu dran bya zhing// shar phyogs nas na gom pa dor// ha cang ma dreg rgod ma bya// gi sngags gangal dad pa yis// bdag nyid de nas bsrung
a bar bya// yan lag gsum po nas dang ni// yungs kar 'bras kyang gzhag bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang// dug ltas dag kyang blta bar bya// sngags kyis dag par byas
pa'i chus// thams cad legs par gtor bar bya// ba lang lci bas legs par sbyar// ku sha dag kyang gdangabar bya// khru bzhi'am drug gam brgyad// sa ya phyogs char thig kyang gdab//
thag skudagasar zhing grams pa dang// napa dang na mdzes pa dang// dri zhim dang ni lta na sdug/ gzabs pa dang na legs pa dang// thung du dungan sbom la sogs// ma legs mdud pa rnams
med na/ 'dridang ma tog mchod pa yis// shes ba can gyis thag kyang gdab// bu dag chog shes dben pa bde// chos la ma slong bde ba yani// btse ba spangs pa 'jig rten bde// srog chags
rnams la sdom pa dang// 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rten bde// 'dod pa rnams las 'das pa dang// ngo snyam nga rgyal zhi bdang// dul ba 'di na mchog tu bde// bu dag rgyun las zlog pa yis//
lam bgrod zab cing blta da krab pa/ mun nag thibs pos bsgribs pa dang// 'dod la chags pas rtogs ma 'khyug/ ngas na dka' ba rtogs byas nas// skya bo rgyun bzhin 'khyamapa dang/
'dod pa dag ga bdun pa yas/ bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'dan lag na rdo rjeya/ yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brgyad// kA li ki lis bsrungs byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jags
kha0/ pa med// byang phyogs yang na nub phyogs su// tshon rtsi la sogs de dag gzhag/ shar bltas lag pa g.yon pa yis// dri dang me tog 'phrang bas mchod// mtshon
cha bsngags shing phyogs bcings la// thag gse grwa yang btsal bar bya// de ltar mnyam pa bkod nas ni// khang pa gru bzhi bribar bya// jiltar thag ni gdab pa bzha// thig dang mthunapar
bsgrub par bya// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// ya mtshan de re dran par bya// nang gi khang pa mnyam pa dang// gru bzhi legs par gnas par bya// grwa yi phyogs na thams cad du// de
yatshod dang mthun par ni// rdo rje khong gnas rdo rje yi// dbus dang thog ma dbyibs legs shing// rtse mtho shan tu rgya che ba/ shar du brtan te gzhag par bya// rdo rje yi ni byang phyogs su//
lordo rje dag sngags gdab cing bya// dbus dang rtsa mo legs pa ya/ rgyal mtshan rtse monang du bsgang// nub byang grwar nagazhag par bya// rdo rje sgo na nub tu 'dod// 'di ni gsang ba'i sgor bshad
de rta rta'abyung po thams cad 'jigs par byed// dkyil 'khor 'dod pas sgo dayi// byang phyogs kyin nyi 'khor dang/ lho phyogs sun gang bshad pa// bstan tu legs par gzhag
tsha par bya// gur kum dgan yi bong ba// rgya skyags khu bas sbyar ba 'am// le brgan rtsisanadamarabyas pa'i// deng na yod kun 'thog khyadab// sa ni ba dan byas nas kyang// shing rang
mkha dag la gdags par bya// sgo ya lho phyogs ngos su yang// de dag las gzhan gang 'dod pa// ku lan da ya'aphrang ba dag/ jorje rtse mor gdags par rgyu// yang na me tog dmar po yi//
'phrang ba sna tshogs bzang po gdags// rdordzo'i sgo na don grub pa// 'gro dang ma 'gro 'jig rten gsum// 'a dag 'joms nus gang yin pa// sgo spungs gnyis kyang gzhag bya zhing// de
yang rig sngags bzhin du byu// grags pa gzhan yang gang 'dod pa// rdo rjethog thog lho phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur byang phyogs gzhag/ jo rje thog thog lho phyogs su// me tog yungs kar/
stong dag tu// dri sung zhim pos tshes ba sgos shang// dri dang me tog rgyas pa'i ng gzhag/ rdo rje khu tshur stobs po che// dpal ldan de bzhin byang phyogs su// rdo rje khu tshur phyag rgya yis//
bzhag na glags na rnyed mi 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum rgyal gang gang las// rdo rje'adzinapa yade kyis bkug/ rdo rje khu tshur khu tshur gyis// bsnan na rnam par 'jig par 'gyur// sdorje
sAng po'i khang pa der// g.yonalogs nas zhi 'jug par bya// de nagayas gos bskor ba yang// 'jig rten dag tu bshad par bya// 'khor kun dang ni lhan cig du// rdo rje sgrog kyang
gzhag par bya// klu yi gtsobo nor rgyas bu// gzican gnyis kyang grwa ru gzhag/ bdaganyis klu kun bdag po ste// klu kun gyin gnas kyang yin// bram ze las byung dug can do// 'ad
gnyis sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// bad gnyis kyi ni mdun logs su// mkha' ldang rnam par 'dud pa'i du// mkha' lding ga ni cho ga bzhin// rkangadang byis pa la
sogs bskor// de nas 'byung po' tshogs bdun dag/ cho ga bzhan du gzhag bar byu// gnod sbyin kun dang ku be ra// de ya ba con byang phyogs gzhug/ de nas klu chen tshogs rnams
dang/ (bya ba sgrub po g.yog dang bcas// klu yi g.yog rnams mthu stobs ldan// de dag shar phyogs ngos su dgod// da nas phyi rol rig sngags tshogs// thams cad gzhag ste
dbang phyug che//chos kyi dang can brag gs ldan ma// lha mo dka' bzlog zha 'brang ldan// lag na rdo rje lha chen ng// dka' bzlog gnyis kyi bar dag tu// rig sngags lugs dag gzhag
par bya// des na lag nardo rje yi// rdo rje 'bar bas rab tu gzare// de nas gra logs lha mo ni// ka ta ya na log 'dren dang// sna yon sum du rtsa gnyis po// de dag las na gang 'dod dang//
de yi 'og tu dri zani// skal chen brtson 'grus che ba rnams// shar du dbang po rdo rje dang// de bzhin dbang po lha yi tshogs// daya 'og tu lha ya bza'// de nas khyab 'jug 'dor ler bcas//
me dang drug ma bstan pa yi// ma dang mdung thung gru ru gzhag/ lho phyogasadang por lho phyogs kyi// 'byung po'i bya ba bsgrubapa gzhag/ de yi 'og tu ba/ shin rje dang// gshin rje'i dbyug pa grul
kha0 bum rnams// grul bum 'a sogs tshogs kun dang// ma mo rnams dang 'jig rten ma// bden bral gru ni 'phags ma'i mdun// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bskor bar bya// nuba phyogs dang
por skem byed ni// drag mo tshogs na mang por ngacas// klu dang mkha' snang grags ma rnams// de yi 'og tu gtor ma'i gnas// tshil zhes bya rgya chen yang// der ninges par gzhag
par bya// de ltar de dag thams cad du// tshogs rnams thams cad bkod pa'i dbus// rdo rje dkyil 'khor nang dag tu// rdo rje dbyibs kyi stegs bun// shar nub phyogs su lta ba'i dbyangs/
de la de byanges legs gzhag par bya// de yi nub phyogs gnas su yang// rig sngags 'chang na sa gnas shing// lag na rdo rje'i snying po ni// rab tu bsgrims te bzlas brjod bya/
tsan dan phyi ma la sogs sos// nas dang yungs kar la sogs dang// yang nade dag re re yis// lag na rdo rje thog mar bris// bdag nyid g.yon phyogs ngos la 'dug/ lha mo lho nub
mtshams su gzhug/ g.yas pas dri dang 'phreng bas mchod// bdug pa sna tshogs dag kyi sreg/ shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad kun// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba 'am// yang na
'dus pa chen po'i mdo// the tshom med par gdon par bya// de nas chos kyi rgyal po ya ]/chos kyi 'khor lo mkhas pas bri// dpal dang ldan pa lha yi lha// sangs rgyas sku gzugs
[m gl ]'od can bri// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu yis// ga sngags gus pas mchod cing bzlas/ lha mo stobs chen de nyid dang// rdo rje ri bo bri bar bya// snying po
lag na rdo rjen// mtshon rtse gsum gyi bdag nyid kyi// tshul bzhin bri zhing rigs rnams kyi// blon mo bdun gyis bskor bar bya// pho nya mo bcu dpung gi mchog/ drug cu rtsa bzhes rjes 'brug
dang/ rig sngags tshogs ni thams cud dang// rdo rje khro bo yan chad bu yade bzhin nor bu 'dra ba dang// skal ldan mchog spyan gzugs bzad 'dra// 'jig rten kun gyi thabs su ni//
wa dus kun tu ni phyag bya ba// lha kun rig sngags chen mo sta// gnod sbyin 'byung po klu 'jigs byed// gdon chen dag ni stong phrag rnams// gcig pus gsod par byed pa ste// de yi mang
ni brjod byas shange// me tog bdug pas mchod byas na// gdon rnams bya ba stong phrag dag/ 'khyam par 'gyur zhing g.yo bar 'gyur// de ya dngos grub gzugs bzang bzhin// dpal
dang ldan par mngon sum gnas// thams cad donan sgrub pa pos// 'di la the tshom med par sgrub// sgrub pas rab dang 'bring la sogs// ngashos dang bdug pa la sogs mchod// a
ka ru spos du ru ka/ yungs kar gu gul shu dag dang// de kun da dang shu la si// pad 'dra ma dang sbrang rtsi mar/ ma hA bingag la dang bcas// 'dir na las kyang bya ba yin// thams cad
'jug pa'i sgo dag tu// thams cad kyang n 'byung bar bya// sgo ma yane pa gzhan dag tu// 'daren ci yang mi bya'o// zhe sdang gti mug rgyugs dang myos// 'dod chags ma shes dbang gis/
kyang/ za'adi la 'jug dang 'byung byas na// mi rnams myur du nad kyis 'debs// gdon rnams myos shinge rgyags pa yis// rdo rje dag la rdzi byed dam// rkang pas rdo rje ri mo brdzis// myur
du dam tshig nyams 'gyur te// de dag rdo rje 'dzin pa yis/ myur du rdo rje chen pos 'joms// de dag gi niriges rnams kyang// rdo rje rig sngags tshogs kyis gzhag/ slob dpon yang na
dam tshig shes// gdon gang dag gis brnyas byed na// rdo rje lcags kyu'i bzlas brjod dang// sbyin sreg dag gis de yi rigs// skad cig gis ni bcom par 'gyur// gzhan yang jorje
rigs chen las// ragi sngags 'dod gyur gang yin pa// de yang star na ba sgrub byas la// myos la sogs pa sa gdon rnams bslad// gang phyir sgor yang 'grub pa'i phyir// rtag tu 'ad/
nanang dag tu// mchod pa'i phyogs na brjod pa dang// brdeg pa la sogs las ma bya// gzhan yang nad gtang mang po dang// yo dgas 'byung po sha zad g/ ngakyil 'khor spong bar
byed pa dag/ de dag 'dir ni gshanges pa yi// drag po'i las la 'jug par bya// gzhag par bya ba gang yang rung// thams cad lho phyogs nang du bya/ kun l mon 'bar bar bya//
bdug pa'i snod na phyi rol gzhag/ lha bshos sna tshogs mdzes pa dag/ ci 'dod kun ni thams cad du// thams cad zad ma shes par bya// gdon gyi da kyil
'khor pha col gyi// byang shar mtshams su gang 'dod pa'i// lha yi phyag rgya'i tshogs kyang bri// pad+ma 'khor lo rgyal mtshan mdung// mdung thung dbyug pa be conar// zhags pa ste/
k+Sha gsum ra gdeng dung// gdon drag rnams la gnas par bya// gangan rig sngags gdon drag pa// mthu drag gnas pa de dag ni// mdzu nyid kyis ni bsgrub bya zhing// 'di la dpyadapar mi
byango dkyil 'khor de ya phyogs kun tu / 'byung po'i tshogs kun gnas kyang bya// gtor ma dngan bdug pa rnams// rab tu rgyas pas mchod par bya// de nas gdonan dul ba yis//
thems par gyur na mchod par bya// mi bzad la ni snar blugs dang// mig bsku ba dang btung ba dang// sbyin sreg sogs pas gzhig par bya// gdon gyis drag tu btab pa la/ dal nas
bzung bas yongs mi bya// dal nas byas pa sman ba nyid// mi bzad gdon gyis bcom par 'gyur/da phur sman pa mi bzad pa// gtum zhang sbyod pa rig pa dang// brtan mchog/
dga' zhing spro ba dang// snying snyoms rig sngags brtson pa yis// khros nas mthun snyoms bya zhing// brdag pa'i m yang na bsdags par bya// dul ba'i gdon ni dang ba yis//
de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bcas par yang// gtor ma'i las na bya ba dang// 'khur ba dang na gzhabs pa dang// kha zas ci 'byor rim bzhin dbul//
dam tshig ci rigs sbyin par bya// rig sngags 'byung bo la sogs kyi// gtor ma kun n pa red sbyin// gdod kun la na mchod pa bya// bcom ldan nyid kyis bshad pa bzhin// bden/
par sku zhang dam tshigangogs// slong dang na phyir na bodi'i brtson pa'i// slong ma dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/ thams cad kyi no phyog rgyu'i tshogs// skrag par bya dang mchod bya nga// jo dag
brams cad g.yon pa yis// rnam pa dran pa cad bstan par bya// rdo rjegom par 'dor dang 'jig/ cig car yongs su bsgyur ba dang// grayon pas brdab par bya bdung// rgyags pa'i sang
ge sgra bsgrags dang// mdzub mo bstan ta hUM zhes bya// shin tu sgra yang rab tu bkyed// rdo rjegs can skyes pa yi// slob dpon gyis nibastan par bya// lha yi gdon ni thams cad kyi//
rtags kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs bshad pa// rkyen du bab pa gang yin pa'o// so so'i phyag rgya'i tshogs 'di yin// tshangs pa'i pad+ma lha na mdung// gshin rje'i dbyug chen dam pa yin// khyab
'jug 'khor lo sman pa'i mi// nam mkha' lding ga sna dang bdab// dang po rdo rje ma ya lce// chu lha yi ni zhags pa bstan// rlung ni dar gyi shugs can te// tan to yi btson sogs// 'byung
po'i gdon rnams thams cad kyi/ lag pa g.yon pas de dag gzung// 'jug byed kyi ni 'khor lo rdzong// lta ba dang ni di ri ri// drize dag ni thams cad kyi// gling/
bu pa wad la sogs bstan// gar mkhanadagun lhag par yang// garadangarol mo'i cha byad bstan// gnod sbyin rnams kyis tshel bgad pa// rab gtum gyin sgra chen te/ ku be ra ya mtshan
wA mang dang// yang na phyag rgya'i tshogs kun yin// klu chen gdengs ka chis pa ste// lag pa g.yon pas mgo bodogazhag dbugs ni rgyun ringes rgyu ba dang// mig dmar dug dang bcas pa yin//
klu rnams gdengs ka mang po dag/ gcig tu gzhabs nas ci dgar gzhag/ bya ba sgrub pa thams cad ni// sbrul yod pa yi gdengs ka'i dbyibs// tshangs pa srin po gnyis kyin// sngags/
kyi ral ba nor bu dang// o brjod pa ya dbyug pa dang// mchod phyir rdzogs la sogs par bstan// srin po rnams kyi so dgos dang// rdzu 'phrul dag kyang rab tu bstan// bza' ba dang
ni bca' ba dang// mtshon cha dag kyang 'dra ba yin// sha za rnams na'atshob dang// ha rer lta zhangesha la srung// 'jigs pa sna tshogs ston pa dang// kun tu yang nalta bar byed// skem
byed kyi rang bzhanetshul// mdung thung la sogs dpung la brten// ma mo bgadonanithams cad na// rang gi lha yi mtshon mchog byed// pad+ma phyar dung thor tshug dbyug/ sngags na nor ngu bskor
bar rtarig pa 'dzin pa 'phags pa rnams// tshangs pa'i phyag rgya bdun pa yane/[· ]/mdung rtsa gsum pa zla phyed dang// thor tshugs mig dang rgyal mtshan dang// khyu mchog skad 'byin
ral gri rnams// dbang phyugachen po'i phyag rgya bdun// mdung thung drale dung dran dang// de bzhin radang bya gag dang// rma bya ya nimajug ma rnams// gzhon nu'i phyag rgyu bdun po yin//
bkror lo dung dang be con dang// ral gri dang ni phub zlum dang// nam mkha' ldang dang phag rnams ni// khyab 'jug phyag rgya bdun po yin// mche ba dngan spran dang so// de bzhin bum pa gtu
shang dang// gshol dang rkang pa g.yon pa rnams// phag mo yi ni phyag rgya bdun// nam gru dag gi gnyeram gdong// rgyan skad la sogs ston pa dang// skom pa nam gru'i phyag rgya ste//
rangabazhin nyid dubastan pa yin// sras su mdangs za rnams kyi ni// lhung bzed ral gri lag g.yon bcom// lha man rnams kyi mi yi gzugs// shudang bcas nga ma bstan par bya// 'phags
ba rnams ni 'khor dang bcas// kun la mdung rtse gsum pa yani// dri ba byas na lhag par yang// gdon rnams mtshan nyid gsal ngar shes// log 'dren sna tshogs brjod pa gang// de dag tshul
ltas par bstan par bya/ de dag la rang gi lag pa bskum pa dang// brkyang ba dang// rkang pa tha mal par bskyang ba dang/ snar gzhug pa de dag las gsang sngags kyi las bstan te/ drib dang/
'jog pa dang/ dgrol tshul rnam pa gsum bya'o// las rgya che ba rig sngags kyi tshogs kyis bshad pa phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi las grub pa 'di ni shin tu
ngo mtshar che ba sta/ sdabs su bya bab mdo bstan pa dang/ sngags kyi tshogs rnams kyang bshad do// 'dus pa chen po'i mdo las shan tu bkra shis pa'i tshigs su bcad pa bstan pa dang/
rdo rje'i gis las rig sngags kyi tshogs rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa rnams kyang bshad do// lag na rdo rje'i dkya'i 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las/ lag na rdo rje dang/ lha chen po dang/ dka'
bzlog masa bshad pa'i las kyi dkyil 'khor phyag rgya dang bcas par bshad pa rdzogs so////dkyil 'khor chen po 'di dag las// las kyi dkyil 'khor ru bstan dang//
rig sngags kyi ni dkyil 'khor rnams// so sor rgyas da ra bstan pa dang// gdon gyi las kyi phyag rgya dang// phyag rgya titso byed pa dang// ge sngags sgrub pa'i sa rnams dang// khrus kyi
dkyil 'khor dag tu yang// dri dang me tog 'phreng bdang// bdug pa dnganamachod pa dang// gtor ma sna tshogs de dag kun// dbul bas kun tu rnam kun gyis// don kun rab tu bsgrub pa'i
phyir[}]spyan drang bden nges par bya// 'byung po thams cad bder 'gyur po// 'byung po kun dga' zhes bya ba// gtor ma rig sngags ldan bya zhing// g.yas g.yon nas na sbyin bar bya//
a0 rtag tu 'du deg thams cad kyang// phyogs kun bltas pas 'di skad brjod// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags tshogs la phyag
'tshal lo// phyag rgya'i tshogs la phyag 'tshal lo// rig sngags brgyad brgyar skyes pa yi// gdon gyi srog gi rten gyur dang// rgyu ngang tungashad par bya// dkyil 'khor spyan drang mtsho
pa dang// dkyil 'khor ris gsum machod pa la// gdon rnams kyin gdon las mchog/ gdon gyi stobs ni smugs bya dang// nges par rtag tu bzlas bya bshadra// bye ba phrag stong gdon
rnams// sa stang dag na rgyu ba yod// dus tshigs sna tshogs bab pa na// de dag rgyu ba sna tshogs pa// gdon mchog dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir// de dag bdag gis bshad par bya// gdon
rnams nyan par byed pa dang// gtor ma len cing grub sbyin pa// de dag tshul dang gnaso byas pa// dben pa dag tu rgyu bar byed// ri bo yod du khong rnams dang// rtse mo rnams dang khyim rnams
dang/ rta'abras bu me tog rgyas rnams dang// drang srongadag gi gnas rnams dang// dka' thub tshal dang gzhal med khang// rig bya rjes su slob pa dang// me tog sna tshog samatshod ldan dang//
gnas dang kun dga' yade bong dang// bya rnams skad chen 'byin pa dang// 'jig rten mar ma byed kun dang// nyima'i gnas nas dga' byed cing// nyi ma lhan cig 'gro bar byed// nyi ma'i
@#// 'od dpal srog mnyam// gza' dang rgyu skar skaram la// de dag rtag tu rgyu ba byed// zla ba nya ba'i bod bgyis// phung po rgyas pa dag la gnas// rin
chen kun gyis rab brgyan cing// rtse nas ngos na lce lnga dang// phug brgya dag gis gang ba yi// lhun po rol de dag gnas// gangs ra ri bo'i rtse mo dang// gangs kyi sul na stongapa dang
smanan gyise ni rgyas pa yi// gsang rnams dang nags tshal dang// smanabargyas yongs su gang ba yi// spos ngad ldan la dedag gnas// spos kyi ngad na zhim pa ya// phyogs
rnams drang mo rgyas byed dang// dpag bsam shangegs brgyan pa ni// phyed mos tshal chen dga' byed dang// lha rnams gzhal med khang rnams su// lha yagazugs kyis gnas par byed//
( dadrag sngon phung gsang na gnas// spran phung gi ni sgra dag 'dra// sprin phung dag dang 'grogs byed cing// sprin phung lhan cig dga' bar byed// rgya mtsho'i nang gi chu la gnas// chu yishug
kyis rjes 'brang zhing// de dag rgya mtsho'i chu klung dang// lhan cig tu rgyu bar byed// mun nag gi grong chen dang// rgya mtsho yi ni sgra rnams dang// rgya mtsho mnapo 'khrugs pa la// de dag
rtag tu 'khrugs par byed// dpyid zla'i dus la bab pa na// shing rnamos kun lagadon do dag/ khu byug bung ba'i gzugs su gnas// chu klung chen po'i 'gram dgen// glinge ma rnams/
[d ]dang rdzong rnams dang// chudamar dag gis rgyas pa ya/ 'jang rnams n ni gnas par byed// chu rgyun yid du 'ong ba dang// chu rnams rab tu 'byung ba dang// khron pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang//
ri bo dag drang nu rnams dang// sbrul gyi tshogs kyis gangal ya// nags khung chen po dag na yang// de dag sbrul du gzugs bsgyur nas// sprul dang lhan cig dga' bar byed// ljon shing

chen po ma'i brad dang// 'byung po doganatshogs chen dang// khang stong dang na yul stong dang// ba lang gnas ni ging ba dang// rgyalo bo dag gi da kor khang dang// pad+ma rnams dang gzhan dag kyang//
glang chen gnas ni yad 'ong dang// rta rnams kyin bris dag dang// gzhan yang grong khyer rnams dang gzhan// tshong dus dag na gnas par byed// chang 'thung gnas dang khyim dang gnyan// srang
dang lam dang shadre rtadang// rgyu ba dag gi gnas rnams dang/ dbu ma la sogs lta ba'i rnams// skyed mos tshal dang mi bzad dang// lha ya gnas ni zhibs pa dang// bu btsa' ba yi gnas gzhan
dang rta brgya la thug pa'i khyimi dag dang// dga' ston sa dang 'dus pa dang// 'dus ston s dang 'thab mobs// g.yul gyi sa na thams rungan// gdon rnams rtag tu gnas par byed//
drug cu rtsa bzhi'i gdon bshad pa// yid ltar mgyogs gang 'dod dgur 'gro// 'dod dgur 'gyur ba 'i gzugs cand// thams cad rang dgar rtsen par byed// lha tshogs ma mo'i gdon drug
[t g]@#/ bcas/ tshangs pa srung bar byed pa ste// bar snang gzab ni nyim yang// gdon rnams kyi na gtso bor bshad// sam byed la sogs srin po'i bar// rdzogs ldan
ma dang glu gnyis dang// srin po bcu dang lha mo dang// nor bu 'gul ni bar ma yan// grul bum la sogs yi dgas dang// brjed byed bcas dang srul por bcas// mdang 'phrog de bzhin smyo/
byed dang// thams cad gdon gyi tha mar bshad// de dag gi ni khyad par bzhin// dkyil 'khor mngon par mchod byas nas/ mngon par dga' bar bya ba yi// bstod pas mchod pa dag
kyang bya// dbang po rdo rje 'chang ba'i lha// lha yi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ shar phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// ma ste bsreg byar 'os pa'i lha//
'byung po'i rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ phyogs mtshams gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gshin rje dbyug pa 'chang balha// sa ya bdag po gdon gyi
bdag/ brnab sems bdag nyid gdon bcas pa// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// ngaden dang bral b.legs ldan lha// srin po'i bdag po gdon gyi bdag/ sna tshogs gdon gyi
tshogs bcas la// mchod nga ra byas te phyag kyang 'tshol// zhags pa thogs pa chu yi lha// bden pa srung ba gdon gyi bdag/ nub phyogs gdon gyi tshogs bcas la// mchod par byas te
phyag kyang 'tshal// rlung ste srog kyang 'dzin pa'i lha// tshig srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// rlung gi tshogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// gnod sbyin
'gan ba can thogs/[” ]/nor srung gdon gyi bdag po ste// byang phyogs gdon dang bcas pa la// mchod pa ra byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// dpung dang ldan pa 'dren pa'i lha/ bgegs
kyi rgyal po gdon gyi bdag/ dbang ldan phyogs kyi gdon bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// 'og gi klu dngare nga' lha// rgyal po chen ngo glang po che// dam tshig shes pa'i
gden bcas la// mchod par byas te phyag kyang 'tshal// steng gi lha tshogs thams cad dang// zla ba nyem gzab chen dang// gza' skar rgyu skar nganus pa dang// skar ma'i bakhor 'a'i dkyil
'khor dang// rig sngags tshogs dang gsang sngags dang// de bzhin phyag rgya'i tshogs kun dang// dam tshag shes dang slob dpon dang// tshangs pa la sogs lha chen dang/ 'jorje
'dzan pa tshe yi lha// lagan rdo rje stobs po che// gtum po 'ge rten gsum gyi bdag/ 'jigs byed 'gan rdo rje thogs// thams cad zhi bar byed pa ste// 'byung po'i rigs ni kun
gyis mchod// rnam pa kun gyis 'byung po kun// dus kun du na srung ba po// rig sngags bcas pa de dag dang// 'byung po'i tshogs ni thams cad la// bshis dang dri sogs rtswa/
[[©]// tshogs rnams// des na dga' zhing dbul bar bya// dam tshig shes pa rnams dang// 'byung po'i tshogs kyis bdag la srungs// de yi rgyas pa 'phel ba
yang / rtabcom ldan 'das kyis mdzad par gsol// sna tshogs tshig gas bar bya// zhi ba 'tshog na yang dang yang// bdag gi bla ma'am yang na gzhan// dam tshig shes pa gzhan/
gyis byas// 'di ni 'byung po kun la phan phyir bshad pa ste// 'byung po'i tshogs kun 'adusal rtag tu mchod par bya// dkyil 'khor dag las gtor ma'i las ni rgyas pa 'di/ rgyu/
ba dag gi gnas dang rten gyur dang la bskyed phyir// 'daren thams cad dus su phyogs rnams thams cad du// yongs su dag pa'i yid dang rnam pa thams cad kyis// than sa rudan bar
byed pa gsum du rab bshad pa// don rnams bsgrub pa'i phyir na bla mas bya ba yani// las kyi dkyil 'khor rdzogs so//gdugagi sems can kun gyis mchod//
rig sngags bdag po kun gyis rjed// mtshungs pa mi drang ba sangs rgyas na// rnam gsum nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan// mtshan chen mang po mnga' ba ste// 'dom gang bod chen 'chang ba dang//
rig sngags ston pa chen po ste// mchogachan 'tshange mgas thon pa chen po ste// mchog min 'chang zhing sbyan byed dang// dag pa'i chos ni des gsung
yang sngon gshegs gshegs gyur dang// ya mtshan gnas ldan dge 'dun rnams// mya ngana'adas pa'i grong 'jug nga// shin turgyas ba de kun la// yang dang yang du phyag 'tshal zhing//
thub pa sangs rgyas gnyis pan// 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// lha dang lha man dri zar bcas// klu dang gnod spyi tshogs kyis mchod// de bzhin dam pa grub pa ste// ge sngags
'chang kun dbang phyug rje// dpa' bo gcig pu dgra thul ba// lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin rdo rje lcags kyu yum// rdo rje thog thog bzangamo dang// de nas lag na rdo rje'i
mthus// ka la ka la gtum po dang// rdo rje sgrog ga te ma bzhin// blo gros rdo rje phas mi thub// 'og pag khro bo dril bu can// de bzhin rdo rjenag mo la// ri sta shes rab can
dag gros// gzhan don grub par 'dod pa na// mchod cing phyag kyang byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor gzung bya legs par bshad// grung pa lags rdo rje yi// dngos grub thams cad
sgrub byed cing// dngos grub thams cad rab rdzogs pa// ji skad du na rab bstanapa'i// dkyil 'khor ci 'dra gang yin dang// de yi yon tan sna tshogs gang// tshogs kyang jeltar
bstan pa dang// dkyile 'khor gyi ni dem tshag dang// chog dam pa grub pa dang// phan dang mi phan don rnams dang// dam tshig shes pa'i yon tanadang// nyams pa'i gnas ni gang yin
[@#/// pa tade dang gzhan yang gang mthong ba// de dag thams cad legs par bshad// lag na rdo rje'i sras gtum pa// rdo rje sde la phyag byas nas// zla phyed yud/
tsam zhag gAge dang// rgyu skar dag na bzang ba la// gtsang zhing gos gtsang bgos pa dang// ngasnams shing nges par gnas pa dang// grogs po gtsang mar ldan pa dang/ 'gatsang/
ma'i las kyi rjes 'brang bas// yar gyi ngo yi tshos gag gam// tshes gnyis de bzhin lnga yang rung// chos drug dang na brgyad dang bcu// bcu gnyis yang na bcu gsum mam//
yang na nyaya ne ba na// yongs su gzung bar bya ba ste// de dag btsam gyis gzhan la mni// dkyil 'khor gnas ni sbyangs byas la// zla ba nya ya nub mo ni// dkyil 'khor
chen po bri bar bya// bsgrims te lagan rdzordzad ng// rgyal dbang la ni phyag byas nas// zhi zhing sngan tshadalas byas pa'i// sa ni mkhas pas 'gro bar bya// tshong dus kun dga'i gtsug
lag khang// grong ngam yang na grong khyer gyi byang sha mtshams gang mthong ba// de ya lho nub mtshams dag tu// zla ba re re brtul zhugs bya// mdang dga' tshal ldan gtsang ma dang//
tshwa sgo rdo gsag rus pa dang// mtho dman skyon rnams rnam spangs pa// de 'dra'i sa de red na ni// rdo rje lcags kyu dran byas la/ shar phyogs nas na gom pa 'dor// ha cang ma drag dgod me
cade nas rig sngags gang 'dod pas// bdag nyid kyang ni bsrung bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor gnas der yang// dge ba'i ltas rnams blta bar bya// sngags kyis btab pa'i
dag gis// thams cad legs par gtor bar bya// b.lang lci bas legs par sbyang// ku sha dag kyang gdung bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbus kyi dkyil dag tu// dkyil 'khor byed pa
'dug nas ni// phyogs mtshams stong dang thad kar yang// khor khor yug bltabar bya// srung zhing yid dga'i dri dag gis// khrus byas zhag gsum smyung bar bya// spos ngad ldan pa'i ri
bzhin du// spos kyis phyogs kun rgyas par bya// thig chung gsar zhange rab gtsang dang tshad dang ldan zhing mdzes pa dang// dri zhime reg na 'jam pa dang// sra zhung legs par gzabs
pa dang [$ $]thung dang sgrom sogs ma legs dang// mdud pa rnams na med pa yas// thig na shes rab can gyis gdab// de yi tshad kyang bshad par bya// dorje 'dzin chen dga' ba yo// dang
bo'i gnas na rdzogs gyur nas// de las gzhan pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// grangs rnams kyang nangashad par bya// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyal po ste gnas dang po'o
gabu dag chog shes dban pa bde// chos la ma smod bde ba yani// 'tsho ba spangs pas 'jig rten bde// srog chags rnams la sdom pa dang// 'dod chags bral ba 'jig rtan bde//
'dod chags rnams las 'das pa dang// nga nyam nga rgyal zhib dang// dul ba 'di ni mchog tu bad// bu dag rgyun las zlog pa yi// lam bgrod zab cing blta dka'
ba3 mun nag thibs pos bsgrubs pa dang 'dod la chags pas rtogs ma gyur// ngas ni dka' bas rtogs byas nas// skyo bo rgyun bzhin 'khyam pa dang// 'dod pa dag gi 'dun pa yis/
bcings pa'i bar du bshad pa ste// 'di ni lag na rdo rje yi// yid 'ong ched du brjod pa brjod// rtse mo can gyis bsrung byas nas// nges par kun tu 'jigs pa med// dkyil 'khor khru
ni gcu drug tu// can s rab tu tshang bar bya// srid du yang ni ci nas kyang// sum cu rtsa gnyis yod pa dang// gtsang mas gtsang ma'i gos bgos la// thig skud de ni bdag gis gzung
lha la dga' ba'i grogs po yis// khor khor yug drang bar bya// thogagrangs de yi steng dgatu// thigen snyoms par legs par bri// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma/ rmad du byung ba de
nyidabarjod// thub chen gnas par gyur pa yi// khor yug brag ni rgya che ba// rang byung gsanibastan pa bzhin// blo can dag gis zlum por bya// dzung sgrom la sogs skyon bral zhing// thig
naligs shang snyoms par bya// thom ches pa ni sngar bshad zin// drung ches pas nad kyis 'debs// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// do na yungs kar dag gsebri// gang/
zhig tshon don phye mas badri// des ni 'jig rten nges par 'joms// nas rnams kyi ni ma 'dres pa// sA lu ba zang por byas nas// de yi nor dang bcu rnams dang/ [– ]/dbyage rnams rtag tu
'phal bar 'gyur// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod pas// der ni gsum char gyis kyang bri// yang na de dag gcig pu yis// shes rab can gyis bribar bya// de nas ri yi rgyal bon//
nichen kun nas grub pa ste/ tem bzhin du rtag tu yang// rang gi 'od kyis rab 'bar zhing/ bang rim yod pa'i de ribade// thog ma nyid dugazhag par bya// sngar bstan pas khor
yug ni// grub bzhi tshod du bya ba yin// de nyid khongs su rim pa gsum/ khru re tsam du bri bar bya// gzhan yang na thon do dodang// so bzhi bcas par bri bar bya// gnyis pa dang ni
lhag ma rnams// ma drugamadzes dang ldan par bya// gzhan na mtshams la thug pa'i bar// ci ges par n bri bar bya// ngu 'bod chen po zhes bya ba// dmyal ba bden bral phyogs
su gzhag/ bstan pa bzhin du de byas nas// gzhan yang bshad pa bzhin du bya// las gsar pan sA lu 'am datsagadon bzang po'i phyi ma yis// rdo rjesrid du khru gang ba// rtse
drug yang n rtso gsum bri// de yang rtsa ste ma 'byoran// grog mkhar gyi na sa dag gis// sor bzhi tsam du bya ba yin// gang gisagadonan stong phrag rnams// khyad par bdar ni sgrub
byed pa/ de nyid 'jig rten gsum dag ga/ bags byed drag po yin par nges// de nyid ngomatshar bya snyad// ya mtshan rnams kyang ston pa yin// gcig
pu rdo rje gnyis ldan pa// de nyid kyan drung dag tu// dkyil 'khor rnam pa bzhi po dag/ byin gyis brlabs nga 'tshog bya// bden dang gtor ma rgya che ba// ting 'dzani zhi ba ya mtshan
ldan yang na gung gas 'di dag kun// thub pa'i shes rab byan brlabs bya// banganadang nges par gnas byas nas// bden bral phyogs su bri bdang// chu lha'i phyogs su song nas
kyang / rgyal chen don rnams bya ban// sa tu ku ni bu dang bcas// bzhi pa de ni legs par gnas/ grong khyer mchog gi drung dag tu// gun byang phyogs blta bar bya//
'denas 'jug par rab bstan te// dkyil 'khor drag pa gzhan ma bya// gzugs gnas sgo mchog de nyid ni// rdordzo'adzin pa dgyesapa yin// dkyil 'khor 'dod pa gang yin
pa/ de yasgo ya byang phyogs drung// lho phyogs kyin drung dag tu// bstan pagangayanagazhagapar bya// gur kum yid du 'ong ba dang// ldan pa'i rgya ste gas khu ba dang/ le
brgan rtsi yis bsgyur ba ya// sor ni dmarazhingayade bong ba// bug rtsolamed cing ma nyams la// drang ba dag med pa yi// gdan dag kyang ni des byas shing/ shing ring la ni legs
par gdags// de nas legs shig rtse mo yi// cha byad sna tshogs khyad par du// rnam par madzes pa gzhug bya ste// rgya skyegs las ni legs byas pagi/ pho long chen po rim can//
gzhan yang dral dang sgo nga'i dbyibs// lta bu 'khor gyi tshogs rnams dang// gzhan yang rnam pa sna tshogs gzhag/ kur na ta ka'i me tog 'phrang// rgyal mtshan rtse mor phyang du gzhug/
yang na ma tog dmar ba yi// 'phreng ba bzang po sna tshogs gadrags// de dag bstan bcos shes pa yis// dkyil 'khor de ya phyi rol gzhag/ de nas ri dbang khor yug gi/ nang du yang
na 'gro bar bya// de ltar ma tshungs med ces bya ba// dkyil 'khor gyi no thog gdab pa// gnasaganyis pa ni rgyas par bstan// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las
gnas gas pa rdzogs so///rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rmad du byung ba de dran zhing// g.yon phyogs dag zhugo rims bzhin// lha rnams kyang ni dgodra bar
bya[$ $]chu lha'i phyogs kyi sgo dug nas// karasha pa Na brgyad dag gi/ 'gron bu rnams ningeshar nub tu// mnyam zhing mdzes par dgod par bya// de yi lho phyogs rdo rje yi// rig
sngags bla ma'i rogs rnams dgod// den rdo rje lcags kyu ma// rig sngags rgyal po dngus sugazhag drags shang stobs kyis rgyugs pa yi// sngon po chen po sngon po gnyis// der
ni rig sngags rigs rnams kyi// sgo srung dag tu gzhag par bya/ bag sngags rdo rje'i rigs skyas rnams// dkar phyogs su na blta bar bya// 'dod pa'i de rjed
por bshad// rdo rje khro bo mjug tu gzhag/ ma rtog yid 'ong rtsi mo can// lug rgyud gtum mo sar mo rnams// pho nyamo dag grangs bzhan du// thams cad do ya la rol dgod//
bung ba ma dang lta ba ma// dgab ma thub dka' byang phyogs gzhag/ rdo rje ka ta ya na dang// 'di dug g.yas phyogs bri bar bya// rdo rje sde yi 'khor rnams kyang// de yi lho phyogs dgod par
bya rtade nas klu rgyal nor rgyas bu// bzhi pa dag la gzhag par bya// 'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba ya// gzhon nu tshogs dang bcas pa yang// dkyil 'khor lnga par gzhag par bya//
mdung thung yang na mdun du gzhag/ de nas drug la bden bral phyogs// 'byung po rangs byed ma 'phrad pa// 'phags pa yin ma dung bris la// 'phags ma ba nimadun du gzhag/ ma
mo rnams kyi rigs lnga po// tshangs ma dang ni dbang phyug ma// sam byed khyab 'jug phag mo zhes// bya ba dkyil 'khor bdun par gzhag/ grong khyer de yanang dag tu/ chu klung 'gram
dang ldan par bri// grwa rnams shar byang grwa dag dang// lho dang nub phyogs phyin par bya// sdig can nun gnas pa'i nang// ngoms ma shes pa'i ri dgas shig/ nang du mchu btsugs
phyogs gcig nas/ da nang khyu mchog 'gro bar bya// rlung lha'i phyogs kyi gnas gcig tu// bde byed lha mo khyu mchog dang// de ba gne ra dang bum rna gzhes// grong khyer gyi ni sgo srung
gzhag/ klung gi g.yas rol 'gramo dag tu// rig sngags chon ma bu smad bcas// dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste// dkyil 'khor bdun pa 'das pa yin// dkyil 'khor brgyad pa/
sngar bshad pa'o// 'byung po'i bya ba sgrug pa bdun// 'byung po sna tshogs bskor ba gzhag/ dgu par yang ni rim bzhin bru// de nas dkyil 'khor bcu par ni// rmongs pa'i drang srong rnams
kyang gzhag/ de nas gshAnedzitshogs mong bcas// bcu gcig par na gzhag par bya// me lce 'bar bas bskor ba ya// ma lha ma ya tshogs kyis bskor// ma da mthu las skyes pa
sta rtaden bcu gnyis shes par bya// yi dgas rnams kyi 'khor dang bcas// ri dgas dag kyang gzhag par bya// lag na rdo rjes bshad pa bzhin// de ni bcu gsum shes par
bya// zla ba phyogs bzang stobs po che// khyab 'jug dbang po nye dbang gnyis// rgyal ba'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi// blo gros lha mo gnyis kyang gnag/ gang na lha dbang gnyis gnas
pa// den bcu bzhangashes par bya/ bco lnga pa yid kyi lo 'khor du// klu chen 'gas brgyad dgod par bya/ bka' stsol pa zhes bya ba yi// tshangs pa'i srin rnams bcu drug tu//
bcu bdun pa yo da kyil 'khor du// ka ta ya na gzhag par bya// de yi 'khor na gung yin pa// de yang drung du gzhag par bya// dbang phyug chen po chung mar bcas//
dngang ldan phyogs su gzhag bya ste// dan bco brgyad shis par bya// de nas phyi rol ragasngags rigs// rig sngags kyan sna tshogs dge/ bcu dgu par ni gzhag par bya// de nas
kyang n rig sngags rnams// ming smos 'di dag la sogs bri// dregashed thabs kyi dri gshedudang// ro langs mar na grags pa dang// dkar mo chen mo dkar mo dang// gzhan
yang sa stangs gnas rnams gzhag rdo rje'i mnga' bdag dgos pa yi// gzhan gyi rig sngags mchog 'chang ba// rab tu gsal zhing 'bar du// dbus dang mkhas pas gzhag
par bya// de nas rdo rje 'dzin can rje// cha shu par gzhag par bya// gang na rdo rje 'dzin gnas te// mnge na rdo rje pho brang yani// nyi shu gcig pa'i byang phyogs su// ku be ra ni
tshogs bcas bri// ku be ra ni gar gnas pa// grong khyer lcang lo can zhes bya// klu ya bye ba sgrub pa brgyud// grong khyer nyi shu gnyis pa gzhag/ bya ba sgrub bcas kru chen rnams//
lnga po nyi shu gsum par gzhag/ dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa ba zhoreg/ klu ni dkyil 'kher gzhag par bya// klu mgo ya ni gdongs ka can// klu chen gyis ni g.yas su bskor/
dkyil 'khor de yi nang dag tu// klu chen kha dog sna tshogs pa// mtha' yas nor rgyas pad+ma dang// de bzhin nor bu la sogs klu// kal pa la dang rab mgyogs gnyis de
bzhin gzhan yang klu rnams kyi// ma dang rgyal tshab 'jog po yang// dkyil 'khoranang du gzhag par bya// shar sgo bod ma'i rtse mo go zhag/ dga' bskyod pa'i lho phyogs su/ nub
phyogs su na legs mthong gzhag/ byang phyogs sun stobs kyi rgyu// de nas nu lha'i phyogs dag tu// 'byung po'i tshog san bdun rnams dgod// de na nyi shu lnga pa yi// dkyil 'khor
du yang grags pa yin// dkyil 'khor nyi shu rtsa lnga pa// 'di dag kyang na mkhas pa yis// cirags par 'dri bya zhing// rdzogs byed rnams kyang legs par bri// chu lha'i phyogs su
nyi ma bri// shar phyogs su ni zla ba gzhag ka ru nani gling bzhir na// phyogs mtshams dag tu gzhag par bya// lhag ma dag na byang phyogs su// nges par yang ni dgod pa
bstan// 'di dag rnams ni mdor bsdu na// khor yug ga na khong nas dbyung// de nas rdo rje shugs kyis ni// der ni stobs chen 'gro bar bya// bang rim la ni song nas kyang// dang por
legs par dgod par bya/ rdzong gi 'phags ma don sgrub pa// dur khrod gnas na drag mo ni// bden bral phyogs sugazhag bya zhing// ma yang drung du gzhag par bya// phyogs kyi
lhan byed ba rnams// dbang ldan phyogs su dgod par bya// log 'dren drag po chen po yang// dkyil 'khor du na legs par dgod// rlung lhab phyogs su/
mkha' lding gzhag/ de nas dang poskyong ba yi// rdzong gi 'phags ma gnyis pa yang// yongs su rdzogs par gzhag par bya// bang e dgan gnyis pa la// rdo rje shugs kyi bsgom/
ts+tsa bya zhing// klu rigs nor bu gzhag par bya// mtha' yas bden bral phyogs su gzhag/ de nas phyogs kyi lha nyid ni// gshin rje'i phyog su legs par gzhag/ de nas yi dag
tshogs rnams kyang// ma ya phyogs su gzhag par bya// de nas chog shes pa yis// yi dgas kyi nirigs rnams dgod// brjed byed kyi ni rigs rnams dang// nam gru dag gi
rigs kyang gzhan// dbang ldan 'byung po rnams dang ni// 'byung po'i chang khyu rnams kyang gazhag/ tshangs pa'i sun po zhes bya rnams// dkyil 'khor byang phyogs dgod par bya// phyi
rol klu yi rigs rnams kyang// rlung lha'i phyogs su legs par dgod/ dkyil 'khor dam pa gnyis pa las// bang rim 'di ni yongs su rdzogs// rdo rje ram gyis bsgoms nas/
gsum pa yang ni bden bral phyogs// sha za bzhag ste song na yang/ rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro'i dkyil 'khor gzhag/ yi dgas kyi ni khyim rnams kyang// gshin rje'i phyogs su
legs par dgod// me yi phyogs su dkyil 'khor du// stobs chen lha ma yin rnams gzhag/ de nas dpal ldan 'jig rten skyong// 'jig rten chos las phyir phyogs pa// yul
khor srung na dpag med pa'i// dra zar lhan ga kun tu dgod// dbang phyug chen mor bcas pa yi// dbang ldan phyogs su gnas par bya// de nas rig sngags rnams kyi bdag/ lag
na rdo rje rnal 'byor tshe 'gregs bcas rdo rje 'dzin pa yi// rdo rje pho brang dga' bgazhag/ de nas stobs chen 'jig rten skyong// dpal ldan 'jig rten chos spangs pa// lag na rdo
rje 'dzin pa yi// dbang ldan byang ga phyogs su gzhug/ de bzhin lcang lo can dag tu// nor sbyin tshogs dang bcas par bri/[– ]/klu rnams ma su ra sa// rlung lha'i phyogs su gnas
par bya// de dag bu dang b.rus par ni/ 'do yi drung du dgod par bshad// mkha' ldang rnam par 'dud pa'i bu// mthu rtsal shin tu rdzogasapa'i ng gzhug/ de nas 'byung po'i tshogs
rnams dgod// chu lha yang n nub phyogs gzhag/ gsum pa dag kyang 'das pa yi// bzhi pa dag gas bshad par bya// bang rim bzhi pa'i steng dag tu// rdo rje shugs kyis
song nas ni// nyes rnams na g.yog dang bcas// chu lha'i phyogs su gnas par bya// bden bral phyogs su srin rnams dgod// de yi pha rol grul bum gzhag/ de nas grul bum
lcags can yang// lho phyogasasu na gzhag par bya// ma ya phyogs su rlung lta gzhag/ shar phyogs zla ba 'khor dang bcas// thag bzas rages kyang
de bzhin te// de gnyis kyi ni bzhi pa dgang// de nas bang rim lnga pa la// rdo rje shugs kyis 'gro bar bya// lha bsrung phyangoni klu rnams kyang// du lha'i phyogs dgod par bya//
drab ng ldan dang shar mtshams su// lha yi mdzod kyang gazhag par bya// gzhan gyis mi 'jorje che// dbang ldan phyogs su gzhag par bya// de nas rdo rje'i drung dag tu// gnas gtsang
rigs kyi lha chen gzhag/ lha yi srung ma gnod sbyin tshe/ byung phyogs dag tu gnas par bya// rdo rje shugs kyis drug pa la// song nas chu lhu'i phyogs dag tu// klu rgyal rgya mtsho chen
po'i bu// drag cing shugs dang ldan pa gzhago/ der nagayog dang bcas par bya// gzhan dag gse ni sprul pa la// dbang byed la ni gang yin rnams// bden bral phyogs su gnas
par bya// tshangs ris kyi na tshogs rnams kyang// ma ya phyogs su dgod par bya// tshangs pa'i mdunan 'don pa yi// lha rnams shar phyogs gzhag par bya// shin tu mthong lha
tshal dbang ldan du// srad rtso de ya pha rol dgod// de bzhin dka' bzlog byang phyogs bzhag/ drug pa dag kyang bdas pa yin// bang rim dag ni bdun pa la// rdo rje shugs kyis rdo rje
'chung/ 3song nas klu yi gtso bo ni/ rgya mtsho chen po rmad byung gzhag/ byang phyogs bya ba zin nas ni// grags shing bsod nams che ba ya// 'phrul dga' ba ya lha chen rnams//
gshen rdzo'i phyogs su gnas par bya// de nas rdo rje shar phyogs kyi// gnas kyi gtso bor gzhag par bya// sum dugasum pa'i ng shar phyogs su// gzhag cing bdun pa yongs su dgung
lha rnams sna tshogs rgyas pa yi// ri yi dbang po dam pa yi// bang rim dag ni yongs su rdzogs// de yi 'og tu byu ba bshad// rirab stod du thams cad mkhyen// rig sngags stang po
'chang ba po// sangs rgyas bajig rten rtogs mdzad pa// thar pa'i grong khyer dbang phyug gzhag/ gangags 'od zer de dag gis// phyogs rnams thams cang rgyas mdzad dang// gang gi yul
mtshan kun gyi/ 'amadzod rnams thams cad 'byung ba dang// mtshan dang gzhon dang brtson 'grus dang// gzhan yang zhi bar ldan pa dang// mchog rnams mchog spyane byed pa la// gang gi se/
mchog gi mchog sbyin dang// thugs rje dang ldan pa'i migon// nyi ma 'char ka'i 'od dang 'dra// 'od zanyem bye ba yas// gang gi mun pabasal bdang// chos dang mtshan nyid shes pa ya//
mad bzhayor bu'i thugs mnga' gang// gang gis bskal pa grangs med par// sems can rnams ni rab tu bsrungs// rin chen u0f00mnal ltar// gang gi gtsug tor mdzes pa dang// nor bu yi ni rgyal
[e]/ @#// bo bzhin// zlumadog dung can ma dzod srungs sna/ gangag bdud rtsi gtong ba'i zhal// dadaru gam dog badradang// dus 'tshams gser gyis bsgyur ba yi/ gsar gyi
ltar sku mdog mdzes// 'khor lo chen po rtsibs stong pas// phyag dang zhabs ni legs spras pa// skyil mo krung na mdzes pa yis// thub pa chen po legs par bzhugatso// chos kyi chu klung chen/
po 'i mchog/ de yi zhal nas kun tu 'bab// rmad du byung bar 'bab pa ste// bdag gi kha na stong phrag rnams// stong snyad byas na brjod pa 'am// khong du chud pa nas mi 'gyur/ de na rgyas par
'gengs pa dang// ye shes pha mtha' blanamed// shane tu rmad byung gsang bar bshad// tshogi ldan gyin lha mo de// 'jig rten mgon po sangs rgyas kyi// gsung la rab tu gnas pa yin// bge
rten gsum ma bdag mchog sbyin// 'jig rten gsum gyis phyag byas pa// 'di ni gnas dang 'gro ba yi// 'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa mAn// tsheba'i mchog stobs chen te// dga' zhing kun
gyi tshog l gnas// gzhan gcage sangs rgyas 'dra ba med// gud na yang na gnas ma yin// de yi bsngags pa sangs rgyas sam// lho rnams nyid kyis brjod par nus// mchog sbyin 'jig rten
gsum gyim// nyes pa thams cad rnam bar sngangs/ mdon 'gro ba 'di kun na// khyod kyi rang bzhin nyid yin te// lha dang dri gludabang dang// gnod sbyin snyam 'i tshogs bskor ba'i// rgyu dang mi rgyu
bzhi rnams kyi gter// ya mtshalas kyi dkyil 'khor na// der gtogs des ni brtson zhing spro// de dang 'brel bar the tshom med// chos krung bsod nams ldan pa de// bsod nams na chen dag
gas rgyas// lag na rdo rje'i bsod nams kyi// las kyi rgya mtsho dag las 'byung// chu klung rgya mtshor 'bab pa na// skyo bas brten nas 'bab par 'gyur// de bzhin chos kyi chu klung 'di/ 'di
drag gis bston byas nas kyang// lag na rdo rje'i mgo bo dang/ rnaganyis dang na gsum du dbab// bla ma 'phros pas lha mo dang// dbang phyug tshogs bcas phog par 'gyur// de phyi'i chos/
chu klung 'di// sangs rgyas las 'byung byas la// lag na rdo rje'i mgo bor yang// rab tu dbang cade bdag par bya// bsod nams ldan pa'i chu klung rgya chen de nyid las// skye bo mas+sa'adag
gcig tu sems btud nyan par byed// de nyid la na lha rnams thams cad mngon par dga'// de de la na rig sngags grub pa'i tshogs kun barten/ gnas rnams gsum pa 'di la yi se nas
yan de// rod+de'adzan pa nga yi dragongs pa bzhin du rdzogs// de nas dam tshig mkhyen pas dkyil 'khor rgyal po yi// gsang ba gang dang gang gsungs dga' rgyas bdag gis bshad g/ lag
na rdo rje'i de rgyal 'khor don bodakyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po las gnas gsum pa rdzogs so// ka'i ba ni byang phyogs su// chos kyi klung chen 'dzin pa yi//
rdo rje 'dzin rab gtum ba// sog chen lag na jo Ni gzhag/ de yi rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po gnan par bya// g.yas pas nirkang pa yase// lha cho
dkab bzog gzhan par bya// ri yi dbang po khor yug dang// bang rim dag gi bar dag tu// blade chen rnam pa bzhi bo dang// gnas rnams ji bzhanegazhag par bya// de nas nuklung bdun
zlo yang gzhage/ lho phyogs sun dbyibs legs pagi/ 'dzam bu glangan gzhag par bya// chu klung dnganishing dang yul// sna tshogs kyis nishin tu rgyas// de yu mngon mtshan chen po//
'dzam bu'i shing mchog skyes pa de// baphang du dang ga tshad brgya yod do// 'og logs suno gzhug par bya// de nas chu klung bdun yang gzhag/ nags tshul yang bdun dag dang// yade du 'ong
ba'i re bdun dang// yul bdun dag kyang gzhag par bya// dang po byang nas brtsam bya zhing// lho phyogs logs su thur du drung// shar nas nub tu drang bya zhing// kho ra khor yug bsgrubs nas ni/
u rgyal ba'i gsung ba yod bob// chos kyi 'khor lo rjes bsgrub pa// 'phags pa shAr dwa ti'i bu// snying rje'i bdag nyid pad+ma'i mchog/ dgo slong dge slong ma rnams dang// rgyal po dag gis

bstan pa ga zhag/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga lho phyogs su// 'khri shing dag kyang bri bar bya// nub phyogs su nibalang spyod// chu bo brgyas n gang ba dang// yul dang skyo bo stong dag dang// ba lang khyun stod
gis rgyas// de bgane shagyi lus 'phags kyang// shar phyogs su gzhag par bya// yul rnams dang deg gas// kun tu rab tu rgyas par gnang// de nas gnas brtan chos skyong
brda tab gnyes dag dang lhan cig tu// sgra gcan zin zhes grags pa ste// sangs rgyas srasan mngon sum gnas// gnod sbyin lha min lto 'phya rnams// nyan mtshan du ni dir song nas//

dradang 'phrangab dpa med pas// mnod pa byed cing phyag kyang 'tshol// de nas byang gi sgra mi snyan// lhun po yin byang phyogasagazhag/ gtsang 'di gru bzhi lham pa ste// nuklung dag gis rab tu brgyan// gang
dgagan tshoyi tshad// chig stong tshang bar brjod pa dang// sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa la// sems can ya mtshan den gnas// rgya mtsho'i sazhabaskor ba yi/ nga yi dam pa ri rab la// phyogs lha
nibazhi pa rnams// kun nas nges par gzhag par bya// kar sha pa Nabargyud dag gis// dkyil 'khor dang por rdo rje bri// de yi ge nas rnams de dag tu// gser gyi gdu bu dag kyang bya// sgo rnams re rer
don grub pa// rgyudang mtshul jig rten gsum// thub par nus pa gang yin pa'i// sgo srungs gnyis kyang gzhug par bya// de yang sngags dang ldan byazhing// kun tu gzhal yas rgyas par bya// jo jo
zhi de 'ju lu sna tshogs pa// sbrang rtsas tsugs shing gzabs pa dang// legs byas a shAka khar te// de bzhane khe le gnas 'khur dbul// dzitsam du ni rgyas ba phul// de tsam
dun 'grub par bashar// 'bras kyi kho thug tshul ka/ thug pa sbyar thug sa ma ta// bsdus tshan tshod ma sna tshogs pa// kha dog sna tshogs sor lngar ldan// de la sogs pa gang 'dod pa// lam sna
gas skyon med pa// yang na kham phor gsar pa 'am// pad+ma'i lom dag la gzhag 'asadang gro dang mon sun grebu// sa lu dang til 'bru rnams// stod gsar dag gzheng dugazhag/ yang
na gzhan du de bzhin gzhag/ hugs dang kha sa gang ba dang// btung ba bsal zhang zhum pa dag/ snod gsar dag gi nang dag tu// bzhag nas rab tu dbul bar bya// des nasu yang 'tsho mi
[P/ ]'gyur// dga' ba'i sems kyis zla 'dod la// kha zas dag kyang spyan par bya// de nas dga' bar bya ba ba phyir// ta la'i lo ma bsale yang dbul// dri'om pa ya dra kun gyis/ dkyil
'khor la ni mchod par bya// spos kyi phyam sna tshogs pa// mchog rnams kyis kyang de bzhinemachod// dzaya mu sa na la sogs// dri zhim thams cad sbyar bas mchod// a ka ru dang du ru ka/
shing gi thang chugs sbyar rnams// bdug pa'i rgyur bsngags pa yin// dngos grub sgo drung 'dug par bya/ yang nanang dusong nas ni// don byang phyogs kha blta zhing// lag na rdo rje tshul bzhin
bod// shin tu bkra shis tshigs bcad dang// de bzhin bde legs rdzogs pa gdon// de nas de ni rig sngags ma// rdo rje lcags kyu rtse mo na/ rdo rje'i rigs las byung ba yi// rig
sngags bstan pa gang yin pa// des na drag 'de bsrung bar bya// de nas thog mar spyan drang pa// rab de yi rtse moran// bdu gnas sgrachen gdon par bya// chos kyi chu klung spyan drang
ba/ dam pa 'di ni brjod par bya// bkra shis tshogs bcad brjod pa dang// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang// 'dus pa chen po'i mdo dag dang// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dag dang// rten
cang 'brel par 'byung ba de// ma nyams thatshom med pa dang// 'phags pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu// srong ge'i sgran dpa mod gdon// danas rdo rje rags kyi yum// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu bzlas/
denas kyang na rtsi mo can// de nas rdo rje rigs skyes kyi// rig sngags dgan gang 'dod dang// snying po bgro ljang gtum po dang// deyasnying dang 'dod pa yi// rdo rjem dang 'og pag can/ lug

rgyud dang gtum mo dang// gsaragadum rdo thog thog ma// de bzhin rdo rje khu tshur ma/ 'jorje thubadakar pho nya mo// chen mo bcudang drug cu bzhi// dang po blo gros rdo rjes/ gnyis pa rdo rje dril bus/
gsum pa rdo rje nag mo dang// bzhi pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa// lnga pa rdorje gong mo dang// drug pa yong 'og pag can// bdun pa rdorjeshug sa yanati// brgyad pa rdo rje nyi ma yin// dgu pa rdo rje
xxx
ka'angos byeng dang// bung ba blta ba chu klung dang// rdo rje ka ta ya na dang// bdug pas 'dzel dang srung ma dang// yon tan chen mo de la sogs// nges pa nyid du bzlas brjod bya// des nadakyil
'khor 'grub par 'gyur// nges par gnas pas rig sngags ni// mchogo u0f8bgyur rdo rje lcags kyu ma// bdug pa kun gyis rgyas pa yaM se// dkyil 'khor du nabargyudabargyud bablas// des na
sa su sgrub pa yi// rig sngags des ni grub par gyur// rig sngags gang la dga' ba des// dkyil 'khor du ni bzlas brjod bya// lag na rdo rjes ba shad pa yi// rig sngags mang po de ni
ni rna mchog 'dod dngos grub brjod pa yis// rinas skyo bar mi 'gyur spyad// de nas rdzogs par spyan drangs shing// gsang sngags rgyas par byas nas ni// de nas dkyil 'khor 'dod pa
chu kun dgazud pa yang na bshad par bya// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun dang// dkon mchog gsum la gtso bor 'dzani// dad cing mnyam par bzhag pa yi// mi dam tshig 'dzin du gzhug/
des na de la mkhas pa yis// bslab gzhi ldan sbyin par bya// ming 'di zhes bya ba bdag/ phyin chadanam 'tsho'o ther dag tu// srog gcod log par g.yem pa dang// rku dang btsun du rtsa ba dang//
'bru dang sbyar ba'i chang 'thung ba// rtag tu bdag gis spras zhes smos// nga slong gzhi me chog dang ldan pa de// blo gros rdo rjes bsrung bar bya// 'bogs par 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyi/ byin gyis
brlabs kyi tshigabang bya// de nas der ni bum pa bdun// chu narab tu blugs nas kyang// blo gros rdo rjes bsngags pa des// bdud rtsi zhes ni brjod pa yin// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i phyag rgyan// dril bur
bcas pas dran byed brjod// lag pa gnyis ka bla 'og sbyar// mabri'u chung mthe bod sprul bya zhing// bdud rtsi'i run blugs par gyu/ gos gtsangabagosashari rab bsdams ba// slabashig pa
la ngu 'bod ma// ma brjod rnams ni bsgo bar bya// 'di ni ngu 'bod chen po ste// 'phrog cing sdug bsngal chen po'i gces// 'di yis khyod ni dem tshagi las// nyams na myur du gdungs par
'gyur// khyod ni dam tshig shes rgyun// rgyun du bab par ma lus sbyin// des na khyad las mkhas pa 'di// 'khrugs pa'i sdug bsngal byed ma'agyur/ dam tshagi spangs pa gangayon dang//
dkyil 'khor du ni ma zhugs pa// de la dam tshig gzhan med pa// bstan bcos kyi no gzhung lugs yin// dmyal ba yod pa 'di ltos// nad rnams thams cad tshogs pa dang// 'byung po la sog
rnams kyis rgyas// khyod na de nyid ltung bar byed// gdon mi za ba'i sdig pa las// 'di la dpyad par bya ba med// rtag tu khyod kyis dam tshig srungs// rtag tu dkyil 'khor mched par gyis//
'on dang 'byung po sha za sogs// sdig byed de dag 'jug mi 'gyur// slob dpon la ni gus par bya// drag rdo rje 'dzin nyid yin// dra na khyod tsho 'bras bur bcas// khyed kyi
'anong 'bras bu yod// da ni dam tshig lha rnams dang// khyod mtshungs pa nyid du 'gyur/ rdzorje 'dzin pa 'i rgyal maMtshan 'dri// ji ltar rtag tu mdzes pa bzhin// de ltar khyod na yon tan gyis// dam
tshig nges par gnas par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje de blangs la// lag pa g.yon pas dril bu bzung// lag pa g.yas pas de yi g.yas// bzung nas kyang ni sbe bar bya// 'di skad rtag tu grub pa 'di//

sdug bsngal dag las sgrol ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin chen nyid dang ni// lhan cig tu na 'jug pa ra 'gyur// de nas grur na zhugs nas kyang// khor yug las na brgal bar bya// lag pa btang nas de la ni// dkyil
'khor thams cad bstan par bya// 'khrul pa med par me tog gis/ mdunabazhugs bde gshegs man chad dang// dkyil 'khor gang dang gang mthong ba// de dang de la bde bar mchod// de nas thams cad
tshu mthong nas kyang// yon gyi bum par dbul bar bya// blo can gyisan mtshan yang gzung// dam pa gzhan yang bdag gis bshad// rdo rje stang stabs 'grob dang// gad mo bcas par bsgyur ba dang// g.yon
pas kyang ni gdab par bya// seng ge 'i sgra sgrogs 'gying ba dang// mdzub mos hU~M yang bsgrogs byas te// thams cad ni tu byed pa'i mchog/ donas gzhan yang mi shes pa chog bzhin dunod par bya//
0slob dpon gus par legs bya zhing// dam tshig kyang nges par bstan// dil zan la sogs mon sran gre'u/ bdag nyid kyis na legs par bzla'o// lhag par bla mar gus byas dang// de la dag 'ba'
byas nas ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa non po dang// rig sngags rnams la sdug par gyur/ de nas rig sngags tshogs rnams la// yis rig sngags gang 'dod pa// de ni bsgrames rib klog bya zhing// dngos grub
'dod pas rtag tu mchod// de ltar slob dpon rgya chen tshogs rnams dang// lha dang lha mne mchog gzugs du ma yis// mthong zhing thos la 'brang bar 'gyur ba dang// rtag tu legs mchodarjes su

bstan pa yin rdo rje'i rigs ngang/8dang ldan pa las mnyes pa dkala'ang mang dang nyi ma las lhag pa de kho na nyid kyi ma dang dam pa'i yin tan dang ldan pa na chog tu gyur pa gang dang gang yanapa de dag ni dkyil

dbor dang dam tshig rang tu rtogs pas rtag du mthong zhing thos pa 'am/ sgrub pa'i tshul dang ldan par byas na dngos grub 'grub pa 'am phan pabang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje chen po thogs bzhin du rtag tu bdug pa dang/

me tog dang/ dringang/ lha bshos rgyas par dbul zhing spyan srag bya'o// de ltar gnas bzhi pa tshul 'dzin cang nyem gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i dakyil 'khor dam pa 'di norepal skyod dang ma chog du myur ba'i rtog
yanangs na/ dkya 'khor thams cad kyi rgyalapo nyid yin no// lag na rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyal po chen po'agan jorjedabang phyug chen po gnyis kyi dam tshig bshad pa lasags bzhade rdzogs so//

yas nub taye/ na maste badzra d+ha ra badzra pA Ni dza?ya/ na ma/ su badzaya/ namo phrodA tiye/ na mo badzra gAnAye/ na mo badzrasridaya ya/ na mo badzra ku pa'i ye/ na mo badzrad ku shAya/ naoM badzra kozla ya/
na mo badzrabi dzayAya/ na mo badzra sha/ ko khapo sha ba dzi yA ya/ na ma pra ba a brta/ badzra ku shi/ ma li mi li/ d+hi'i ha lo/ hi hi'i/ ki'i/ A kazla A ka/ ga ga ri/ khar kher/
b+ha ra b+hi'i/ ki li kil/ badzra ku lo so su ra/ gi rig raM/ ti'i ri/ b+hi'i b+hi'i/ A gats+tshA A gtsA// A naya ma ha ra sungatadz+han d+ha mun/ a tapa yam/ b.ru Nakyi bar/ anamA/ yan

ru ki ki ri/ tu ru tur/ tur tur/ badzra yi hA/ kodaM gAyi sAhA/ bgro ku shA ya swA hA/ badza yaM ku shAyi sA hA/ kA maM ku nA ye swA hA/ a dzA yaM ku shA ye swA hA/

ka ratsho ku shAye sA/ rdo rje lcags kyu de nyid na// 'di ltar rnam pa gzhan du yang// rdorje rigs chen gtso mo ste// 'bar ba chen mi mchog sbyin mchog/ rigs kyi yum ste
rigs kyi mchog/ las mchog kun gyis byed pa mo/ bcang dang grol ba thams cad kyi// las kun lan thung med pa// dam pa ci 'dra de bzhin 'dra// ba ma ci 'dra de bzhin 'gyug
snying po dang na mnge 'di yang// gtso bo dang nA mchog tu bshad// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang na// skad cig gsan 'odis bkug na// phyi rol rgyal po pho nya sogs// tshogs rnams ldan zhig
smos lha ya reb sa na mthong ba yi// rig sngags 'chang ba de la ni// 'grub par mi 'gyur gang yang med// gang zhig rab tu bsgrims nas ni// yum 'di rtag tu 'chad byed pa// dal
mchog kun 'grub par 'gyur// bcing ba dang ni grol ba la// rig sngags gsang sngags kun bdag 'gyur// nang dang phyi rol bcas pa yi/ 'khor dang ldan par byas na ni// gcig pu 'dzag
cha rten gsum mchog dang/ rnam pa gsum du 'gyur bar bshad// de dag thams cad khyad par du// stobs dang ldan par skyo bos brjod// mdor na yul 'di thams cad kyi// mchog gi
dam par bshad pa yin// de dag bsgrub pa'i dus dang ni// tha mal dus su rtag tu yang// ji skad bshad pa de bzhin du// rig sngags 'din sbyar bar bya// nam tsu ru hUM da/ tsu'u

kyid badzrad chen mo bud+d+ha gya sAhU/ lanaN+Dishu rtsa gcig bzlog brjod byas pa'i yungs kar gyi phyom gzhag par bya/ na maShA ku mutsu ru badzra pA Ni/ na mo bud+d+hA s+ya sA hA/ 'dis na mi tog dang
bdug pa dbul bar bya'o[” ]/na mo dri ma umame dus sa dum/ tsu ru tsu ru swA hA/ 'dase lha ngashos dbul lo// na mo badzra badzra/ badzra NibadriNi/ han han/ dehad ha/ pa tsang tsa/ ataM

sarba biganang nas kaM/ sa ma mA raya/ danahan/ uta swA da ya/ nisha ya/ bi d+h+waM sa ya/ sarbadutsati ta ma ma/ gu ru shu ru/ sid+d+ho ts+tshA badzra pA Ni/ rAdzA pa ya ti swA hA/ ma sbyar la sngag/
'dis shing bo ma can gyi ya ma srog shing ngam/ kAr A la ka pa'i yum srog shing dang/ skatsho dang/ lanatshudang/ tsha ba gsum rnams lhan cig tu sbyar te sbyin sreg byas na/ bgegs dang log 'dren gyi
gnod pa thams cad sel bar byed do// de nas de yi sgrub pa/ rig sngags 'changang kun gyis mchod// sgrung pa'i thangs nigang gas su// stobs chen 'di'i grub pa bshad// thams cad mkhyen pa thams
gzigs// sangs rgyas bgrub byed magon po dang// 'jig rten dag na ya mtshan gsang// rdo rje 'dzin la phyag 'tshal nas// lha rnams dang ni dri za dang// rig sngags 'chang dang lto 'phye ma/ shan tu a

mtshan gsang ba 'di// don kun 'grub byed mnyanapar gyis// gang zhig gsang ba'i rgyal po'i mchog/ 'di ni go sor 'chad byed pa// de la 'jig rten thams cad na// nga ka' las 'ag la bar byed pa med// ci ste sgrub
sa// ba'i de nyid shes// yang na dngos grub 'dod pa yis// chog ba zhan du kun byas na// sgrub pa pos ni thams cad 'thob// lha 'am sgyu ma yan rnams dang// gnod sbyin yang na ga
sngags 'chang// gzhan yang gang dag su yang rung// 'gal bar byed pa gang yang med// sangs rgyas sha ra da ti'i bu// jorje 'dzin pa chen po dang// rig sngags bdag gi bla ma la/ ci ste mchog tu
dad byed na// de ni kun las lhag pa dang// sems can kun gyis mchod pa dang// rtag tu dngos grub kun byed dang// gzhan gyi dngos grub 'jige par nus// dus kun tu ni gtsang ba dang//
gsang ba thams cad 'chad byed la// rage sngags 'chang gi go 'phang mchog/ gne tu sems par byed pa yi// cho gar ldan zhing rgyas par bcas// de ni ma lus bshad par bya// de nas lha dang lha ma yin//
mi dang rig sngags 'chang rnams dang// 'byung po' tshogs dang klu rnams dang// gnod sbyin rnams dang srin por bcas/ gsang ba mchog name nyan pa'i phyir// thams cad thal mo sbyar nas 'bod//
des na tshig don rtogs pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin pas de dag la// gsal bar bya phyir tshig 'di snyas// ngani dkyil 'khor dam pa dang// bla ma'i rigs na sngon mthong l// rdo rje dang ni rdo rje 'dzin// rig
sngags sgrub pa rtogs byas nas// zla ba phyed gsum bar du ni// cha gcig pas na bsgrub par bye// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rdzogs pa 'am// sku gdung ldan pa'i mchod rten der// rig sngags rdo rje
lcags kyu ma// rig sngags rigs kyi tshogs bskor ba// cho ga bzhin du byas nas ni// yid dang 'thad pas mchod par bya// mtshams bcad dang phyogs bcing dang// nus na kun nas bcad pa
dang / rtathams cad du na srung ba rnams// cho ga bzhin du legs par dgod// sna gsum rdo rjebakra shes dang// lcags kyu kha gdengs yungs kar gyis// tshul bzhin dang por mngon dag tu// rdo rje lcag
grub gzugs su bri// kha zas kyang na dekur gsum gyis// chog bzhan byas bza' bar bya// dus gsum yang nanub bdun du// bzlas brjod mchog gso brgyad brgya bya// donas derani rdo rjedang//
lcags kyu 'bar ba mthong bar 'gyur// dus gzugs las grub pa ngo// lha ya rig sngags 'chang bzhin 'gyur// 'jig rten gsum yang snang bar byed// sa steng dag kyang 'dar ba dang// 'jig
rten gsum yang g.yo bar na// bdag nyid kyis ni der mthong 'gyur// rig sngags rdo rje lcags kyu dag/ de nas de la bgrub par 'gyur// ri dgas kyis bskor gzhon nu ma'i// thad de dga' ba sgron
par 'gyur// de nas lha dang 'byung po dag rgyu mtshonam mkha'i sa gnas pa// dang ba med cingam grub rnams// da lta dga' bar gyur nas ni// don rnams kun yang byed par 'gyur// de bzhin du
nijo ltar yang// kun tu dngos grub ya mtshan can// mkha' lade bzhin byed par 'gyur// de nas ri deg rgyu ba dang// de yaM dga' mgur de bzhin byed// rtse dga' mchog tu shes par bya// den
yun du 'tsho bar 'gyur// de ni dga' bzhin mkha' la 'gro// lha ya rig sngags 'chang gas bskor// de na gcig pu ci dga' bsu/ rdo rje 'dzin pa yin bzhin du// lhag
par dga' ba'i gnas rnams su// rig sngags 'chang bas bskor bar 'gyur// de na da ku ber bani// dga' bar yang yang skye bar 'gyur// dus min par n shange rnams dang// me tog tshal
dang 'bras bu'i tshul// khang bzangayude du 'ong ba rnams// thams cad kyang na sprul par byed// 'on kyang 'din mdo tsam ste// 'dir ni de las bshad mi bya// rdo rje lcags kyu grub na na//
tshig tu brjod pa thams cad 'grub// las kyi dam pa 'di nyid kyis// thams cad kyang ni 'grub par bshad// dam tshig tshul bzhin mthong nas ni// dam tshig dag dang mkhas pa yis// sangs
rgyas rage sngags rdo rje 'dzin// bla ma tshul bzhin mchod par bya// bsgrims te mchod pa byas nas ni// lha bshos dag kyang tshul bzhin dbul// de nas 'dod pa kun sbyin pa// rdo rje lcags kyu ge/
sngags gdon// lha bshos dayachog dang// me tog bdug pas mchod byas nas// sgrub pa pos na nus kyis// dus gsum bzlas brjod byas nas// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas kyang// gdon
tsha3 gyi las rnams 'grub par 'gyur// des na gdon ni stong phrag rnams// dga' mgur yang na gzhag par nus// yang na g.yul ngor ma bzad 'jige/ gdon dag gi ni dkyil 'khor du// myur du gdon
na 'bebs pa dang// de bzhinagazhig dang gsad pa dang// b.rungadang brdeg dang gzer ba dang// ku co 'don du 'jug kyang rung// grong khyer dang ni gnas rnams dang// smras pa'i rje ni spo ba dang// rig
sngags dam pa bshad pa 'das// thams cad kyang na byed par 'gyur// babs pa de dag thams cad nga// pa wang dag kyang len du gzhug/ de bzhi nagar gyi chog rnams// yid 'ong yamtshan byed du
gzhug/ dgug dang rmi lam chog dang// de bzhin lcags sgrog gzhom pa dang// rgyal po'i pho brang dag ni// rtsod pa dag las lhag par rgyal// gzugs dang stobs chen ldan pa yi// rig sngags dorje
lcags kyum// gang gisnyinge la tshul bzhin rtag/ de yi den kun 'grub par 'gyur// skyes pa'i m yang na bud med dam// klu 'am lha yang dga' ba yod// da ni kun tu thams cad la// don rnams
thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rgyal bo dang blon po dang// blon po chen po na dunan 'don// zhag bdun yang na lngaya bar/ brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas dbang du 'gyur// gang zhagi 'tshabor bya 'dod n// de
yi gzugs de der bris la// lag pas mnan la bzlas brjod byu// gdon dang klu yi gdon yang rung// 'byung po 'byung po'i gdon dngani// kharan dordzogawar byas na// zhag bdun gyis na zlog
par 'gyur// bran mo dngani mi rnams kyang// zhag gsum gyis ni smug par 'gyur// dbang du bye bar 'dod n na// dor yang nyo shu rtsa gcig bzlas// brgyad brgyar bzlas brjod byas nan// bu dang
ba0 @#// bu mo chung ma dang// khyim thabs dang ni nor 'jog dang// i dang bzhon pa glang chen rta// ma pa dang ni gleng yang rung// zhag bdun gyis na myur bar 'thob// gzhan gyi rig sngagrwa/
sa rigs kun dang// gdon rnams kyang ni rgyag par 'gyur// khye'u dag dang bu mo rnams// nad kyis kyang nam rung 'gyur// robasregs sol ba'i ri mo yis// dgra yi gzugs ni der bris la// jayi
steng du bdag nas gang du gnom par 'dod pa der// gabrar bar byas te zhag bdun du// bzlas brjod dang na sbyin sreg bya// de ltar byas na gzir bar 'gyur// ci ste bu mo thob 'dod na// des na zhag
ba bdun bya bar bstan// zhag bdun 'bum du bzlas nAni/ bu mo'i mchog kyang thob par 'gyur/ rig sngags 'chang ba bdag nyid kyis// khros nas bzlas brjod byas na ni// grong khyer dug ni 'bar ba dang//
gser dang de bzhin 'jig pa dang// gdon dag gis ni 'debs par 'gyur// gang las rgyal 'dod dmag gi nang// 'dug nas kyang na bzlas brjod bya// grong khyer dbus 'dug bzlas nan// nad kyis grong khyer
dkrugs par gyur// grong gi dbus 'dug bzlasanani/ grongamand kyis dkrugs par 'gyur// dgon par 'dug nas bzlas na ni// gdug pa kun las thar par 'gyur// de nas yodanazhi ba yis// zhi
ba'i rig sngags brjod par bya// zhi phyi'i rig sngags brjong na ni// thams cad dun zhi bar 'gyur// gsad phyir rige sdugs bzlasanan// phan tshun du yang gsod par 'gyur// 'thab tu gzung phyirarige
sngags ba rjes/ 'thabamo mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur// shing skam bya na chul bzlas/ zla ba gcig gis lo na 'byung// kun dga' ra ba yade khong yang// zla ba gcig gas bshig par 'gyur//
tsa ste nyen rangs par ba zlas// chu dang phas dang ngag chos dang// 'bras bu rnam pa sna tshogs kyang// dam brag du sgyur bar byed// gzhan gyis bshon dung de bzhin du// shing rta'ing zhon pa 'joms
pa 'byed// ci stachu klung chen po ya// 'gram du song nas bzlas brjod byus/ las rnams gang dang gang 'dod dang// gongagang chogadzangazhan gang// dobanechog gtor ma dang// bzlas brjod tsun
sug gtsang byas na// des na don rnams thams cad kyang// byed 'gyur de la the tshom med// rtag tu bden sna bslab la dga'// dngos grub mchog chen thams cad ldan// 'byungang sgrub par 'dod
nan rtazhag gsum sgyed byas mar gyi ngo// bcu bzhi' nagator ma sbyin// zla ba drug gam zla ba phyed// shing dung yang n dgon par gnas// gcig pu sud nga mtshig byas la// slong mo yani
zas kyang ba phul// zladrug yang na zla bgacig/ lha bam gdon kyang gnas kyang rung// zla gcig phyugs kyi lhos su gnas// zho dang 'o ma marayang bza'// sku dung ldan pa'i machod rten drung/
zla gcig sna tshogs zas kyis mchod// zla ba gnyis n dur khrod du// gtor ma bdug pa gtsang sogs ma chod// thang ngam mchod rten drung dubarlas// des n 'byung po drug par 'gyur/ deng na 'byung pa
wa @#// dam pa gang// yang na thog mar gang 'ongs dang// gang tshe de la nye bar 'gyur/ gangan gang zhig sems kyis 'dod// de tsho na tubaston nag gi/ rdo rje thugs dag tu bzlas//
deamang na drisanus kyang// de nyid mang ni gzung bar bya// gcig pus da kyil 'khor byas na// rig sngags rdo rjelcags kyub tshogs// dril sogs pas legs mtshod nus// des na 'byung do
de dag dgug/ deyasamangabarjod 'byung po rnams// dga' nas der ni'idabar 'gyur// de nas des ni'i gus par mtshod// gzhan yang bongs nas mchod par bya// mang na gas bar brjod bya zhing/
skag byud mong la brtenanas ni// 'byung po sgrub tu 'grub 'gyur na// mi ni 'grub par 'gyur ba yin// de nas de la 'byung po rnams// kun nas skabar 'khor bar 'gyur// rgyal po'i zham 'bring
mthun byed bzhin// las kun yang na byed par 'gyur// de rgyal po'i dmag rnams la// smyal po chen pos byas pa bzhan// stobs chen 'byung po' sda dag la// bka'anA kun tu stsol bar
tshul byed sa stangs kun tu rtsa byed cing// 'byung po'abadag po kun gyis mchod// 'byung po dag gse phul ba yi// kha zas lnga sogs thams cad za// grongan gang la rgyal 'dod cing// yang na phan
par 'dod kyang rung// sgrub phyirayang nagazhag pa'i phyir// der ni 'byung po rnams kyang gtong// des namang gang ma bkug pa'i// 'byung ngo bam 'byung po'i tshogs kyang rung// de yalas mchog 'dod
de yi ming yang smyos par bya// ming ni smos pa de yisan// snyems pa med pa 'byung po yang// bkug ra med par myur dun// bka'a bzhi n byed par 'gyur ba bstan// den mi yi 'khor dag tu//
sgyu 'phrul du ma byed par 'gyur// lhag par 'byung po'i 'khor dag tu// spyodang sna tshogs byed par 'gyur// srog chags mi la sogasa rnams kyi// srog la dbang bar des 'gyugro/ 'byor par
blob ba phyir yang rung// yang na lusu nugazhag phyiredas// mang gis bkug pa'i 'byung po la// dga' bzhin bag kyang smra bar bya// mang la sogs pa 'di deg gi/ snan shin tu che ba dang// shin
du range bar byos shig ces// bsgon de la zhen byed par bgyur// de bzhin rkang lag bzhinamadog bsgyur// rod pa dang ni skam pa dang// ma rung bar ni byos shig ces// bsgon de tshodi bzhin byed//
dengazhan rnam pa mang po dang// shin tu 'jigs pa sna tshogs rnams// de bzhin zhi byed sna tshogs kyis// 'byung po sgrub pa rtse bar 'gyur// ma 'dod na yang ma rnams dang// 'byung po mang pos
mthong mi bgyur// rig sngags 'chang chen bzhin du 'gyur// gang zhig rig sngags rtag tu zlos// lha la yang ni phyag khaMtshal zhing// rtag tu 'byung po rnams la yang// kha zas rtse 'dod sbyin byed
po den ltog par bde 'gyur zhing// tshoyang lhag par bskal par thub// 'byung po mang po'i rgyal po'i mchog/ gtso bor yang na legyur ba dang// lha yi rgyal po 'drab yang// rgyan du bab
kru/ par bshad pa yin// rdo rje lcags kyu ma'i sgrub pa rdzogs so///rdo rje lcags kyu'i rigs la ni// rig sngags don kun grub byed pa// lha mo mchog
bgro grags pa 'di// sems can rnams kyis bstan par bshad// zla ba drug gas 'grub 'gyur te// tshog gas don kun byed par bstan/ rtsi sman thams cad blangs nas ni// srang gcig
nges pa gzhag par bya// na mo ratA trayA s+ya/ na mo badzrapa Na s+ya/ ba ta ba ra te/ bar ti ku shasam+pan mnas/ a ta ra to/ ba te/ yesi tsa b+ha te/ ato the/rupatu a / misA hA/ skugadung ldan
kha pa'i mchod rten drung// dus gsum bzlas brjod brgyad brgya bya// gtsang zhangetshangs par spyod pa yis// lha bshos me tog bdugapa dang// de bzhin mtshan mo mar me dang// mchod pa tsanus ci
(dga' bya// mtshoms gcad phyogs bde bsrung brnanas// rtag tu rdo rje lcags kyus bya// de ltar rtag tu brtson pa la// danazla ba drug gis 'grub// danas 'dod chags la sogs dang// smachen
mnyam par 'jog par 'gyur/ nad dang sman kun ston pa dang// gtam rgyud thams cad smra bar 'gyur// sgrub pa po la legs nyes rnams// tshig gis ston dang smra bar byed/ gsang sngags de'atshog ni

a'adi yin te// bsam nyams pa 'tshon rtsa phyin med pas bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rje'i sku gzugs drasate/ lha mo'ang com ldan 'das kyi zhabs la 'dud par byas nas/ yar gyi ngo tshes gcig la brtsamyu

te zas su kho ma dang phyob 'dag guza zhing/ dus gsum du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan rer bzlas brjod byas ngas lag na rdo rje la bstan par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das dang lag na rdo rjel mchod pa khang rtag
du byas te mjug tu zhag gsan sbyang ba byas nas/ zla ba nya' nub mo brgyad stong gas bsnunal ci 'byor pas mchod na 'grub par 'gyur te don thams cad ston par byed do// gzhan yang tshes bcugazhes nas/

brtsams tanya'i bar du gtsang zhangedasaM pa dang ldan par byas te/ sa la bcom ldan 'das dang/ lag na rdo rje dang/ lha mo dang/ sgrub pa po rnams dge bsnyenal 'dra'i bcug ste/ skugadung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten

gyi drung du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchod pa byas nas sna ma'i mi tog brgyad brgyal lan brgyad brgya sbrags kyis btab nas phung po lngar bcad de/ da rnams las cha gcig bcom ldan 'das la dbul bar bya'o//
lhag ma rnams ni phyogs bzhir gtor bar bya'o/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba de dag las kha gag blangs te ras dkar po'i nang du phul nas sngas su bcug ste nyal bar bya'o// khom dang/ phyi'i bdag

gu rung// bras dkar po za zhing mo tog dkar po dang dri dkar po phul nazla ba nya la 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas gang gi nyin par yang rung ste/ rnyog de bzhin du sna ma'i me tog brgyad brgya la lan brgyad brgya bzlas
brjod byas te mchod pa byas la/ lhag ma'ang de bzhin du gtor nas nyal na rmilam du thams cad ston par byed do// cho ga gsum pa ni mo long la bsgrub par bya'o// mchog 'groma'i rig sngags kyi chog/
rdzogs so///na mo rat+na tra yA s+ya/ rnamash+tsaN+Da badzrapA s+ya/ ma hA ya kA sa nA pa tigyu/ e hibadzrapA Ni/ i daM ba han/ ma nu smarag rgyu man tsa ba la

la ti gti/ ma hA akA s+ya nu pa badzra pA Ni/ hi hi heha mi ha hi/ ha ku ru ha ka ru/ ku ku ku'u/ ku badzra pA Ni/ sa ra sa ra/ ba rib ri/ ha hihahahahe/ ku ku shu ku ku// badzrapA Nis nA/ 'di na snying

wApo spyan drang ba'o// de la 'di ni lag na rdorje'i snying po yan no// sad+d+hA tra a par dzitaM sarba tra a pra tihetaM/ sarba tra azla sa d+hanan o dzaste jogam N+NaM/ sArU pa tshu pa dar naM/ ki li ki li/ mo lul

brda ru taM badzra tu taka ra kri tu karanar Na dzanaM/ ad lhan sid+d+haMpar ma sad+d+haM/ ba tsa yaM tsatsing tre/ ba kaMs kaMr kar ta ka raMshAtika// puShAka raM/ sA pa nopar da/ tsan daM/ saT+Ta zlaany+dzas d+hA kaM/

AkaraNaM/ badzra pA Ni s+ya/ bol la panaM/ badzrapA Nis/ has pa ni/ badzra pA Ni@#/ pa ra mgyod ya e daM/ badzrapA Nis+ya/ badzra pA nure ma hAyakase nA pa tirA dzA ba ya ti badzra Na/ han ti/ da ha te/

pa tsati/ tsan+dati/ ts+tshan+ti ti/ badra pa ya ti/ A lo ka ba lokaMka ro ti/ hi lin/ li mi la/ o u ho u b+ha badzra pA Ni/ hur chu ru/ saM b+haM badzra b+hany+dzaye dut+taM na/ hranahan/ du hu du hu/
patsadatsa/ grin+d+hagragaM/ saMhuM ka ro hiha la hal ya swA hA/ hu lu hu lA ya swA hA/ hi li hi li ye swA hA/ ka la ka lA ya swA hA/ ku lu ku lu ye swA hA/ kili kI li ye swA hA/ ke li ke lIl
sA hA da yaman sma ra badzra pA Ni/ ma hAyaka sanA pa ti sam ya pra tiya? su te'u tirU pa pa sha gnA ma myi tsa ra su ma tu tAs ma yaMbya tIkram/dam/ sa ma yobashAn+ti/ hi li hi na a laM/ ku'u
nu pra da gat+to snya myur ma ha rab rA hi ri li/ nil brjod kyi ti li/ dalaM/ bshi ma nu brta 'o Ni/ niri Nes ma yAnub rta hir mi ra a bA haya ni/ sa twaM badzra pA Ni ma ma hi/ sA ya mu pa tiSh+Tha

sA te/ 'di ni de'i bdug nga 'i sngags so// la ha la ho nga lo tu u ny+nyo/ u b+ha/ gu ru chu/ b+hany+dzab+hany+dza ba bye ma ka ra ha deswAhA/ lag na rdo rje phyag 'tshal bcas/ rtsed mo can zhes bya ba yi//
snying po 'di ni 'jig rten grags// de na 'dod dgur sgrub pa yi// gang zhig dngos grub mchog 'dod cing// bad yo sgrub pa'i don shes pa// des na rdo rje sgrub pa'i mchog/ ya mtshan 'di ni
bsgrub par bya// de nas rim pa ji bzhin du// bdag gis legs par bshad par bya// dam pa'i don gyi rjes mthunopa// thub la spyi bos phyag 'tshalabo// gser ram ra gan zangs la sog
ya ngonan dan dmar po las// rdorje rtse mo brgyud pa 'am// yang na rtsamo bzhi par bya// sor gsum yang na drug gam brgyad// yang n sor nabatsuganyis pa// zur brgyadan tu rdzogasab
'am/ yang na zur ni drug du bya// de nas dgon pa'i m rang ga me// gtsang zhing mnyam pa'i sa phyogs su/ ba lang lcabs dkyil 'khor tsug/ sku gdung mchog dag 'gatsang ma yis// de ya stong
la du drim pa'i/ smos kyi dkyil bar rgyug par bya/ mungs kar shul rdzag bsams kyang// dbus dag ni gnag par bya// de yi steng du rdo rjede/ dri dang me tog
